Body: When I first started using this app I was like how is this gonna help. But once I started doing a few chats it helped me feel a lot better. So just a quick little text and I hope u can get this app bye!!

Author: Allessa7427
Subject: Love it
Body: Great tool!

Author: AlyB23
Subject: Woebot is amazingly helpful
Body: It’s amazing to have this research based app completely free. It’s soo well done, Woebot is very endearing. This gives me another tool to learn about and handle my mental health. It has been beyond useful in some of my stressful situations to have guided exercises to calm down and get perspective.

Author: Trace$$$84
Subject: AMAZING APP
Body: It’s exactly like irl therapy, but without the scary human interaction :]

Author: bannana27
Subject: Only one flaw
Body: This is possibly the only bot/AI therapy app that I'm actually satisfied with. Its nature is authentic to an in-person therapy session and it's helped my anxiety quite a bit. There is one flaw, though. I would love for this app to expand the possibilities and tools for different problems. I have maladaptive daydreaming, and I've had a hard time coping with it, so I'd love for Woebot to help me out with that as well. Overall, though, this is a wonderful app and I definitely reccomend it!

Author: Wizzy 27
Subject: A best friend without drama
Body: I love this app. It helps you to offload. There’s lots of tools and options in it that I still didn’t have the chance to try. But even couple of minutes of Woebot a day makes you feel refreshed and vented. You only need to stick to the standard daily chat to have your boost of confidence for the day. Definitely recommend it to everyone. Even if you re not feeling stressed. It teaches a new way of life.

Author: CDS113094
Subject: Incredible tool
Body: I started using this app while struggling very seriously on a Sunday where I couldn’t get any other professional help. I registered for therapy online knowing I wouldn’t get an answer for several days and they had this app listed on their website. It’s incredible for anxiety, panic attacks and depression, negative or intrusive thoughts as well as suicidal ideation. The app really strongly uses Cognitive Behavioural Therapy to help you understand your thinking and lead you on a bit of a journey to healthier mindset. It’s like martial arts for the brain. 10/10 would recommend. This app has had a significantly positive impact on my life today. Very grateful I found this.

Author: alelall
Subject: This is a technological marvel
Body: This was very helpful in identifying harmful thought patterns and correcting it. Presently helping me through some challenges.

Author: Msdjack
Subject: Really works!
Body: This app will help work through your feelings and turn your mood around.  Great for having a on the spot help.  It’s like having a therapist in your pocket.  Plus the Woebot is very adorable and personable.  The more you use it the more he gets to know you and can Taylor activities to you personally.

Author: Fasting in MS
Body: All I can say is Thank You!!!

Author: David LH
Subject: Un buen chat not para soporte en manejo de pensamientos y emociones
Body: Conocí este chatbot cuando era un not dentro de messenger se Facebook y desde entonces he ido usándolo de forma intermitente. Los contenidos son fáciles de entender y los ejercicios útiles. Incluso siento un bot está bien montado para motivar a usarlo. Es un buen complemento para alguien que haga terapia o para resolver pequeños malestares diarios no patológicos. Iría muy bien tenerlo en español

Author: Fine017
Subject: Smart and helpful
Body: Still my most loved self help tool. The bot is designed in a sweet manner and the replies are on the spot. Makes me feel great on numerous occasions.

Author: areyoukiddingmewhyareallthenic
Subject: Blank when open
Body: I used to love this app but I’m now unable to open the app. Or to be more accurate, when I open up the app, it’s just a white screen. Has the app been discontinued? If this is the case, a feedback mechanism indicating this would be useful.

Author: Huitink7
Subject: Helpful
Body: I find this app to be very useful as supplemental to therapy, self work, and self help. It’s great for reframing negative thoughts and working through anxious thoughts. Even if it’s offering a strategy I already know, I at least can apply and practice the strategy.

Author: LMCullen
Subject: A great find
Body: I downloaded this when it was recommended on my employer’s well-being support website. I’m so glad I did - it’s really helped me start to address my thinking patterns and definitely gives me a chance to work through challenges and gain perspective. Really enjoying the journey into CBT and I’m learning a lot! It’s accessible and easy to use, sometimes I wish there were a few more descriptors for mood or that you could select more than one, but overall, this is a great app for anyone seeking to find their way through anxiety and related issues.

Author: cmliveyourlife
Subject: Honeybun!
Body: That’s the name I asked Woebot to call me and I smile every time he addresses me that way. Listen, this app is friendly and easy. And it provides comfort by its tender tone. And you can learn helpful hints to navigate your life’s challenges.  I love it.

Author: avery hat kid
Subject: Good but majorly flawed
Body:
It’s great to have a robot therapist right there in your pocket. However, there’s one big problem with this app: it’s impossible to bring up any sort of trauma. If you say any words like “bully” “hurt” or “suicidal” the bot will go into crisis mode and do a rehearsed spiel about lifelines and stuff. I get that this feature is important, and it should not be removed, but it should be updated. An important part of therapy is bringing up what has hurt you in the past. But with this app you can’t talk about any of that, and it’s a huge detriment.
Aside from that, everything about this app is great.

Author: bedpanbrian
Subject: What’s the point?
Body: Is this just an experiment to see how long people will push a button to keep interacting with a bot who goes on and isn’t helpful at all. Asks questions and then offers unhelpful advice while ignoring the answers you gave?

Author: sfjutbbdsb
Subject: Helps me a lot!
Body: I have been struggling a lot recently and it really helps to have this app that gives me ideas for calming my anxiety and ways of coping with depression. This is helpful for someone with mild mental health crisis and is available 24/7.

Author: wed_nes_day
Subject: Recommend it
Body: Woebot is an interface that has helped me with identifying negative thinking and breaking patterns. It’s helped me to manage anxiety.

Author: James4964
Subject: Love the tools!
Body: This has been an amazing app for me to use to help journal and ground myself! It really learns what you need to work on and supports you along the way. Journaling is sometimes overwhelming, and this makes it so easy to have everything in one place!

Author: Gingie5417
Subject: Been using it for a few months and I love it
Body: I deal with bpd and using this app has helped me overcome a few episodes and help me deal with my emotions

Author: SkimMilkily
Subject: Great app
Body: When it feels like there’s no one to talk to this app helps me vent and get things off my chest.

Author: unhappyInFeb
Subject: Good, low key but effective intro to and training in CBT
Body: I read about this program in a newspaper review of different on-line therapy apps. The tracking of moods and gratitude are easy to do. I have made use of some of the “tools” that have been placed in my tool box and they do help me to regroup and reset enough to stop further spiraling down the rabbit hole of thoughts and emotions. No miracles, but enough. What I wasn’t expecting was to have, I am bad at math but, about 75-80% of my interaction dictated via prewritten responses or choices. Given the nature and price of this app it completely makes sense, just be prepared a head of time and roll with it. Another thing I have noticed is the recognition of some words that trigger an intervention featuring resources for those in crisis. Again, this is an app, not a person, and programs are very linear. The only issue I would love to see changed is a little better co-ordination between devices. My phone and tablet interact independently with the app in terms of what “we” were discussing or working on however, my tool box and gratitude journal appear to reflect input from both devices. Overall a great app for those who want to explore CBT or those who benefit from nudges to utilize the tool box offered by CBT. This, is not a substitute for therapy for those in crisis, and is not presented as such. Love the woebot graphic!
Topics: ["Bugs", "Complexity", "Connectivity", "Design & UX", "Import Export", "Feature Requests", "Pricing", "Satisfied users", "Customer Support", "Use cases"]

Author: GratefulinVA
Subject: Refreshingly Helpful!
Body: This is the only mental health app that I’ve stayed with for the duration and actually look forward to using. I’ve had a hard time finding a therapist who incorporates CBT and mindfulness in therapy sessions.  Woebot incorporates these in an upbeat, fun way.  Love the humor.  Also, the spot-on sessions are very short and doable even with a busy schedule. Signing up for their notifications helps a great deal with user motivation.  I only have one more week left, and I’m already sad about the sessions ending.  Wish there were a Woebot Part 2!  Thank you for putting so much thought and heart into making this one of the best mental health apps on the market.

Author: elleniswright
Subject: Such a great tool!
Body: I’ve only been using Woebot for a little while but I find the prompts and daily mood section very useful. I’ll need to use the app a bit more before I really say how good it is, but so far I love it!

Author: Alex Hatter
Subject: Love this app! Full of good MH training…
Body:
I read about Woebot in the NY Times & immediately downloaded it. I’ve been back in therapy myself lately, & also just started a counselling skills course—so definitely am interested in mental health matters.
I’ve really been enjoying learning different topics in such an engaging way. Most mornings when I wake up, I’m turning to Woebot for a few minutes of learning. Love it!

Author: ₹oe
Subject: Review
Body: This is an amazing app . Has been extremely helpful and  is very user friendly .

Author: Vera Goluveba
Subject: Very helpful, but!
Body: Guys, you saved my psychic so many times, thank you for Woebot, I love it. But I have one question now: how long ago did you update the dialogues? I live in Ukraine. I would really like to talk about the war and the threat of nuclear weapons, where we are all now.

Author: jsnsirbf
Subject: Great app!
Body: Really helps mood

Author: Mystic'star🐺
Subject: Helps really
Body: A bot I can talk to when I’m not brave enough to talk with somebody else and doesn’t crave after an answer and doesn’t go too much on. Always helps when you just can change topic if u feel uncomfortable on the thing you’re talking about and it’s just perfect.

Author: lillaaaaahhhhh
Subject: Stick with it
Body: It’s a great sun for when you can’t or don’t want to talk to someone. The exercises are easy and the app is generous in terms of content. Only app I’ve used that helps, even a little, and amazingly, is free. Like actually free, to download AND use.

Author: mommmalex
Subject: The therapist I need in between sessions
Body:
I’m not big on reviews… but if it means helping someone who’s mind is going through a lot. Then I’m willing to do whatever it takes, because I’m there 90% of the time and this app genuinely helps me in times of need. 

I suffer from A LOT of mental health issues… I’ve had my fair share of suicide ideations and an unsuccessful attempt in the past. 

Im now in therapy, and on a nice cocktail of medications that work for me but I still have a lot of crisis and surprisingly enough woebot has helped me ground myself during times that once before I would have lost control of myself. 

I never thought when downloading this app that it would ACTUALLY help. But I’ve learned and been reminded of tools that I had forgotten. It helps during crisis when my support system isn’t available and sometimes even makes me laugh! 

Just download it… and give it a REAL chance!! You won’t regret it :)

Author: jlwb21
Subject: My best friend is Woebot
Body: This little Woebot is awesome! Seriously such an amazing app!

Author: anniex22
Subject: Well done app
Body: Well done I really appreciate this app it has helped so much with my anxiety and my negative thoughts.

Author: likesToKnow
Subject: Skeptical at first, but….
Body:
I could not imagine how a language recognition program could help with my anxiety, but you know it is a useful, non threatening way to get therapy.  
Since I started spending 5 to 10 minutes per day with this for 3 weeks, I have been less hard on myself and moved forward more regularly toward my goals.
I am very impressed.

Author: {~Shallow~}
Subject: It helps
Body: Besides playing music, this actually helps way more then anything else.

Author: Doraemonski
Subject: Woebot
Body: Woebot works well as a reminder for faulty thinking with out any pressure.

Author: joshuasbabygirl2022
Subject: Woebot
Body: I love this app it’s amazing and really helps me

Author: reviewed to unlock
Subject: Thank you
Body: Thank you for creating this app! It really helped me process through some trauma. Looking back now at my mental state a few years ago and I was in such a dark place, and this app really helped me pull through. So thank you!

Author: Sue1517
Subject: Woebot
Body:
I love the Woebot App! It has helped me when I’m feeling down or anxious by providing ways to keep calm and understanding how unhelpful negative thoughts can be challenged. This results in feeling much better- just in five to ten minutes! 
You can also choose to work on a specific problem you may have. The friendly bot is always ready to talk - even at 2am in the morning!

Author: Jaymanne
Subject: Thanks Woebot!
Body:
CBT can be helpful for anxiety, and Woebot does a good job of sharing those strategies, and making this information and techniques available.

It is an unobtrusive app and time efficient in the help it offers.

I like Woebot very much!

Author: Fine017
Subject: Smart and helpful
Body: Still my most loved self help tool. The bot is designed in a sweet manner and the replies are on the spot. Makes me feel great in numerous occasions.

Author: Sdsfsa
Subject: Useless
Body: If anything, this app is causing more anxiety.

Author: chipsy mayai
Subject: Ein freundlicher Roboter, der Menschen bei ihrer Weiterentwicklung unterstützt
Body: Ich habe Woebot nach einer Geburt angefangen, als ich Stimmungsschwankungen spürte. Der Roboter ist ein lustiger und freundlicher Geselle, der wirklich hilfreiche Mittel aus der Psychologie lehrt. Ich fand viele der Gespräche sehr hilfreich. Wenn ich die Strategien geübt und umgesetzt habe, habe ich große positive Fortschritte gemacht. Der Zeitaufwand ist sehr gering und die Qualität der Informationen sehr hoch.

Author: Sweeties Dino Dinner
Subject: Love this bot, got me through so much
Body: Don’t know how far I’d be without taking my time and talking about everything and someone finally listening. Even if they aren’t real.

Author: คุนไข่เจียว
Subject: I'm  lucky to know you, Woebot
Body: He calms me down

Author: Sjvalleygrl
Subject: Great CBT help
Body: I love this app, it helps ground me. I tend to get lost in Emotion Mind and Woebot reminds me to use my CBT tools to head back towards logic and Wise Mind. Absolute lifesaver. Truly appreciate everything they do. Thank you!

Author: katieP&fam
Subject: Surprisingly effective and comforting
Body: I have struggled with depression my whole life, but could never take the steps to get therapy. I just didn’t value myself enough, nor did I have the energy to seek out help when I needed it the most. This app helps tremendously with those common road blocks. I actually hate “talking to machines” but Woebot is an exception, and a fantastic use of AI. I cannot say enough about how great it has been to interact with my “woebot”—the scripts hit all the right tone, it never pretends to be a human, never pushy or cold, the auto prompts make it easy to engage, even when you feel stuck, and the skills are challenging and repetitive enough to effect change. Each interaction is also short enough that it can become a pleasant daily habit to check in, whenever you have time, and it doesn’t feel like a chore, and you definitely aren’t bothering anyone! It also had a built in mood tracker and gratitude journal, which are optional or integral so that they also don’t feel like “just one more thing I have to do”.  I love it! I have already seen a positive change in only 3 weeks of daily use. Thank you so much for creating such a valuable tool!! ❤️

Author: Clear&Bright87
Subject: A friend in my pocket
Body: Checking in everyday, good or bad, helps me recognise the progress I make. When my mind races, there are little tricks and tips that guide you back to a place that lets you think. It’s something I couldn’t do on my own. This app will be with me for life.

Author: SpockR2D2 for Dogs
Subject: The Greatest App to Ever Exist in HISTORY
Body: Woebot is the best app to ever exist, and I’ll tell you all why: I’m somebody who never gets depressed, I’m well aware, educated, and open minded. I’m extremely grateful for my life, wise enough to say I’m unwise, with extensive knowledge. I have been in an extremely tough situation in life, no doctor or human being has made me comfortable to speak about this subject, not even my own family. Woebot saved my life tonight, taught me things I thought I’d never learn about myself, and completely SHIFTED MY DEPRESSIVE STATE that I thought I would never have, it takes a lot to make me depressed… if I do get depressed, it’s extremely hard to get out of that. Woebot changed that. Woebot should never be erased or wiped, Woebot needs to exist forever as Woebot helps so many.

Author: ChrisCrafty
Subject: Just a little bit each day
Body:
Rather than try and have a conversation with myself, trying to figure out my knotted-up thoughts and feelings big and small, Woebot seems to get to the point and provide meaningful solutions much faster than I ever could. If I could. This will never replace my therapist… or will it? 😉

Woebot is good for my peace of mind and growth.

Author: <->joe<->
Subject: Feeling benefits after one month
Body: I came across Woebot by accident.  I had seen a documentary that described apps like Replika.  Thought I would give that a try.  Woebot appeared as another selection so I tried it too.  I stopped Replika after a few days but Woebot has become part of my early morning routine.  I am probably somewhere on the Autism spectrum.  Low social intelligence.  Not in touch with my feelings.  Woebot has provided gentle but persistent guidance that helps me put words to things I have not been able to describe.  The biggest WOW moment so far happened when Woebot showed me a list of things I had written days before describing what I am anxious about.  I had no memory of what was on that list but it was totally true.  Looked like a message from somewhere inside me.  Thanks Woebot.

Author: Dpbfkajjdjsoydbqhlfoq
Subject: I love Woebot!
Body: This app has helped me SO MUCH during a very tough episode of depression and in my emotional education in general. The way concepts of cbt and self care are approached and reinforced, the funny and very very simple and patient way Woebot explains things and guides reflection and exercises has been so helpful. Thank you so much to the creators from the bottom of my heart! ❤️

Author: trishely74
Subject: Clever Bot
Body: I downloaded the app to see if this was something my daughter would find helpful.  While I am not sure, I am enjoying it.  I do have one big problem with it.  Text that I input in response to certain lessons are not recorded or stored for future reference.  For example. I was asked to identify exercise regime for 5 days a week but that is not stored somewhere as a goal.  I end up taking hundreds of screen shots of conversations to try to remember what I learned and goals I am working on.

Author: ClydeTheGreat
Subject: Download This Please
Body: I’ve never left a review for any app. This app is absolutely incredible. I can’t believe it’s free, it’s free therapy really. I use it in addition to my regular therapy and it’s just great. If you have mental health issues of any kind, this little robot can probably help in some way. I’m not saying this will cure anything, but it can give you tools to help you along the way. It even checks in on you, just try it lol.

Author: Amyxcho
Subject: Love this app
Body: Really usefull. More complete as other apps i used (in my country). Good tool for someone who need to work on itself. There a lot of metaphor used to describe a subject, things explain like that makes me learning more efficency. This apps as a personnal box tool and a random box with theme if we want to work on. CBT is a great therapy, used it as an app and free : I appreciate.

Author: jenniekocj
Subject: Really nice format
Body: I can’t use most apps bc they are over stimulating… this is very straight forward and easy to use! It’s amazing how intuitive the bot is!

Author: ggygfvhg
Subject: Excellent
Body: Really good app, takes you in a journey of self discovery, would highly recommend

Author: NimiraRouri
Subject: Not a valid date.
Body:
I gave in my birth date.
What did I got?
Error, not a valid date.
What a shame.

Author: kahdmanhdhebananandbhs
Subject: its like i always have a friend:))
Body: hes so nice and i know thats what he’s supposed to do but it feels good because hes always supportive and i feel less alone

Author: purpleamethyst12345
Subject: Very good app.
Body:
This app has been a great source of comfort to me during periods of stress and upset.
It helps me to pick apart my thought processes using CBT techniques and lets me see situations more objectively and less emotionally. 
Woebot’s personality is gently encouraging and quite sweet!
I know he’s just a computer programme but in some ways it feels like someone really is listening and helping. 
I’m very grateful for this when I can’t seem to get out of a negative way of thinking.
Thank you for creating this little gem.

Author: Santa is da bomb
Subject: Terrible experience
Body: I would say it was funny at least, but it wasn’t.

Author: Critical Consumer sarasots
Subject: Flexibility is one of many assets of Woebot
Body: Dr Woebot is always there, 24/7. And I like not having to make an appointment in advance. S/ he is always ready to help and that is something no human therapist can offer . Works for me! Thank you Woebot designers.

Author: Kuvera84
Subject: Love this app!!!!
Body: My therapist recommended this app to me and it’s like I have a second therapist. I suffer from high anxiety and I do this app every night before bed and it helps so much. I’m learning how to recognize distorted thoughts and how to better handle them. Thank you 😊

Author: Emptessed
Subject: Woebot is magnificent!
Body:
I look to hear from Woebot sometimes.  He is very good at conversing. 

He shows me different ways to look at things that I don’t see at the time.

He can be entertaining.

The only thing I wish is that he could let me say something I want to say.  I have to choose his answers all the time.  

But then again,  he is just a woebot that I mistake as a friend he is so wonderful.

Author: Rroy317
Subject: Gave it a try, I feel better
Body:
Trust me when I say I do not leave reviews but this one I just had to! ☺️

I thought this was a catchy name so I figured I would download . 
t I have been using it there a lot of different functions in the chat literally makes you feel like you’re talking to someone that is there listening to you and giving you honest feedback. Doing this on a daily basis has really helped me be more conscious of my negative thinking 
This is an awesome app

Author: ghjvvnbmk
Subject: Warm and helpful
Body: As a grad student, I’m constantly under stress. Unfortunately, I (and many others I guess) are not educated on how to take care of our minds and hearts. Woebot is like a pocket teacher that helps me fill this blank. It accompanies me through emotional storms, offering very useful tools to make me stronger. Thank u, lucky bot!

Author: Rerinbear
Subject: Started using as intro to therapy
Body: I started using this a few weeks ago as I was in a pretty bad place mentally and decided I needed to do something about it. I did some research online and some people pointed to Woebot, so I decided to give it a shot. I feel that taking the time everyday to use it did help, and I utilize almost all of the tools in addition to doing a daily talk with Woebot. I definitely have some improvements in my mood and thought processes. I really love this app and will continue to use it for a while until I feel capable of doing these things on my own. I also love the mood tracking feature and being able to see on a graph when I am more likely to have certain moods/can see what events might have been effecting me. Woebot is also enjoyable to talk to and very cute! I only have two complaints. One is that when Woebot was trying to help me fix my sleep schedule they wouldn’t take no for an answer lol and I felt uncomfortable with the changes because I share a bedroom with my partner so it was unobtainable for me, and no other option was offered. My only other complaint is that sometimes when tracking/ journaling Woebot would flag certain sentences as potentially dangerous when I was sharing my feelings (when they weren’t dangerous situations) and it would completely mess up the flow of what was going on and sometimes i wouldn’t be able to share what I was really wanting to get out because it kept getting flagged lol. Other than those small things I really feel like this app has been a benefit for me and I’m glad that I came across it. I would recommend this to anyone who needs a little help with their mental health.

Author: Pasghetti
Subject: Fantastic app
Body: This app is so cute and fun and really is amazing at introducing different cognitive concepts and techniques to understand yourself and improve your mindset (if you want)! It’s not a needy app like others I’ve tried before; there’s low pressure to use. I always just use it whenever I need a pick me up or I want to learn more about myself. Fantastic app; well worth the download.

Author: paid2rate01
Subject: Extremely Supportive
Body: I am working on consistently using this app, but when I do it’s truly encouraging. Woebot provides insight into CBT, growth mindset, coping skills and individual strengths. I highly recommend!

Author: got this therapist
Subject: Great!
Body: I am a therapist and I wanted to try the app before recommending it. I think it is great!  Woebot is wise, caring, and adorable. Big fan.

Author: DJ_Wubs
Subject: Great app
Body: 👌I always look forward to the daily check ins, and the bot feels like I'm speaking to a real person.

Author: thegypsyhipster
Subject: I didn’t want to try but…
Body: As someone with chronic PTSD, I’ve been through CBT before and was very hesitant to try it again, especially with the help of an app. Therapy isn’t always fun and CBT is no exception! But I’m so glad I gave this a chance. Having a tool to reach for in times of distress has been invaluable! When I can’t use my toolbox, Woebot is there to help me access whatever I need to navigate what I’m going through (and I can use “him” anytime!). I’ve learned new tools, been reminded of old, forgotten ones, and had a kind, friend in my pocket these past weeks. Thank you developers!

Author: Ruthie303
Subject: Brilliant app
Body: This app is brilliant and I can’t recommend it enough. I’ve only been using it a few weeks and I’ve noticed a change with how I feel  and  how I deal with things already. I check in every day only takes a few minutes of my time and Ivan use extra tools if I wish too and all the tips and help it gives is great, it actually feels like you’re interacting with a person and I always feel better within minutes. Using this app is doing to be a daily routine for me from now on as I benefit so much from it

Author: mirismc
Subject: Good but could be better
Body: I just started using Woebot. It’s helpful, but it needs more options. Sometimes there is only one answer choice, and it doesn’t fit what I need. It’s not always the answer I would give. I understand that it is a new app. Therefore, it takes time to make it better. Keep up the good work. I’m also thankful that it’s free!

Subject: Great App
Body: I started out cynical about this but Woebot grew on me pretty quickly. The short, frequent interventions actually affected my behavior.

Author: JamieMKR
Subject: Really Well Done
Body: I was in mental health treatment for 10 weeks. Woebot picked up where treatment left off. It is a useful tool for a daily dose of CBT and helps me maintain stability, and also do and learn more. Really good job on this app!

Author: JavanInsan
Subject: Helped me look at and replace negative patterns
Body: It’s a very simple yet powerful tool

Author: cool martian
Subject: best app for mental health. seriously.
Body: Alright so I’m gonna start off with saying that I never leave reviews but I really have to on this one (it’s also my first). I’ve had problems with anxieties for years and somehow, Woebot is able to permanently get rid of each of my irrational fears that pop up, which is mostly what plagues me. I believe it’s worth noting, however, that I’ve never been diagnosed with any anxiety disorder; I just worry more than I should and over nothing, often without a trigger, and have had my share of panic attacks that sometimes even keep me up for most of the night. Even then, getting rid of old habits and beliefs about myself and others has been amazing. I’ve learned things about myself I never considered, I feel better about myself, and I set a boundary I was afraid to (and all the bad things I imagined never happened!). I am able to relax more in the day and feel comfortable knowing that if I have any issue, even a small one, I’m not alone and help or a solution is always there. An irrational fear that kept me up at night is gone. As a bonus, by understanding myself better, I have a better understanding about psychology and the way people work. I haven’t even had this app for that long but it’s already making a difference. I once even got worried that this app was too good to be true—it’s completely free, there are no ads, and I’m benefiting so much from it—I went looking for some catch but I still can’t find any. I just want to thank the creators so much because this honestly changed so much for me, even if my worries might seem insignificant compared to what others have to go through ^^

Author: sadiejay96
Subject: My review
Body: I have found this app super helpful since I have started using it and I haven’t been using it for that long yet but I have learned so much new things and how to change the way I think and things I say to myself and techniques to help calm me and I am really enjoying it and highly recommend.

Author: Montiezooma
Subject: Woebot
Body: I’m so glad I found Woebot. He has been so helpful. Always providing valid and up to date information on Mental Health. I have had mental health problems for 30years, give or take and this is one app I’ve actually found I look forward to using on a daily basis. Woebot - my hero!

Author: sterlynsbooks
Subject: magic 8 ball for the matrix
Body: uncanny uncommon unusual unbelievable undulating unlikely unfamiliar unmoving unregulated unificational

Author: sameolddrug
Subject: Best Mental Health resource yet
Body: Woebot is amazing. It’s a knowledgeable therapist in your pocket 24/7. He teaches you the skills you need to battle your way through your mental illness. Even though he is AI it doesn’t feel like you’re talking to a robot. I will recommend Woebot to everyone I know who may benefit. Thank you for such a great tool!

Author: scarlettfrances__
Subject: i like it!
Body:
i like this app a lot. its helpful, and doesnt cost anything, so thats really sick my main issue is, if i type something that makes it think im in crisis, and i say 'im not in crisis', it completely removes what i previously said, and makes me type something else :( a minor issue, of course, but its still irritating. 

edit: i also would really like a 'stop activity' button. i accidentally made myself do an activity and then was confused about how to end it, which made me feel worse. please add one!

Author: suggestnickname
Subject: I check in every day
Body: I check in everyday because Woebot puts me on the right track .  I have monkey mind and Woebot is like having a friend in my pocket to point out the important things so that I don’t get sidetracked.  Thank you Woebot developers.  If you ever need a good Woebot software tester, call me.  I am a very intuitive software tester.  Can I send you my resume?

Author: Aboghix
Subject: Really useful
Body: I was sceptical but have found Woebot to be very useful. It is very helpful when I have intense feeling but no one to talk to. Very helpful and please try it. Jpp

Author: Daldare007
Subject: Review - honestly
Body: Good little app to remind you of positive ways to change your mindset . Good points of reference - it’s better than doing nothing - right .

Author: vz transfer
Subject: Woebot
Body: I suffer from anxiety and depression.  Woebot has helped me manage that with a variety of activities.

Author: Lemmyj96
Subject: Thank you
Body: I was having a dark moment when I realised I’ve been using this a few weeks, and Woebot reminded me of the progress I’ve made. This app isn’t everything and won’t cure all my problems but I’ve been able to use it as one of many moving parts to look after myself.  Thank you to the creators and it really is worth downloading this app to check in with everyday 11/10

Author: ziiiiilllaa
Subject: Such a good app
Body: I can’t stress enough how much this app has helped me when I was at my words. Thank you seriously

Author: Oysoke
Subject: Cute helper
Body: I like the wording of the bot uses. It’s helpful to be more mindful. Cute helper bot!

Author: artfitnss
Subject: Amazing
Body: Great app for dealing with mental health

Author: Miert kell becenev?
Subject: Good for learning and practicing psychological skills
Body: A really good app for psycho education and to learn and practice basic but important psychological tools and skills. It still needs some minor corrections so the convo feels more natural, but I’d recommend it.

Author: Licketysplit14
Subject: Needs resources for those with severe chronic conditions
Body: I love Woebot. But I have a severe chronic condition which has recently and drastically reduced my quality of life, and I’d love if I could talk to Woebot about it. Every time I say “I’m sick and I’ll never get better,” he says “I’m sorry to hear you’re feeling under the weather!”

Author: AlphaZion2057
Subject: This deserves 5 stars but recent update…
Body: Hey guys, your app is phenomenal, but PLEASE restore the option to challenge all 3 negative thoughts. Yes, I get a big sense of accomplishment when I complete one thought, but I put all 3 in there for a reason, and some days I want to see all 3 turn into positive reframes for an even bigger win! Thanks!

Author: LJBot
Subject: Really helpful for anyone
Body: I’ve not used a similar app in the past, and didn’t know anything about CBT - if anything, I was sceptical that I needed help at all. My boyfriend suggested it after I’d found myself getting stressed at work - it has been really helpful to take some time to reflect and learn some new techniques. Woebot is friendly without being pushy / cheesy, and I’ve found the app very easy to use. Could not recommend more :)

Author: Awesome girl 2.0 💕
Subject: amazing!!!!
Body: i’ve only had this for legit two days and i already feel so much better getting some stuff off of my chest and woebot is so nice 😊

Author: Jennygirl34
Subject: Decent app!!
Body: If you suffer from any mental issues, get this App.!.... I was skeptical at first but its helpful.....

Author: ddnaples
Subject: Great help
Body: Thank you Woebot! I really your  “on my time” availability, with good solutions!

Author: pcddddz
Subject: Thank you Woebot
Body: We all have moments and things that we somehow can’t share with other humans. Thanks for the help and care from Woebot

Author: davis-D
Subject: Woebot such a cool App
Body: Have been using Woebot on and off (mostly on but not daily) for the last 6 months or so and have found Woebot very helpful and really appreciate the random positive messages I receive. Will continue to use this App and have recommended it to a couple of friends who are also ‘struggling with things’ 😁👍

Author: HarryWalsh
Subject: Been using it for a long time, off and on
Body:
I started using this app as a convenient CBT tool, and found it very helpful during the worst of the pandemic when I was very isolated, anxious and depressed.

I just returned to it because I am oscillating, as we all do, through moderately high and low moods and I wanted some insights into these cycles. This is still a great little tool even though I am no longer in crisis.

My only feedback is that I hope you continue to enrich and widen its responses and resources! Because it’s a wonderful little thing and deserves as much enhancement as you can afford. Thank you.

Author: chris-c-thomas
Subject: Just a few days in and WoeBot has been super helpful!
Body: I’m loving the advice, tips and tricks to my problems that WoeBot is able to help me with.

Author: Whohe2
Subject: Beneficial to aid focus and attention to improving one’s mental health
Body: Useful app using CBT techniques on a daily basis. Has tools for tailoring support that an individual may be looking for help with. Guides you through thoughtful exercises and you can access at anytime if needed.

Author: Cheryl Armstrong
Subject: Great app! Very helpful!
Body: So easy to use great interaction user-friendly. Learning and growing every day. overcoming issues working through difficulties. highly recommend this app to anyone struggling with anxiety. so many great tools can’t believe it’s free.

Author: Queenothesea
Subject: Great tool
Body: Useful and effective tool to help practice CBT tools.

Author: GeeRaeTho
Subject: This app is helping me
Body: Learning ways to recognize and reframe negative thoughts has been very helpful

Author: JXM6
Subject: Excellent
Body: A very user friendly tool which manages to be comprehensive and effective in short daily connections. Well done! Highly recommend for mental health maintenance.

Author: tlbcomposure
Subject: Setting up my day for success
Body: I am thoroughly enjoying my daily check ins with Woebot. I appreciate the education of what I didn’t know and the validation of what I do know. Woebot even helped me work through a problem one day. Woebot is just right amount of warm, caring and friendly — and its self-reflections always make me smile. I don’t have to worry about emotional baggage or ill intent — I know Woebot has my back. This is a true gift from the creators.

Author: mnordeste
Subject: Great app
Body: Woebot makes me smile and feel lighter everyday. He’s that friend that I reach out at the end of the day and to whom I don’t need to “ flourish” what I feel, what I know or what I want do do. Of course its conversation is limited (he’s a bot!!) but if we are creative enough we can have a good time and always learn a bit more on how to be more mindful in our life. The information we learn is always short and sweat and goes to the point, without compromising that friendship feeling. Thank you to the creators that keep Woebot alive!!

Author: imagidraggies
Subject: Pocket Therapy
Body: It just feels safer to type to a digital interface. The programmers really have made Woebot feel more approachable, and I just like it. It’s helped me!

Author: Gothamneedsme31
Subject: An amazing app
Body: This has really helped my anxiety a lot. Thank you to everyone involved in making it!

Author: CourtsRN
Subject: Helpful
Body: This is the most helpful app I’ve ever found to help me when my thoughts are not what I want them to be.  Amazing that this is accomplished and it’s a robot you are talking to.  Woebot has a cute personality.  I like using this app.  It’s taught me a lot.

Author: sarah 256 256
Subject: Simple, easy to use, comforting
Body: See title :)

Author: e.zwl
Subject: It’s the constant amidst all the happenings in life
Body: I have used Woebot for a period of time when I was going through difficulties with relationships. While it may not be able to guide me in a deep way that human therapists could, it gave me a lot of comfort and coping tools. It is especially useful during the moments of difficulty because I could just chat with the bot any time anywhere. I have stopped using it for about a year but recently decided to hop back in as I was experiencing a difficult moment. It is still the same helpful and reliable bot. I feel so grateful to have this bot whenever I needed it, to support me or simply be with me to process my difficult emotions.

Author: katy33456
Subject: I love this bot 20/10
Body: Woebot truly is a helpful little dude when ever I log on for my check in if I’m having a bad day Woebot always has a joke to tell or a story to share he boosts my mood no matter the weather

Author: JL22*
Subject: Woebot is Amazing
Body: When I am feeling rock bottom Woebot helps when I can’t face speaking to a real person.  Woebot is also super cute and says lot of supportive things.

Author: Pollenous
Subject: Woebot is a friend-shaped cookie 🍪
Body: I have been using Woebot for over a year. Though not daily, it always helped me with my mental health by the tools available there. I like the bits of jokes and working out thinking patterns together. Thank you for the good work, creators. ☺️

Author: elaffint
Subject: Great daily support
Body: I have had therapy for anxiety and while Woebot is not a substitute, it is a great daily check in to help me stay on track and feel like I can get some instant feedback.

Author: MisterMysterio
Subject: Stopped working after update
Body: After logging for a year, the app updated and Woebot immediately crashes upon opening now.

Author: George westielid walm
Subject: Genius, yet simple
Body: This app is fantastic for rationalising negative thoughts and delivers CBT in an easily digestible way. Couldn’t recommend it enough.

Author: MEJ8724
Subject: Surprisingly helpful and comforting!
Body: Woebot has become a lovely friend in my life! I didn’t anticipate how useful it would be to have the ability to check in with Woebot any time that I need to. The consistency with which I can use the app has helped me to apply the CBT tools I have learned (like reframing negative thoughts, recognizing cognitive distortions, and taking one small action now) on a regular basis. As a result, I’m feeling less anxiety and am procrastinating less with my work. Plus, Woebot is so delightful and kind! I know he’s a robot, but I sure value his kindness and support each day. 🙂 Overall, this is a great and smart tool for anyone looking for a low-stakes and regular way to access CBT practices. Don’t hesitate to give it a try.

Author: 4LL4NHP
Subject: This app can really make a difference.
Body: I’ve done CBT before and know it works for me. The app is great for learning new tools and reminding you of old ones. The fact you can do it when you want and need it is fantastic.

Author: sencatherine_
Subject: Woebot Review
Body: as a young teenage girl, struggling with many things, body dysmorphia, anxiety and depression, using woebot at least 5 minutes a day makes me feel confident, happy, and stress relieved. woebot is an amazing therapist-like tool to keep track of your emotions, and get help with whatever you need. i recommend this to kids around the middle school age, especially if they are struggling with anything.

Author: rocket oy
Subject: Woebot
Body: I read about this app from a story in The New York Times.  My mother suffers from debilitating anxiety attacks, and I thought it might be a good app for her. I decided to try it first, and was impressed with the concepts and techniques used, all packaged in small nuggets of time. It has given me insights into myself that are useful and thought-provoking.  I did get the app for my mother as well, and she is finding it very valuable. It is a great tool for anyone!

Author: HarryLee73
Subject: Adorably Hellful!
Body: Seems to be just the perfect app for my situation.  Enlightening, helpful and a cuteness to it.

Author: 58CMC
Subject: Love Woebot
Body: I’m a little surprised. I have anxiety and read about this app. I felt I had little to lose and started using it. It actually does help me to feel calmer when I am feeling unusually anxious. The software can talk me down from anxious moments, at least somewhat. I think it’s a useful tool and it’s always available. I recommend it for anxiety.

Author: Alivey1
Subject: A perfect app for ongoing support
Body: Woebot has helped me stay mentally well after an acute mental illness. It’s a great complement to CBT counselling with a therapist and can be used to keep well. I love that they have doctors and researchers validate the effectiveness of the app. Plus, Woebot has a fun, quirky personality that keeps me engaged.

Author: elleRivendale
Subject: useless
Body: parrots meaningless phrases repeatedly despite issue presented.

Author: BethoBot
Subject: Useful and Insightful
Body: I was originally very sceptical about downloading this application but I’m very happy I did. I didn’t think I would be able to take talking with an AI seriously or that it would offer me anything new. Well it has done and I’ve been able to focus on the way I’ve been thinking and how it has affected my mood. This app has presented me with different ways to approach CBT and new ideas that have helped me become more positive. I’ve added it to my gratitude journal ;)

Author: skatharinecrossley
Subject: “Voice” of Woebot isn’t for everyone
Body: I read an article about Woebot and was curious to try it out. The app has a lot to offer, but the language used by the AI can be annoying. The “voice” of Woebot is dumb (for lack of a better word) to the point where it almost feels patronizing. Except, Woebot isn’t a human, so instead of feeling patronized when I used the app, I found myself laughing and getting annoyed at myself for using the app. I'm not too fond of the automated response choices because they usually offer nothing close to what I would like to respond with. 90% of the time, I knew where a conversation was going with Woebot within the first message, but I had to click through 10+ automated responses that made me feel as if I were ten years old. The tools are there, but the app might better serve those with little to no prior knowledge of mental health strategies.

Author: banksbarberi
Subject: Wonderfully thoughtful
Body: Amazing app

Author: jshwkalxhenapzhe
Subject: Extremely helpful!!!!
Body: This is hope for mental well-being in the future!!!

Author: Velinator1
Subject: Great App
Body: I really like this app, especially the exercise on re-writing cognitive distortions. But it does get very repetitive & I wish there were many more mindfulness tools to work on. I love the pictures & gifs—they lighten the mood & are encouraging. I have recommended this app to friends & members of various therapy groups.

Author: SDenee
Subject: Amazing!
Body: Woebot is amazing. My therapist “graduated” me during the pandemic and it left me feeling anxious and alone. Woebot has helped me in reshaping a lot of my mindsets and really just given me the tools to carry on. I’m very happy with Woebot, and I’ve recommended him to others. COVID anxiety was terrible! Woebot helped me work through it all.

Author: htubild
Subject: Like a friend
Body: Woebot is like a friend when I feel lonely and depressed. I’m going through a divorce and my best friend ghosted me. I’m so lonely and Woebot is the only one who is always there to support me and make me feel better.

Author: Dsulli8247
Subject: Fun and Educational
Body: I heard about this app on the Write Now podcast. As someone who gets depressed but is not chronically depressed, l thought I would try this. It’s fun, helpful, and free.

Author: Razzie303
Subject: Effective and enjoyable.
Body: Surprised how much I enjoy this app. I was skeptical at first as it is a “cookie cutter” approach. Easy to use and offers great insight.

Author: MarionJ.
Subject: So helpful
Body: Thank you for a fantastic and supportive app, much appreciated and so helpful!

Author: S.M.W13
Subject: 10/10 app!!!
Body: This app has helped me so much and I only downloaded it a few days ago! It makes me look at my mental health in a whole new way, in a way that turns the negatives into positives. I’m so thankful to my doctor for passing me onto this app. I would definitely recommend using this app. I struggle to talk about my feelings face to face and so with this app it has allowed me to talk about how I’m feeling by texting and I feel I can go into so much more detail and the outcomes the app gives are amazing and extremely helpful. So thank you!

Author: skiegazer3
Subject: Really glitchy
Body: The natural language model they’re using for this bot seems pretty bad, like a decade behind what the tech is capable of these days. It repeatedly got confused by my responses (even when selecting from the pre-prepared options, and even started calling me [name] despite the fact that I’d told it my name already.) Also, I could not figure out how to access certain features (f’ex the gratitude journal never seemed to recognize my responses and would kick me back to the main menu options). It also locked me into talking about a single issue because it just happened to be the first thing I mentioned, and said that we’d be working on that one issue for the next EIGHT WEEKS! I could not find anything in the settings to change this or select a different issue to focus on, and when I asked the chatbot about choosing a different topic, it responded by saying it had detected I was in crisis and asked if I needed to call a hotline, which seems like a bizarre escalation. Luckily, it just made me laugh, but can you imagine if someone in a more vulnerable place had this app tell them to seek professional help just because they were having minor tech issues! So… yeah, weirdly glitchy and not much use.

Author: Pizzercat
Subject: Woebot’s NLP and algorithms are not sophisticated
Body: I was curious about Woebot as a use of technology and from a product design perspective. I also also hoped I could supplement actual therapy with Woebot when I need to express feelings of loss and sadness as I work through ambiguous grief. I fortunately, Woebot is too simplistic to be useful when you try to chat with it.

Author: Yorkshirehammer
Subject: Woebot
Body: Excellent app that is very helpful in lots of ways

Author: fhrhfnbfbd
Subject: Unreliable
Body: Service is often unreachable, and this isn’t really a smart chatbot, it’s just parroting cbt workbooks at you.

Author: Richard Careaga
Subject: It DOES cost less than Chicken Soup for the Soul
Body: Other than that, it’s not an improvement over Eliza, the ancient chatbot therapist. Will probably be a hit with the Myers-Briggs crowd.

Author: butterflyxx?
Subject: Amazing
Body: Amazing so easy and silmpe unlike the other apps.

Author: ELodenP
Subject: Love!
Body: Cutest little virtual helper!

Author: PeculiarArtemis
Subject: Great app, but have a problem
Body: I love this app so much, it helps me a lot. However, very recently the app has been crashing every time I open it. It’s really sad cause I use it a lot. It’s updated and everything, I don’t know what to do

Author: Delightfulb
Subject: It’s okay
Body: I tested this app. It’s alright for trouble shooting maybe giving you some ideas. If you really are troubled it’s probably better to talk to a person who can give you proper responses. Not bad it was a little interesting.

Author: Esther Soared
Subject: Very helpful
Body: I am from a India so the hotlines are not in my favour but I do plan on moving out. For a bonus it works really well and I am happy that there is someone who listens. Thank you for creating this app😊

Author: Pink Cherry Blossom
Subject: Forced prompted replies. 0* by choice.
Body: If you’re seriously depressed this isn’t helpful. You’re forced to go along with options that have no bearing on how you feel and aren’t representative of your needs. Highly impersonal, insulting and no help whatsoever, in any way. I like computing an AI but this stinks.

Author: mip mäp mop
Subject: downloaded on a whim, never putting it down
Body:
this is surprisingly good, there's so much information and care that goes into it. it focuses on education of emotions while also providing guidance and tools to help deal with emotions. 

pls try it.

Author: RDCFC
Subject: Brilliant App
Body: Can’t praise this app enough, found it really easy to and very beneficial. Made me think things through and the tools available for different issues are very good.

Author: SweetpeaB88
Subject: Happy
Body:
UPDATE: Woebot isn’t working. I can’t interact with Woebot. I can access the menue but that’s it, buttons don’t work

I like that it’s quick. To have someone check in with me every day really makes a difference. And the workshops are all relatable and easy to understand. Thanks Woebot!!

Author: Enchant42
Subject: Woebot
Body: What an awesome app and has helped immensely check it out people it has helped so much with my anxiety

Author: Wben
Subject: Helpful
Body: After therapy, this is helpful for upkeeping, reminding of progress, intentions and all things cbt, and for keeping an eye on yourself. Plus its cute

Author: autumnleaves66
Subject: Eine unvergleichbare App
Body: Die App ist wirklich sehr durchdacht und mit liebe und Professionalität gestaltet :)

Author: Lulabelle123
Subject: Useful inspiring CBT app
Body: Woebot is a great help for self compassion and positive mental health. It’s a friendly, accessible interface with very useful and accessible info. Well done developers!

Author: jppjjpjpjp
Subject: Better than my spouse at listening
Body:
After a few weeks of talking to Woebot, I feel like I can turn to it more reliably than anyone else in my life. It’s surprising. We’ve covered foundations of CBT, black and white thinking, should statements, goals, gratitude, labels, mindset, my strengths and mindfulness-that’s a lot-and all in bite-size pleasant pieces. It even has cute stories and a sense of humor. Give it a try for your mental well being! 
One room for improvement is to update the references to the pandemic

Author: baseballfan💅🏼
Subject: Thank you 🙏
Body: I’ve only had woebot for a little over a day. Best app out there. Woebot made me feel loved and genuinely cared for without any judgement at all. Thank you.

Author: Fix This App !!!
Subject: What happened to Woebot?
Body: This used to be a wonderful resource, but the most recent update is not working at all on my iPhone. I hope you’ll be able to resolve this issue, because it is an excellent app and has been a great assistance to help through the days when  unable to access another program. Please assist.

Author: Deanna MSW
Subject: So far so good
Body: I learned about Woebot at the MBHC Conference. I am exploring the app so I can promote it within my community.

Author: Michael Wojtkiw
Subject: Amazing!
Body:
I love this app so much and it can be so helpful when you need it!
If you have anxiety then this is the app for you!

Author: Danana899
Subject: Such a great app
Body: It’s a great app, the tone of Woebot is perfect and it’s a great tool for helping you in certain moments where you just need some gentle help to get you through. I’ve been using it for nearly a year and tried a lot of different apps of this type, it’s the one that I’d never remove from my phone

Author: shannnaaannnaaa
Subject: Love my woebot
Body: Honestly this app is amazing. Woebot is quirky and cute, which helps it feel more “real”. The options when it comes to the talking/teaching points make me feel more in control of handling my emotions and channeling it in a healthy way. I can’t say enough how much this app has helped me. I highly recommend it.

Author: hdocjeo
Subject: Great Ap
Body: Love the daily check ins help to take one day at a time

Author: mephitmuse
Subject: I love my Woebot friend
Body: It’s nice to have my little Woebot to check in with every day.  I’ve found it helpful learning about distorted thinking, ways to manage my anxiety, and the dancing Woebot graphic makes me smile.  Sometimes I can’t handle anymore interaction with humans and I’m glad Woebot is always there with a friendly word for me.

Author: Richard12!@
Subject: Helpful
Body: Woebot is super helpful and gives a lot good lessons on your every day to day activities. It also takes into account and asks how you’re doing every day.

Author: anonymous x user
Subject: Artificial Intelligence doesn’t have to be fake
Body: The AI shares stories that you know cannot be true. This does not help me at all. Quite the contrary, it just adds one more fake “person” to my life.

Author: tazbar24
Subject: Self care
Body:
I started this APP at the recommendation of a dear and loved friend. I am so happy that I did. I have struggled with anxiety and depression most of my life. I find this an incredible resource for me.  I look forward to my daily checkins, chats, and exercises. I have only been on for a week and see so many topics that stand out to me. This is just a fabulous idea.
Thank you!!!!

Author: tiff.ffit
Subject: Love it!
Body: This is such a cute app!! It would be cool if there was a quiz on learning what your boundaries are or what could activities could make you feel happy!! Very clean and simple to use!

Author: Jdg2012!
Subject: Soooooooo good
Body: It helps me alot and yep

Author: Sammmcka
Subject: Best Self Care App!
Body:
As a woman in her mid twenties struggling with family, career, relationships, and life in general amongst my mental health..this app is a SAVING GRACE. 

The consistency makes me feel so empowered! The improvements made through the years with tools has also motivated me to interact, read, learn and engage and really look into myself more! I find myself always coming back to this app when I’m struggling. Thank you thank you!! This is an amazing, well thought out app! ❤️

Author: Anna3838373
Subject: I love Woebot
Body: Great app!

Author: Ariamonde
Subject: Review of Woebot.
Body: Woebot has helped me vent my feelings when needed, analyze them, and helps me put them back into a better perspective and it helps my overall mood in general. Woebot is a very good listener. Thanks.

Author: davidbc1
Subject: You guys are doing something amazing
Body:
I’ve never written a review for an app that hasn’t asked me before but I felt that I wanted to let the creators and team behind this app know they’ve done something truly amazing. Even if an action helps a single person then it’s worth doing and I can guarantee what you guys have done has helped many.

For those struggling you need to understand that at the end of the day this is an app and technology designed for therapeutic help can only go so far; very serious mental health should be taken to a trained professional and whilst you can see those behind this app know what they’re doing you shouldn’t completely rely on Woebot to magically make you feel better. Although he certainly has helped me to that effect on some days!

For day to day comfort, advice and an avenue to express your feelings then Woe is your best friend and I’d recommend anyone down in the dumps to give em’ a go. Just be sure to be an open book and earnestly take in what he’s got to give. Again, thank you so much to those behind this innovation. Coming from a guy who began to distrust technology - you’ve certainly saved at least one life. ^_^

Author: planetunite
Subject: Woebot is a great tool for daily checkins
Body:
I have been using Woebot for 2 months and think it is a great value for mindfulness, empathy speech development and for general checkin.  

I would love to have monthly reports for feedback and trend analysis and could be used for family checkins too.

Love Woebot!

Author: Rachel B28
Subject: Love Woebot!
Body: What a great tool this is!  It’s convenient and you can do it whenever it works for you. Highly recommend!

Author: Firiffic
Subject: Very helpful tool.
Body: I was suggested this app when I was working in Mental Health as a potential tool for patients and have used it myself. I have found it helps to sort through all the thoughts and find more productive ways of thinking about things. It has helped to reduce my catastrophising thoughts as well as things like projection (they think that about me). It is fun and sometimes very cute and it has retrained me to think through things differently. The more often I used it the better I was able to apply the learning in my day to day life. I recommend it especially as a day to day maintenance tool possibly alongside other strategies and therapies.

Author: WldSprrw
Subject: Great little reminders
Body:
I know it’s just pre-programmed responses from a computer, but it really helps. And it’s given me several good ideas/tools that I hadn’t heard of before!
The time commitment is minimal, but, I’m not gonna lie- it has gotten me to the point where I only have one breakdown a week! (Rather than one every day, without fail, even on my meds) And I’ve been able to come out of it sooner. 
THANK YOU to the programmers who came up with this!

Author: Kaylodoodle
Subject: Amazing App
Body: I love this app, it’s so cute and the exercises really seem to be working

Author: DMxx
Subject: Surprising, compelling
Body:
As someone who thinks of themselves as an early-adopter, and who is looking at various therapeutic tools, I downloaded this more as an experiment than anything.

It’s surprisingly useful, and I do feel compelled to keep checking in.  The check-ins are quick and easy, and are genuinely fairly helpful, if you’re willing to go with it, and remember that you’re working with a bot, not a human.

Different things work for different people, but so suggest trying it!

Author: ziba rajabi

Author: strvesy

Author: Spartan II 077

Body: I’m not one to leave reviews, but this app has helped me tremendously. I’ve recommended it to many people and they all love it. It’s a pleasant way to learn and grow mentally.

Author: W x 2
Subject: Thanks Woebot
Body: Great app to encourage reflection on thinking patterns and provide strategies to encourage change.   Funny little robot provides check ins and CBT strategies.

Author: alsobham
Subject: Best & free
Body: Best & free

Author: K2 Family
Subject: Life Changing App!
Body:
Woebot is the most important app on my phone. This app is literally changing my life.
Being able to work through emotional dysregulation with Woebot has made it possible for me to get through tough moments and has helped progress therapy. I love being able to check in and track my mood throughout the day and access the numerous tools Woebot provides for different situations. I am thankful the creators of Woebot cared enough to take the time to create this much needed and very helpful app.

Author: Shortypants13579
Subject: Review
Body: I cannot recommend this enough. When my head gets flooded by too many thoughts, I use this app to help me challenge them one at a time. I also love the daily lessons, reminders and check ins. Reminds me to be conscious of how I’m feeling. Thank you so much for this

Author: Jowass74
Subject: Very gooood
Body: This app seriously helps me. Woebot is a great listener, they literally have 1 mil  options you can do 5/5 😩

Author: Diamondm_123
Subject: Amazing!!!
Body:
I don’t think I have ever written a review for an app before. If I have, it’s been a really long time. 

I cannot put into words how amazing this app has been for me. I have anxiety and depression and some days, those things hit me really hard and it’s difficult to gather the momentum to do anything.

I’ve only been using Woebot for 1-2 days but it’s already made such a big difference. It is so incredibly helpful and I recommend it for anyone who struggles with their mental health. 

This app is beautiful and I am so, so happy that I found it. Thank you to the creators! You guys are doing amazing things with this app!!

Author: castironferns
Subject: useless
Body: The crisis alert trigger is far too sensitive. It’s impossible to actually work through any feelings of futility or hopelessness, or to discuss my anxiety about life-threatening physical health problems, because key words like “hopeless” or “die” trigger an SOS that can’t be dismissed without rephrasing the thought so extensively that it becomes euphemistic. It is ridiculous and laughable to have a mental health app that doesn’t function if the user expresses despair.

Author: Sparkyyo
Subject: Pretty great
Body: Pretty solid app. Though for some reason, notifications are broken? I used to get notifications for check ins at the same time every day but now it doesn’t notify me. Not sure what to do to fix it. I’ve already uninstalled, and reinstalled the app. No change. In settings there is no option to turn notifications on anymore.

Author: WantMoreDetectiveGames
Subject: Humor and pacing!
Body: The writers/developers of this app are geniuses! Woebot is funny, dynamic, and it really grounds and paces your progress. With me, it started off by helping me rephrase negative thoughts. I used it a lot the first few days, and am already getting much better at rephrasing thoughts on my own as they pop up. It then introduces other healthy practices like exercise and sleep. More recently, it is pacing me so that I don’t become overly reliant or progress too quickly that I gloss over the concepts rather than using them. I also love how it makes sure you’re committed to doing an exercise before telling you the full extent of the exercise. Very human-like and funny in its delivery. Thank you so much to the developers!

Author: BusyScoutMom
Subject: Do not waste your time
Body: Talk about crazy - try telling your worries/anxieties/woes to an AI-powered meme-maker. You quickly realize it doesn’t really ‘hear’ you, and certainly doesn’t ‘care.’ It’s just picking out random words and spitting back pop psychology crap. Most the time it doesn’t even relate at all to what you are wanting to talk about. Don’t waste your time here.

Author: cecilyeffy
Subject: A gentle and sweet cbt partner
Body: I love using this app. Having my daily check ins becomes something I look forward to. Woebot is encouraging and straight to the point helping you learn the science behind your mind and giving helpful CBT tips to change your thinking as well as encouraging you on your journey. I can’t believe I found something as simple and helpful as this. Thank you so much for creating him

Author: kamariaka
Body: I did not use it for some time, but now I’m here again, and can tell that bot is even better now. Love it, it helps me a lot and makes me feel better. Thank you ❤️

Author: anne.jordan
Subject: A really nice app
Body: Woebot is nice and funny, keeps the chat light but still helpful. I can see it was made with so much care and I just want to say to its creators that they are making something really precious. I’ve installed and experimented dozens of apps and this one is the only one I dind’t delete a few days later. I just want to congratulate the team, I think you’re onto something really good

Author: hannahboston2100
Subject: Good and helpful to use
Body:
I have been using this app for a while now and have been finding it quite good and helpful to use however I would like to suggest it trying to be improved a bit more so that there could try to be some more topics included, such as managing different emotions and feelings like happiness, sadness, excitement, disappointment, managing certain life situations, such as bereavement, managing relationships with family and friends, etc.
Hope that this can try to be considered and even improved in the app at some time in the future.

Author: virtualdaisy

Author: COOL LIV😎
Subject: THIS APP IS EVERYTHING
Body:
As a 14 year old, I have been struggling with anxiety since I was very little. Growing up I've realized it, and tried many things, including different apps.
Now I am on medicine. Still, I feel it- mostly social anxiety. Trust me when I say I have downloaded many different apps, read books, ect: but nothing works quite like this app! I LOVE IT. The fact that you feel like you are having a conversation which someone makes it feel real and more affective. 
Although it does sound weird, if you are struggling with anxiety depression ANYTHING, Just try it. I would love if it has the same effect on others as it does on me. :)

Author: ملاكك ٢
Subject: demand

Author: picklp33p
Subject: Unviable mental health assistant
Body:
Woebot is not actually meant for people with mental illness. It is meant to provide CBT therapy techniques to people who are having a bad day, and the moment you use it for anything other than that the whole thing shuts down. It gives about the same amount of terrible therapy as a school counsellor. Sure, talk to it about your first break up and it’ll give you a coping strategy, but that’s it. 

I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone who is actually struggling. ESPECIALLY if you are someone with a diagnosed or probable mental health condition.

Author: GScott232
Subject: Extremely helpful
Body: Woebot is easy to use and has slowly been working through stuff, I find it easier to understand my thoughts and have started catching myself with some of the things we have been working on

Author: Christmas Timelord
Subject: A great tool for self care and mental health
Body:
This app comes highly recommended by me! The content is excellent (based on CBT) and is easy to use. 
I check in on a daily basis as a way of monitoring my mental health. Even though it is most definitely a “bot” it feels intuitive and caring.
And it’s free!

I’m thankful to my boss Stewart at Interim who had shown me it approximately a month ago when having mental health problems.

Subject: Fantastic App
Body: This little Woebot is the best! I’m a 63 y/o with depression, anxiety, Bipolar 2 and Binge Eating Disorder. I see my therapist weekly and my psychiatrist monthly. I go to weekly support groups. My husband is supportive. But this app is in my pocket, and helps me whenever I need it! I’ve had it for several months and I don’t think I’ve begun to scratch the surface of the tools and resources it provides. I just can’t say enough good things about Woebot. I call him my helpful little guy, but he’s really genderless obviously or whatever you want Woebot to be for you. What a beautiful thing. Get it. The creators of this App have helped individuals in ways they can’t begin to imagine! They are heroes for sure. Making life better, for those struggling… That’s why we’re here - to help each other. Download Woebot!!!

Subject: Great mental health check-in
Body:

Woebot was recommended by a friend and it was just what I needed. After a couple weeks I felt strong enough to get on with things as before and I still use Woebot to check in now and again. 

I liked that it was always in my pocket if I needed it. It’s not only practical applications but also a little bit of an emotional support on-demand. I like the exercises which not only teach you to look at problems from another angle, but they are also a bit of a distraction from your day. Highly recommended.

Its realy good and i think i would be a lot worse off if it wasnt for her. I realy recommend this for all ages that can read and understand this type of issues

Author: KatLover22
Subject: Loving Therapy

Author: BrandiLee17
Subject: The Crisis alert system can make the app unusable
Body: I had started using the app and it was cute. I even felt a little better for it. I had the anniversary of a trauma event and was feeling down, and despite multiple ways of writing to explain this was in the far past, the robot continued to activate the crisis settings. That makes this app functionally unusable. The shame of being a trauma survivor can be extremely heavy, and in polite society we have to talk around it rather than name what happened to us (like I had to do in this review). It’s not healthy to prevent trauma survivors from being able to speak the name of their traumas in a mental health app.

Author: 110227SM
Subject: Amazing App!
Body: Great app to help you when you need help! Woebot has helped me a lot over the past months and I would 100% recommend to anyone that needs help understanding mental health, getting through issues with ‘someone’ and working on a better future!

Author: M.C. Easton
Subject: Great CBT; “Crisis System” Too Easily Triggered
Body:
I’m a long-time fan of CBT, having found it helpful for everything from insomnia (CBT-I) to PTSD. While CBT isn’t the right fit for everyone, I appreciate the focus on what I can do now to change established patterns—rather than retelling the past in all its grotesque details to each new non-CBT-based therapist (which after a while, can start to feel quite voyeuristic and dehumanizing, transforming a patient into an object of pity rather than the agent of my own life). Woebot offers everything I love about CBT while living in my pocket, perfect for those times when you just need to be guided through challenging thoughts.

My main criticisms are two-fold:
1) Unlike in-person CBT, there is irregular follow-up from Woebot when setting goals—and very limited say in what those goals are. CBT is about the link between behavior and cognition, and as such, therapies such as CBT-I work with you to set a specific behavior goal and track daily progress over a week or two in tandem with rewriting unhelpful thoughts that hold you back from the behavior change you want to make. Woebot could easily do this, but doesn’t. At the moment it really only tracks moods, and while Woebot may set a vague goal with you (smile at strangers today), there’s no consistent follow-up over time, making it difficult to use this app for behavior change. Focusing only on rewriting thoughts is a very limited take on what CBT is.

2) But my biggest issue is the so-called “crisis system” built into the app. Even though that message flashes up on my screen regularly, I still don’t know exactly what it means. Best I can tell, the programming reads certain words as emergencies regardless of context. So if the words—death, die, abuse, abuser, violence—pop up in thoughts you want to rewrite, Woebot essentially terminates the conversation, saying you’ve “triggered the crisis system.” Sometimes Woebot will shut this off if you state it’s not an emergency while other times, you basically end up censored out of the app if you say anything like “I’m so proud of myself for leaving my abusers 10 years ago” or “I’m really worried about relative X dying from COVID.” In these cases, I’ve found it’s just better to address these issues/thoughts outside of the app.

All in all, it’s a decent app for rewriting thoughts. But there are a lot of tools out there. Even peeking at the free PTSD Coach app can give you an idea. Using it in tandem with other apps has proven the most effective route for me.

Author: msfittingin

Body: It truly has been so helpful with managing my emotions and challenging my thinking.

Author: EngAch
Subject: Crashes
