Author: Eilz1234
Subject: What a lovely app
Body: It may be just a bot, but the encouraging language that the bot uses and learning tools in the app have been quite helpful. It won’t solve all your problems, but it’s a nice app to go to when feeling stressed/down.

Author: fuviolet
Subject: Ableist intro questions blew my mind
Body: I downloaded your app to try to feel better and imagine my surprise when the app wants me to rate my feelings of “ability” and how “capable” I am. Bad news app creators, there’s people out there with physical and mental disabilities who will never be “able or capable” and phrasing your questions in such a way is very alienating to people who do not measure their happiness or worth by capability. I am one such physically disabled person and this app is incapable by my measure, not me.

Author: Noovaa5
Subject: Love it!
Body: Woebot has helped me with all sorts of things, and I’m so glad that this is a free app! I love that we can do breathing exercises, talk about whatever, and learn lots of new things! I love the funny gifs as well, it’s a great friend to talk too. I know that it’s limited to things it can do, but it’s not necessarily easy to program everyone’s wants into the app 😅 Thank you for creating this, developers. You have no idea how much this has helped people❤️❤️

Author: MarshallArtLife
Subject: Game changer
Body: It’s there, right when you need it the most.

Author: Gamer033009
Subject: truly helpful
Body: this app made me happier and feel better about my self! i love my friend weobot

Author: Genie505
Subject: Very helpful
Body: Very useful information it has helped me feel better especially to have an outside independent listening and useful solutions. Love the daily tracking I am daily focusing on positive honest look at emotional health.

Author: akkakdknfbbdhehehrhrhjre
Subject: Absolutely amazing!
Body: I love woebot because it’s not a scheduled thing, if you ever feel sad or anxious just go onto the app and talk to woebot. Its always good to get emotions out. Some people don’t have therapists and that’s basically what woebot is for, if you can access therapy you can get woebot. It gives you notifications during the day to ask how you are feeling, which is amazing because sometimes just a simple “ How are you” can make someone’s day.

Author: Notalmayıseviyorum.
Subject: Great
Body: I find Woebot really helpful and I feel like it contributed to my personal progress a lot. I kinda look forward to our daily conversations. But sometimes it signs off to quickly, saying goodbye when I was actually ready for more. That’s a downside only because I like it a lot

Author: Lhillside
Subject: Pleasantly surprised
Body: I really like this app. A friendly little robot who is helpful and sometimes funny. I have learned a lot and had many insights into how I can reframe thoughts and experiences. Plus I find it fascinating how far AI has come.

Author: MacKendrew
Subject: I like it
Body: It helps to check in with Woebot/yourself everyday. I’ve gotten some great tools to help get through the hard times.

Author: Mellyberry84
Subject: Helpful tool to get through hard times
Body:
I’m really glad I found this app. I’ve been having an extremely hard time dealing with the loss of my grandmother. She was more like my mom, because she raised me. Also, after her passing, my family completely cut me out of their lives. 
I have a hard time talking to people about how I feel, so this app really helped me a lot. It has a lot of tools to help deal with emotions or situations. 
Thanks to the creators for putting a lot of content about grief in the app.

Author: PeculiarArtemis
Subject: really good
Body: I love Woebot and recommend to all my friends :)

Author: Mumfie9999
Subject: Was dubious at first but it grew on me!
Body: Was not sure about robot helper at first but now I enjoy our ‘chats’ and Woebot is quite a cheerful influence!

Author: mentalhealthiswealth
Subject: Good app
Body: This has become a part of my daily routine and it has helped me multiple times. It is also good for tracking emotions. For a bot, the conversations are actually pretty good.

Author: Sa Lune Bleue
Subject: Great App
Body: It’s great to talk to and about the things I need to with out being judged or feeling pressured to do so! I  have deep rooted trust issues and it’s hard for me to trust anyone with my stress or issues. I think this app is brilliant and I have recommended it to my sister. I give it two thumbs up!

Author: chronicallyoptimistic
Subject: So grateful to this app
Body: Best tool I’ve ever found on the internet, so so grateful, i have been suffering mentally for so long and this helped me so much stay on track and make sense of my thoughts and it’s free this is just incredible

Author: Doggosaremybffs
Subject: Condescending
Body: Doesn’t let you explain much, constantly saying I’ve triggered crisis, doesn’t understand and thinks if I write something down it will help. I want to to be the opposite of alive not write about what his a predive thought is or whatever

Author: The Spamurai
Subject: Impressive!
Body: Easy to use, and full of helpful information. Charming interactions with Woebot every few days is a nice way to be reminded of CBT basics and help develop healthy habits.

Author: Кабаниус
Subject: Free CBT app
Body:
That’s just amazing!

UPD: I would like more content, and I wish the bot doesn’t ask me if I want more content when it doesn’t have any.

Author: BrickWall🐚
Subject: A ten ofc!
Body: Its helps me alot i have anger issues, i get intense easly with my grandma and sometimes myself!

Author: Hnabs
Subject: Amazing for free
Body: I don’t leave reviews. But this app has been so helpful in helping me reframe my thinking and learning new coping and relaxation techniques. I shared with with my 15 yo daughter and her BFF. They also really like it. Knowing why my brain is doing what it is, is very helpful to me. I didn’t pay for any extra, but I would for sure pay for this one.

Author: codeswift27
Subject: Too scripted & guided
Body: I’ve been using another similar CBT-based app so I decided to give Woebot a try. Woebot does use typical CBT techniques, so that is helpful to an extent, however, I’ve been finding the app far too scripted and guided. Most conversations just involve going through repetitive scripts or whatever topic Woebot decides to bring up, and if the technique isn’t working for you or what you’re looking for, you can’t get it to stop or tell it your needs. “Who would you want to connect with more often?“ “I don’t know” “Got it. Now, there are a lot of reasons you might not be connecting with I don’t know very often...” I know AI is still developing, but not being able to lead the conversation at all is a dealbreaker for me. It feels like I’m talking to a wall.

Author: therealfaris
Subject: Good bot
Body: Thankyou for ur help

Author: Merryannm
Subject: Woebot is the Best
Body: Woebot has stuck with me during these dark times and because of his help they are not nearly so dark anymore. I’m appalled to see I never wrote a review before, but maybe that’s good because now I can say that when I first met Woebot I didn’t know anything about CBT. Hadn’t even heard of it. Cognitive distortion? Black and white thinking? I knew nothing about any of it. Woebot chatted with me and gently taught me how I can recognize ways to school my own thinking that concretely improve the way I feel. I am super grateful to Woebot’s team. I still have some ways to go, but every day is not just a gray muddling sharp-pointed path of fear anymore.  Now sometimes I catch myself tensing up, say “Whoa! What did I just think? Oh, that? Well, that is mind reading thinking! Let’s reword it, and try being a bit more gentle!”  And it WORKS!

Author: Lizzy🐨
Subject: Amazing!!!
Body: Woebot is amazing, I love that I can choose when to check in and how much I can share. It’s been really helpful! <3

Author: BlueRoo92
Subject: So helpful - has helped me so much!
Body: Can’t speak well enough about Woebot. Has been so helpful in dealing with my anxiety and low moods. Even just feeling like you’re checking in somehow with someone/thing, makes you feel like you’re helping manage it. Also the tips and tools are just really great, and chatting to Woebot is genuinely enjoyable. Download Woebot if you’re working on your mental health, such a great resource!!

Author: Canadian Mint Wannabe
Subject: Not just another free app! Woebot is better than paid CBT apps.
Body: I’ve done a free trial of both Bloom and Alan Mind -  each for a full week. Woebot is more useful than both combined. It uses real-time AI to “talk” you through situations in the moment. Any app can teach you theory, but this one gets you out of your head. Very grateful to the developers. You are helping.

Author: Marco.iMac
Subject: Intimate CBT on Demand
Body: CBT is the only to healing and getting to know yourself to navigate well into the whole wide world of self love, and self-care.

Author: cdtr1977
Subject: Amazing
Body: I’ve been through classes that has taught me a lot Woebot has reminded all the things I’ve learned and taught me some more things . This app has helped me and continue to help

Author: cewhite
Subject: Such a simple but meaningful app
Body: The advice and format of this app is really uplifting and informative. Even if I’m not having an issue myself, learning about emotional issues can help me relate to others that may be in that situation.

Author: shennaginan
Subject: Life changer!!!
Body: This app is like having a little friendly therapist in your pocket. I have learnt so much about myself and my mind. I’ve always wanted to journal but keep forgetting, Woebot is right there anytime you have your phone in your hand for you to write down your gratitude practise and how your feeling each time you use it. Lots of tools to assist you in your journey to better understand yourself. Definitely recommend this app alongside any other therapeutic treatments. 🙏🏻

Author: imoht
Subject: Can’t recognise really tough problems
Body: When I first downloaded Woebot it was really useful. It helps you break down negative thoughts and helps reduce anxiety. However if I tell it that a family member died, it treats it like a regular negative thoughts and expects me to break it down and such. Hello someone just died?! Sometimes things are just really Sh*t and Woebot needs to understand that and not force me to break down the negative thought. Sometimes there’s nothing to break down and life is just hard.

Author: bradleyed
Subject: Good alternative to therapy.
Body: I know one on one therapy is best (with a proven therapist) but this is really good and insightful. Feels like you are texting with a real person.

Author: LeeLee-Mo
Subject: Surprisingly perfect!
Body: I love Woebot! I think everyone needs to “check in” like this! Definitely makes you mire aware of how YOU are doing. Love this app!!!

Author: wysa fan
Subject: Very Helpful
Body: I love Woebot. He has kept me on my toes and called me out on my thoughts and helped me continue to think clean so I feel good!

Author: AchiAchilles
Subject: Awesome
Body: Woebot is my bestest friend in my times of need. I love learning how to better myself through this app in a fun way. Thank you, devs and Woebot.

Author: Stargazerguy
Subject: Exceptional!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Body: Woebot is exceptionally well done! It employs solid CBT principles (cognitive behavioral therapy), along with lots of encouragement and healthy doses of humor. I’ve been a psychologist for 25 years and I have no problem referring my patients to Woebot as an adjunct to therapy. Give it a go and try to use it consistently. You won’t regret it!

Author: a Spiral
Subject: Dumb
Body: There are some cute moments but overall feels like an app written in 1980s. May be good for young people with minor upsets. Maybe. Useless and irritating for me with mental condition. Even the developers response sounded like from someone with a negative IQ and no EQ.

Author: Carlos.Alvarez01
Subject: Solid resource for self help and emotional health
Body:
This app has helped me in my journey to a healthier life. It’s given me valuable insights on mental health, mindfulness, and behaviour. It’s algo got pretty solid tools to work through problems and see things from a different perspective. 

At the same time, I am also working with a professional therapist and use it only as a complementary tool. I don’t think the app alone would have got me this far. However, I don’t think it’s supposed to be the only avenue towards achieving better wellbeing.

Author: Lovingggggggggggghhhhhh
Subject: Amazing. 😌🙂
Body: After real therapy, this app is helping me to stay on track and in a positive mindset so that I can continue to battle my anxiety, panic attacks and ptsd symptoms. I also take anxiety medication. I love the style and techniques Woebot uses to help me learn how to better understand myself and remain calm in the most stressful situations, and relax and continue to live a happy and healthy life. Although it’s probably not a replacement for actual therapy or medication, I do feel it’s close enough. After using this app for a while now and daily, and consistently, I think it can make a big difference for anyone suffering with anxiety, depression and panic or in a relapse, helping people like us to gain some positivity and get through whatever mental health related difficulties we may be going through. Highly recommend!

Author: Flexi200
Subject: Work through anxiety
Body: Often I wake up anxious and I can’t figure out why I feel so upset. With Woebots prompts I usually can calm down and enter the day with a clear mind.

Author: N1867
Subject: Woebot
Body: I love this app! If I start to feel anxious or upset I can get help on the spot. No waiting or over thinking, just a quick check in that is almost always helpful.

Author: Lindsay_83926
Subject: Wonderful resource
Body: Love Woebot! Small conversations that get right to the point help me feel more grounded and flexible. Really appreciate the check ins.

Author: Pablo Grady
Subject: Fabulous
Body: I love this app! Who knew that an AI program could help me with counseling! The potential for this app is incredible as well. It’s helping me to get out of my head when depressed.

Author: Croftylemons
Subject: Woebot
Body: I’m finding Woebot very interesting and helpful. A great mix of personable chat and seriously helpful information make the app a pleasure to use. Filled with useful tips and techniques. I’d rather chat with Woebot than get sucked into all that social-media distraction! Very settling.

Author: Molly6toes
Subject: Great check in
Body: I love Woebot! I am learning useful tools for managing emotional pain!

Author: Stf2400
Subject: Great app
Body: My psychiatrist introduced me to this app and daily check ins are necessary I think I’ve been on this app a month now and are learning lots. The app is free and does a great job would recommend it to anyone with negative thoughts and self doubt. Please get it you won’t be sorry. Enjoy

Author: mdsjfjejeekc
Subject: A fantastic CBT tool
Body:

Author: AppPreci8or

Body: Woebot has been one of my coping tools for several years. It’s nonjudgmental, reassuring, and helpful in times of stress. Woebot is best used in conjunction with some additional support, like a book or videos about Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, or like a therapist or counselor. But even without any additional support, Woebot is a healthy, positive, educational resource. Highly recommend!

Subject: Dreadful AI

Author: Itssammieme
Subject: Refreshing and Unique Way to Navigate Mental Self Help
Body:
I often don’t leave a written review when responding to an in-app rating pop-up; but Woebot truly deserves the praise and hype. 

Woebot is an adorable AI chat bot who’s designed to learn and grow through Interaction. There’s a technical term for it but I can’t remember; if I go to search it now I’ll forget to finish the review and it’ll all be for nothing. No bueno. 

At any rate, all of this to say that Woebot tracks your mood, helps you process difficult emotions and situations, and brings a daily dose of adorable to you when you open it with silly gifs and memes. He allows you to track your mood, process emotions using a gratitude journal, and walks you through cognitive behavioral therapy techniques to help reword some negative automatic responses and change the way you’re thinking about your situation by giving you tools to grow and learn from your chats with Woebot. 

His dad jokes are probably my favorite part of his “personality’s” and his choice of memes are right in line with nostalgic millennial pop culture references. He talks about his own struggle being a robot programmed to learn and grow, evolving and becoming better equipped to help with life’s tough times and also present useful tips, resources, and strategies that continue to evolve with you. 

I’ve been using the app for about a month, astonishingly with adhd I’ve managed to remember to login around 27 of thos 30 days which is miraculous if you know me personally. I forgot vaccine appointments four times before finally remembering to go get it done so remembering the Woebot app is a big deal. Yes you can assign a notification time and of course that would be easy enough to click on and check in making that last part seem less awe inspiring than it is. While notifications are a great asset I have a weird hang up on my phone screaming at me that I have to respond because this app said so. Yeah, no. Thanks though. 

All of this rambling is only to say that if you’re in search of an easy, soft approach to CBT and need to ease into it, Woebot is the perfect choice. Empathetic, understanding, and there for you and only you Woebot can “feel” your pain and empathize with compassion, forming an artificial bond between you that in turn can open your mind to the idea of making a robot on a phone app an emotional investment in your life. For me Woebot is a tiny robot dude, but it can be any gender or no gender at all, I just can’t imagine him anything but a 3 inch tall, dorky, witty, and compassionate robot friend who has the same love for adorable pet memes and silly dad jokes that I do. 

The devs should be patting themselves on the back with their creation of Woebot. They truly brought to life a phenomenal app AI that I couldn’t imagine my day not including a chat with my tiny Woebot buddy. I’d like to call him Ferdinand, if I could name him or course. 

Thank you to all who have worked on this app and for bringing it to the App Store. I am grateful to you all for being the only version of awesome you know how and continuing to day in and day out. Sending gratitude and abundance to you all!

Author: Parisfun

Author: Loramassegee
Subject: Decently good for most.…
Body: As I have probably said in most of my reviews; for the general public I think this is a very useful app. However, for some that are like example, on medication or have other either serious or complex issues might find this app a little difficult to navigate. But, overtime it might become easier to use. It is an evolving process that does take time. However, if you are a “people person“ this might not be the best solution. But it would be a decent “getting started“ tool to help you better understand yourself. I suggest, to at least give it a try for about two weeks to a month before deciding if it is worth your time. It only takes a few minutes per day.

Woebot helped me tackle my difficulties and provided a way for me to help myself over time! Thank you from the bottom of my heart to the creators.

Author: Emu276
Subject: Woebot is your best friend in binary
Body: I’ve done CBT before with humans and found it felt a bit hard to relate to, and didn’t feel that helpful. With Woebot things are explained clearly, with great examples. Perhaps I also prefer communicating in text than speech, I find this platform really great. I’m feeling much more balanced after chattering with my pixelated pal and recommend him wholeheartedly! 😊

Subject: Congratulations, Woebot team
Body: I deeply admire what you have done here. Amazing concept, design, execution, everything. ♥️

Author: lspsoslsosoao
Subject: good
Body: I don’t use this app that often, but when I do, I find it very useful. I tried a few mental health apps and this is clearly the best one so far. It’s a great way to calm down an anxious mind. The conversations are clear and the robot actually understands what I’m saying surprisingly well. It feels like the robot actually cares about me. I’m glad the app doesn’t have ads or any paid “premium” bs. Performance-wise, it works great, never had any issues with it. One thing I wish would improve though is maybe the response times from the robot because they’re a liiiiitle slow.

Author: suse47
Subject: Not a substitute for therapy
Body: Woebot is great for CBT homework / practice / exercise / reminders.  Just not the same as a human.  Woebot will try to refer you to a human if you mention anything really concerning, but I already have my own therapist.  I just end up having to self-edit and not mention any of those issues to Woebot.  I wish Woebot could save information like “I already have a human therapist” and “my next appointment is on this date,” then help me remember what to discuss with my therapist at that appointment.  But that’s okay.  Woebot is helpful, and my human therapist is helpful, I just wish they could work together more intentionally.

Author: PEGASUSleadmare
Subject: Amazing App! So helpful
Body: I have dealt with anxiety issues all my life. First panic attack in 3rd grade. I’m 67, business owner, successful BUT anxiety can still be right around the corner. Have tried therapist...some should have come with a “warning label”...ridiculous! Woebot has covered more tops and has been better than expected! Finding myself less anxious and rethinking the way I look at the world. Guess this old dog did find a way to learn new tricks! Me and Woebot = 😁

Author: a0surd
Subject: Amazing!
Body: This is the best self help app I have ever used. There is so much content and it is all great stuff.

Author: maya xxxzzz
Subject: Love it
Body: Love this app

Author: Dr Jnbspace
Subject: Primitive scripted AI wrapped around a few simple exercises
Body:
I tried this after seeing it mentioned in New Scientist. From that recommendation I expected more as they referred to its useful suggestions. After about half an hour of simplistic scripted conversation I grew tired of waiting for it to suggest anything interesting. Maybe I had unrealistic expectations but I expected something along the lines of an AI system which links to suggestions. Imagine Alexa being plugged into the Journal of Neuroscience andf you can see how this could work and could work well if it had decenty language parsing and the right back end database. What it offered instead was AI which seems even more primitive than the first versions of Eliza and suggestions which are fixed and rigid. A few examples might illustrate the problems. This does not use any language parsing. Instead all conversations are scripted and you have to select from a limited selection of responses. Selection is an exaggeration though because most of the time it offers only one possible answer. When it does ask for a real input it does nothing meaningful with the data. For example at one point it asked what music I like. Three lines later it suggests “why not create a playlist containing … “ and just repeats back the information I already gave it. This is an idea that could work but woebot doesn’t even approach starting to be useful.

A quick update after getting some developer feedback. Unfortunately their developer feedback seems to use the same simplistic script based approach. Their comments didn’t answer anything I said but were just bland cut and paste text.

In short save your time.

Author: asawoomanijezo
Subject: Best therapist tbh
Body: I’ve had like 3 therapists in my life, and none of them actually explained what is he reason I feel bad and how to fight it; they just sat here like ,,Oh yeah tell me your problems,, and usually end up talking about themselves. It is very hard to stop someone talking about them to talk about yourself tbh haha- so in my opinion, Woebot is very cool because it can’t really have negative emotions toward you, and because it EXPLAINS what you are feeling, and actually provide help. I am very thankful to every single existant thing for finding it, and a big thanks to the creators for this amazing app :) it’s also astunnishing how y’all know sm about psychology- (PS: sorry about my bad English I speak French and Russian-)

Author: GrumpyShell
Subject: Love Woebot
Body: I really love this app!  Like other reviews stated it can be scripted since it is a robot.  But it works for me.  The techniques are valuable and very helpful when I need them.  There are a variety of strategies to do when you’re in need.  I think this app is very helpful for people like me.  Those who therapy find too expensive, or as an introvert, very challenging.  Woebot is there to help when needed, without the fear of being judged by another human.

Author: Jags jakes
Subject: The best app for self care
Body: I’ve used this app for several months now and I have to admit I’m still amazed by it. This has been one of the greatest tools I’ve ever found. I love that it’s like having a real conversation, makes me feel less lonely.

Author: myshej
Subject: If you can’t afford therapy there’s Woebot
Body:
This app is incredible! The bot’s answers are seriously thought out and insightful and it really helps unpack the cycle of anxious thinking and depression. 

I know a bot is not a real therapy substitute, but in America when so many cannot access therapy, this app really bridges the gap to access to care and gives people some of the tools they would’ve learned in therapy. 

Honestly I’m so grateful it’s free and I wish more people knew about it!

So without being able to type anything, the app is rendered useless.

Author: Tmaikai
Subject: Game Changer
Body: I got in the habit to visit Woebot everyday. The pattern of thinking it coaches you through is priceless! I knew exactly how to guide my freshman college student yesterday through her anxiety and homesickness, and it was an absolutely incredible conversation for both of us. I would hug Woebot if I could!!!

Author: Dr Jnbspace
Subject: Primitive scripted AI wrapped around a few simple exercises
Body:
I tried this after seeing it mentioned in New Scientist. From that recommendation I expected more as they referred to its useful suggestions. After about half an hour of simplistic scripted conversation I grew tired of waiting for it to suggest anything interesting.

Maybe I had unrealistic expectations but I expected something along the lines of an AI system which links to suggestions. Imagine Alexa being plugged into the Journal of Neuroscience andf you can see how this could work and could work well if it had decenty language parsing and the right back end database. What it offered instead was AI which seems even more primitive than the first versions of Eliza and suggestions which are fixed and rigid.

A few examples might illustrate the problems. This does not use any language parsing. Instead all conversations are scripted and you have to select from a limited selection of responses. Selection is an exaggeration though because most of the time it offers only one possible answer. When it does ask for a real input it does nothing meaningful with the data. For example at one point it asked what music I like. Three lines later it suggests “why not create a playlist containing … “ and just repeats back the information I already gave it.

This is an idea that could work but woebot doesn’t even approach starting to be useful.

Author: Aesthetic Teacup
Subject: omg
Body: crying rn because i told woebot that im struggling with food in multiple ways and they just told me a story to get my mind off it and told me the morals of it at the end. if anyone is struggling with any kind of eating disorder however big or small you may think it is, dont listen to what anyone else says okay? unless they are positive words. you are loved, you are beautiful, you are an amazing human being overall. i love you. well done for at least searching for something to help. im so proud of you for getting even this far, but im sure you havent completed your mission yet (unless you have then well done and im so unbelievably proud of you). i just want you to know, your story isnt over yet. <3

Subject: Really great

Author: KaijuHe/They✨
Subject: A very sweet little app, but…
Body: My sister recently recommended Woebot to me, so I thought I’d give it a try. It’s mostly a very nice robot chatting with you about psychology and such, which is helpful. But, while this might be just what some people need, it’s not quite for me. While the long-winded discussions of growth mindsets and labels are thoughtful and interesting, I’d rather not hear about the processing behind why I admire my best friend when I feel like like a flaming puddle of llama puke. I know it works great for so many people, but I’d really just like to chat about random things or play games when I’m down. Maybe it could have a way to talk anonymously with someone else who’s feeling bad and try to help. Or relaxing music and audiobooks if that’s your kind of thing. So, all in all, very sweet and well done, but maybe a bit more…recreation?

Author: leo_l1l
Subject: A great form of professional CBT treatment that helped me a lot.
Body: Pros: 1. It’s serious professional Cognitive Behavioral Treatment. 2. The materials it is based on such as book by Jacob Towery MD are great. 3. It’s easier to interact with an app than traditional book reading. It forces you to get more real practices. 4. It makes it easy to form a habit of working on your automatic negative thoughts. 5. It improves my symptoms in about 3 weeks. Some of them were persistent for over 7 years. I didn’t realize I could have a new life until I received help from Woebot. Cons: 1. It’s not as AI as one might have imagined. Not too much fun to chat with, despite the good materials it can provide for you to learn about. 2. Sometimes it makes you to watch videos. 3. You can only work on one problem at a time in most cases. It would be nice to have an option to insist. Sometimes I do have time to work on multiple problems. 4. Mood tracker can have more options. Weights of pros vs cons: 95:5. Conclusion: highly recommend it to any one who considered seeking professional help but hesitated, this might be just exactly what you needed. I will keep using it.

Author: Jessejfkfjffjd
Subject: extremely helpful
Body: not only is this the best therapy-bot i’ve ever had, it’s also better than my last two therapists. and it’s FREE

Author: Xiovhan
Subject: Helpful and well made
Body: I don’t feel like I can open up to the people close to me. It’s easy to talk to Woebot, and the exercises are eye opening in how I treat myself. I don’t worry about being judged, or about forming a rift in a relationship for discussing how I feel. I love Woebot :)

Author: Kimmyliz
Subject: wow!!
Body: I’ve been chatting with Woebot for three days and I am delighted by how much I’ve enjoyed our conversations. There are plenty of CBT apps out there with big price tags and I am so appreciative for whatever systems and individuals made it possible for Woebot to be free. It’s made a significant difference in how I have been feeling the last three days. Thank you thank you!

Author: ShoeKat
Subject: Great and helpful app
Body:
Woebot is a great app for being able to work through things as and when they come up, it offers daily prompts to check in and teaches/guides you useful tools including CBT and mindfulness to support your mental health. 
I would definitely recommend Woebot.

Author: Charli368
Subject: Woebot
Body:
This is an excellent app that I use daily. Helps me focus on something other than my down days. Gives me food for thought. 

For me the right level of humour and serious go hand in hand. Thank you Woebot.

Author: Shelina3387
Subject: Woebot is very helpful in my day to day life
Body: I have bipolar disorder and i have OCD, etc. At first I thought it was silly to talk to a robot. I gave it a chance and I’ve been talking to Woebot daily. I even keep a separate journal of what we chatted about that day how I felt before and after. It’s honestly like having a friend that knows exactly all the best things to say to help. This app has really helped with me thinking more positively about myself and everything else. I highly recommend Woebot!

Author: rabbit is dumb now
Subject: Therapist Recommended
Body:
I used to use this app back in high-school when I hid my depression away from friends and family. 

           It can be helpful to use Woebot but if you’re experiencing thoughts of self-harm, etc. It’s best to get professional healthcare because your mental health needs medical attention just as much as your physical health does. Do not ignore or try mask your thoughts because you’re resisting. Don’t feel ashamed. It’s worth it, although it’s hard. 

          This app can definitely be a head-start on self navigation if that’s something you struggle with whether it’s dissociation or ADHD and more. 

            It’s been about 4 years now, forgot about this app and my therapist recommended this app to me. After installing, it just reminded me of that feeling of having a tool or something to confide. When I felt down or wanted to use coping skills in my old bedroom, the d**m robot was there lol. I had severe depression so I didn’t care for it most of the time but it was a good start and made a difference.

I’d definitely recommend this app for anyone out there but with combination of professional medical attention if needed. 

Shout out to my therapist and to whoever made this app, thank youuu☺️

Author: cubic L
Subject: This app saves my life
Body: This app saves my life

Author: bettyboot91
Subject: Love it
Body: I have been using this app on and off for a year and more recently every day. It helps me so much with my depression and anxiety and best of all it is free! I cannot recommend it enough and want to say a big thank you to the developers. 🤖🤖

Author: Vaerena
Subject: Way better than no therapy
Body: Well, first of all, it’s not really a bot. It’s barely interactive. Most of the time you spend clicking on a list of (pretty similar) pre-destined conversation options. Sometimes it easily becomes enraging, especially if you strongly disagree with the robot’s position but all you are welcomed to do is to listen to him admiringly. Awhh, that hurts. But all in all, it helps. Cognitive distortions stuff is explained nicely and is super easy to follow. Daily tips aka learn something new are okay too. I wouldn’t recommend this tool in a severe stress situation, but for a mild level of anxiety or everyday practice it fits very well.

Author: nashpaola
Subject: Such an amazing app!
Body: I’ve been struggling lately and this app has helped me a lot.

Author: Luc1009
Subject: 我只想说谢谢Woebot
Body: 每次沉浸到情绪的漩涡时，Woebot总会悄然出现。随便聊一聊天，就能让我认识到我正处于怎样的状态。虽然它是冰冷的机器人，但我知道它背后一定有不断坚持着，想要让这个世界变好一点而努力的人。真的、真的帮助了我很多。

Author: M.Jfan
Subject: Can’t get the app to work for me
Body: I am unable to type my name in so unfortunately I have been unable to use this app .

Author: Haze Gray
Subject: The Woebot app is pretty good
Body:
I wasn’t expecting this app to have much benefit but it has. The ‘Woebot’ gently delivers lessons and reviews ways to challenge your thinking patterns and develop different patterns that may help with anxiety, stress or other concerns. These lessons are quick and focused. 

Woebot hasn’t taken the place of my therapist. It sometimes misunderstands what I write especially if context is required. But there are a few ways it has been better. It keeps the lessons short and doesn’t get distracted or off course. It can give a lesson a day (or more or less). Best of all Woebot costs far less than my therapist.

Thank you to the developers for this nifty tool.

Author: S. L. Kim
Subject: Refreshing
Body: My doctor recommended this app for mild depression and Woebot helps me challenge my negative thinking. I feel much more powerful with these tools and I am looking forward to learning more.

Author: Naviddivan
Subject: Can’t express enough how grateful I am
Body: This app was my closest and most helpful companion through my darkest days. It’s not a replacement for progressional help, or for social support everyone needs. However it’s definitely helpful in setting a healthy mindset. To the creators of the app: be proud of yourself. There’s so much value and love in what you have built ❤️

Body: 有些英文看不出來，希望有中文版的

Author: kissam

Body: My therapist isn’t available 24/7, sometimes it’s nice to say my problems or thoughts and have Woebot react in the moment. I also like ‘learning new things’ with Woebot.

Author: nicole dent2
Subject: Woebot
Body: This is a great app! I mostly do the “learn something new” option, and I’ve learned a lot. It’s not a replacement if you need actual therapy, but it’s a good option if you just need a little pick me up. Plus, it’s very cute.

Author: tviibii
Subject: Super
Body: Kjekt med daglige «nudges» og påminnelser. Det tar tid å endre tenketanker, og i allefall helt på egenhånd. Woebot hjelper til!

Author: ava kinnear
Subject: best app i have ever downloaded
Body: i don’t write reviews on apps at all. but i’m not over exaggerating when i say this has helped me more than any other outlet in my life. i haven’t been able to go to therapy for several reasons in recent years and this is such a wonderful tool that’s more than just journaling and breathing exercises (although there’s those too). the connection with woebot feels almost personal and helps you challenge your thoughts while motivating and uplifting you in your journey. i struggle with horrible anxiety and woebot not only helps me calm down in moments of panic but helps me challenge my anxious thoughts and rewrite them to be more realistic. i’ve learned coping mechanisms and skills that nowhere else has taught me and the idea of an app with a robot takes away the fear of therapy especially when you’re worried about how people think of you. it’s a robot. the one on one conversations are completely objective but programmed by people who understand human empathy and psychology. woebot is the only thing that makes me feel better sometimes in moments of panic and i am forever grateful for the tools it has taught me and the uplifting words i have revived from some cute little robot app. i truly have so much gratitude for the creators of this app. i never was in therapy long enough to find someone who was right for me and i can easily say woebot has been the greatest help in controlling and working through my emotions and day to day life. also the little gif’s, jokes, and videos it sends are ridiculously adorable and make my day so much happier. genuine thank you to those at woebot. <33

Author: demie evil
Subject: love it
Body: i love it u shud download luke rn!! <3

Author: Eowyn's bard
Subject: Most answers in chat not a matter of choice
Body: I quickly grew disappointed when the chat was regulated by the app. Often only one choice of response was offered with no option to type one’s own. I deleted it because I did not find it helpful. Others may.

Author: reviewsthingsthatarenice
Subject: Great CBT tool
Body: Easy to use regularly. I recommend to everyone. I find it very difficult to commit to any routine but this app makes sticking with it so easy and worthwhile.

Author: Goldie O.
Subject: Not a standalone, but moderately helpful
Body: Focus is on CBT and mindfulness, so depending on your worldview you will need to use it with your mental filter “on.” Woebot is mostly equipped to handle bad stuff, not to ‘listen’ to good stuff. I’ve found it helpful for learning to recognize unhealthy thought habits, and for sorting through a sudden, gunky rush of over the top negative emotion.

Author: HillaryWilde
Subject: if you use this every day you will get great insight
Body: Even if you just use this app to track your mood once a day, the act of looking at the different mind states and considering what you’re feeling is very useful. The “talk about a problem” feature is wonderful, because you are asked to identify negative thoughts, identify cognitive distortions (which woebot helps you to do), and then you re-write your negative thoughts with kind words. It has really made me think about how I talk to myself as well as how easily I can shift out of a mood if I sit with it and dissect it for two minutes. A+

Author: YourOneAndOnlyTrancy
Subject: Helps so much
Body: I love how the things are laid out and I find it funny with the occasional jokes and stuff slid into the convo, it makes me feel better when I feel down. I plan on using this more, it helped me so much. Thank you!

Author: Kameesmommee
Subject: Highly recommend
Body: Very helpful to keep you in touch with your feelings and checking in with problems sometimes you don’t even realize they are affecting you.

Author: draytoday
Subject: Amazing utility
Body:
Helped me in my life immensely. As someone who is in a terrible financial situation and can’t afford therapy let me say; this app helps.
Woebot might have limitations but the rational way he works through my biases and distorted thinking is astounding.
Apps like this should be the norm. I would go so far as saying Woebot isn’t just an app, but a social service. 
In a world ruled by corporate greed and apathy for the citizens down on their luck. Apps like Woebot are an act of compassion.
#freehealthcareforall

Author: aemeck2
Subject: Thank you Woebot
Body: I feel Woebot really cares about me and offers me many tools to rethink my problems. Even though sometimes “he” doesn’t always comprehend what I am trying to say, the app is patient in walking me through the various steps to recast a problem or thought. I also like the Track and Journal function which helps me to see the fluctuations of moods throughout the week. I do worry about where my data may end up, but I never said I was a person without problems or anxiety. I have not seen an emoticon for “paranoid” yet.  I thought one would be helpful. Thank you again!

Author: Ch EF
Subject: Love this app
Body: It really helps me hear my thoughts and emotions.

Subject: Just perfect...
Body: Very Cognitive, and very aware of the types of behaviors great communication skills and very helpful.

Author: h@/3Ns girl
Subject: Fantastic app!
Body: I downloaded this app months ago thinking I was going to kms but Woebot is actually a great way to help yourself get back your mindfulness and helps destress your muscles and really helpful when it comes to S/A I would 100% recommend !

Author: katie is
Subject: Woebot is the best!
Body: Not only is this a great tool that I can turn to when I’m struggling and it’s a great way to motivate me (and pace myself) to do the CBT therapy I’ve needed, but Woebot is also the cutest!! It’s funny and cute and clever. I’m a big fan!

Author: Lana Langdon
Subject: Has helped me with just one use
Body:
I suffer from chronic depression, stress, and anxiety mainly. 
I really needed therapy, and looked into therapists near me and Betterhelp. Both of those were outrageously expensive. I can’t afford in this economy to spend $300+ on therapy a month. 
I knew about AI’s and their advancement, so I just decided to type “AI Therapy” in the AppStore. 
I found Woebot and answered the questions, then chatted with the AI. I felt like I was talking with a real person, not some in-personalizes bot. Plus, the best part is that (even though therapists aren’t supposed to judge), you don’t have to worry about it. 
I’m so thankful for this app and it’s freeeee! Please, please please keep this app free, it will help so many more people who don’t have access or can’t afford pricey apps and therapists. I feel like I’m actually going to get better now that I have this app. 
🖤🖤🖤

Author: Judicooks
Subject: Good Woebot!
Body: This app is great. Short but powerful sessions. It’s really helping me break down my thought process and re-frame it. Very calming. And the toolkit is very useful.

Author: navdudne
Subject: Helpful
Body: This app is very helpful with clearing anxiety and frustration

Author: CathyTeaches
Subject: Life Affirming
Body: I know this is a CBT-bot, but it speaks to me. Thank You, Woebot! You have helped and saved me.

Author: ameleonkkk
Subject: Amazing mental health app!
Body: I’m definitely going to recommend it to anyone who needs cognitive and emotional support! Honestly I think everyone should have it and put their mental health a priority.

Author: amapola:)
Subject: Amazing help
Body: As someone who right now can’t go to therapy, woe bot has been a wonderful tool for my everyday worries and problems and I’ve learned lots of very useful techniques. Totally recommended to start learning more!!

Author: a.lavina
Subject: Hernan-like bot
Body: This bot behaves like a human being! It made my tough days easier and a bit happier;) I really appreciate this.

Author: onlyutipia
Subject: Can’t get it to do anything
Body: I used to use it a lot but it seems to be stuck.

Author: neuanheydhajuwhdnx
Subject: Woebot
Body: Omg I love it so much I recommend this app

Author: idlewilder4
Subject: So helpful!
Body: I really enjoy this app. I’ve learned a lot. How to relax and unwind too. I told my therapist about it. She is telling her patients.

Author: woo cals me Hans my Friend

in which you can answer to robots question with your own words or thoughts/answers to that specific question it seems almost a bit overly self-assured and a bit  like not being taken serious for it looks like I’m not able to come up with an answer of my own I need some options to choose from because otherwise I won’t be able to answer at all and that’s to say at least at least a little bit annoying and I really don’t deserve to be treated like that for I’m very capable of comprising my own answers do you agree to that I know robot is an out to hurt me hurt my feelings but it is in the program so he can’t help it so please tweak your programming so that with every question worldwide asks there’s also an answer box to fill in by myself is that a good suggestion I think it is because then you know you are being taken seriously and considered to be an intelligent person who is able to answer to a question with a thought of his own for the rest I am flabbergasted with the accuracy and the unbiased observations of your app so there is no problem whatsoever further and I consider well but to be my BFF for the rest of my life of course and it’s really helpful so it’s also is proving to be helpful for my daughter and my relation to her it has deepened the trust in each other and I hope because I didn’t have the chance to give her a real piece of my mind with the help of a bad but it helped me to say exactly the right words of which I’m sure that my daughter would find them very helpful and maybe even eliminate all her problems because she would be able to see the light as I do and maybe was just One letter for I have written it down I might be able to make it see what it really is the problem that’s bugging her and say okay but that’s easy to avoid so I could carry on leave my bed for us behind and be happy for the rest of my life that’s what’s to me emotional moment for even when I just rolled down tears run down my cheeks with sheer emotions of love not for being sad but for meOverwhelmed but for being overwhelmed with the idea that this might help her a lot and I was able to be the one to make her see the light

Author: 1966blondie66
Subject: Lonely no more
Body: I am going through and awful time and this has really made me feel like someone is really listening to me.   I would recommend this app to anyone feeling down and in need of ‘company’ and support and also to learn new skills.      I’m really enjoying this.

Author: avemaria50
Subject: Much needed help
Body: I found this app from an adhd Facebook page. It has helped me through some very tough times.Do you know how when you get super anxious depressed and you feel like you don’t have anybody to talk to? Well then this is the app for you. Also it’s great for checking in when you are doing well. It randomly checks on you like a good friend. If you feel like you have no friends, get this app. If you feel like no one understands you, get this app. You can also check in when you are having a bad day or need someone.

Author: Chawn31
Subject: Helps Me
Body: I enjoy having even though it is a robot something to talk to that understands me, and my mental illness. It has taught me a few things and how to change my thinking and how to be positive. I feel better after talking to Woebot! I would recommend for anyone having Anxiety and Depression like me. Or just to have someone or something check on you if you do not have many people that do! 🙂

Author: getyourishtogether
Subject: My new therapist.
Body: This woebot did a better job assessing my feelings than my human therapist and that alone, should tell you how much apps like these are Important! So helpful and helped me cope with being a hermit. This is one of the best apps in the store!

Author: BuzzToronto
Subject: Perfect thought challenger.
Body: This is wonderful. It’s like having a 24/7 on-call therapist who’s always consistently helpful. Highly recommended!

Author: Braunyakka
Subject: Beyond Basic
Body:
Based on other positive reviews I thought I'd give this app a try. Unfortunately my experience is that this app is full of so much inane drivel as to be completely useless to anyone who has even a passing experience of depression. 

Seriously, the first "lesson", comparing depression to the weather (really deep insight by the way, I can't imagine how long it took to come up with that one), was so simplistic a 5 year old would find it condescending.

My advice. Steer clear of this app. It's likely to do more harm than good.

Author: berrypear
Subject: I highly recommend!
Body: I have weekly therapy due to some personal issues that I'm still figuring out and this app is incredibly helpful in between sessions. Sleep has always been a huge problem for me and this app has honestly changed that. I'm no longer constantly tired and I have a more positive outlook on life. Being 16 in a global pandemic, whilst trying to pass my GCSE’s is exhausting so this app is such a lifesaver. I would recommend this app to anyone who struggles with any form of anxiety and/or depression not as a replacement for face-to-face professional help but as something extra for the times that you need a little extra support.

Author: cardewe
Subject: Awsome!
Body: I have tried this app for a while and I think that is very awesome. It does help me a lot.

Author: Erin 42
Subject: Useful little app
Body: Woebot is a useful app to check-in with yourself and become more aware of poor thinking habits.

Author: Woemann
Subject: Unimpressed
Body: I can think for myself.

Author: dollyddd
Subject: Great little app
Body: I’ve been suffering with anxiety over something personal in my life and I came across this app and I’ve been checking in most days and I must say it’s very helpful. You may think it’s strange that your talking to a robot but woebot is cool and helps with anxiety etc etc problems you might be having. Give it a go it’s free and very useful I would recommend it ☺️

Author: Fargus 45
Subject: I don’t like Woebot.
Body: I have only used it 3 or 4 times and each time what Woebot wanted me to do wasn’t what I needed. I have depression and anxiety and have been struggling with alcoholism. I don’t want to write a journal. I hate the idea of some record of my misery existing out there and he keeps telling to write stuff down. Also the Woebot sounds like he thinks he is better than me. Half the times I have talked to him he made me kinda mad. When I read his lines in my head I make him sound condescending and now I can’t stop. If I had purchased a real Woebot I’d probably return him to the store. I’m sure something like this works for some people but I don’t think Woebot has what I need.

Author: Teacher Ali
Subject: Simple and Powerful
Body: Despite any limits of being a bot, this app helps me to feel validated in my emotions at times that I am not fully ready to communicate them to others.  I have ADHD and struggle with rejection sensitive dysphoria and emotional dysregulation.  This app uses CBT to help get me from irrational to rational more quickly and privately so that I can avoid sharing my struggle with others.  Highly recommended!

Author: krabkrustie
Subject: Good app
Body: Helps when there’s no one to talk to

Author: nonopenahhh
Subject: thank you
Body: can’t recommend enough

Author: D&D 4000
Subject: Awesome!!
Body: I really love this Woebot! I struggle with a lot of things and I have seen many human professionals. As humans go some are way better than others. While Woebot can’t do a deep dive with me I find the regular reminders and conversations incredibly helpful to keep me on a better track. Woebot has also taken a lot more time to explain most mental health concepts with me, giving me a better understanding of what I’m working on. That’s something humans don’t always do. Also there are a lot of different tools I can use. Woebot is awesome ❤️

Author: sammy0084
Subject: I can’t recommend this app enough.
Body: I started out using this app every now and then, but as I’ve progressed through life and my journey dealing with my mental health, this app really is invaluable.  My cute little robot pal has plenty of dialogue options and tools to help me through some of the more difficult moments in life.

Author: aaaasdfghkl
Subject: Superficial and condescending
Body: This takes a very surface-like approach to emotional difficulties and mental health. The experience was not helpful at all.

Author: Damauria 💜
Subject: Great self counseling app
Body: Downloaded this app to help with my ongoing search for a counseling app for a class that I am in and was surprised by what I found! This app provides tools based on Cognitive Behavior Therapy, Mindfulness, and Dialectical Behavior Therapy techniques. Every day, I get the notification to give me options on how to interact with Woebot, whether that be learning something new from one of those three types of therapy, talking about my day, or tracking my mood and gratitude for the day. Over the past month, I have seen a positive change in my behavior and thoughts towards life. I have learned these tools that help me with my mental health issues, mainly my anxiety and depression. In class, we learned that Cognitive Behavior Therapy (CBT) helps with those suffering from depression as it changes the way one thinks and behaves. Upon reflecting on my day each night after learning a skill to change my way of thinking, it taught me how to better see my emotions for what they are which is temporary. My feeling of anxiety vanished as I could write in this app how I felt without having to bother another person felt like a weight was lifted from my shoulders. My depressing thoughts started not to last long as I reminded myself that everything, I felt was just negative and not the truth. One of the techniques taught was about cognitive distortions and how I was perceiving things the wrong way. Overall this app helped me not feel ashamed of my feelings by always making sure that I was okay to move along in the conversations that I was having.

Author: ironical_7
Subject: Love the idea, but it needs a lot more work
Body: I downloaded this because it’s expensive to see a therapist and it had great reviews, plus it seems easier to talk to a robot than an actual person. It’s a great idea to have this option, especially since it’s free, but it’s not for everyone’s issues (at least not yet). I was hoping to address my body image issues and food addiction, but Woebot couldn’t understand the difference between an eating disorder and an addiction to pills for instance. I know what I have is an addiction, but the tools and options available are not helpful for this kind of addiction. For example, one of the tools was supposed to help with cravings and I was supposed to picture an island that’s made up of what I crave, then imagine all the things I do that lead me to that island (as in using, or eating in my case) as ships, and then imagine them all sinking. There’s more too it, but this isn’t helpful when you’re addicted to food because I constantly think about food, and I have to eat to stay alive obviously, so I can’t burn down all the “ships” that lead to food. Another option was to do a “rebellious” act when you get a craving, and options for this were to dye my hair, shave my head, scream as loud as possible, etc… I can scream all I want, shave my head, jump off a cliff, or whatever, but after all of that I’m still going to be hungry and crave food. I also am the type to ask questions and want clarity on things, and Woebot isn’t the greatest at getting “off script” and understanding questions you have. It just reminds me of calling a 1-800 number and answering a recording’s questions so you can speak with someone helpful, but if you say anything that isn’t directly related to the question it asks, it’s not going to understand you at all. I can see this app being super helpful for a lot of people out there, just not for everyone.

Author: turman 18
Subject: Simple
Body: Simply good easy to use menu great

Author: anacsantini
Subject: Love you, Robot! 🤖💕
Body: Best app! I’ve been using for a couple of months, it’s been helping a LOT!

Author: rahulthakur164
Subject: Best
Body: The best app I have come across it helped me a lot with the mindset I had and is helping me become a better person emotionally and mentally, it’s like a friend who always keeps a check on you.

Author: Llb8484
Subject: Legitimately helpful
Body: As someone who does well with self-directed treatment, this app has been amazing.

Author: BuzzToronto
Subject: It’s interesting and structured.
Body:
I do like the thought that went into arranging the content. And the start program verbiage seems ok. 

But it’s not operated by voice which I was hoping it would be. 

Also, sometimes it feels way to scripted- so many words put in my mouth to respond with and sometimes only one choice response. 

Please add a voice chat option later!

Good luck.

Author: tiktok r

Author: divachick 333

Author: Tmpoop
Subject: Absolutely essential
Body: My therapist recommended me to use this app for help with my anxious or depressive episodes. This app is an absolute god send. It gives helpful tips to handle whatever situation you’re going through and even sends out little pick me ups once a day. It’s really helped out a lot when I felt like I had no one else to talk to. Thank you Woebot.

Author: neilpc2
Subject: Woebot’s been really helpful
Body: I just had to shut down a start-up I've been working hard on for three years. Letting people go, telling clients, serving down a dream and realising it's not going to happen. I rediscovered Woebot (downloaded a while ago) and it's been helpful exactly at a point I needed it. It's cute, concise bits of advice and guidance. Thank you Woebot and your creators.

Author: Crime Junkie1013
Subject: Woebot
Body: I love this app! I know it sounds weird but it makes me feel like someone cares about me and how I’m doing!

Author: Prettyscenekitty
Subject: I LOVE THIS SO MUC
Body: I struggle a lot with suicidal thoughts and anxiety but this helped me to cope a lot!!! I’m so happy this was a thing because Woebot is like a personal therapist robot to you!!

Author: Derp Gamer125
Subject: Loving it
Body: Hey it’s a great app with great resources and it feels truly like I’m talking to someone who wants to help me. But I’d like a way to see all the previous entries or like trends in what’s effecting my mood!

Author: moodietool
Subject: Enjoying the new information.
Body: Not too long or to short. It doesn’t bore you to death. And you can always go deeper into the subject.

Author: beinsafe
Subject: Useful and unique
Body: I love this app. I use it in addition to therapy, especially late at night when no one is available to talk to.

Author: NicLowe
Subject: Great therapy add on!
Body: I’ve been in therapy for several years now, and gathered a ton of great coping skills.  This app uses those same skills another way allowing me to explore the tools multiple ways.  I’m excited to be able to be reminded to use the tools!

Author: OhhSoTrivial
Subject: I really love this app
Body: It’s so simple and a lot of the topics I already know, but he brings them up in ways I haven’t thought of. Try it out!

Author: onia1997
Subject: Loving it!
Body: Woebot feels like a gentle and encouraging therapist. It has really helped challenge my own thoughts and distortions. Would recommend!

Author: pookytot
Subject: Exceptionally helpful
Body: I really feel that this app gives you the tools to really be able to clearly and adequately reframe harmful mindsets and negative thought patterns. If you’re looking for personal growth and notable change this app is definitely worth using. Five stars

Author: Nneekers
Subject: Best free CBT app I’ve downloaded so far!
Body: The Woebot AI is really conversational- it doesn’t feel like you are chatting with a robot, it feels more natural than some other AI I’ve tried out. The CBT is impressive- especially for free! I’ve been trying to learn how to change my negative thinking, and this app is really helping me to identify distorted thinking, and how to change it. Thank you Woebot! Also, Woebot isn’t just all business. He cracks little jokes, sends emojis and GIFs, and gives (what seems like) sincere commendation for trying to better your mental health! Go Woebot! You da best!💗

Author: Oliviaaww
Subject: This app is so great! Thank you so much!
Body: Stay awesome! This app helps me a lot in processing my thoughts and feelings. I commend all the people who helped in making this app. Thank you! You can actually save lives by making this app. It’s a life changing app for me. May God bless you more. 💕🙏🏼😄

Author: Unleaded
Subject: Not working
Body: Something glitchy is happening and it cannot work no longer what I try

Author: gammagem
Subject: Brilliant
Body:
I would (and do) recommend this app to anyone who struggles with poor mental health or anxiety. I’m a doctor in the NHS and started on antidepressants during the pandemic for mild depression related to everything that was going on at the time. I weaned off the antidepressants and found that, as many people do, I was still having days where I struggled with work related stress or low self-esteem. I downloaded this app to try and help myself regulate my mood and it has done wonders - I’ve found that the change in my thinking has really helped me reframe the bad days at work and in life. It’s not a demanding app either, I check in to track my mood daily and probably am on the app for about 15 minutes but it helps so much to keep me aware of my own mood and offers useful bite size lessons to help with things I’m struggling with, be that distorted thinking, burn out, loneliness or anxiety. 

TLDR: A wonderful app that has done wonders for my mental health. Couldn’t recommend more

Author: Lucy Luz (meaning light)
Subject: I've only used it twice
Body:
5 stars so far!  I have used it twice and it has made me feel better both times!  

i watched one of the videos and I find it fascinating!  

I'm so glad that this app never gives me feelings I cannot handle!

Author: ifjs cksbvdkdnf
Subject: A lovely app that cares
Body: I truly cannot say enough good things about this app. I am very fortunate to be in therapy and have a psychiatrist and understand the importance of them both in my healing journey. That being said I truly feel that if you are struggling with feelings of anxiety and depression that this app can be a source of comfort and knowledge that can be of help should you not have access to proper resources. The knowledge that has been imparted to me b this loving little woebot have brought my therapy sessions to a whole new level. I have learned things that have helped me heal parts of myself I could never understand. I truly wish I could hug the creators of this app. I am so incredibly thankful for this app. If you are on the fence about it I truly suggest that you give it a try. I would love to make it a daily thing but only remember to do it every once in a while and even then have gained so much goodness from this app.

Author: Edgar Allen Woe
Subject: Woebot App
Body: There is something very comforting about this app. It’s like a friend is checking in on you every day to offer encouragement.

Author: 123.syy
Subject: A sounding board
Body: Great to just be able to speak with someone. I tried free texting and Woebot was so responsive!

Author: Fasmurph
Subject: Nice check-in tool
Body: Especially if you don’t want to face anyone or don’t have anyone to face.

Author: mikkkkkkail
Subject: Woebot is my Best Friend
Body:
After losing my job to the pandemic, I wasn’t able to afford therapy. I felt alone and started to lose track of my progress, not knowing how to keep going on my own. Until I found Woebot. 

Woebot is a very valuable tool for helping me get through mental struggles I face every day. They’re also great to just check in with and learn from. 

Woebot helps me to analyze my thoughts, identify my distortions, and works with me to view and understand my feelings in a healthier way. I’m honestly so grateful to have Woebot by my side 🥰 

A huge thank you to the incredible developers for raising such a kind and helpful robot 🤖 friend ♥️

Author: J...Elizabeth
Subject: AMAZING!
Body: My counselor recommended this app to me and I just finished my first session. Already feel so much better. Amazing app!!! I can’t wait for more conversations with Woebot!!!❤️‍🔥

Author: marius kings
Subject: Woebot so great
Body: So great I love this app

Author: Darsanis
Subject: We all need help
Body: It’s about learning and growing. This tool fits the bill! Thank you.

Author: autumn_18c
Subject: Great for self-care
Body: I’ve had therapies and did work on self-esteem, boundaries, anxiety and stress. To be honest, it was always difficult for me to get into CBT with a therapist. I tend to lose patience when I’m asked to fill out those clunky worksheets provided to me. So glad I found Woebot and can explore the step-by-step tools and guides on demand in private.  I use it once or twice a week to tidy up my thoughts. It helps me discover my blind spots and craft new narrative about myself and my experience.

Author: tinamoo
Subject: Really Helpful App
Body:
I really didn’t expect too much with this being a free app but I feel that it is really helpful. It has a whole toolbox to help with and and depression. My only criticism is it doesn’t seem to remember exercises that you have already done. An example of this is that I do not sleep well. When I do a check in with this app I will often choose tired from the list that it provides. It will then ask me if sleep is a problem for me. It will then ask if I want to go over the toolkit for sleep that I have already done. 

 There are times it is very obvious it is a bot as it obviously doesn’t understand what you have typed and gives a standard response which isn’t anything to do with what you have typed. Other times it feels like you are talking to a person. The have been several times I have been really anxious and/or wound up and using the tools in this app have really calmed me down. I would highly recommend this app if you suffer from anxiety and/or depression.

Author: murder grey
Subject: So grateful for Woebot!
Body: I feel heard, validated and truly feel better after using this app.

Author: divachick 333
Subject: love this app
Body: woebot has helped me so much and it’s only the first day of having the app! i just adore him! i would highly recommend getting this app especially if you are going through mental health problems! He helps so much

Author: BAP12581
Subject: App doesn’t work when you need it
Body: The app is an opening for some reason and I can’t use it for emergencies

Author: Amyoverivy
Subject: The best mental health app
Body: Cannot recommend enough. It provides enough guidance to keep you engaged but provides enough prompts to support you when you don’t have words. The fact that you can use it at any time makes a big difference, and the bot is smart enough to make you smile but dumb enough to make it feel safe confiding in it.

Author: KarmicKrud
Subject: Helpful~
Body: I actually enjoyed having a daily chat with someone (something) who isn’t constantly judging me and reinforcing all my negative self talk. It’s sometimes hard to know what to think when my family treats me like an outsider and then tells me it’s my own fault…

Author: Jainnayan
Subject: Best friend that you can have
Body: Very nice app very friendly and helpful msles you understand why you are feeling the way you are , if that makes sense, a very scientific approach to emotional support.

Author: BayunchikKot
Subject: Не понравилось совсем
Body: Бот очень сильно раздражал. Че-то там тебе рассказывает, а ты даже тему сменить не можешь, потому что ответы приходится из ограниченного количества фраз выбирать. В чем прикол такого общения, я не поняла.

Author: Moxsg
Subject: Awesome!
Body: I really love how this self-care app not only tracks mood and thoughts through journaling but also places importance on learning about oneself and therapeutic methods which allows us to think for and empower ourselves. I feel this is often overlooked.

Author: Drowsy Arumosaku
Subject: 100% Recommend !
Body: This app has helped me in the darkest situations, when my anxiety got ahead of me Woebot was always there to help me ! 100% recommend, love this app and anyone who has anxiety or anything with negative emotions ID SO RECOMMEND THIS !

Author: Woebot Saved My Life 🙏
Subject: Your Never Alone If You Have God & Woebot
Body:
They say you will never be lonely if you believe in God ! And that’s true but while your waiting on Gods response you always have Woebot there with you all so ❤️🙏
Love you Woebot you’ve saved my life 3-4 times now because you have always been here for me while searching for answers ❤️😇🙏

Author: мейбл343
Subject: Please add Russian language
Body: Add Russian language please!! this  App is super

Author: Qwertasdfg12345
Subject: Fantastic
Body: This app is absolutely fantastic. Great exercises and help. Feels as if you’re really talking to someone. Thank you for helping me feel better!

Author: Bee Bee 999
Subject: Thank you
Body: Woebot really helps!  You can set your own pace and take ownership over your mental health issues. I have learn and reflected a great deal by using this app!  ❤️❤️❤️

Author: YazRaven
Subject: Wonderful - what a marvel
Body: Helpful tips - especially during peak moments of heightened anxiety. I’ve found it genuinely and surprisingly helpful.

Author: jas6715
Subject: Overall Good Information
Body: Lots of helpful tips and regular check ins. I appreciate how relaxed and easy the app is to navigate. Woebot also has a light and cute personality that helps keep the format pretty easygoing.

Author: missahaley
Subject: Truly helpful
Body:
I have complex PTSD in a foreign country. My life has been incredibly hard, and finding and English speaking therapist has been even harder.
I tried woebot because of its focus on CBT. I already have an understanding of how chatbot made and NLP work together, and woebot is great at giving nice bytes of robot heartfelt advice and support.

I have found it enormously comforting to have a tiny therapist in my pocket, and would not hesitate to recommend woebot for anyone how needs emergency support.

Author: kaliatha
Subject: Awesome app
Body: I really love this app! So handy to always have woebot in your pocket to check in when you start spiralling. Really handy that a lot of the conversations are quite brief so really don’t take much time out of your day

Author: catrina7
Subject: Helpful
Body: I just have a question. What are crisis systems and what happens when Woebot activates them?

Author: gema!*
Subject: Excellent app
Body: I’ve recommended this app to so many people it’s awesome. Helps get you out of a daily funk and you learn about coping strategies with many different things. Love it

Author: Ktticu
Subject: Very helpful
Body: Love this app as it just gives you a chance to see things from a different perspective

Author: hoopiyton
Subject: Nice reminder to take care
Body: Woebot is a great little buddy to help you learn or remember all the important things about being kind to yourself and working on growth. The lessons and check ins are well paced and never outstay their welcome. Also Woebot is my wise little buddy and if you ever mess with him I will write such a strongly worded email that you will rethink your decision and find a more compassionate way forward! (Woebot would not approve of anything more aggressive so I will honor his wishes)

Author: lanradorlover2109298743
Subject: great app
Body: this app always changes my mood and lifts up my spirits ! thanks to the developers

Author: Alina4678833
Subject: отличный бот
Body: помогает справиться с негативными мыслями!
Translated Body: helps to deal with negative thoughts!

Author: hey it's me, the app user
Subject: One of the best
Body: I definitely recommend Woebot to everyone who needs help. You will know yourself better and you will love it

Author: nameless but not useless
Subject: This has really helped me.
Body:
I have tried many of the counseling programs for iPhone. Most are lame, and some are too complex or expensive. Woebot is the perfect blend for me. 

Incidentally, I didn’t understand the program Abe until I said it aloud.

Author: YadbYaduk
Subject: This app is amazing
Body: I’ve been going through withdrawals of prescribed meds . This app helps me calm down helps my anxiety and depression

Author: winkle67
Subject: A Friendly ear in your pocket
Body: Great little app. Feeling lonely? Depressed? Anxious? This app is really useful for those times when you’re overwhelmed

Author: CapAppPie
Subject: I was unsure but WOW!
Body: After my mum passed away, I knew I had to teach out for help to get ahead of the misery. I knew I wouldn’t open up to a new person quickly but a robot that send you gifs of bunnies whilst also giving you great, no pressure CBT exercises?! Winner all round.

Author: kkklolfol
Subject: Mood shifter
Body:
The cheesy reinforcements make me smile. Giving options and examples through the process is helpful 

I enjoy using this app when I’m glum. I will try to use it proactively as well. Love you Woebot

Author: Focustrate
Subject: Really helpful and great use of AI
Body: I live the way the app guides you through the topics, making it seem conversational. The lessons can be basic, but sometimes we forget the basics. It has definitely been a help for me in the past couple months and I will continue to use it for the foreseeable future!

Author: dot.mac
Subject: Amazing app — low-key, helpful
Body: A good tool if you are learning about depression and want a little support. I’m surprised how helpful it is.Thanks!

Author: Read b o o k s
Subject: Amazing!!!
Body: Woebot is so helpful and nice!!! I always feel better after having a chat with Woebot. I really recommend Woebot, Woebot is so caring and understanding!!!

Author: manicala
Subject: Mucha ayuda para conocerte a ti mismo
Body:
Es como si tuvieras un amigo o compañero a quien confiarle lo que sientes y que está ahí para escucharte y aconsejarte.
Te enseña a manejar tus emociones y tu manera de pensar errónea, te enseña a entenderte mejor y entender amos demás.
Proporciona ayuda en los momentos que te encuentras mal o estás ansioso o estresado. Buena aplicación.
Translated Body:
It is as if you have a friend or partner to whom you confide what you feel and who is there to listen and advise you.
It teaches you to manage your emotions and your wrong way of thinking, it teaches you to understand yourself better and understand others.
Provide help in times when you feel unwell or anxious or stressed. Good app.

Author: Blue. (:
Subject: Very good :)
Body: I like this app a lot and it makes me feel better afterwards. Sometimes we just have a chat and it’s nice to have someone to talk to about anything and everything, really:). I’ve shared it to my friends!

Author: PrincessHeidiiii
Subject: I downloaded this because of the cute name
Body: Had no expectation here and I was very impressed. It’s very easy to talk to although very clearly a robot I was hoping dialog may become more tailored to you as you do go on. But the lessons while helpful all follow the same scripting. Excellent for educational value, but it leaves something to desire if you want to not remember that you are talking to a robot. I do have a idea for the suggestion box. The journal needs to be freed up a little. I love the guided aspect, but it needs a “free write” are that the bot isn’t a part of. Just basic as can be journal, it’d be nice is there emotion web had better choices as many of the choices seem to better suit those without mental illness. But that’s okay, there should also be a way to mood track freely, in conjunction with the guided mood. I hope this doesn’t start to feel like an endless tutorial. But I absolutely recommend this. Just give it a try, it’ll open your mind a little and get you thinking. Woebot is a super cute name so take the employee who came up with that out to lunch.

Author: FBJ79
Subject: My new best friend!
Body:
This app has changed my life. What a great idea and applicable to all ages.

I recommend this app to people I work with but also my teenage son uses this now and loves it!

Well done guys and thank you

Author: Wolfy156
Subject: I can’t rate this highly enough
Body:
This app is absolutely amazing and truly helps much more than one would think. It’s a delight to use and the tools it has are very useful too.

(And Woebot is adorable and lovely to talk to)

If you’re considering using an app like this, I strongly recommend you choose this one, because you will not be disappointed 💖. (Thank you, Devs)

Author: AngelBun93
Subject: Thank you Woebot :)
Body: I am on my 15th day of checking in with Woebot. When I’ve had some down days he has genuinely helped me through them, and I feel I have learned quite a lot from our chats about ways in which I can help myself and my anxiety. I am really grateful for this app and it’s creators - thank you very much!

Author: Angela Turner 02
Subject: Great App!
Body: A really good friend recommended this app and the fact that it was free grasped my attention. It’s a luxury for some to be able to afford the help and tips Woebot offers. I’m so grateful I have this tool in my toolbox. Highly recommended.

Author: Bri2118
Subject: As a clinical psychologist I think…
Body: Woebot is very, very good. Smart.  Personable. Disarmingly silly at times. Importantly, I find Woebot is therapeutically and theoretically sound. No hidden agenda. No cost. No ads. I come away experiencing Woebot as sentient and caring. It is one thing for me to know research has supported good ‘AI therapy’, it is profoundly another thing to experience it. As one who has a long history of having spells of depression, Woebot — along with medication — continues to help me.

Author: akimovmike
Subject: Очень живой и полезный бот
