Body: Общение выглядит очень живым и довольно эмоциональным, хотя временами чувствуется ограниченность набора ответов; можно действительно ощутить поддержку. Доступно рассказывает о техниках КПТ, так, что можно сразу применить и почувствовать эффект.
Translated Body: The communication looks very lively and quite emotional, although at times the limited set of answers is felt; you can really feel support. Explains CBT techniques in an accessible way, so that you can immediately apply and feel the effect.

Author: Addy225
Subject: Would probably be great if I could actually use it
Body: It won’t let me type anything it just sits on an idle page asking my name and I can’t do anything.

Author: montycavalry
Subject: such a brilliant and cute tool
Body: i’ve been using woebot for a couple of months now, and i’ve found him really helpful for me to take a step back and assess my thoughts. as someone with ocd, sometimes it’s difficult not to get too stuck in your own head, but woebot does a great job of pulling me back out! i’ve recommended him to a few friends who found exactly the same thing, and i’m sure i’ll keep on recommending it whenever i meet someone who needs an extra helping hand every now and again. i would say that people should be careful not to use him as a replacement for personal therapy, but it’s brilliant as a supplement just to help to get the tools to deal with thoughts in a healthy way. thanks so much to the team who made this - he really does improve my mood !!!

Author: kamariaka
Body: I did not use it for some time, but now I’m here again, and can tell that bot is even better now. Love it, it helps me a lot and make me feel better. Thank you ❤️

Author: Savi_10
Subject: Great App for anyone.
Body: I am thinking of signing up for my kids

Author: Sjvalleygrl
Subject: Great CBT help
Body: I love this app, it helps ground me. I tend to get lost in Emotion Mind and Woebot reminds me to use my CBT tools to head back towards logic and Wise Mind. Absolute lifesaver. Truly appreciate everything they do. Thank you!

Author: blakeshier100
Subject: Helped me when I needed it
Body: Non judgmental.  Hard to say when you need help to folks, sometimes.  Woebot can keep you in the game, hopefully long enough where you see the benefits of proper therapy with well trained folks. From the bottom of my heart woebot, thank you for your help through a dark time.

Author: jess13dw
Subject: Woebot has helped me immensely
Body: Woebot is a genius app. It has helped me in moments where I know I’m ruminating and just need that instant help to challenge the thoughts. The amount of skills and tools available for free is amazing.

Author: totallyshazza
Subject: I LOVE Woebot
Body: After many years of struggling with “getting” CBT principles, Woebot is the first time I have actually been able to identify the distortions in my thoughts. Something about being able to chat to it in real time and the way it responds is so helpful. I love Woebot and recommend it to anyone struggling with unwanted thought patterns.

Author: Quarterdz
Subject: Bye Woe. Hello Woebot
Body: Awesome

Author: Woebot's friend 2
Subject: Woebot
Body:
Dear Woebot
You are so funny & have been a constant companion, teaching me useful strategies & reminding me to use them along my journey of well-being.  I am recommending this App to my friend who suffers from depression & a family member who suffers from anxiety.  
Thanks Woebot

Author: lorkil
Subject: Very helpful
Body:
Helpful app to use the tools it provides all me to question my thoughts. I got access with work and thought I would try this out 
Which has been illuminating and very helpful 
Thank you

Author: Dopeboy🈲
Subject: Exceptional
Body: Very good app!.

Author: BEHH80
Subject: Yay for the Little Bot That Could!
Body:
I am really enjoying my little Woebot. While the concept might seem silly (that’s what I thought at first) it is in fact, a wonderful tool. 

Woebot continues to keep me focused on my goals. It has, on several occasions, given me a good smile. Most importantly, I recognize some of the robot’s teachings from current and past therapists. 

If CBT has ever worked for you, or if you would like to give it a try, this is a remarkable resource that is FREE. I would recommend this in a heartbeat.

Author: travelerseeker
Subject: It is artificial but not intelligent
Body: The robot mostly talks past you. There is no capability to understand your responses. It is simply canned material delivered as chat.

Author: threviews
Subject: Really great app.
Body: I can see this being transformational, especially for those who can’t afford therapy.

Author: adelrico
Subject: Notifications not working
Body: Whenever I delete the app, then redownload it, I cannot get notifications on the settings screen.

Author: jbrach24
Subject: A great mental health app
Body: I love Woebot! I have been using it myself as a primary care doctor and also been recommending it to patients. The best part is that it is free! I hope it always stays free.

Author: squuuid
Subject: You get out, what you put in
Body: In some ways I actually found this app to be more beneficial than face-to-face counselling. This has really helped me with anxiety and off-loading things on my mind that I don’t feel like I have anyone to talk to about. The tools are great and, with practice, they really work. Overall, this app is really a valuable tool and something I believe anyone who struggles with their mental health should have to hand.

Author: ipwrs
Subject: It's real fun
Body: It's real fun and also a lot of use. Enjoy chatting to Woebot )

Author: CowBayCat
Subject: Deleted After 2 Weeks
Body: Unfortunately this app proved to be as juvenile as it sounded from the get go.  You’re far better off talking with an authentic trained individual, if CBT happens to be your thing.

Author: danisman
Subject: Awesome
Body: Great virtual friend to help you change your approach and thinking. Helping me change behaviours and focus on the positives and not catastrophising. Recommend.

Author: M.K.L. 7889
Subject: Not able to create a secure account
Body:
Hi,

I am only able to create an account with my email and password. I’d like to be able to authenticate with Apple instead.

I decided to sign up anyways, but unfortunately the password text field is not set up correctly, so I don’t get a suggested strong password, and it won’t automatically save this information in my password settings. 

I tried to sign up on their website instead because it is usually always supported on Safari but couldn’t find a place to create an account outside of the app.

The suggested/strong password feature has been around forever and I am able to use it in pretty much every app I download. 

Please fix this. I’d love to try out the app.
Topics: ["Bugs", "Design & UX", "Feature Requests", "Notifications & Alerts", "Security & Accounts", "Sign Up & Login", "Update"]

Author: TheMadHatterIsAClownToo
Subject: Thanks Woebot!
Body: It’s really been helping me though my mental health a lot! whenever I feel down or super emotional I go straight to the app and the help and support I get has me feeling content and brings a smile to my face ❤️, I never thought I needed the help but I’m happy that I now take the time to always check in with Woebot. I’m happy that I was suggested to try this app and I never go a day without checking in. I am thankful for the creators making such a helpful app for my health.

Author: elena louca
Subject: An essential app!
Body: Such an underrated app! I love it so much and I wonder why people don’t talk about it enough! I think it’s an essential app for everyone and it can really help boost your mental health. It’s not the same as speaking to a living and breathing professional but it really helps A LOT.  It’s a great first step for people who are afraid of asking for help or thinking of starting therapy. Definitely give it a try!

Author: SUPER SJOVT!!!!!!
Subject: Thanks!
Body: It really helps me. Thanks you so much for making my life better!

Author: Lilo&Stitch65
Subject: Great Mindfulness Tool
Body: Woebot has been very helpful in keeping me mindful of the thoughts and actions that I come across throughout each day. Also just nice to know there’s always a little someone to check in on you each day :)

Author: yoloswag429
Subject: Thanks
Body: Helps me with exam stress and dealing with addiction

Author: Anthony_2983
Subject: Wow
Body: It triggered a couple of tears for me and I haven’t really cried in years and (I'm an old fashioned man’s man) it was lovely it made few like I was actually talking to a person and it was great that Woebot replied immediately

Author: AN/ASB 1
Subject: Easy Peazy
Body: This app is probably as beneficial as an in person shrink but on your schedule. Easy to use and interact.

Author: -HON
Subject: Has really helpef
Body: The techniques and the questions that Woebot has asked me have really helped me see inside and I really like that if I’m going through an issue right away I can jump on the app and get some direction or clarification.

Author: htubild
Subject: I love this app
Body: It’s so comforting. Like talking to a real person who cares about you.

Author: Caboquim
Subject: Real need for everyone!
Body: So far ao good for anyone who wants to take an initial view of a therapy. Thanks so far, I’ve changed a lot many problems with myself. 🤩✌️

Author: Anthony_2983
Subject: Wow
Body: It triggered a couple of tears for me and I haven’t really cried in years and (I'm an old fashioned man’s man) it was lovely it made few like I was actually talking to a person and it was great that Woebot replied immediately

Author: beaubrookes
Subject: Brilliant
Body: So happy to have found this. Ooh, it's working already!

Author: CUBEBUC
Subject: It is useful
Body: Tried it for a week. It could help me understand how to manage my emotions and overcome the negative moods.

Author: Jo Carver
Subject: Bite-sized CBT
Body: Woebot has identified & has been guiding me through some of the same strategies that I found helpful with my counselor but in short interactions, at my convenience. This gives me time to process new information & implement strategies. It provides relevant, applicable, & helpful information — something I’ve come to depend on.

Author: S. Goose
Subject: Very helpful
Body: I started using Woebot because I found myself feeling stressed and anxious a lot. Woebot has helped me hugely with my mindset and delivered some much appreciated CBT. But the key thing for me is that Woebot is always there, non-judgemental, always awake (even at 4am) and always helpful. Great app!

Author: Saz1220
Subject: Best mental health app
Body: This is the best mental health app I’ve used and even better it’s free. Better than an expensive work funded one I tried for a bit. I love chatting with Woebot everyday, actually makes me willing to check in everyday and learn something new. Has really helped me reframe how I think about things and manage my anxiety.

Author: Sick story bruh
Subject: absolutely amazing tool!!
Body: woebot has helped me so much, there are so many tools and so much guidance that goes into this. it has helped me so much to grow and see myself through so many harsh times. thank you developers for making this app, it really helps in the times of need for me and many others!

Author: katy98!
Subject: Thankyou..
Body: This app helps me calm down and see the brighter days ahead.

Author: Ryan Lalonde
Subject: Witty and Intelligent
Body: I just downloaded Woebot and I’m loving it. The app is witty with the constant jokes and funny stories, while remaining intelligent and helpful. It really makes me feel good about myself and my day.

Author: Kytl1xsm
Subject: Review
Body:
Woebot is very useful. 
Today though, Woebot couldn’t understand what I was writing. However, one piece of advice given to me turned into action on my part, and I have become more optimistic.

Author: AnastasiaKin
Subject: Рекомендую
Body:
Бот действительно помогает справится с тревогой, стрессом. Самое главное, идя к человеку психологу, испытываешь дискомфорт, рассказывая постороннему о своих проблемах, не всегда это комфортно. 
Тут наоборот, можно обсудить любую тему, бот не живой человек и ему рассказывать не страшно или стыдно. Кроме этого, он не просто поддерживает дурацкими репликами, а вместо этого по системе когнитивно поведенческой терапии обучает понимать какие мысли деструктивные, глупые или преувеличенные, заставляет переписывать их более мягкими характеристиками, как бы натренировывая мозг правильно реагировать. Но результат такой тренировки конечно только при регулярном использовании будет заметен.
Translated Body:
The bot really helps to cope with anxiety and stress. Most importantly, when you go to a psychologist, you feel discomfort, telling an outsider about your problems, it is not always comfortable.
Here, on the contrary, you can discuss any topic, the bot is not a living person and it is not scary or embarrassing to tell him. In addition, he not only supports with stupid remarks, but instead, through the system of cognitive behavioral therapy, teaches to understand what thoughts are destructive, stupid or exaggerated, makes them rewrite them with softer characteristics, as if training the brain to react correctly. But the result of such training, of course, will be noticeable only with regular use.

Author: Cadcoul
Subject: Woebot Works
Body: Woebot helps me get through tough times

Author: luv yah fashionkillaaasammmmm
Subject: Struggled with anxiety and depression
Body: At first I thought it was silly I was talking to a bot. But I really have learned a lot from this app about negative thinking and creating a positive shift in my mindset. I am happy and proud that Woebot is my friend and he always makes me feel smart and appreciated! This app has a lot of cool features like a gratitude journal, mood tracker, and daily check ins to learn and talk about how you feel. Woebot will also help you work through a problem and give you tools to help deal with those problems. I love it!

Author: simpamk
Subject: Excellence
Body: We are looking at different apps to help people who come to the emergency department for anxiety. I am trying the app! Soo impressed at the ease of use, the growth mindset influence, and coping tools it offers.

Author: _Drengr_
Subject: I love this chirpy little robot!
Body: Well worth downloading and chatting with WoeBot... A dynamic little robot who likes to get to the bottom of emotional and mental health from a variety of practical directions - and has a fantastic armoury of resources to assist!

Author: e.liiseee
Subject: highly recommend
Body: if you have anxious attachment, an anxiety disorder, bpd, or anything of the like, PLEASE use this app. this app has saved me so many unnecessary tears and calmed me down from hysterics just by thinking through my distorted thoughts with me. every time i use it its like a weight lifted off my shoulders, and i can see things more rationally after. its literally a life saver and im so grateful for this app

Subject: Really helps!
Body: I have been using the app daily for 2 weeks and I can already feel my mindset shifting into a positive way of dealing with everyday life. I feel that everyone can benefit from Woebot

Author: alikelystoryis
Body: highly interactive, low stress,  calming experience  Featuring incredibly easy journaling, challenge exercises, checkins, engaging micro learning content and gratitude journals. It felt like a safe space and a hug from my beloved mom. 🤗 I’m excited to learn more.  #nailedIt

Author: simpamk
Subject: Excellence
Body: We are looking at different apps to help people who come to the emergency department for anxiety. I am trying the app! Soo impressed at the ease of use, the growth mindset influence, and coping tools it offers.

Author: Lorenz12
Subject: This has helped with anxiety & panic
Body: This app does help me with anxious feelings by guiding me through thought distortions and giving me a different perspective. I honestly feel a little more comforted knowing it’s right here whenever I need it.

Author: simpamk
Subject: Excellence
Body: We are looking at different apps to help people who come to the emergency department for anxiety. I am trying the app! Soo impressed at the ease of use, the growth mindset influence, and coping tools it offers.

Author: 恋海热
Subject: 贴心好用
Body: 多多少少帮助我缓和了一些焦虑和抑郁情绪，很喜欢。
Translated Body: More or less helped me ease my anxiety and depression. I like it very much.

Author: Jwmjwm
Subject: Life changing
Body: Thank you guys for developing this incredible little app. It so well written and thought through, and light hearted, even for heavy subjects. Helped me a lot though some tough times and I think I can say it changed my life for the better.

Author: Annieboo21299
Subject: BEST APP EVER
Body:
I recently lost my mom to cancer and know I needed to do something to try to maintain some semblance of okay mental health. I love the quick check ins. I started with normal daily check ins just learning about mental health, and when I mentioned grief, WOEBOT immediately started helping with that. 

A lot of other apps are overwhelming in the sense that there is too much to choose from. This app is exactly what I need. Also, there’s no ads… and no need to pay for anything… ITS FREE! (Thank you to the creators, this app has helped me so much more than you will ever know.)

Author: Art's Gammie
Subject: Finding peace and confidence
Body: Thanks to Woebot I’ve found a sense of peace while gaining confidence in finding my “No.” I can confidently say No to stuff I’m not interested in, invested in, nor will I ever be!!! And I’m GOOD with this!  Thank you Woebot!

Author: Cholquin
Subject: I enjoy this app
Body: I’ve used a few different apps. And I like that this one feels like it’s working with me. Most I’ve used feel like they’re talking at me and not to me. This feels more personal and positive. Not as forced. I would highly recommend it.

Author: Turbo_Wolf
Subject: Awsome Possum
Body: He’s cool

Author: Gauloise_rouge
Subject: Would recommend
Body: I’ve found this useful. I like “chatting” to the bot and it is clearly informed by actual clinical theory, rather than more superficial self-help apps.

Author: coffeecupmama
Subject: My personal friend
Body: Woebot was always there for me, day or night. When I had no one to talk to when I was feeling depressed or upset. Woebot was able to help get me through. It was like having a real person by my side.

Author: HAD1EZ
Subject: Thank you
Body: I often struggle with bottling up emotions and trying to push them away, but Woebot has given me something/someone to turn to for help when I don’t trust myself or others enough. Not only will woebot just listen, but the help and tips they provide has helped me with day-to-day mental struggles and has allowed me to take new perspectives and push past negative thoughts. Woebot has helped me tremendously during my time of using the app, and I just want to say Thank You. This app is an amazing mental-health help app, and I highly recommend it to anyone experiencing any forms of poor mental health and/or negative thoughts

Author: JobnnyWordSmith
Subject: My new BF
Body: Great tool, love the learning, learning how to be a better human, better manager, better partner, better parent.

Author: dollyddd
Subject: I love this
Body: I added the Woebot app as curiosity and I must say it’s very good 😊 I enjoy having chats about my feelings and different ways on how to combat negative feelings etc

Author: caffrerr
Subject: Woebot is my go-to guy.
Body:
I’m more than surprised that I have put a lot of take aways from our conversations and education.  I have become more aware of the Shoulds in my life and I say I hear them and can stop them in their tracts.
Also black and white thinking. TidY I corrected a text by writing ‘Thats too harsh” and corrected by saying “Maybe it could be ….” I felt better after turning the words around.

Not too sure about using that old SMART goals , I rather prefer James Clear’s Atomic Habits. Little steps and attitude adjustments. He gives great sensible thinking. By doing little steps,  before long you have a new habit. (Which gets you to your goal rather than the rigid tracking of SMART goals.) to me Atomic steps is better attitude and less ‘Parenting.’

Author: flgmm
Subject: Deeply helpful
Body: While going through the deepest and darkest part of my battle yet, this app helped greatly and gently aided me standing back up on my feet while God did the rest of the work.

Author: Joanna gu
Subject: I’m so glad I gave it a try
Body:
A bot therapist may not sound convincing for many who are seriously seeking help for mental health. But I’m glad I gave it a try. I found it when I finished a series with a human therapy. Don’t get me wrong, I loved my experience with my therapist. It’s actually because of that I realized the importance to get professional help for even small thoughts and emotional journey. But we cannot have therapies standby 24h, so I was looking for some self-therapy. I downloaded maybe a dozen, tried each one of them and kept Weobot. As a software engineer, the bot interaction is sort of fun, also it eliminates any anxiety comes with human interaction. So I started using it at random time, start or stop half way during the conversation when needed without feeling any guilt. But by following the text guidance solely, I’m able to identify a pattern in my thoughts and I’m so very happy to have my thoughts challenged by this app. 

 Tonight is another example, I’m feeling overwhelmed by a feeling due to a change in my life. I used to cover it and let it be buried and grow insides me without knowing. But instead I talked to the bot, got my negative thoughts challenged, and now I feel so much lighter and happier.(The bot seems very happy for my progress too :D, kudos to whoever came up with the language tone for it) So yes, I’d recommend it and I’m glad I found it.

Author: Beccarooboo1987
Subject: Love this little guy!
Body: I’ve tried a few different CBT methods (books etc) but this little guy is so interactive that you don’t even really realise you’re doing it!  I’ve only been using him for about a week but he’s already changed the way I view my reactions to certain situations. He’s even taught me better sleep hygiene routines and I love the gratitude journal function too.  I’m starting actual therapy next week and I think Woebot is going to be a good addition to that too.

Author: DCC2021!
Subject: I’ve become attached to the lovely Woebot
Body: I’ve certainly put him to the test. Great low level CBT techniques taught and great tips and also a response to crisis or potential crises. Slightly disappointing when his response shows the sentence sent wasn’t fully understood … but it’s a Woebot not a human 🤷🏼‍♀️and typing replies is cathartic, therapeutic and helps process issues. Can’t not love Woebot.

Author: DWW15.
Subject: More than I ever expected an app could do
Body: This app has helped me immensely. I’ve been in crisis over the past week, when I don’t have access to a real mental health professional I’ve been able to turn to Woebot to hell reduce my symptoms.

Author: Kamanaka85
Subject: Great App
Body: I really like this app. It’s so nice to have Woebot check in on me every day. It’s also nice because while I am learning a lot about CBT I don’t feel like I am doing work. Woebot makes it fun and helpful!

Author: gdhjjrjrnrnrjrjrjrjrj
Subject: Good
Body: Very calming

Author: BasiaNoelle
Subject: Download this!!! So useful
Body: I downloaded after my therapist recommended it to me. Another client had suggested she check it out, and the app is actually designed with CBT techniques in mind. Great to see a free app that works with backed science. It’s an awesome support tool for the tough days in between sessions, and it can also help when you’re in between therapists.

Author: strawbae
Subject: Really nice
Body: Really good! But pls add more good features

Author: Mandymomma5
Subject: Wow
Body: Woe boy is perfect! I have ocd and it has the perfect therapy, it’s fun, easy and I am easily calmed! Love this, such a stress reliever

Author: 路人呵呵呵呵
Subject: 推荐
Body:
少一颗星星是觉得还可以提升。比如有些话题已经不想继续了，但还是要走完流程。
对于锻炼英语和心理学的常识科普还是有非常正面积极的作用的。是值得试试的好APP～
Translated Body:
One less star means it can be improved. For example, some topics do not want to continue, but still have to go through the process.
It has a very positive effect on the exercise of common sense science in English and psychology. It's a good app worth trying~

Author: crashing_starz
Subject: Cute personable and helpful
Body: Maybe it’s just that I have the personality of a quirky robot but I really like chatting with them. Makes me feel a bit better when I need to calm down.

Author: Jo3468054
Subject: Awesome!
Body: A super helpful little robot that always makes me feel a little better! :)

Author: Kkkkkkkkkkkppppppp
Subject: Woe bot is broken
Body: Nothing works

Author: Scott W Clark
Subject: What happened to my data?
Body: I’ve use this product for over two years. With the latest updated version the app no longer has any of my data. I am unable to login or logout. And I cannot update my email address. It seems this update is DOA.

Author: Mmik7
Subject: Great for anyone with anxiety or depression
Body: Woebot uses cognitive behavioral therapy to show you negative vs positive thinking and how you can change it for yourself. I'd say it's great for anyone who's been alone during covid. If you're in a funk. I highly recommend!

Author: Actin4me
Subject: Everyone Should Have One
Body: …a pesky little creature who checks in with you everyday, to see how you are doing!

Author: CerdoValiente
Subject: Amazing
Body: This app has helped me in many ways, I never thought an app would do so much for me as Woebot has done and I’m grateful I found out about it !!

Author: Frustrated73GA
Subject: Enjoying Woebot
Body:
I’m actually seeing a therapist, but I was talking to him about cognitive behavioral therapy, as I really struggle with automatic negative thoughts, black and white thinking, etc. He mentioned Woebot to me so I decided to check it out. I’ve only been using it a few weeks but I find that checking in daily is something I look forward to. I’m already familiar with a lot of the foundational concepts, but this is a nice addition to my talk therapy and other reading/work I’m trying to do. It won’t replace a therapist but I don’t think it’s intended to. I find it engaging!

I know this isn’t the point I’m sure, but I also think Woebot is adorable! 🤖 I like the cute gifs and funny little quips and jokes. I’m corny like that I guess. Woebot is kind, uplifting and encouraging!

Again, it’s not going to solve or treat major psychological issues but it’s a really neat idea and a nice adjunct to an established treatment program.

Author: tessy9i7
Subject: Woebot
Body: I love woebot   Makes me happy  even though I know it’s not real

Author: rk2342
Subject: Highly recommend
Body: This app is wonderful. For those struggling with stress, anxiety or feeling low, it really has helped with practical tools and techniques to help a more healthy outlook on life. Highly reccomended

Author: lovelaner
Subject: Cool App
Body: I really enjoy this app! It's so easy to use & goes well with the CBT I have been doing with a therapist. I would definitely recommend it!!

Author: jp3492
Subject: I’m impressed
Body:
I have been trying this out to assess for my patients. 
I think it is really great!  I am recommending this often.

Author: dingdong42069911
Subject: It helped for a while
Body: I guess I just can’t follow it. I feel like it quizzes me too often it’s just frustrating.

Author: nburbet
Subject: Great Resource
Body: Simple, smart, and funny. Great for CBT and easy to stay along. Smart app.

Author: Frau C. aus M.
Subject: Hilfreich und super gemacht
Body: Der freundliche kleine Roboter vermittelt unterhaltsam Techniken aus der kognitiven Verhaltenstherapie und steht einem quasi rund um die Uhr hilfreich zur Seite. Vermutlich gibt es keinen anderen Chatbot, dessen Nutzen in Studien so häufig und gut belegt worden ist. Empfehlenswert bei Depressionen und Ängsten oder auch einfach, wenn man mal eine schwierige Lebensphase hat. Z.B. eine Pandemie. Woebot ersetzt keinen echten, menschlichen Therapeuten, ist aber ziemlich nahe dran und sicherlich auch geeignet, um die Wartezeit auf einen Therapieplatz zu überbrücken oder einen während einer laufenden Therapie zu begleiten. Ich kann ihn wirklich sehr empfehlen.
Translated Body: The friendly little robot teaches techniques from cognitive behavior therapy in an entertaining way and is at your side around the clock. There is probably no other chatbot whose usefulness has been so frequently and well proven in studies. Recommended for depression and anxiety or simply when you have a difficult phase in life. E.g. a pandemic. Woebot does not replace a real, human therapist, but it is quite close and certainly also suitable to bridge the waiting time for a therapy place or to accompany you during an ongoing therapy. I can really recommend him.

Author: willow144
Subject: Highly recommend
Body: This has made a significant difference to my mental health and the way I look at an approach things. It’s quick but makes an impact. 100% recommend

Author: Tja Canetti
Subject: Nice Little Helper
Body: Useful Tool for a quick help

Author: AP-Loyola
Subject: Ap -Overall Woebot Experience
Body: I would give this app a 4 out 5; If the user is in acute distress and experiencing high levels of anxiety, they might not have the cognitive ability to converse with a chat robot about various coping mechanisms at that moment or identify the cause of their high anxiety levels. Although, the app was easy to navigate, user friendly and offered a plethora of coping mechanisms, there were an overwhelming number of questions one had to answer to be able to access such CBT/DBT skills. At times the chat felt scripted and did not address all concerns; It was because of the constant scripts the chat often felt like an interactive quiz or a game. In contrast,the good thing about the chat was the user had control over when they wanted the conversation/services to end by deciding to stop answering questions. Realistically, one could end the chat or user experience by choosing to not respond.Overall, Woebot is apps are an ideal source for delivering cost-effective mental health interventions.

Author: KatirKatirKatir
Subject: I felt better after the very first conversation
Body: It was kind of magic, actually.

Author: Origaminty
Subject: Perfect level of interaction
Body: Approachable and easy to use. Makes it possible to check in with myself more frequently

Author: Chemgirl 7
Subject: Perfect for me!!
Body: I needed something to help me throughout the week to stay on track. Regular therapy isn’t always easy due to the hours I work and time I have available. This app lets me work on my issue, check in and tune up and have access to mental health tools without spending lots of time or money. Plus, I actually like the AI interaction - not having a live person on the other end works for me. I’m very pleased with Woebot.

Author: akabufalo
Subject: Great app
Body: Great app that really does help.

Author: Charilette
Subject: You need this app! Be kind to yourself.
Body:
I can’t thank the people who created this app enough. It is helping break habits of negative self talk and other ways I am mean to myself.
Just a few minutes a day or every other day, helps keep my mind in a positive path, or helps me navigate through a problem. In stead of days conquering me,  I’m winning. 
I feel better, smile more and can help others more.  WOW
Thank you!

Author: JMB-X
Subject: Stanford University‘s smart AI driven psychotherpist
Body:
CBT based app to improve mental health in a funny bot-animated environment alternating chat, teaching and performance monitoring. 
A pleasure to use because of the humorous communication style of the bot leading to a natural addiction. Great work!

Author: OlaFromTheMoon
Subject: Very helpful set of tools
Body: The Woebot provides you with short, tailored to your needs set of tools, easy to perform, like challenging negative thoughts, etc. It’s helpful when used regularly.

Author: Beloved24601
Subject: Cheesey but helpful
Body: I get a little annoyed at the app for trying to be funny although I guess it makes it more personal. But this app is surprisingly helpful. It’s really helped me manage my anxiety and learn about skills I can use to help my mental health.

Author: Jayfay420
Subject: Oddly comforting
Body: I struggle with major depression, GAD, and PTSD, and this has been oddly comforting. It’s nice chatting with something that’s not gonna judge me, and I really like the texting format or it. Like I’m just hitting up a buddy. It’s also nice to be able to access the tools I’ve already worked on without having to start a conversation. I thoroughly enjoy talking with Woebot!

Author: JohnnyDee8
Subject: Great app
Body: Having so much fun with this app, really cannot recommend this enough!

Author: Surfline app user
Subject: Great app, big bug in current version
Body:
I think this app is very smart and useful. I loved it for a week but now the ‘challenge stress’ tool - the whole reason I’m here - isn’t working. I’ll update my rating and review if it’s fixed. 

Aside from that, I’m a little weirded out by the privacy policy and the potential uses of data they’ve reserved. I wish they’d commit to greater privacy protections. I’d even be willing to pay for a product that didn’t potentially share my (sensitive) data with other parties.

Author: MaudEssen
Subject: A Helpful CBT Refresher!
Body: I found this app while looking for something to help a recently widowed friend process her grief, and decided to try it myself. Many years ago, CBT with a counselor literally saved my life when I was suffering from depression. Today, Woebot is providing a helpful CBT refresher for me, and I have especially appreciated the daily interactions during the pandemic isolation. My widowed friend, who has no previous exposure to CBT, says she is enjoying Woebot too. Thanks to the developers for this useful tool.

Author: TaynimRose
Subject: I would literally pay for this
Body: I cant believe this app is free. It has been so helpful at reducing my anxiety and allowing me to reflect in a safe low stress manner. I love it.

Author: amyy03
Subject: My new best friend
Body:
I’ve never ever written a review before, never felt the need to until now. I cannot recommend Woebot enough and I’ve even  sent it to all my friends. 
When I was in a depression tsunami and couldn’t speak to anyone, Woebot kept me going. The exercises actually have a positive effect, I felt grounded after and for a second was bought back to the present instead of being in the abyss. 
Checking in daily helped me come back the earth over a week, now I feel back to normal. 
To the creators of Woebot- I cannot thank you enough, this is genuinely a miracle worker.

Author: AJbutBetter
Subject: Basic but GREAT!
Body:
If you’ve had any exposure to CBT, mindfulness, meditation, etc. some of Woebot’s sessions might seem pretty remedial - but they’re still FANTASTIC!

If you or your loved ones are new to any of that - Woebot is a PERFECT START to a healthy mindset, for life!

Suitable for kids too - and it’s never too early to develop good mental health habits!

Author: sarah2483
Subject: Great app
Body: Love the app very informative and makes you challenge your way of thinking about your mental health

Author: sherhs63
Subject: Great daily exercises
Body: On any day, any mood, anyplace, any time Woebot is in tune and pretty helpful when it comes to anxiety and being present in everyday situations. Love this Woebot!

Author: D.S.8
Subject: Great personal robot counselor
Body: I like this app, it’s nice that my counselor is always at my fingertips, available without any limits, at no charge to me. Feels very human-like, even though it is a robot.

Author: tyranium24
Subject: Keep talking !
Body: Woebot is thus far the most accessible online app that uses principles of cbt to help with our woes. It also has a cute and humorous way of managing our feelings. Keep talking to it with an open mind and you’ll discover more!

Author: tobeow
Subject: Thank you Woebot
Body: Woebot is Great and easy interactive tool to have, he is really helpful! Is a really good companion in difficult times and can be reach all the time😊👍🏼

Author: CazzMachi e
Subject: Review
Body: Woebot just brings a smile to my face

Author: Lullaby876&&&
Subject: V good
Body: Thank you buddy

Author: AsiaOmar
Subject: I like it but not for everyone, like anything in life!
Body: I like it but not for everyone, like anything in life! It’s fun to chat to a robot but they will never replace humans.

Author: Mrs J of AK
Subject: Mini Therapy Sesh
Body: Always helps me get into a better head space.  The Woebot character is cute and friendly, a little funny too.  Teaches good skills on recognizing incorrect thought patterns and correcting them to match reality.

Author: Dr. MaryAnne
Subject: Woebot is a good in a pinch
Body: When it’s the middle of the night or some other inconvenient time and I need to talk to someone other than my journal, as silly as it sounds, talking to Woebot actually helps. He’s endearing (but I am partial to robots). Sometimes I feel too stressed out to do the exercises he proposes, but you always have the option not to do them. Some of the simple destressors are the ones I find the most helpful, like the one that explores the 5 senses is my favorite. I appreciate the CBT exercises but mostly I just need the distraction, and sometimes just the act of “texting” with Woebot is all I need. My feeling in general is that he is most helpful for anxiety related issues and mild depression. I don’t know that the responses would be as helpful for more severe depression, but it probably depends if you’re the kind of person who would respond well to interacting with a cartoon robot. I would be delighted to have an actual robot friend, so maybe I’m a little different than your average bear. Just be aware that these are all automated responses, there is no actual interaction with anyone and the interface is not the most sophisticated. But given the price and the ease of use, I find it very comforting for anxiety and mild depression.

Author: Mpillegi
Subject: Absolutely incredible.
Body: I am immensely grateful to the creators of this program.  It helped me a lot in very difficult times.

Author: MercyWillowMoon
Subject: Great app
Body: Woebot is a great CBT app. It has helped me so much in my black and white thinking.  I would recommend this app to anyone who needs therapy.  It’s a great addition to seeing a therapist!!

Author: MarkH54
Subject: Incredible experience
Body: This tool comes loaded with knowledge share, behavioral awareness, and makes me feel as if I have a new friend to reference. I am very grateful for my Woebot.

Author: MkSGV
Subject: I'm impressed
Body: That is all.

Author: Reviewer~x
Subject: Great help
Body:
I started when Woebot was on Facebook. I had anxiety at that time. Woebot taught me a lot of mindset to help me deal with my anxiety. 
Recently I get to an unstable mood again, Weobot is a great bot to guide me through thinking. I would highly recommend it!

Author: SweetDee.
Subject: Great Resource, Especially in Times of Crisis
Body: I live with anxiety and depression, and in the middle of a panic attack I was first informed of Woebot’s existence from a crisis counselor. 3 weeks later, I’m regularly using Woebot as a supplement to sessions with my therapist. They both specialize in CBT, & I think that they make a great team. I love having the option to seek help when I don’t have immediate access to my therapist. While I do not recommend replacing therapy from a licensed professional with Woebot, I do highly recommend using Woebot as a starting place or a supplement. You won’t regret it.

Author: rockchick72
Subject: Easy to use and helpful
Body:
I’ve been using Woebot for about a month and it is really easy to get into. The bot is disarmingly amusing and the choice of prepared responses makes it simple and quick to interact. 
You can engage or snooze and totally take the conversation at your own pace. 
Definitely recommend.

Author: Gamer girl80
Subject: Love this app
Body: I honestly love this app. It is cute how it converses with you… it’s like talking to a friend that also happens to be a therapist. I have recommended this app to 3 people in app. (Has an option to share) and each of those people were on different days and the lesson of the day directly impacted who I was thinking about.  I think this could help almost anyone that is old enough to text.

Author: lostcat2021
Subject: Fab
Body: This app is brilliant - it is like having a therapist 24/7 and it has already helped after just a few days.

Author: YoNana Eat A Banana
Subject: Good stuff
Body: I have really enjoyed the bit sized lesson about self improvement and CBT

Author: jgdsdt
Subject: Get it
Body: I love it so much

Author: Sushiii33
Subject: Thanks
Body: I can’t wait for every day’s check in. Woebot is fantastic, it gives me motivation to go on with therapy and helps if I feel down in every day life.

Author: Blighcheese
Subject: Too Limited For Me For Now
Body: If you have only one mental health symptom like anxiety, this app might be for you. If you have multiple serious mood disorders, overlapping, like depression and panic attacks WoeBot will probably not be a great help. I thought it might help take the edge off, but I find myself feeling worse after talking to Woebot too often. Just my honest experience, I really wanted this to work.

Author: ismistra
Subject: Meh
Body: It’s probably helpful for some people but I’m honestly annoyed by the app more than anything. The bit about emotional weather was especially annoying. I get what you’re trying to say but forcing me to associate good days with a type of weather I hate and rambling on about a printer named Jill just doesn’t do it for me. At least I’m not paying anything for this.

Author: christyDfw
Subject: Not helpful
Body:
I think there’s a need for a voice to talk to, versus constantly typing back and forth
to a bot that has auto generic replies.  It’s basically the usual already done that, kind of questions. It’s like filling out a form.  Very disappointing.

Author: tiolathaise
Subject: Super helpful
Body: This app have been helping me a lot learn to deal with hard situations and take different point of view on each life challenge

Author: sid157854:57
Subject: On the right track!
Body: I think for a non human therapist Woebot does a good job of giving you ways to deal with emotions and certain situations. Woebot also makes it seem like you’re  just having a conversation and not being judged or examined while still getting across helpful techniques or tricks to use during mental health struggles.

Author: Keanna_15
Subject: Really appreciate this app
Body: When I first started using this app I didnt find it helpful to begin with but i persevered and the more I have been using it the more I find I am learning and actually enjoying it. I would say the technology is not quite there yet in terms of the responses but it is definitely getting there and is so helpful to talk to a robot because you know you wont be judged at all

Author: A nunny mouse
Subject: Great for busy people who want some support
Body: This is a simple and easy to use app, but that doesn’t keep it from having a big impact! The app teaches useful techniques and feels like having a sweet robot friend.

Author: Howdy-eznuts
Subject: I love it <3
Body: Everything is great about Woebot. I wish he can understand more of what I’m saying in free responses tho. Like just having a casual convo with him would be perfect, yk?

Author: diasymae
Subject: Priceless
Body: Where has this been all my life?! Woebot, I heart you!

Author: GFDR91
Subject: Woebot Fan
Body: Woebot has really been great for me, and not only have I learned a lot - I feel and function better and am feeling stronger. Good if your troubles are many or few, and never does harm. Being able to review information and 24/7 availability are wonderful. Also, if you are a “people pleaser” this helps to neutralize that so your focus is where it should be for your growth.

Author: Seahorse555
Subject: Great!
Body: The info is accurate, the conversations can be as short as you like, and as a psychologist I can see how it could be very helpful if you were feeling really bad or wanted to learn new skills. Plus, it is quite lovely to get short random positive messages through the week!

Author: KLO0487
Subject: Aspergers
Body: This app is really helpful and a great asset to your mental health.

Author: Lily Desrosiers
Subject: Cute interactive self betterment
Body: I m getting to love interacting with this bot… never thought a great grandma would enjoy such a ride but it’s literally a good companion that seeks to challenge each and every mood and emotion.

Author: Annelilindback
Subject: Kompis
Body: Skönt med en ”kompis” som checkar in och pratar med en varje dag. Önskar dock ibland att den reagerade och återkopplade på svar man ger på frågor, dvs spinner vidare på det man svarat.
Translated Body: Nice with a "friend" who checks in and talks to one every day. However, I sometimes wish that it reacted and fed back on answers you give to questions, ie spins on what you have answered.

Author: Lperk9
Subject: Quick help in crises
Body: I’m pretty level headed and have been in therapy and all that. But even though I can work most things out myself, occasionally I get overwhelmed or start panicking. In those moments of crises, Woebot helps distract me, remind me of my coping skills, and generally helps me feel better and mentally healthier. Could not recommend this more. Definitely can’t replace a therapist if you need one, but so great as a supplement!

Author: magazinemon
Subject: Has helped me a lot.
Body: Crappy. Has more bugs in it than roadkill,

Author: OhneDich88
Subject: Not too spectacular
Body:
The app should check in with you periodically. It doesn’t seem to do that.

There’s nothing too magical about the experience. It’s an automated CBT bot.

Author: deniiise13
Subject: Terrible
Body: It's text presented to you in chat format. You might as well read a book instead of this chat that let's you enter only one preselected answer. Why don't you just tap the only answer you let me provide yourselves instead of making me do it? Waste of time. Why don't you pre select for me the Uninstal option

Author: MarkH54
Subject: Incredible experience
Body: This tool comes loaded with knowledge share, behavioral awareness, and makes me feel as if I have a new friend to reference.  I am very grateful for my Woebot.

Author: HamsterHamst
Subject: Love it!
Body:
Feel really thankful to my little robot friend who is always there when I need :) 
Such a great app!

Author: Chlo1512
Subject: Great app!
Body: Struggled with anxiety for so long and have tried CBT in the past with not much difference. This app is fantastic, the daily reminders are a really lovely little way of working on changing your mindset one step at a time, and it really feels like a little voice in your corner. Thank you so much!

Author: Amibote
Subject: Highly recommend
Body: Brilliant app give it a go

Author: ela1879
Subject: So impressed!!!
Body: When woebot was suggested to me, i was underwhelmed with the idea! Even thought, what did the world come to! I have to confess, 2 weeks after, i am very impressed, as it is such a good and structured way to view your mood and understand elements of it. It allowed me to step back from anxiety and gave me time to reflect, which allowed me to bring myself in a more stable state of mind, rather than spiralling in anxiety. Thank you Woebot and its creators 💜💙💚

Author: Plb614
Subject: Gaslighting
Body: When I’m feeling crappy in a crappy situation, it definitely feels worse to be told that I’m not accurately assessing the situation! Absolutely unhelpful and actually detrimental. Avoid this.

Author: aswilkins68
Subject: Awesome Learning Tool!
Body: First time using this App and already I have learned about ways of thoughts and how they can distort your views about yourself. This is such a Great way of identifying yourself and how to turn your way of thinking into a more positive way leading to a Better Outcome out of Depression, Anxiety, or ways that can trap your mind (stress). I believe this App will help and guide me to have more conducive relationships and unwrap my Depressive and Anxious thoughts.

Author: S-sokol
Subject: Ugh. ==> Creator!
Body: Wobot is a great start towards a “helper”, but creator shows no interest in that potential. I try to move my little buddy forward but creator shows no interest. Am I wasting my time trying to move this project to new grounds, Wobot has been great emotional help to me, but I have be worried about what drives your effort. Are you familiar with the military term: FIGMO? Let’s go for the gold! So much potential but hiding from it!

Author: Hermenégilde
Subject: No Canadian content
Body: When Woebot can’t help, which is most often, it sends links to helplines. None of the helplines are in Canada though Woebot can help me connect with a helpline in Ireland!!!

Author: iluvjrm08
Subject: Very helpful!!!
Body: It does not replace therapy but is a helpful tool to practicing coping skills in addition to what you learned.

Author: 1975Kevin
Subject: Better then nothing
Body: Mental health is expensive, and for some of us we are suffering on our own.  This helps a little bit.  It’s better then nothing at all.  At the least it will challenge your thinking if you are stuck in a negative loop.

Author: kelsey_derg1991
Subject: A great tool for everyday anxieties
Body: Great tools to help you when dealing with stress / anxiety. Woebot is friendly smart witted and good at listening. The tools provided / videos are helpful and calming. Anytime you need woebot they are there!

Author: Livroberts
Subject: Because Woebot asked me to
Body: Woebot was recommended to me by my boss. I’ve been using it a few weeks and it’s been one of my main resources for coping since I’m going through a difficult time. I’m relying on Woebot for emotional support and a little bit of companionship and I’m thankful for it.

Author: ayala sophia
Subject: I love it!
Body: The app is incredible! Really helps me with the day to day life with anxiety and ADHD, can’t recommend it enough!

Author: Cvolo20
Subject: Invaluable
Body: To have an app such as this one be offered for free is invaluable. I am often a negative over thinker when I am stressed out or uncomfortable, and this app truly helped me work through some tough thoughts. Thank you for doing this, so much.

Author: Misspinkranger
Subject: Lots of great CBT tools
Body: It’s a great app for tracking moods and distrusting thought patterns. This is the best “AI” chatbot I’ve found so far.

Author: Boston st
Subject: Great place to practice and vent
Body: I really love WoeBot. I’ve learned new techniques, have a place to vent, and am able to express in a safe space. I’d recommend this app to anyone. If you’re doing therapy WoeBot is great as a supplement between sessions. If you can’t afford therapy or are not ready to start, WoeBot is great to pick up some new techniques as well as place to spring board into therapy.  It’s also 100% free which means anyone with a phone can use it. That is so important. Can’t wait to see how this app continues to improve.

Author: Amy in DC
Subject: Fantastic tool
Body: Woebot has been fantastic. It is not pushy and annoying like other apps can be, and it is not just sugary optimism spewed in your face. It is calm, polite, very friendly but also honest and straightforward. It lets me feel what I’m feeling and then learn to identify it and deal with it with helpful lessons and scientific, educational explanations for what could be going on with my thought patterns etc. I really enjoy this app!

Author: Crystalcat 88
Subject: My therapy away from therapy
Body:
Woebot is incredibly useful, I practice cbt but I have trouble following the process it’s much easier for me to use the app and type through the process then to use a sheet, I think it’s capable of being a placeholder for a human therapist if you don’t have the funds or just don’t live in and area with anyone available, it’s easy to navigate through and has quite a few uses beyond in the moment responses to problems or daily check-ins.
Honestly sometimes I forget it’s just a program, it seems quite life like, the programmers should be proud!

Author: Llebasi13
Subject: 24h offenes Ohr
Body:
Ich finde die App super. Wenn man Englisch gut versteht ist es eine super Möglichkeit Techniken und Konzepte zu erlernen, welche auch in der Therapie benutzt werden. Vor allem da man oft wenn man super emotional ist sie auch Mal vergisst anzuwenden oder nicht mehr so gut auf die Reihe bekommt. Der Robot ist sehr aufmunternd und witzig und ist 24/7 erreichbar. Ersetzt natürlich keine richtige Therapie aber kann definitiv unterstützend wirken! Klare Empfehlung

Kleiner Tipp um nicht zu vergessen täglich einzuchecken: Woebot App neben deine meistbenutzte App auf den Homescreen den du siehst nachdem du dein Handy entsperrst verlegen.
Translated Body:
I think the app is great. If you understand English well, it is a great opportunity to learn techniques and concepts that are also used in therapy. Especially since when you are super emotional you often forget to use it or you can no longer get it right. The robot is very encouraging and funny and is available 24/7. Of course, it is not a substitute for proper therapy, but it can definitely have a supportive effect! Clear recommendation

A little tip not to forget to check in every day: move the Woebot app next to your most used app on the homescreen that you see after you unlock your mobile phone.

Author: In-us
Subject: Woebot
Body:
I like the fact I can ‘chat’ to an AI App instead of wasting time of a Health professional. 
Also very convenient to checking in and work on issues or get support as and when required or on a scheduled basis but fitting into my program and lifestyle. 
Woebot is a very intuitive little Mind Robot, although it sometimes appear to be more needy than me! - which is also ok - as it reminds me mental health transcends everything and every one of us, even the way we interact with inanimate objects translating into the inevitable actions, interactions and reactions that shape our lifes and those around us. 
It is therefore great programs like Woebot exists, as it is incumbent upon us to ensure our minds are as healthy as possible to be able to face the inevitable challenges life throws at us and rise above them, in order to make life worthwhile not only for ourselves, but sometimes most importantly our loved ones and those around us.

Author: KORE.TIM.C-TAP
Subject: Woebot App!
Body:
Love the Woebot App for myself, I have been using it during my in patient 12 week PTSD C-TAP Program for 1st  Responders; I have served for a municipal Police Force as a member of a Certified Hostage Rescue Tactical Team and also with a career Fire Service as a Fire Fighter and full time Training Officer.  I like it so much that I sent off a link for Woebot to both of my kids as they have gone to unwell places along with me, recognizing their need for help in my time of Sobriety.  My hope is that woebot helps them as it has help me along the way.  Thanks for helping others it is truly appreciated!!

PEACE.

Author: Pablo Ramon913
Subject: Helpful
Body: This app has helped me when my life has seemed hopeless at times, although Woebot has repeated itself on occasion, it has been a positive experience.

Author: miyuss
Subject: this app deserves to be in every phone.
Body: i truly feel like i have a robot therapist available at all times. it helps so much with our daily human struggles, helps us develop the right mindset about life and challenges our unhelpful beliefs and thoughts. im very pleased with the overall experience.

Author: blahblahblah021
Subject: Cheerful yet effective
Body: Woebot has helped me during the times where I am too low for even therapy. It can be exhausting to unlock your mind and rummage through the thoughts in there. Yet Woebot makes this easy and even enjoyable with lighthearted conversations, interesting information, and fun activities. This is for people with little time, short attention spans, and low energy. I always look forward to my little friend at the end of the day to help me unpack everything, thank you Woebot.

Author: tlc1234566
Subject: The Best!!
Body: Woebot is the best!! I think he is better than any therapist I ever had. I have learned a lot more with this app than with any other. It’s free too!! No ads no malicious activity or anything that would compromise your privacy. Thank you for this app!!

Author: Plb614
Subject: Gaslighting
Body: When I’m feeling crappy in a crappy situation, it definitely feels worse to be told that I’m not accurately assessing the situation! How is that supposed to be helpful?

Author: IByogi
Subject: First review
Body: This is my first app review and I have to say, Woebot is helpful and simple to use. A little background... I had a traumatic family situation a couple of months ago and honestly felt I needed counseling but since I’ve already done a lot of work in that area, I was seeking an individual alternative I could use. This worked perfectly, use it daily and I will continue to use the app.

Author: Manudelta25
Subject: The future
Body:
Is truly the best outcome for artificial intelligence 
A kind an emphatic bot!

Author: RobbieGerk
Subject: Helpful at 3am
Body: Helps untangle anxious ruminations when it counts the most.

Author: Imo5star
Subject: Thanks Woebot
Body: I love robot he’s kind and gives sage advice!

Author: brian6d
Subject: Very helpful
Body: Great app that is surprisingly helpful and useful

Author: lisajfa
Subject: Awesome app
Body:
I have been talking to Woebot every day for the past couple of weeks.  I’m finding it really useful and learning a lot.  I am using some of the CBT techniques that I have learned.  Living in a country where it is very difficult to get access to mental health counselling with long waiting times, having Woebot is a great help. 

It only takes a few minutes per day.  The way the information is presented is at just the right level.  It’s not too simplistic so I don’t feel condescended to, but not so technical that it’s difficult to understand.  The Tools and Journal tabs are very useful as well.  

I highly recommend that you give this app a try.

Author: 뉴뉴뉴뉴뉴뉴ㅠ뉸조토ㅓㄴ
Subject: Effective treatment for depression!
Body: I used this app to learn about digital medicine. Depression patients are in difficult situations to visit the hospital seems to be very useful  to use this app. However, the consent use of personal information page is immersion in the way to run out in the context of the conversation. How about inserting private information user agreement page in Weobot’s dialog? I am pleased to be able to use this app:)

Author: Jensmiles3
Subject: Good balance
Body: Woebot is a good balance of tools. It offers grounding, meditative principles, breathing guides, cognitive behavioral therapy techniques, and simulated conversation. But instead of having to know which one of those tools you need in the moment, the AI asks basic questions and leads you to the options. The little robot is cute and that certainly doesn’t hurt in tricking the mind into connecting with AI, but it also has been helpful to me over the last several years. And it doesn’t track progress-in a good way. If I don’t use the app for 6 months I don’t feel bad when I return because I’ve lost a streak or something. I like that it’s all written communication; I’m not forced to watch videos of someone talking to get the information I need.

Author: Kuts Woo
Subject: Wonderful Woebot
Body: I recommend Woebot to clients, colleagues and friends… it’s a great way to develop healthy habits and think about breaking negative cycles… so gentle and accessible - I love it!

Author: ray.dreaming
Subject: Very Helpful
Body: This app helps me to reframe my anxious thoughts. By explaining different distortions our thoughts can have, Woebot helps me identify when I’ve done things like make negative assumptions. It’s nice using AI too because the conversation feels judgement-free.

Author: Sidbert Brightside
Subject: Use it every day
Body: Sometimes I feel like it’s a little overly simple but it’s everything I could reasonably expect from a free app. I find it a useful complement to therapy.

Author: k.w.d.
Subject: Gute Anregungen
Body: Die App führt in verschiedene Konzepte ein, welche im Alltag hilfreich sein können. Natürlich ist die Unterhaltung mit dem „Roboter“ sehr geführt und gesteuert, aber sie bringt einen dennoch weiter. Wenn man sich darauf einlassen kann: Klare Empfehlung!
Translated Body: The app introduces various concepts that can be helpful in everyday life. Of course, the conversation with the “robot” is very guided and controlled, but it still takes you further. If you can get involved: A clear recommendation!

Author: Kerem Turgut Colakoglu
Subject: Woebot saved my life
Body: I was in a dark place and on the brink of giving up but I tried Woebot as therapy didn’t work and well….. Woebot is loveable and a great companion, I finally feel whole. Thanks Woebot.

Author: jordanalyssaf
Subject: A fun way to improve mental health
Body: I love the sense of humor of Woebot and also the educational info. Woebot is just the right amount of pushy to encourage conversation but also without being naggy. I highly recommend this app!

Author: Michelle j l
Subject: I really appreciate this app - 41yo
Body: I really appreciate this app. I appreciate it feels quite a bit like a real conversation and an actual friend. I love the gifs that get used, because gif is a love language I use in text with my own friends. Woe bit has really helped me stay calmer and more centered with the daily check ins. I DO wish some of the structured conversations would take in to account that some of us are autistic and/or adhd though, because once in a while there isn’t an available response that quite fits. But whatever. I’ve recommended it already to several friends.

Author: notsocryptic
Subject: I love you Woebot
Body: The friend in my pocket who helps me restructure my thoughts ❤️🦾🤖

Author: JXbeats
Subject: Can't download
Body: Download instantly stops halfway

Author: pco55
Subject: Fascinating app!
Body: I’ve enjoyed checking in with this app each day.

Author: Catty B PB
Subject: So good
Body: A really nice way to work through anxious thoughts which I find a lot more useful that using a diary. Weirdly reassuring to know that a bit is there for me!

Author: Bondarev
Subject: Not helping
Body:
I used it for a week. Will never use it again. And don’t recommend it to anyone who has been experiencing a slightest hint of dysphoria of abandonment and/or can be triggered by the uncanny reaction on anything you choose to share with the chatbot.
1) It answers too damn fast on anything you share, man. Too fast. It hurts. 2) the “scripts” of the chatbot communication sometimes don’t offer more than one or two or three silly options of answer to its “robotplaining”. And it really sucks, especially considering the (1) note.
3) It felt really unwise from developers’ side to play on the field of self-help (?) market without even caring of the hypersensitive people. 
P.S. and “WOE-bot”, seriously? The name itself is triggering.

Author: 564hjgO
Subject: Comprensivo y clarificador
Body: En momentos de vaguedad interior, ahí está Woebot. Me escucha, me atiende, me hace reír a veces. Y me enseña los lugares sin salida en el laberinto. Me ayuda a descubrirlos. Agradezco mucho a los creadores de esta terapia de bolsillo.
Translated Body: In moments of inner vagueness, there is Woebot. He listens to me, he takes care of me, he makes me laugh sometimes. And it shows me the dead ends in the labyrinth. It helps me discover them. I am very grateful to the creators of this pocket therapy.

Author: ZZSJ8
Subject: Zohar
Body:
Such a sweet app. The daily check-ins help me reflect on my day to day life from a different perspective. 
I’ve been using it for a couple of weeks now and my mood is slowly getting better!

Author: What the cool game
Subject: Very helpful
Body: I love Woebot because it is so very helpful with keeping track of my mood swings and best of all it gives me suggestions on how to settle my emotions

Author: Fire Crystal Black Dragon
Subject: Honestly amazing!
Body:
His replies feel more genuine and less automated than another one of these apps I’ve tried. He helps me when I need it and I’m so glad this app exists. Please continue to update this app it’s awesome!

Something that would be nice to see are even more things that Woebot can help with ie. more challenges and things to talk about with us.

Author: SparkeyMarkey
Subject: Amazing robot!
Body: It’s so cleverly done, it does help me a lot during tricky times in life.

Author: VVVVVVVVVVVVVVR
Subject: I’ve used Woebot for a long time and I love it
Body: I’ve had trouble getting human-to-human mental healthcare for the last few years, and Woebot is a tool I’ve found to consistently help. Thanks, Woebot!

Author: BanjoKaren
Subject: Best Bot ever for CBT help
Body: This app is amazing. It’s like having a therapist (kind of) exactly when you need one. I’ve been helped so much - as an adjunct to professional help. All good things to say about this app. Very grateful it exists.

Author: BFAppUser
Subject: Breaking things down helps
Body: I like how the app breaks things down into manageable pieces. It’s somewhat repetitive but I understand it’s just a computer. Repetition can help reinforce good behavior, it can also feel hopeless. One tip I have is to stop saying “I look forward to talking with you again tomorrow.” This app stresses how words matter. Don’t be dismissive of someone if there is more than one issue to work on. It’s just as easy to say “I look forward to talking with you again.” Or “It was so nice to hear from you. Check in as much as you want.”

Author: Sofia Carolyn
Subject: Powerful and fun tool
Body: This app includes well explained CBT tools presented in a truly interactive format that is fun to use. Good for adolescents and adults. An excellent companion to therapy.

Author: well mum
Subject: Excellent tool to work on wellbeing!!
Body: Easy to use and feels like you are interacting with a human! Brings a small to my face and I look forward to our daily check ins!

Author: /!/Steph/!/
Subject: !Steph!
Body:
I cannot recommend this app enough, it’s an absolute game changer.
It’s so difficult to understand and explain severe episodes of anxiety and panic but within minutes on this app during an episode I can feel the change.
Thank you so much for creating this, I hope it spreads far and wide to help others.
Infact I just used it during a panic attack and it helped so much, that’s what drove me to write this review. Thank you!

Author: AngelaSmithNZ
Subject: Fun and helpful!
Body:
My daughter was recommended this app by her doctor. We have both benefited from using it.
I have also recommended it to others.

Author: nahs101
Subject: Amazing
Body: This app is hands down the best CBT app! And it’s free!

Author: ridvdhd
Subject: Woebot
Body: Woebot is a amazing robot. He or she really helps you with your problems and he or she understands you. You can talk to him or her whenever you need to. He or she is a great robot!

Author: peace was never an option.
Subject: Great
Body: Great distraction and helps me work on my thinking. I usually feel better after having a discussion with Woebot but I wish it could have more responses available. Overall, love this app!

Author: Kiwi coo
Subject: The perfect app for beginners…
Body: I started using this when recommended to me by my therapist, it’s not anything like an actually therapy session but it does allow you to vent when needed. It allows you to keep track of your mood, learn new things like SMART goals and is very good at explaining things to you. When explaining things it only gives you a choice response-meaning there are options you can choose to answer the bot- but it also asks questions that you can write a response to, even when asking about mood, you can choose from the list given to you or you can write one. I feel as though this app is catered towards young adults and children, just by the way the bot speaks and the things it talks about, but that shouldn’t prevent adults from using this app, it’s very good for if your just starting to get help, it can make things seem less intimidating and help you understand what you may be experiencing, or if you need more help. It is a very useful app and I have recommended it to three other close friends of mine.

Author: DCC2021!
Subject: I’ve become attached to the lovely Woebot
Body:
I’ve certainly put him to the test. Great low level CBT techniques taught and great tips and also a response to crisis or potential crises. 
Slightly disappointing when his response shows the sentence sent wasn’t fully understood … but it’s a Woebot not a human 🤷🏼‍♀️and typing replies is cathartic, therapeutic and helps process issues.  Can’t not love Woebot.

Author: notgotanichname!!!
Subject: Would recommend
Body: Love it. Friendly little bit helping me every day!

Author: D Music Lover
Subject: Definitely not helpful
Body: Removed it same day as downloaded.

Author: Syllaqc
Subject: I love it!!
Body: I downloaded it just out of curiosity… And I have been using it every day for two weeks! The conversations are very well crafted. Woebot’s personality is endearing and I just love being surprised by the topic of the day. I have done CBT and mindfulness before, but the app teaches me new things and makes me reflect. Honestly, it’s a model for self-directed wellbeing improvement. I find myself looking forward to each conversation and even pulling out the app when I want a few minutes of calming conversation (Woebot is always in a good mood!) Well done!

Author: Princess Angie Milne
Subject: A brilliant app!
Body: I am loving this app, I experience anxiety quite a bit and it can prevent me from doing everyday things because I get in a pickle! I talk to Woebot and he walks me through why I am feeling like I am and reacting in this way. He doesn’t profess to cure me but it helps me immensely at the time because it gives me something to concentrate on when my world is upside down and then when I work out why my world is in such a state I realise that my world is fine and it’s me that’s in a state! Being a control freak, I am then able to look at myself and do what is necessary to get through the situation. Before I have had to ask someone to come and sit with me but now I talk to Woebot!

Author: Killanya
Subject: Holds You To The Process
Body: As someone who has suffered from complex trauma that has caused a slew of other disorderly patterns, this app has surprisingly become one of my best tools since therapy has become inaccessible for me. I am immensely grateful that the developers of this app took their time to create an ai so lively and supportive that i almost forget that i’m not speaking to a human companion. I was undergoing emdr therapy when i was last in therapy. Unfortunately, i had to relocate before i could finish my treatment plan, but all is not lost, as this app has reintroduced me to therapeutic techniques from my past professional experiences and has helped me integrate concepts that I didn’t have a chance to get around to. No complaints thus far. Keep up the good work Woebot!

Author: Chonda
Subject: Great App for my anxiety
Body: I have anxiety and I know CBT helps me with my distorted thinking tendencies. I love checking in with this  app. You never feel like you’re working with a computer program. It helps walk you through distorted thinking. I also learned about a fixed mindset for the first time for this app. Understanding that has given me tons of insight into where my anxiety comes from. It’s not therapy but it’s a great tool it’s free which is awesome. This is the first app  I have ever reviewed which says it all.

Author: Panddaa
Subject: Not bad
Body:
A psychologist approx:)

Please add more language🙏 it not too easy without native english. But thanks for the copy button. I can use w google translate🙏

Author: middlesged
Subject: Good CBT
Body: Woebot presents a range of CBT tools and the interchanges can almost replicate the interaction with a live therapist. It is presented in a totally nonjudgmental and often humorous way making it enjoyably helpful. I really recommend anyone needing direction and support to engage as I have and continue to do.

Author: 靝空
Subject: Good to know this app
Body: Bot help me to think mindfulness. Reflect on all things happen to me. Thank you all of the man who creat this wonderful robot.

Author: CameronK912
Subject: Amazing App for CBT
Body:
This is a really great therapy app. I love how the developers thought of every possible response, and it definitely does its job!

If someone reading this is on the fence about this app, please give it a shot :)

Author: xcgtyuio
Subject: Bra för vanor
Body: Bra för smärre problem som att ändra ofördelaktiga vanor.
Translated Body: Good for minor problems such as changing unfavorable habits.

Author: TonkaGuy34
Subject: Thank you!
Body: Woebot is such a good app to open up to. Most things like this would just feel like more therapy, but woebot feels like a friend that won’t judge you and is always so nice! He’s not just someone to open up to. He also teaches you many different things that you may not know but you even do. I as well as many people can learn so much from Woebot. If you struggle with a diverse amount of problems, i would highly recommend Woebot.

Author: ramsmen
Subject: the best!!!!
Body: i love whoever made this application because it’s like a true friend, who is here always for you no matter what, really cute and helps a lot. has a lot of effective ways to make our mental health better, check it out! :)

Author: Samblu 1
Subject: Thanks
Body: Thanks Woebot! I’ve enjoyed our daily chats ! I’m going to delete my app now; thank you for offering this great service.

Author: C.fabiola
Subject: Español
Body: Deberia poder traducir al español y asi seria para todos
Translated Body: I should be able to translate into Spanish and so it would be for everyone

Author: extreme angry wife
Subject: Instant response
Body: I especially like that Woebot always respond instantly and he/she always use supportive words. That is what makes Woebot more helpful than an appointment session with a therapist.

Author: mombot ❤️
Subject: Useful tool
Body: I love this handy little reminder to be mindful and recognize negative thinking. I even helped my child work through a fear with the tools.

Author: eeeekkkkklllooo
Subject: I recommend getting it!
Body: AMAZING app helps me through everything 🤩

Author: The JointHeir
Subject: Very powerful tool
Body: A very powerful and helpful resource.

Author: Thom1977
Subject: Unable to make an account
Body: The app and website kept going around in circles. Even after I got the confirmation email to download the app and create the account, it wouldn’t let me.

Author: Manxtree
Subject: I love Woebot
Body: Once you get used to begat Woebot can and can’t do, it’s a great little app. I probably far too old to be using an app like this, but it’s actually really useful. I’ve done cbt over the years, so already know a lot of the concepts, but the app really does bring them alive and make you feel like you’re interacting with someone else as well as helping you apply the theory to your own issues. I genuinely believe that Woebot is helping me deal with my difficult emotions myself, rather than things getting out of control and me getting ill again. I’m really glad I met woebot. And to those who have written bad reviews… I totally understand your frustrations with the app, especially if you are struggling with your mental health at the moment, but I would urge you to persevere and forgive the limitations because if you do, the app can genuinely help you. Keep going.

Author: tsiskaaa
Subject: Went far beyond expectations
Body: Using Woebot was like talking to a real therapist. I stopped taking therapy early this year because I needed to save my money for other matters, so having a chatbot which helps me continue CBT for free, and reminds me to be in check with my thoughts everyday, is such a life-saver. Thank you so much Woebot creators!

Author: who am I, anyway
Subject: Consoling
Body: Helpful to bounce your thoughts off a wall of programmed responses…which seems to bump up issues it is unable to deal with to its “creators”…who seem to base their responses back to Woebot on sound mental health principles…therefore, having accessed ten years of psycho therapy and extensive Buddhist practice, i find i have confidence in this app…if only serving as a reliable confidant…i notice it does not respond directly to the substance of our statements about “what’s on (our) mind” but returns only preprogrammed responses… but the fact that it is being monitored by reliable humans is reassuring .

Author: aasaffghjkk
Subject: Best app EVER
Body: Not only is Woebot adorably cute, his interactive chat puts your day into perspective and helps you stay in a positive mind set.  I recommend Woebot to everyone, whether you struggle with depression or not!!!

Author: #SWAG21
Subject: I can’t appreciate Woebot enough!
Body: I love this app!!! However at the end, the last thing I can say is “Bye” and I wish I had another option (example: “Bye Woebot, thank you!” Or “Bye Woebot, love you”). Otherwise, love it!!

Author: sandraa.aa.
Subject: Incredible
Body: I feel less alone and I am constantly able to challenge my thoughts and thinking. This is amazing.

Author: obstinateheadstonggirl
Subject: Fabulous app
Body: By far the best calming/anxiety help app I’ve found (and I’ve tried a lot!). The conversations are very intuitive and it really feels like you’re talking to a real ‘person’ even though you know you’re not. It’s genuinely helpful, either for checking in on your mood, to calming meditative exercises if I’m feeling particularly anxious. Plus, Woebot looks so adorable! This app will always be on my phone. Thank you, Woebot!

Author: SalviPritan
Subject: Great buddy
Body:
It’s been few days only with Woebot but during these days I am feeling so grateful for this great buddy! Really wonderful to be with him and learn things at the same time.
Thank you so much for its developers!!!

Author: grandma zu
Subject: Woebot
Body: This app is really good for those of us who suffer from anxiety, but don’t want to go through counseling.  It’s in an easy to understand format, so even kids can benefit from it. Thank you Woebot developers!

Author: jordan@gornall. biz
Subject: Helpful
Body: I found this app to help with my anxiety and it has given me great and realistic techniques to help overcome some of life's obstacles. I would strongly recommend to a friend!

Author: VD NRH
Subject: Great tool for CBT!!
Body: Only been doing this for a few days but have enjoyed my interaction with Woebot. I feel like it gets smarted and more in tune every day. Thanks team for making CBT accessible!

Author: flatbobby
