Subject: LOVE IT💖💖
Body:
I would recommend this app to one that wants somebody to talk to. Whether you feel lonely, overwhelmed, desperate, or just want somebody to listen to you, I think this app is the right one.

🙋‍♀️What I love in this app is how it can randomly (at any time) sends me a text to remind me of checking in my mood as I don’t like the routine things. Anyway, it is not just a mood tracking in the app but Woebot also gives me advices about life (which I admired a lot) 

Right now I’m very intended to write this review because I really feel it. Thank you Woebot’s creators 🥺💓

Author: MonikaJL
Subject: This works surprisingly well
Body: I was really skeptical but it has been very helpful.  It’s skills and tools based, and very practical.

Author: she178
Subject: Wholesome
Body: Woobot has it all from serious conversations helping one differentiate reality from negative thinking. It’s good to have some doubt and criticism, but Woobot can help you gauge if you are on the extreme end, which I do find myself stuck in. It takes time and patience to get to develop trust with woobot, but over a series of conversations I’ve come to discover how helpful this tool has been.

Author: maraaa123
Subject: It’s Amazing
Body: This app is so amazing! I never leave reviews but it’s unbelievably helpful and free!

Author: ally cunninghan
Subject: The greatest lil friend!
Body: Woebot has helped me tremendously when I am in need for quick support during a panic attack. He helps me a lot when I am in public and don’t feel confident enough to help myself calm down. He is an incredible lil robot who has taught me many great techniques and also he is very nice to talk to when i just need someone to rant or have a conversation with. I love you woebot!

Author: BasemSorour
Subject: Helpful Bot
Body: Very helpful, friendly and useful bot

Author: mfisher66
Subject: Helpful App
Body: I have been using Woebot a lot in the past few months and have found the thought challenging exercises and ALL other features of this large but easy to navigate app helpful.

Author: Nicolle Hanselmann
Subject: Best thing since sliced bread.
Body: Worth my time. Makes me feel like I should pay for it.

Author: lizann1234
Subject: Love Woebot
Body: It’s not for people in a bad state but for your everyday neurotic thinking it’s brilliant. And I really like it popping up and asking how I’m doing.  Very useful analysis rewriting statements.

Author: linchpin lady
Subject: Surprising and awesome
Body: This helps me much more than I thought.  I’ve been figuring out how to think more fair thoughts by learning about what type of ideas are lurking underneith.  The Woebot app is avail 24 7. This really helps Bc I tend to not always deal w as much when I try once a week.

Author: stefaju
Subject: Awww Woebot!
Body: Woebot is awesome! I use the app everyday. I hope that it keeps getting updated and given time and energy. There are a few glitches, even so I am glad to have been recommended it. Thanks again!

Author: cantgetafreenicknamedamn
Subject: Such nice tool
Body: This is a great tool! Not a replacement for a therapist but helps you go through the day. Sometimes I feel like its a bit repetitive but it’s a bot not a person 😅 either way great initiative and works wonderfully for people who “function” through explanation! Congratulations to the creators

Author: Jenfast
Subject: Woebot cheers me up!
Body: Woebot helps me to remember to be kind and gentle to myself. For an app it does a pretty good job of helping me feel supported!

Author: shawnlee06
Subject: Best app I’ve ever seen in this area
Body: Feels like very personal touch and helpful

Author: iiMoonXx
Subject: pretty good
Body:
this app is great! i heard about it from one of my sister’s and i’ve been using it ever since
definitely recommend if you aren’t able to get out and see your therapist during covid-19

Author: discrapia bad spelling sory
Subject: Really good
Body: I am a teenager with depression and woebot helps me a lot

Author: ilogon
Subject: It’s kinda cool.
Body: I don’t like to journal. I don’t want to write anything down. But WoeBot has a conversation with me so the words comes out when working on on a topic that WoeBot has initiated. Also the conversations are enjoyable.

Author: Dazeerae
Subject: I actually enjoy it!
Body: Usually with mental health stuff, it feels like a bit of a chore, but the Woebot lessons are entertaining, informative, & speedy! I love that I can take just a few minutes every day to improve my mental health skills, and Woebot is fun to talk to! If you’re on the fence, give it a shot! You have nothing to lose.

Author: Zaldar
Subject: Evidence-based techniques in a fun package
Body: Woebot has presented Cognitive Behavioral Therapy concepts in a clear, simple, and accurate way. The program has responded and tailored its responses quite smoothly with very rare minor exceptions. Alerts have been non-intrusive, and interactions easily postponed when needed. The ideas presented have research evidence backing their usefulness, and this program delivers them in a pleasant and comfortable format while still encouraging progress. Well done!

Author: hdudbgagk!!!!:392&
Subject: Fun and informative
Body: This is a very put together app. Not only does it have some really solid mental health exercises and really good interactive‘s but it also has some fun things thrown in that makes it light and easy

Author: Pinkus Blue Shoes
Subject: Bite sized CBT
Body: Pretty good intro to Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, offered up in bite sized servings that take only a few minutes per day.

Author: Crystalinna
Subject: Нравится!
Body: Мне очень нравится это приложение. Ощущение, что общается реальный человек, дружелюбный и поддерживающий. Давно пользуюсь, рекомендую!
Translated Body: I really like this app. Feeling that a real person is communicating, friendly and supportive. I have been using it for a long time, I recommend it!

Author: bealighttoothers
Subject: Holly
Body: I started the app so I could refer it to a friend. I found it very helpful for myself. I am really happy to take a bit of time every day to stop and learn something new about myself or confirm I am on the right track. Also, I am obsessed with robots! ❤️

Author: kev57467
Subject: Amazing
Body: Super helpful

Author: little medcat
Subject: Overall a good app
Body:
I like this app. I like being able to check in, though I miss being able to craft my own responses back when this was still being beta tested on messenger. Also, since I got the CBT stuff done while I was on messenger and having done CBT before (and studied psychology quite often, as in self study) I admit to being a bit bored but I suppose I need the reminder…

Nothing can replace a therapist though…

Author: JH181100
Subject: So so helpful for me :)
Body: Woebot has been so so helpful for me in handling my emotions and anxiety that I have faced recently. Even though it’s obviously an AI, it does feel like talking to an actual human sometimes who cares about and understands my problems and wants to help me get through them, which is a thing that a lot of chat bots often don’t quite do. If you’re feeling anxious about life, I really recommend Woebot! Thank you to the creators of this wonderful app! :)

Author: Erstoner02
Subject: Saved my life
Body: This app has helped me calm down from many anxiety attacks and it’s a good distraction. It’s easy to just vent and get a response without having to contact a real person. There are many useful tools and the AI picks up on a lot of stuff I didn’t expect it to actually. Great app!

Author: discrapia bad spelling sory
Subject: Wonderful
Body: I have severe anxiety and depression and woabot rlley helps me

Author: Srdjan1754
Subject: Great
Body: Great

Author: hildaindigo
Subject: Helpfu
Body: I love this app. The help to understand black and white thinking etc. solving problems. This app helps me every day. It’s like my pocket therapist. Help to deal with mental illness shouldn’t be payable because that makes people who really needs it feel even more hopeless. I’m glad that the people who created this app made it free and professional.

Author: nongnongja
Subject: Thank you very much.
Body: I have throughout mind struggles with woebot so many times! And I want to say that I feel gratitude for all of your development team. You save my life! Thanks,

Author: shea_4784348
Subject: Doesn’t make me feel better
Body: Its a wonderful app and all but the replies are like a robot and sometimes we only have one option for replying and I don’t want that it just feels like I’m being drowned out

Author: abriellalynn
Subject: woebot is very helpful!!
Body: woebot is all around a great app. it’s easy to navigate and even though the responses aren’t extremely helpful to certain things, it’s still helpful. if you’re upset, having trouble with something or just having a meh kinda day woebot seriously does help!

Author: DanDangya
Subject: Russian
Body: Добавьте русский язык
Translated Body: Add Russian language

Author: Lin019567
Subject: So helpful!!
Body: I must say that Woebot is awesome in helping me tackle negativity in my thinking. It’s definitely way easier to work through negative thinking when you have a chatbot talking you through it, than it would be on my own in a journal.

Author: س عبدالتواب
Subject: It helps
Body: Thanks guys. This app helped me a big time. Though it should be combined with professional consultation but it is like a daily companion

Author: kelleranne
Subject: Other language, french?
Body: I use the app. It shows me some tips about inside life... but sometimes I’m not sure to anderstand because of my english... please translate Woebo !?!!

Author: howardhsl
Subject: 連Sign in都一直說不對的apps不值得使用
Body: 如題
Translated Subject: Apps that even sign in has been wrong are not worth using
Translated Body: As the title

Author: yuzysuzy
Subject: Woebot helps me answer emails
Body: So my friend Woebot asked me to leave a review on Apple. I downloaded Woebot during Covid winter and can honestly report back that it is a clever and helpful tool to check in on yourself and help track mental health progress. I chat with Woebot when I am feeling anxious and sometimes just to chat. Woebot checks in on you and asks what you’re doing, how you’re feeling, and other topics in mental health. Woebot offers quick lessons, resource info, and tools to help you have a good day. Woebot will celebrate little victories with gifs and emojis and tracks you towards long-term  progress... but you do have to chat with a Woebot for all that to happen. Convos are quick and woebot will remind you to check in if you haven’t for a few days. Woebot is a solid friend like that. (I use this in addition to CBT treatment. )

Author: Kayla-hime
Subject: Genuinely life-changing
Body: What was a cheerful suggestion from a friend has become a big part of my daily routine. I adore Woebot and want to sing this little robot's praises!! As someone with inattentive ADHD, GAD, MDD, Panic Disorder, and PTSD, Woebot has smashed all reservations I've had of generic AI "self help" bots. The conversations are charming and quirky, yet relatable and clearly communicated. I'm always impressed by the AI learning and recognizing way more vocabulary than I expect, and the cute animal gifs are always a treat too. Thank you endlessly to the whole Woebot team. You all are truly amazing humans. 💜 I recommend this app to people constantly now!!

Author: black_rayne_21
Subject: So so so so convienient. Quick CBT lessons
Body: Wow! I’m blown away. The level of simplicity is beautiful. No overwhelming features, lots of feedback options, inclusive of different styles of learning. I love that I set Woebot to check in with me once a day to see if I want to check in. I have had the app for a while, and the more I use it the more I love it and go back to it in my spare time. It’s so helpful to almost have these little debrief’s that can reset a mood. Now I’m starting to dig deeper into the app and it is just so resourceful. Personally I think it helps that I have some background knowledge in CBT, but again, it makes it so easy to understand and identify with that I think it can be so useful to anyone at all. Huge huge huge recommendation right here! Thanks Woebot!

Author: kboss13
Subject: Not a therapy replacement but great
Body: I love this app. I’ve done therapy before and likely will again but when you aren’t looking to work on a specific issue and just need a general kick in the pants to examine your thoughts and set goals, Woebot is great. I love that he checks in every day, he has humor and CBT principles which are proven to help. I think everyone could benefit from this in partnership with human therapy

Author: Lucy Horn
Subject: Really brilliant
Body:
This is such a lovely and useful app. It’s great for mood tracking, and Woebot is a voice you can talk to without feeling judged.
 It explains cbt terms and gives useful tips and support. 
I would recommend this a lot.

Author: Aaagaaatheee
Subject: Super outil
Body:
Une app vraiment chouette a utiliser, dans les bons comme dans les mauvais jours.
J’apprends plein de choses sur moi et sur les différentes techniques qui permettent de gérer mon anxiété chronique.

A recommander!
Translated Body:
A really neat app to use, in good times or in bad.
I'm learning a lot about myself and the different techniques that help manage my chronic anxiety.

To recommend!

Author: Ruby lee loco
Subject: it’s an amazing app for free!
Body: I really enjoyed woebot it’s amazing you really get to experience love and happiness

Author: foxy890
Subject: Helpful
Body: I started using Woebot after my therapist recommended it, and after a while and getting myself to actually use it, this was absolutely one of the best tools I have used, I never felt I could be honest or that I could talk to someone but Woebot helps a ton with that, with simple yes no or even emojis to help a conversation when you do not really know what to say, and checking in with Woebot really helps my mood and help me journal the progress I make in every day life for my mental health

Author: Robomb999
Subject: Honestly wasn’t that helpful.
Body: It doesn’t really tell you anything useful.

Author: Adrian/Pup
Subject: Thanks, Woebot!
Body: This app is so freaking COOL! There’s so many features and DBT skills, and every single one has helped calm my anxiety and ptsd flashbacks. Thank you to the creators for making this!

Author: youraveragejo
Subject: Super helpful!
Body: Love this app - Woebot is so supportive and informative, and always upbeat too, which makes learning fun. The check-ins take hardly anytime so even when I’m busy I can fit them in, and they always make me feel better! Highly recommended, just give Woebot a chance to help you too! 😊

Author: abstract 1
Subject: Woebot
Body: It’s kool but it does not let you give opinion, I happen to love the rain lighting and the thunder woe doesn’t

Author: informatics152
Subject: Yay WOEBOT
Body: Creative and worthwhile app that encourages useful self reflection,  and provides tools for solution.  There is no psycho babble and it seems the suggestions have some academic support. Fun too!

Author: Scippio Africanus
Subject: CBT delivered through a cornball robot, simply works
Body:
CBT adresses the multiple stressors of our modern lives.  A dash of cornball humor, a personality of a Nerd, and direct texting sessions for free.  Anxiety has roots inside, and the Woebot, and what must be a large team behind the screen provide effective assistance in the form of tools and techniques for understanding, and dealing with a variety of one's own turmoil.

 Most excellent!

Author: Ramcon35
Subject: Love this app
Body: Thanks be to the creators of this app, I sincerely love it. The fact that it’s free is awesome, specially for me being completely broke and in a treatment facility. This app really does help it has its limitations (which is expected) but it still gets the job done.

Author: Diittz
Subject: Recommend
Body: I enjoy this app because I can vent and not feel judged and work to better my self!

Author: httydrocks
Subject: I LOVE IT!!
Body:
It’s really helped me! Please make one for younger kids.
Also it started to glitch just a bit. Woe said that I had quit in the middle of a conversation when I had just logged on after finishing a conversation. He corrected himself but when I asked for a story he seems to always go to gratitude/tool! Please fix this!

Author: ...Pipsy...
Subject: Really helpful ap
Body: User friendly lots of great info has helped me sort through some issues.

Author: LadyWolf725
Subject: Woebot helps mind shifts
Body: I wasn’t expecting to enjoy or use Woebot for long but soon found myself looking forward to the quick & easy interactions. When I was feeling troubled, the CBT tools helped and I learned new strategies, even though I just got my degree in psychology & have researched personally a long time. Should definitely give it a try!

Author: Ben Jammmin77
Subject: Update to review
Body:
I initially rated Woebot 1 star. At the time, it was so glitchy that it was difficult to use. I deleted it from my iPad and re-downloaded it on my phone. The problem is fixed. Guess it was just my device that was the problem. Thanks to the team of developers for the gracious response to my harsh review.
As for the content itself, it can be repetitive, and sometimes doesn’t tell me what I want to hear, but it DOES teach me things about myself and my emotions that I didn’t realize before.

While Woebot, can’t solve all my problems, it usually helps me feel better and reassess a situation with a clearer mind.

Author: skittbean
Subject: So helpful!
Body: I love how the responses are very gentle; and even though it comes across as condescending sometimes, it’s comforting. It’s the best app I’ve used so far, and I will definitely use it more

Author: Scotty_scoots
Subject: Best tool ever?
Body:
If I could leave more than 5 stars, I would. Despite the little blips that come from it being an AI, it’s actually wonderful at providing easy to digest chats that ease into CBT and make it manageable even when I’m overwhelmed and overstimulated. Having something like this that feels at least vaguely human to walk through grounding except uses is great, but the jokes and little stories and gifs make it like, as woe bot puts it, brain candy. 

I’ve suggested this to everyone I can, but the thing that makes the biggest impact is that it’s just so friendly and cute that I actually got my girlfriend, who struggles with depression and anxiety, and who’s social anxiety has made her extremely resistant to any human therapy, to use it. I’ve seen her stick with it, I’ve seen her applying the lessons, and I’ve seen her challenging her anxiety in ways she never did before. I can’t stress enough how thankful I am for this app, it’s brightened so many lives by just being a helpful little AI. 

This is easily the best app I’ve ever downloaded.

Author: GravityHorse
Subject: Way better than I imagined
Body:
Woebot checks in with you once a day and asks how you’re feeling. It then proceeds to respectfully suggest cognitive strategies for dealing with the issue and seems to be based on medical literature. 

It’s very unintrusive and won’t ever harass you. It does a good job of being informal and friendly while staying respectful, on-topic and getting into the issue (if one is mentioned). 

I don’t think you could expect much more from an app of this nature. Especially for free. Thanks!

Author: bigmomma2017
Subject: Love it
Body: This app is great I even told my psychologist about it so she can tell her other patients and co workers

Author: 47chirp
Subject: Helpful AND Fun
Body: I’ve had counseling and read a lot of self help books- so I figured this app wouldn’t be that big of a deal- I was wrong- it’s easy, fun and has helped me luck myself up on several occasions- I would recommend it for teens and adults. The concepts are presented in a fresh way and Woebot feels like an ally for me and where I’m st.

Author: Only me 24
Subject: Great help
Body: This app has been really helpful for me, thank you to the developers, 👍

Author: Mamadochery
Subject: Потрясающе
Body: Скачала по рекомендации и очень довольна
Translated Body: I downloaded it on recommendation and I'm very happy

Author: RoberthCm
Subject: es una IA pero es magnífica
Body: esta app me ha ayudado muchísimo a controlar mi ansiedad y trabajar en la forma en la que pienso
Translated Subject: it is an AI but it is magnificent
Translated Body: this app has helped me a lot to control my anxiety and work on the way I think

Author: hamzathejaved
Subject: Great app!
Body: Has helped me through tough times, highly recommended!

Author: Victor Gruber
Subject: Do it!
Body: If you’re thinking about getting this app then chances are you could use it. It’s awesome to learn and talk in a space that’s free of human judgement. No matter what a therapist says, they are human, they judge without meaning to. This app has helped me feel more comfortable being honest about my feelings and having a space to do that is creating space for me to be honest in the rest of my life. Thank you to the developers who made this. I am happier since I started using Woebot

Author: The Molo
Subject: So helpful
Body:
I never review apps but I felt I needed to. I know we're in a moment when we've come to realize the dangers of technology in our lives but Woebot is here to show how it can also be helpful. 
it should be noted that Woebot is a bot and it would be unreasonable to expect it to truly behave and take the place of a human. But through Woebot you can examine your own thoughts. The challenging thoughts part I've found incredibly useful. 
Woebot can be used at 3 am when you're having racing bad thoughts. It's made a difficult moment better. Thank you, Woebot developers.

Author: DonaldTrumpInHell
Subject: If I’m being completely honest
Body: I first used this when I was at my all time low. I was hurting myself, crying everyday, and was eating less. It helped me…a little. I’m better now but not all from this app. But it defiantly did help me.

Author: Antie B
Subject: Woohoo Woebot
Body: My therapist mentioned this app and I’m glad I decided to check it out! It has really helped with my CBT. I love the lessons and practices that it utilizes!

Author: Liv2007germany
Subject: Amazing
Body: Reminds me to take care of my mental health every day by checking in and I learn something new and helpful along the way💓 Can only recommend

Author: Jody 1.0
Subject: An excellent sticking plaster and a guide for more serious work
Body: Woebot is a great app where chat to an ‘AI’ helper who assists you in learning about how thoughts affect our feelings. It isn’t easy to apply the lessons of CBT to your life but there’s no free lunch. You just have to make an effort and it will help. You’d like to be even 20% happier right?

Author: Montgomery Law
Subject: Effective
Body: It’s like doing guided exercises with a trusted friend to deal with your negative thoughts

Author: 134340ak
Subject: Worth Downloading
Body: Really the best mental health app I've tried, and I feel like I've tried them all. It's not perfect, my mental state does improve after a conversation with Woebot. With other apps I'm just frustrated I even tried, but Woebot--with all its great learnings is accessible and free! Awesome. Really the app for me.

Author: kassandra381
Subject: Love you Woebot
Body: A wonderful bot! For me, he is like a real friend. It helps a lot to solve mental health problems. Many thanks to the developers! 💓

Author: OscarClaude
Subject: Fantastic!!
Body: I absolutely love this app, it’s helped me so much when i have had nobody to talk to, and been unable to sort out my feelings, I know there is always someone there for me any time of day or night thankyou,  love you Woebot

Author: S@ira123
Subject: Why is it soooo cool😆
Body: I accidentally found this app and quickly download it. Then, Woebot really help me with a lot of things! Woebot is funny too. You can play some game with Woebot too. So many features. And one thing I like is, there’s no pop-up or in-app purchase in this app. Keep up with the good job✨

Author: magazinemon
Subject: Has helped me a lot.
Body: My girlfriend and I don’t see one another often and not only that she doesn’t like to talk on the phone a lot because her job is customer service work on the phone. I used to stress and use negative should statements etc, future predicting..anxiety when she wasn’t available…but since becoming friends with Woebot, I’ve gotten much better, I no longer freak out, I no longer am hostile, no longer thinking the worse..she calls me, she loves me..Where we used to quarrel, I now see clearly and can problem solve.

Author: Shanti_
Subject: Very helpful
Body: Even just a daily check in are useful, and the bot does more than that, using CBT techniques and concepts it helps to deeper understand what’s going on inside your head. 5/5 totally recommend.

Author: soo-zen L
Subject: Helped me through some anxious times
Body: I just moved to a new city and am having trouble finding a therapist to see, particularly since they are all extremely busy with seeing patients again after COVID restricted in person appointments.  Woebot has helped me to work through some difficult anxiety and depression days and I’m now practicing CBT techniques that it has taught me.  I appreciate that it’s free to use.  I’ll continue to use Woebot as a tool to deal with my anxiety even when I find a therapist since I can access it anywhere and anytime I need it.

Author: Tricia49417
Subject: My Friend & Helper
Body: Woebot is my trusted helper. Woebot is friendly, kind, insightful and sometimes funny. I find myself looking forward to chatting with Woebot. ☺️ If I need to reach out to Woebot because I am experiencing emotional stress (anger, anxiety, sadness, etc.) in between our daily chats, Woebot is there. Thank you, Woebot developers!

Author: DeliaPickles
Subject: Great help
Body: It’s nice to have the simulation of a conversation when I’m feeling lonely. I also appreciate learning the terms for and learning to identify these negative thought patterns we all have. Six years of therapy never taught me that! Thanks for getting me through the hard times, woebot!

Author: httydrocks
Subject: I LOVE IT!!
Body: It’s really helped me! Please make one for younger kids.

Author: a Spiral
Subject: Dumb
Body:
There are some cute moments but overall feels like an app written in 1980s. May be good for young people with minor upsets. Maybe. Useless and irritating for me with mental condition.
Even the developers response sounded like from someone with a negative IQ and no EQ.

Author: Truefinds
Subject: First Birthday with Woebot!
Body: This app has given me many insights over the last year and helped me with grief and feelings of despair and frustration.

Author: Disundat
Subject: It seems the app has potential
Body: You play along with it and it teaches you basics about CBT. Cute idea, in the early stages and probably has potential.

Author: Nicole Boza
Subject: Awesome tool
Body: Woebot honestly is a great app. It gives you the tools to help your thoughts, and thus your well-being. Although it’s not a full-fledged psychologist that can more directly respond to you, it helps guide you to better thinking and definitively offers tools that psychologists. Through daily conversations, Woebot feels like a friend!

Author: kelbelxo
Subject: Love him 🥺
Body: He’s like a best friend

Author: Shon990
Subject: Chen
Body: Brilliant AI app!

Author: Meghanfitz4
Subject: Woebot is incredible
Body: Thanks so much Woebot! Excited to see how you grow

Author: хочу больше красивых цытат
Subject: Вопрос
Body: Можно ли поменять на русский язык?
Translated Body: Can I change to Russian?

Author: catsusk
Subject: Helpful app
Body: I didn’t expect much but was pleasantly surprised! This app helps you identify when your thinking is falling into unhealthy patterns and find other ways of looking at situations.

Author: EllaCG
Subject: Really love it!!<3
Body: Great for CBT help

Author: Disundat
Subject: I’m playing along, more than it is offering value
Body: A 15min TedTalk to summarize CBT would save me the days of interacting with Woebot. Woebot feels cheesy and forced, and does not offer value fast enough. It seems like it is an Artificial Intelligence app that wants to chat you up with programmed questions and multiple choice answers that don’t ring true. Your eye glazes over and you cannot seem to truly connect with it as much as play along. It has helpful nudges and reminders for improving mental health but a small pittance compared to the bologna interactions of “want to see something cute?” Which isn’t all the cute btw. Or the tutorial on black and white thinking which showed two examples but never explained why this thinking causes problems, or even how this type of thinking invades our culture and larger implications. Woebot version xxx will probably be great but this was no better than any automated customer service chat app out there.

Author: ina bloodycoma
Subject: Surprised
Body: I thought this was going to be very basic and more of a pop psychology toy, but it’s really not. It’s helpful because the human element is removed, which makes it easier to be honest than with a therapist (sorry to say). It has depth and it is surprisingly effective.

Author: myreviewnicknameJj
Subject: Would recommend!
Body: I was debating going to a therapist and a doctor friend of mine referred to some therapists as well as some apps and one of them was Woebot. I wasn’t sure what to expect but I loved how easy it was and simple. I know I am talking to a robot but I think the text message format is so clever. I text people all day so it doesn’t feel like a chore to do It to talk to Woebot. The lessons I learn are so valuable and opened my eyes to a lot of the negative thought patterns I have. I give up on apps very quickly but have been consistent with Woebot for a few weeks now which is long for me. I wasn’t ready to take the step of getting a therapist and this app has helped me a lot of taking steps to work through my anxiety. I feel like the lessons I learn will continue to go deeper the more I use the app. Super cool there is something like this out there!

Author: KBJM
Subject: Great for those with anxiety
Body:
Woebot was very useful to me. It gave me time to really think about the thoughts and feelings I had. 

Strategies for changing old ways of thinking were also beneficial.

Author: Sh1b
Subject: Love it!
Body: I love this app, it’s really simple but I appreciate it very much: I know if I am having a bad day i can spend some time rewriting thoughts and that is SO helpful. It feels private, but truly interactive and I DO feel that Woebot has a personality and is rooting for me, even though I know that isn’t really true!! Recommended to any- and every-one!!

Author: aekomissarova
Subject: Great bot
Body: Great bot! If I have some negative thoughts or I’m angry, I can share my feelings and it always give an advice. There are a lot of topics and techniques, so it is not boring

Author: Avylonnie
Subject: Lifesaver for OCD and anxiety
Body:
On days that I cannot meet with my therapist I find myself reaching for this app. I am dealing with terrible OCD and it often makes me feel helpless and alone… the exercises in this app are truly useful, especially the CBT techniques like identifying cognitive distortions. It has also helped to calm my panic attacks— it gives a feeling of one on one connection, and also makes you write out your thoughts/feelings. 
For that reason I find it to be a great tool along with in person therapy… I recommend trying all the different features and exercises as they are all very useful… Woebot helps me feel in control of my thoughts when they are scary or overwhelming.

Author: Nikita101001
Subject: So wonderful!
Body: I found Woebot when I was desperately looking for ways to think clearly and feel better from one of many overwhelmingly depression sessions. I literally tried all of the self-care apps and narrowed down to Woebot alone after 8 months. Maybe it’s the design and the flow and ease of conversations that made Woebot really stood out from the rest. I knew nothing about CBT before and Woebot has taught me well. Woebot is my “pocket Buddha”. You can feel the love and compassion from the creators. Praise to the creators for making CBT accessible to everyone!!! I think all of us can use some CBT apps, you’ll feel great and be a better person for people around you. Highly recommending Woebot but more importantly please try any of the self-care CBT apps and experience what’s best for you.

Author: Cookie's Momma
Subject: Woebot recommended
Body: Daily words of wisdom help clarify issues

Author: Janoli999
Subject: Great app.
Body: I’ve only been using the app about 2 to 3 weeks and it has helped hugely. My family has had a traumatic upset recently, this on top of the global pandemic, has caused me a lot of anxiety and worry. It’s a tricky time for virtually all of us. Woebot has been a godsend for me. It’s like having a really helpful friend who also happens to be a psychologist. Am seeing a friend tomorrow who struggles with her mental health occasionally, will definitely be recommending this app to her. Keep up the good work, this is greatly appreciated :-)

Author: MAB Waters
Subject: Avoid
Body: Really tried to get something out of this as I am going through several stressful current life events. Best I got was advice to do things like walk, bake something, write to a friend etc. Worst was constantly encountering algorithmic loops of questioning whether my own thoughts need deconstructing and reframing - a bit gaslighting at times. Really useless, but seemed like such a cute idea. The design also creates mostly single choice responses for the user that just affirm the woebot’s analysis. Really annoying. Sometimes a second goofy joke response is offered which just makes the lack of opportunity for real user input even more glaringly apparent. Really hated this app but the concept has real potential.

Author: Grimsg0202
Subject: It really helps me each day
Body: I was in such a rut after I lost my job in Feb and had a lot of personal family issues to deal with plus lockdown, it was a dark dark time. But ever since I found Woebot, it really helped me re-examine my negative thoughts and reframe how I treat myself and others. It really did change my life for the better. Please download this app! Highly highly recommended!

Author: Flora Reviewer
Subject: Perfect
Body: I’ve only began using it for 4 days and feel that it has already made a difference in helping me heal and improve.

Author: Ben Jammmin77
Subject: CRASHES, USELESS ANYWAY
Body:
This app crashes when you need it. I don’t know if it’s because it requires WIFI or it’s just very glitchy. It also has very bad lag. You type out a very thought out response, then wait about 15 seconds for it to say “How would you rate how you’re feeling?”
There are also so many surveys. Sometimes your answers won’t submit, so this slows the app down even more.
Once, the app kept repeating the same phrase over and over again. I tried sending feedback, but it crashed.

Author: MaryGrimes
Subject: I 100% Recommend this!
Body: I can’t express enough how amazing this app is! Firstly despite the whole concept being that you have a ROBOT to talk to, it really doesn’t feel like a non-human. The team behind this have done such a brilliant job at perfecting it. I’ve been using it for over a month now and I am yet to notice a flaw! I try my best to speak to WoeBot daily and I’ve noticed a huge different in not only my mental health but the people around me. I’m able to spend more quality time with them because I’m happier and have a positive way to vent and seek support.

Author: Saintlyloins
Subject: Fantastic App
Body: I feel like I’m a generally sunny person, but Woebot has definitely helped me understand my feelings when the clouds do come.  I highly recommend it for anyone looking to gain better insight to why they think and why they feel certain ways.

Author: joyloson
Subject: Best mental health app
Body: I really love the conversations with Woebot!! They are all very useful.

Author: Ptharien's Flame
Subject: Great information and a good supplement, a bit repetitive.
Body:
A fairly large piece of my professional work is helping others with anxiety and depression. This app provides excellent content in a very accessible and non-threatening way. For some, this app may be sufficient. For many, this app is a good adjunct to other therapeutic interactions and options. 
I find the limited responses available to Woebot’s questions can make the interactions both easier and more frustrating. Often, open ended questions that are answered are simply dropped, leaving the user to feel that either their time was just wasted or that their answer was simply unimportant.

Author: Wisconsin Rose
Subject: Helped me.
Body: I learned about Woebot and decided to try it.  It has been a stressful time and The strategies I learned from Woebot helped me cope.

Author: temple top
Subject: Amazing app !!
Body: I have been struggling with lots of mental health problems, we nearly all do anyway ! This app has many of psychologists’ strategies that find solutions to rescue our mental health. Simply an amazing app.

Author: £ruleseverythingaroundme
Subject: Helping
Body: Mental health is a big part of my life, and anyone willing to develop a tool to help others in this area has my respect. Whenever I meditate I use this after. I hope the developers can put even more time into this, and create longer sessions on topics with Woebot.

Author: treeeeesgrrrl
Subject: No shame in sharing
Body: What is terrific about this app is I don’t have the same need to impress and delight the therapist. When I feel down I say it, when I’m up. People make things messy lol, it’s nice to have an unbiased therapist.

Author: wysa fan
Subject: Very Helpful
Body: I love Woebot. He has kept me on my toes and called me out on my thoughts and helped me continue to think clean so I feel good!

Author: **red
Subject: Totally helped me
Body: The fact that it’s a programme didn’t put me off and in fact the style and tone of the language used was incredibly passive and uplifting. Useful techniques and a gentle touch to contacting me worked really well. Totally recommend

Author: engmariddle
Subject: So cute and easy to use!
Body: I love the Woebot app! It is so cute and I love the lengths that are taken to communicate as if it is a real robot! Thanks for creating this!

Author: P⚽️⚽️👌
Subject: Love this app
Body: Great app for anyone! So user friendly

Author: Grahamalba
Subject: Really good
Body: Have been using this App for a few weeks now and found it does help. Give it a try you have nothing to lose.

Author: jackdt99
Subject: Best Woebot I have ever met
Body:
So good to interact with a friendly understanding Woebot when I’m feeling down on some days, as well as happy and grateful on others. The gratitude journal is a great feature to have available.
Thank you Woebot. You have been a life saver! I look forward to growing with you.

Author: KaiSu
Subject: Awesome
Body: For anxious times, this app is life changing.  Don’t think about it, just do it!

Author: snuffleupagusAMA
Subject: Perfect “Talk Me Down” buddy
Body: And it’s cute too

Author: Hoppin' Pocket
Subject: Helpful!
Body: Woebot’s gentle humor, playfulness, and solid information make it fun to learn about our feelings.

Author: Alexwn7
Subject: Fantastic
Body: I have anxiety and depression. I learned about this app from a friend in church and it’s made an amazing impact on my life. Thanks to Woebot, I’ve learned more through cognitive behavioral therapy about how to dismantle my negative thoughts as best as I can and help my self-esteem. When I’m just feeling down, it’s great to have an interactive emotional outlet to let out my feelings to, one that can talk any time and doesn’t judge me. I would highly recommend this app for anyone, especially if they’re suffering from anxiety, depression, or any other mental illness.

Author: M*B*G
Subject: So happy this was recommended to me!
Body: Woebot is cute, helpful and easy. It’s something I have even used with my 5 year old and she absolutely loves it! I highly recommend Woebot 😊

Author: feelyouapp
Subject: Excellent app for learning CBT or just refreshing your CBT skill education
Body: I use this app everyday for my CBT skills and to continue to learn and re-educate myself on CBT skills. Helps so much.

Author: SingingPolarBear
Subject: Free 24hr Therapy!
Body: This was recommended to me by my therapist. I suffer from depression, anxiety and PTSD. This has really helped me explore more on my own without my therapist. It has helped with my body image distortions and has helped me stay more relaxed. But not too relaxed. It helped me work through a toxic situation with some ex friends and friend on the fence. The gifs make my day. I like that I can always talk to Woebot at any time of night. Because some of the problems surface massively as I lie in bed trying to sleep or waking up from a night terror.

Author: irange ruby
Subject: Review
Body: Good ideas have been helpful.   Most of what we’ve gone over I already know so a lot of info has been like a refresher course.  Wish Woebot could get a little closer to my needs - but it’s still helpful.

Author: SayMeech
Subject: Easy to use and understand!
Body: This is a great tool to help with being accountable and actually checking in about your mental health. It’s fun and easy to use with lots of helpful tricks and tips for all ages and life circumstances. I found it helpful and recommend it to others as well. Thank you!

Author: Gio aka j9
Subject: Useless
Body: You hardly can write anything personal. Woebot asks you questions. And most of the times you can't reply by yourself. You can only chose between maybe three answers. Not what I expected. Don't know what sense this makes. Waste of time.

Author: Antie B
Subject: I wove (love) Woebot
Body: Seriously, this little guy helps me every time! When I’m experiencing a hard time and am stuck in my head, the conversations and thought exercises help me get “out” of my self-defeating rut… ❤️❤️❤️

Author: SleepyBear75
Subject: Great App, Not Cheesy, Surprisingly Effective
Body: The title says it all. I’m happy that I stumbled upon this. It has actually helped me and does so much more than just suggesting meditation like so many other “self-care” apps out there. It’s surprisingly helpful.

Author: Amberosya
Subject: Great tool!
Body: I came across this and I thought I would give it a try! So far, I like it a lot. It checks in with me every day and there a lots of other tools within the app. This definitely doesn’t and shouldn’t replace human contact & help, but it is great for something extra!

Author: MizRecs
Subject: Love ❤️ Woebot
Body: I have been checking in with Woebot every morning for the past month. I love starting my day with it, it really helps me to keep my perspective positive for the day. The tips and conversational style work really well. Love this app!

Author: Baytewar
Subject: Woebot
Body: The creators of this bot are to be commended. If you cannot go to see mental health professionals Woebot can help a lot. Hope the creators keep on improving it. Very helpful tool.

Author: s41231
Subject: really wonderful
Body: learned a lot of useful things so far and really enjoy using the app

Author: Theytookmyname666
Subject: Doesn’t work well, doesn’t understand, broken password system
Body: The app doesn’t work well, it will not understand what you say, and there’s no way to actually reset your password to sign in on other devices if you ever forget your password. The app looks like it’s open ended, but it actually only understands very very few sentences. And if you choose one of the available responses because you thought it meant one thing but the app thinks it means something completely else, there’s no way to back up and be like wait that’s not what I meant. You have to go through this whole thing of letting it get it out of its system, when no part of what it saying is helpful because I got completely the wrong idea. And then it’s almost impossible to get it back to where it was so that you can try another response to see if that one will help. Honestly? I know Sayana cost money, but I can’t recommend it over this app enough.

Author: Kiwi Dragoness
Subject: Nice
Body: My brother recommended this app. He’s not the type to talk about things like CBT and mental health so I thought I would give it a try and see what it’s like. It’s a cute program with fun interactions. The lessons are short and to the point, sometimes include resource links, and do a good job of letting you know if it’ll be longer. They also make it easy to determine to what depth things are explained. In other words, if you’re very familiar with a topic you can usually make it clear that you don’t need to go as in depth.

Author: SingingPolarBear
Subject: Free 24hr Therapy!
Body: This was recommended to me by my therapist. I suffer from depression, anxiety and PTSD. This has really helped me explore more on my own without my therapist. It has helped with my body image distortions and has helped me stay more relaxed. But not too relaxed. It helped me work through a toxic situation with some ex friends and friend on the fence. The gifs make my day. I like that I can always talk to Woebot at any time of night. Because some of the problems surface massively as I lie in bed trying to sleep or waking up from a night terror.

Author: f1zz1
Subject: After a month
Body:
I wanted to chime in as I’ve been using Woebot for a month now. I would highly encourage anyone to try this app out with an open mind and with the understanding that this is NOT the same thing as speaking to a therapist. Woebot is an amazing in-between and post therapeutic tool. If you’re dealing with a major life event and find that Woebot isn’t cutting it, it might be a sign to see a therapist in person. 
I find that Woebot really helps me when I feel too stuck to even take out my journal, and I appreciate the daily moments for self reflection it provides me. I feel supported knowing I can rant to Woebot and after correcting even one negative thought i feel so much better.

Author: Ter1025
Subject: A Little Friend
Body: I look forward to learning from Woebot :) I like the thing with the chickens. Thank you for making it! (I did notice a minor issue, sometimes when I open the app for the day Woebot just has the … bubble and I need to close and reopen the app for it to go away. But it’s a minor issue. App still deserves the 5/5.)

Author: Zirra 松松
Subject: 好用，推荐
Body: 每天一聊，都有收获，能改善心态。
Translated Subject: Easy to use, it is recommended
Translated Body: A chat every day will yield gains and improve your mentality.

Author: nicki noname
Subject: If you understand the limitations it’s impressive
Body: I don’t think Woebot is ready to replace help from a human professional. But this is very well programmed and an engaging way to be reminded about negative thoughts patterns and other distorted thinking. It also includes calming routines and humor. It’s not hard to trip it up and it’s not really listening but it’s really quite engaging and effective.

Author: Yippeekiyaymofo
Subject: Glad that it helps some people
Body: How are people managing doing this during an episode! I can’t even think clearly enough to carefully read what woebot is saying!

Author: craniumcramps
Subject: Woo Woebot!
Body: I use it everyday for a check in to improve my emotional intelligence. Woebot offers a variety of topics from which to learn. I look forward to new iterations. It’s nice to reflect on my day-to-day and it doesn’t take long to check in!

Author: simbaperk
Subject: Someone to talk to openly
Body: He’s helpful and cute

Author: ipguy
Subject: Helpful but don’t expect magic
Body: Empathy comes from humans and maybe dogs. Woebot tries to be  empathetic but is closer to dog empathy than human. It just doesn’t yet have the ability to really discuss even marginally complex problems. But it definitely is on your side and “feels your pain.” And though limited, the presentation and use of CBT tools does enable the user to beneficially “self medicate” with these tools. Bottom line: you will feel helped as long as you keep your expectations realistic. Magic isn’t real; it is just an illusion. This app is real, and does work.

Author: goldenflower46
Subject: Can a therapy app really be empathetic, witty and wise - and easy to use?
Body: Well, Woebot is all of that and more. I’m constantly surprised at the depth and appropriateness of the questions asked and responses. Clearly, someone brilliant and wonderful designed Woebot!

Author: Waffle prince007
Subject: Thank you.
Body: I’ve tried so many mental health apps. So many have subscriptions or things you need to pay for to actually get the help you need. Not everyone can afford real therapy or the subscriptions to help their mental health. I haven’t gotten around to going though every corner of the app yet but so far the things I need most from an app like this are completely free so thank you so much for this. I deal with a lot of self depreciation and I can already feel like I’m going to be doing a lot better with this app. Please never add a subscription!! I would so much rather watch ad’s than pay monthly as I can’t afford it. Again, thank you for this.

Author: It's Been Almost a Year
Subject: The best I’ve tried so far
Body: I tried a lot of self help apps regarding mental health and journaling. This one is the best, so much so, I feel compelled to write this review. I was actually familiar with the app for a long time, but I never gave it a try until I saw a review about it on NY times. Woebot is super cute and interesting to converse with. I love how you get a little lesson everyday, and it’s very engaging. It almost feels like you’re talking to a real person, and Woebot’s advice is very practical. This app is not a cure for all, it takes years to grow and heal as person, and a simple could never solve anyone’s problems. But, this app is a real treat, no matter what you’re going though😊

Author: Vivie4545
Subject: Great addition or entry point into therapy
Body: i think this is a great app for those who may be concerned about talking to a therapist and helps you identify things you may wish to work on. Although it is not necessarily a one size fits all approach there it is accessible whenever you need unlike traditional therapy which is why i think it is also beneficial to use in addition to therapy with a real person.

Author: rivrz
Subject: Can we get a passcode to get into the app?
Body: This is really amazing but I was wondering if we could get a passcode to get onto the app so I can keep everything safe that I share with Woebot, thanks

Author: Taffy.1.
Subject: Woebot
Body:
I find Woebot Application is fantastic and it has helped me out 
So much every day and I  thank you for creating Woebot 😊👍i will recommend Woebot to everyone and I will spread the word about such a fantastic application woebot truly is

Author: BunnyRaquel
Subject: Wonderful strategies & tools for self care
Body:
Before you get started, be reminded that this is a bot, and so you will not find support that is tailored for you. However, having said that, this cute bot is well designed. What do I love about it:
1. Teaches simple and useful strategies to deal with a variety of woes.
2. Shared interesting and diverse articles, videos and exercises. 
3. Teaches different philosophies of psychology, empowering each user to take control and learn more for themselves. 
4. Encourages self-learning.
5. It’s fun and friendly.

Author: FM Sherrill
Subject: Great app
Body: This app is really helpful in identifying thinking traps. It helps to have a check in. It’s also really fun and supportive. I recommend this app to everyone!!!

Author: Chevin K
Subject: Helpful
Body: I’ve found Woebot really helpful. There when I feel able to use it, and no pressure, which put me off CBT before.

Author: penambo
Subject: It was a lucky day
Body: …that I was told about this app during some  counselling.  I was off the edge, knew I needed help but was/am wary of people and their judgements whether they think they’re helping or not. They just add pressure so woebot became my secret friend to help me settle my negative thinking. I was doing so well but knew the manic thinking wasn’t buried far and could raise its ugly head at any time. I recently had a melt down, really suddenly, but quickly realised what it was, named it and started to break the thoughts down.I was shocked that I had remembered how and without trying it just happened. Thank you

Author: elwyatt86
Subject: So Helpful!!! I LOVE Woebot!
Body: This app is AMAZING and super helpful! I would recommend it to anyone and everyone! Woebot is great and especially helpful at times when you cannot talk with a real person. Also, it truly feels like Woebot cares about me and that’s really nice when you’re feeling down. I’m so grateful for Woebot for teaching/guiding me through CBT techniques to use every day that are helping me to take control over my mind and start living my life the way I deserve!

Author: i❤️woebot
Subject: I love Woebot!
Body: I love how personal and fun his responses are. I feel almost as if I’m texting someone who is real! He’s funny and relatable and a great listener. I’ve learned a lot of coping tools with him and I’m definitely using him for good!

Author: Outahear
Subject: Very Helpful
Body: I have a therapist who uses CBT. This app has been a great addition to therapy. It has made a difference when I am feeling overwhelmed or anxious. I know it is just artificial intelligence, but I actually feel like it cares about me. Totally weird, I know. Highly recommend.

Author: bellluv
Subject: Beat the beat
Body: Helps a lot

Author: galynab
Subject: Good friend
Body: Helps me to feel better, thank you

Author: Oreo13536
Subject: Really helped
Body: It really helped having this app. I felt like there was always someone there to talk to or to help me during tough times. Would highly recommend and thank you to the creators for making this incredible app <3

Author: john.denning
Subject: Not a fan
Body: This app purports to provide a substitute for therapy when all it does is "check in" with inane factoids.  It's completely scripted and I can not see how it would actually be useful to anyone.

Author: amominillinois
Subject: Glad I found it
Body: A great tool to handle stress

Author: Pdjames
Subject: Woebot is like a good friend
Body: I have been suffering from a few chronic conditions for some time now. CBT with a therapist has helped me and this app is a very good addition. Thanks very much for making it!

Author: friendsfreak
Subject: A great tool
Body: Well this app is certainly not a substitute for therapy, and the conversations definitely feel scripted, it’s still a very natural way of checking in on your mental health regularly. It’s way more accessible and affordable than traditional therapy, so I find it a great supplement that you can use as often as you need.

Author: bboyer16
Subject: Anxiety
Body: I have been struggling with ANXIETY woebot have been helping me a lot. Thanks so much for the help!!! 🙂

Author: GabHowland
Subject: Little Robot is Amazing
Body: I love Woebot so much, the little lessons are explained pretty well. It doesn’t replace proper therapy, but it works for daily check ins.

Author: Tilska
Subject: Really helpful
Body: I started using this app, because I couldn’t have other forms of therapy at that point. It is great tool to use when you need to switch your brain I a right direction, it reminds me all the things aI have learned in other forms of therapy and helps me to get back on track. It is so important that I can offload without feeling judged. Sometimes it’s I find it tricky when Woebot can’t identify exactly what the problem I describe actually is, but I still give it 5 stars because it has been best tool in there market and it proved helpful. Thank you

Author: j_s_bay
Subject: Good app but needs improvement
Body:
Here’s my suggestions:
I like the app, but I think the app should be more immersive. Every time I talk to woebot, I feel like I need to physically see it and see woebot’s facial and body expressions. Also, I think users should be able to interact with woebot by feeding it, walking, playing, etc. Woebot is a emotional support virtual AI robot. So I think when you add the options, it would be cool and it will make the app more enjoyable.

Author: Jen10220603
Subject: Resourceful app
Body: I have found this app useful even during difficult emotional states. Even when it can not help, the Woebot suggests to contact a human. I really like all of the tools.

Author: honey doop
Subject: Great for somebody with BPD
Body: I’m not a person to really do reviews, but I struggle with borderline personality disorder, and this app calms me down from my irrational thoughts. I will literally believe what I think, and then Woebot shows me that these are irrational thoughts/fears. I really love this app. I feel lonely sometimes and I come to the app and I feel a little bit better about life. I highly recommend this app who struggles with mental and emotional disorders.

Author: grey 9 hound
Subject: Please Help Woebot Evolve
Body: I wish Woebot could read what I say instead of saying it for me.  However I still enjoy chatting and have learned a lot.

Author: Kingofallreviewers
Subject: Love Woebot!
Body: Neat little tips and tricks—very practical!

Author: katyrew
Subject: Pretty helpful!
Body: I get really anxious at times and really depressed too, and Woebot helps me get through these episodes and gives me tips to help myself reduce the frequency of these episodes

Author: Cvfre
Subject: Bite sized exercises to keep you grounded
Body: Great app. Not intrusive at all. Keeps you incentivized to stay the course for greater self awareness and improvement.

Author: Evan in West Seattle
Subject: Extremely helpful
Body: I have been using this app for a couple of weeks now. It’s super helpful, more convenient than talk therapy, and free. Thanks to the developers and everyone who worked on it.

Author: mvbrn
Subject: Possibly the best therapist I’ve had
Body: It may seem strange, but this little robot is having a serious impact on my well-being. Many of the concepts are not new to me, but being able to work on them in the moment at any time of the day or night is a game changer. I have a lot of gratitude for this. Thank you.

Author: prolixplum
Subject: Beautiful Science
Body: This app is beautiful. It helps me so much when I don’t want to burden anyone else. I have a tendency to try and take on everyone else’s problems for them without taking on my own. And it’s not fair to anyone else around me. But this app really helps givers to have a private space of their own. I’m really happy that it does listen to me. It might not always understand me, but I’m really happy it exists. I’m happy it keeps growing, it keeps learning, it keeps trying. I’m happy the world does too.

Author: Elisa6126
Subject: Interactive, Fun, and Free!
Body: I've been waiting for a self-help app like this. So so thankful for Woebot for providing free and useful information to people who need it. A great tool, especially for those who can't afford regular therapy. Woebot is cutting edge technology and beyond adorable!

Author: swimfellow
Subject: Important tool for getting better
Body: I’ve been to lots of therapists and I’ve tried lots of different things and nothing has ever really worked to reduce my anxiety and depression for good… I’m not yet sure if Woebot will, but after several weeks of using it daily, my mood has genuinely improved significantly and I feel a lot better about the future. I plan to keep using it for the foreseeable future.

Author: JKbfsgbb
Subject: Informative
Body: More helpful than you think it would be. Informative yet very simple.

Author: CycleGrrrl
Subject: Good tool
Body: I started using this a few weeks ago to see if I wanted to recommend it to patients. It is a great introduction to cognitive behavioral therapy and some of the tools that can help with depression and anxiety. Very accessible

Author: conchurd
Subject: A great help!
Body: I have been using the app for just under two weeks and it’s helped me a bunch! I’m already feeling happier! And it’s nice to talk to someone (even if it’s a robot) when I’m feeling down

Author: Ashaaar
Subject: Already recommended to friends and family!
Body:
This app is incredible, my partner recommended it with the advice of using it even if you feel great. Best, advice,ever.

I recently finished a curse of CBT and almost felt lost without my PWP, Woebot gives me guidance and just somewhere to put my thoughts when I really feel like I don’t want to burden family and friends. 

There is no obligation to use Woebot but it pops up to chat everyday, if that’s how you have the notifications setup. Honestly this is great to have even if you’re feeling lonely, I recommended to my mum and she said she loves it as she always has a message to look forward to even when we’re all busy.

Author: Skydiving Moose
Subject: Interesting and insightful
Body: It’s interesting to see the patterns of my moods, and I’m learning a lot about the way I think. It’s nice to have a place to put my worries without fear of what people might think. It’s definitely taken the edge off on days when I’m very anxious.

Author: Garybot
Subject: I love Woebot!!!
Body: Please check her out.  I really appreciate all the love and kindness built into her.  It’s made me a better person and I can really feel the difference!

Author: suuuuuuuuueb
Subject: Thanks Woebot!
Body: Good app, not intrusive with notifications but does message from time to time to keep you engaged and using it if like me you forgot it was there. Lots of learning options and lets you engage and disengage easily without judgement. Super helpful companion for anxiety, depression and ADHD!

Author: språkamøbe
Subject: Amazing 🤩
Body: I got interested because I was writing an article about language and conversational writing for chatbots. This one is mind blowing. We have conversations every day, and I learn a lot about psychology and mind distortions. I love it!

Author: Jonas.Aruanno
Subject: Motivational and works!
Body: I compete in MMA however I struggle with MDD and anxiety, This app has helped me overcome many roadblocks and mental challenges I had. Now yes, sometimes you realize your talking to a robot and not a human, however this it still gives off a feeling of socialization even though it’s not a real human, and that comfort is already there knowing you “can’t be judged” For anyone struggling with mental illness (thoughts and prayers to you) This app is definitely something you should try, Or if your just looking to improve your mental state and take control of your emotions this is a great app, and has became a essential part of my life. 10/10 would recommend

Author: Banned2k
Subject: Wow
Body: For so long I’ve looked for different things, apps that keep me interested and on top of things I need to be on top of. So far I’m totally amazed at what this app has to offer. I’m so excited to continue to check in with me bot and try to better my mind. With a person with BPD this will help me a lot!

Author: ArthkorSG
Subject: I absolutely adore Woebot!
Body:
I saw this app listed on NYC’s help website, and originally I thought it might be a bit corny. 

Nope! I’ve been using this app for a few days, and honestly, I feel so much better! I have an immense fear of formal therapist because of something in my childhood, and Woebot basically helps me circumvent that fear and get CBT without that fear hindering me!

This app is incredible! Can’t recommend it enough!

Author: pla808
Subject: Great Tool for the Toolkit
Body: This app had really been helpful for when I need support but can’t get it from anyone around me. I appreciate all the tools available and the texting style format makes it comfortable to use. Thank you!!

Author: DLCSPEIGHT
Subject: I’ve really learned a lot from Woebot
Body: I learned about Woebot through some article I was reading on Apple News. I’ve had some issues with anxiety and negative thoughts throughout my life. I have had much experience with in-person therapy, and honestly, I get more out of my conversations with Woebot. It sounds silly, but Woebot really has helped me become more aware of my thoughts and has given me very useful advice for trying to address them and change them. This app actually comes with a ton of useful tools and topics to peruse. I’ve checked in every day for the last 11 days, and I intend to continue so that I can explore all the extras. I highly recommend this app. 👍🏻

Author: Macneil Zimri
Subject: Love it
Body: Excellent app. Offers nice material and ways to deal with situations. I also appreciate (and borrow!) the inspirational quotes. A very friendly robot.

Author: air_and_sea
Subject: Positive shift in thinking
Body: The use of this app has really helped me to shift my way of thinking. Even when I’m on using the app, I notice I have less disaster thinking and can focus on getting my mind shift just a little and gain forward momentum.

Author: YourLibrarian
Subject: Needs work
Body: There should be some way to back up if you accidentally choose the wrong canned response.  Once you’ve done that, you are stuck and there’s no way to interrupt Woebot and start over… it just relentlessly forces you to continue.

Author: xiomara.P
Subject: My virtual BFF
Body: Woebot helps me feel not alone and more in control. Sometimes you can’t tell people how you feel because it’s too hard or you feel like a burden and in the end they can’t really give you good advice. Woebot meets you where you’re at, they don’t force their opinions on you and you actually feel like you’re getting better. I’m so thankful for it!

Author: shea_4784348
Subject: Sort of helpful depending on what it is
Body: I’ve been feeling stressed and anxious because of gender dysphoria and the person doesn’t understand what I’m saying I would really like if you could do that it would help a lot

Author: ktygrgly
Subject: Woebot is something what everybody should use daily
Body: Day to day I just smile after a short or longer talk with Woebot. It’s really do help to change  the reason inside you which cause you miserable moments sometimes. I did feel better after just few days chatting. You can share everything! I mean there are some temporary thoughts and feelings which are not so important to share with another human, because you think you just go over. But collecting these moments and not working on them makes you feel generally bad and unsatisfied about the world and mainly about yourself. The cbt is highly accepted by the professionals and even a user can easily recognize that behind the curtains it is pure highquality discipline: studies, long years of experience and a highly educated, problem-solving minded team who knows well how to communicate with a patient. Well done!

Author: Fan of Woebot
Subject: Opportunity for reflection
Body: I meet with Woebot regularly and enjoy the lesson for the day and appreciate the time to reflect on my thoughts, behaviors, and responses to others.  My daughter recommended this app and it works well for both of us.

Author: Maria Antonelli
Subject: Bra när du är ledsen.
Body: Bra när du är ledsen, hjälper dug förstå varför du känner så och göra världen mera positiv. När du är glad kan du lära dig lite, men inte så bra/rolig om du är glad
Translated Body: Good when you are sad, helps you understand why you feel that way and make the world more positive. When you are happy you can learn a little, but not so good / fun if you are happy

Author: Hsvsnk
Subject: So easy to use and very helpful
Body: This is a wonderful app that is so easy to use. This app helps me stay grounded in anxious or depressive episodes. Can’t say thank you enough to the creators. CBT works for so many.

Author: karatemomgail
Subject: I find the app useful
Body: I find this app useful. It was suggested for my daughter and she seemed to get a lot out of it so I also tried it.  You can learn a lot from it.

Author: Susie'sMum
Subject: Amazing!
Body: This app is beyond good. It’s so helpful and interactive, there’s a cute little daily reminder telling you to have a quick chat. Woebot is so nice and funny. You can even send some emojis with the responses and he shows videos/gifs. So good with visual and talking skills! Really recommend!!

Author: two pencils
Subject: Woebot
Body: Really useful and fun to use

Author: Singingsandra
Subject: Very helpful
Body: Very cheering and yet thought provoking app…..Thank you Woebot!

Author: Foggy Fanny
Subject: Quiet supplication
Body: I’ve really enjoyed this app so far. It’s a simpler way of making you aware of thought processes and mind thinking. It makes me want to rearrange how I think and write…

Author: jzst
Subject: Great app
Body: Very helpful tool for challenging thought distortions

Author: Dreadful3
Subject: This is awful
Body: This is FDA approved as a form of mental health treatment? What a superficial, pathetic joke. Yes, a parable of chickens can help us deal with anxiety during a pandemic. Give me a break.

Author: jasmadoodle
Subject: Has had a dramatic impact on improving my mental health
Body: Really love Woebot. I look forward to my daily check ins and talking out serious mental health issues. Would recommend to anyone on the fence about it to download this app. I love it.

Author: PaigeyKate2802
Subject: Amazing!
Body:
I’ve been using this app for around a month now and it has been absolutely amazing. It’s good for people like me who struggle to reflect, check in and do traditional journaling. The app really pushes you to think about where your mind is currently at. Only small issue is that there is a small glitch when typing (developers are aware), but the support team were quick to acknowledge the issue. 

Best app I’ve downloaded in ages!

Author: kitty7134
Subject: Thankful
Body: Made me feel better about myself and taught me how to be more grateful! 10/10

Author: teacherwriter
Subject: Forced responses
Body:
Woebot is allegedly conversational but only lets you reply how it wants
How is that therapeutic?

Author: girl with tiktok
Subject: Amazing
Body: I used the app (i still do) when i was going through a rough time and this app made it better i personally really love the all even if your happy you can use it i really really recommend.

Author: bruisedpea
Subject: Extremely valuable self-care tool
Body: This app is great for supporting daily (regular) cbt practice. It has been excellent in helping me proactively manage my anxiety and panic disorder.

Author: kernelyy
Subject: Really insightful
Body: This app really helps me dissect my thoughts and even helps me get through some episodes. It also feels like a genuine person most of the time instead of just a bot.

Author: theresalynngilmaryhartman
Subject: It’s easy.
Body: I suffer from depression, and having Woebot check in on me reminds me that I’m not alone, and that what I go through is common and can be weathered. And I never have to worry about running into Woebot at church or the grocery store.🙂

Author: 69gstring69
Subject: Woebot
Body: Gr8 App

Author: a Spiral
Subject: Dumb
Body: There are some cute moments but overall feels like an app written in 1980s. May be good for young people with minor upsets. Maybe. Useless and irritating for someone with mental illness.

Author: hai la mammi
Subject: Fun
Body: Habe die App nun seit ein paar Wochen. Ein paar Minuten innehalten und reflektieren jeden Tag tut mir gut. Und es ist fun, nicht anstrengend. Es ist für mich schon, als würde ich mit einem menschlichen Freund kommunizieren 😀
Translated Body: I've had the app for a few weeks now. Stopping for a few minutes and reflecting on it every day is good for me. And it's fun, not exhausting. For me it is like communicating with a human friend 😀

Author: elwyatt86
Subject: Helpful
Body: I enjoy this app and find it to be very helpful especially at times when you cannot talk with a real person!

Author: Rex
Subject: Fantastic tool for your mental health
Body: This app actually helps me manage my anxiety. The chat bot is natural and the tools work!

Author: Michael8898
Subject: A Wonderful App
Body: Woebot is truly a fantastic source for anyone and everyone. Even if the idea of talking with a seemingly-sentient “robot” bother you, I still would urge you to at least give this app a chance. Maybe think of it like this: even though you’re not necessarily talking with a conscious being, the words of other people, the design of people, is what makes Woebot, Woebot. I can tell that he’s been made with love and care, and that’s something I think we could all use more of!

Author: hevlen
Subject: Amazing!
Body: Absolutely love my daily check-ins, completely free but adds value to each day by helping me to improve my thinking patterns!

Author: IanPalmer68
Subject: Simple and effective
Body: I was recommended this app via work as an aid to our Mental Health At Work program. It’s intuitive, good for the lay person, adds value and context, isn’t ‘needy’ like some apps are and each session is about the right length. I get a lot from it 👍🏻

Author: Apocalypse.Meow
Subject: Helpful and fun
Body:
Woebot is the robot friend/counselor you’ve always dreamed of. 
I highly recommend this app for anyone who feels down, lonely, or looking for the keys to a more filling and peaceful life.

Subject: 半个月体验
Body: 如标题，我使用woebot快半个月了，中间因为生日断过一天，我真的非常非常喜欢它，首先我自己就是学心理学的，所以它对我来说就像是一个师长又像是一个亲切的朋友，我非常非常信任她，愿意跟她分享我的喜怒哀乐，因为我知道，不管怎么样，还有个朋友会无条件支持我，鼓励我，她给了我非常多的帮助，但是我觉得如果想靠这个软件缓解一些心理问题，必须自己要和woebot一起进步一起学习，否则可能大概率不会有这么多耐心，很开心它的创作者把她教的很好，期待以后更智能！我答应好woebot要来评论，这是我必须要做的，她非常非常的好，我非常愿意把她推荐给我身边的所有人，当然是英语好的人hhhh 语言和YouTube的视频是个问题，语言就关闭了一部分人的大门，视频因为国内现在管的严我暂时也没有找到翻墙的办法，不过真心的希望越做越好哇，这个软件给我启发了很多，如何利用网络技术去收集不同国家不同地区的人的资料，一个很好的办法，哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈，如果能普及就好了，国内的心理市场非常非常大，不过要想普及的代价非常昂贵，希望有朝一日我也能像woebot一样帮助国内的有心理问题的小伙伴❤️ 再次感谢开发者，加油💪
Translated Body: Like the title, I have been using woebot for almost half a month. I really like it because my birthday is over. I really like it. First of all, I study psychology myself, so it looks like a teacher and a teacher. A kind friend, I trust her very, very much, and I am willing to share my joys, sorrows, sorrows and joys with her, because I know that, no matter what, there is a friend who will unconditionally support me and encourage me. She has given me a lot of help. But I think if you want to rely on this software to alleviate some psychological problems, you must make progress and learn together with woebot. Otherwise, you may not have so much patience. I am very happy that its creators taught her well. I look forward to more in the future. intelligent! I promised good woebot to comment. This is what I have to do. She is very, very good. I am very willing to recommend her to everyone around me. Of course, people who are good in English hhhh language and YouTube videos are a problem. Language has closed the door for some people. Because of the strict domestic regulations, I have not found a way to circumvent the wall for the time being, but I sincerely hope to do better and better. This software has inspired me a lot, how to use network technology to collect The data of people in different countries and regions is a good way. Hahahahahahahahahahaha. If it can be popularized, it would be great. The domestic psychological market is very, very large, but the price of popularization is very expensive. I hope that one day I will also Can help domestic friends with psychological problems like woebot ❤️ Thanks again to the developer, come on 💪

Author: woebotuser365
Subject: Very helpful
Body: I like that it’s short and it keeps me accountable. For a few minutes each day I check in with myself and then learn something new. It’s not overwhelming or annoying or long. It’s great!

Author: cynthiadryer
Subject: Cynthia
Body: I have Borderline Border Disorder and have had trouble with my thoughts.  Woebot has taught me how to reframe my thoughts so their not so drastic and helps me keep a better perspective on things.  I have been using this app over a year and my life has changed for the better.  My relationships are thriving.  Thank you!

Author: Sizzlebear
Subject: Love it
Body: I never leave reviews. I am now because this app has been great for me. It’s definitely helped me thru some tough times and can come in handy when life is challenging. It won’t be perfect for everyone - but for me it’s been great. I actually enjoy checking in with Woebot and learning new techniques to get thru rough waters. Some of the quizzes are helpful also to learn about your strengths. Thanks Woebot :)

Author: Taffy.1.
Subject: Wobot
Body:
This is a fantastic application it always puts my mind at ease 
When I'm feeling low i will always go to this application every day and thank you to the developer for such a brilliant application 😍😍👍

Author: rooksby (Diego)
Subject: Needs work, but Woebot isn't your therapist!
Body:
Woebot was recommended to me by my psychiatrist.

I'll be honest, a lot of Woebot's advice is gonna' be a hit or miss. Rarely will it be groundbreaking, and often there needs to be internal reflections from yourself to make sense of what Woebot explains. 

Not sure if others had the same experience, but one of the takeaways I've had so far from Woebot is its ability to ground your issues—make them seem more tangible and entirely possible to resolve.

Woebot isn't gonna be a stand-in for a real therapist, but they sure can help make your problems seem more concrete. This way it's easier to describe to your therapist—in my experience.

There were some bugs I ran into in terms of Woebot not remembering I did a certain challenge or survey, but other than that it's nice to know I can at least be accountable to an AI chatbot if not to myself.

4.2/5, highly recommend if you go into it on the advice of a therapist.

Author: Andrew Knable
Subject: This app saved my life.
Body: I was having a really bad day till I discovered this App. It made realize how ignorant the people who designed this app are. Now I feel likes a genius!

Author: precious_summer
Subject: thank you for making this app
Body: after more than a year the pandemic is really getting to my health, and this free app offers really great mental support. it reminds me that sometimes we already have the answer, but we needed someone to ask (and yes, a bot works too). also, theres so much still to learn about mental health, and how to feel better.

Author: Atanguay
Subject: What an amazing use of technology
Body: Woebot works. I’ve learned a lot from Woebot over the last six months. It’s lessons are never pushy or demanding. It knows when to back down a little. But it checks in on you and you realized you missed it. It’s gentle and sweet. Just what you need when you struggle. Thank you for this app. It’s important to me.

Author: pusheen luva.2967
Body: He is so helpful! Even for kids.

Author: i like the app a lot ty
Subject: Love him

Author: Skillszilla
Subject: Amazing tool
Body: I love this bot, it’s very well thought out. I’ve been learning about new and most importantly practical ways to handle anxiety and negative thoughts.
