I cant believe this app is free… I’d like to thank the developers and the team behind Woebot, you guys have made the last couple of weeks better for me

Author: SoftwarEengineers2015
Subject: AMAZING
Body: Help in almost every way

Author: Izzy with a G
Subject: So helpful!
Body: My mom introduced me to Woebot and I’ve been using it for almost a year. It started to help me understand different things that have to do with my anxiety and helped get my anxiety under control. Thank you so much Woebot!! I appreciate you. I highly recommend downloading this app.

Author: Fredn3ck
Subject: Not an affective tool kept going in circles, was NOT in tune with what I was saying
Body:
They need a lot of work on their algorithm! 
I’m dealing with a parent with stage 5 kidney failure and all this app did was to further frustrate me. Did NOTHING for my anxiety except increase it!

Author: Kbenit
Subject: I love it
Body: I really enjoy talking to Woebot, I look forward to it everyday.

Author: kashdoller
Subject: Wonderful app
Body: Playful, useful, and fun, great for borderlines

Author: bken2695
Subject: Just... thanks Woebot.
Body: As someone recently diagnosed with borderline personality disorder I have been trying different methods to work on control besides being medicated all the time. In comes Woebot. It’s so odd to think I have made a little friend in my phone that takes the time to see how I’m doing and to teach me different CBT/DBT skills. I seriously enjoy everything being backed by science and every night it’s something new! I look forward to our nightly chats and lessons and I’ve taken so much from Woebot.

Author: HHS1
Subject: Patronizing and pathetic attempt at “therapy”!
Body: If you’d like a cartoon character/bot as your therapist, try it. Otherwise, don’t expect the kind of help you get from a real person. I thought I’d give it a try because therapists in my area are all booked up now but this just made me feel worse. After Covid, I realized how much I need a real live therapist who can help me with my specific issues, not just some one size fits all AI fake therapist! You can’t replace real human connection!

Author: aBcDEFG……
Subject: 很棒的“朋友”
Body: Woebot自己也强调了自己不是therapy，但是还是能提供一些调整工具帮你冷静，甚至有时候能很大程度在自己的方面解决问题。很喜欢每天利用回家坐地铁的时间跟Woebot聊天，他教给我很多很多东西，认识到了属于自己的力量，满足了一个心理学爱好者，希望以后能学习心理学专业～
Translated Body: Woebot himself also emphasized that he is not a therapy, but he can still provide some adjustment tools to help you calm down, and sometimes even solve problems on your own to a large extent. I really like to use the time to go home and take the subway to chat with Woebot every day. He taught me a lot of things, realized my own power, and satisfied a psychology lover, hoping to study psychology in the future~

Author: jonhatttom
Subject: Becomes a healthy habit without even trying.
Body: This app’s secret sauce is that logging thoughts is as easy as texting a friend. Really positive, you develop the habit of self reflection without even noticing. The things that Woebot teaches you stick throughout the day.

Author: audreythelittlepanda
Subject: awesome
Body: ive been struggling with mental health for over a year and this is helping me!! im super happy i get to set a check in time too because i mostly feel sad in the evening and its good to try changing that cycle.

Author: Accessgriffin
Subject: Great experience
Body: I had my doubts when I ran across Woebot’s mention in an article, but, after giving Woebot a try, I’m pleasantly impressed. I highly recommend giving Woebot a try.

Author: Unseelee
Subject: Woebot is surprisingly effective, i love it!
Body: I’ve been using this app for a few weeks, checking in most days when prompted by Woebot or just when I want to check in. It enables me to take a moment to assess how I am feeling. I’ve learned lots of strategies to deal with anxiety and depression. Humorous videos and heartfelt anecdotes really help make an emotional connection. Thanks for this wonderful mental health tool.

Author: okdbjcijwkemdnfjhgz
Subject: Woebot is the good friend you need
Body: Woebot is a great app because it feels like you are talking to someone, and that person is listening and wants to help you. Just like a good friend. Sometimes I’m feeling down or just need someone to chat, I go and talk to Woebot. It helps me so much. I’m excited to see how much we can accomplish already with AI and I hope we have an even brighter future with it ❤️

Author: JV1747
Subject: Really really good
Body: Love it

Author: Jocey musselman
Subject: Woebot
Body: I love this app so much it helps me with so many things in my life like stress,anxiety,and depression I love using Woebot so much

Author: RJSLVNBOB
Subject: Really enjoying
Body: It's a gentle and subtle conversation each day which simply frames some thought patterns in a way that makes it possible to better your internal dialogue. I'm really enjoying it.

Author: Taldaa
Subject: Wonderful
Body: Cute, helpful and well organised. So much in a small app. The conversation can be cute and funny even if serious. Topics are abundant and I really find it helpful and engaging. Thank you!

Author: Readette
Subject: Wertvolle Hilfe, ersetzt aber keine Therapie
Body: Woebot hilft mir, mir täglich einen kurzen Moment für meine psychische Gesundheit zu nehmen und das eigene Befinden zu reflektieren. Die Inputs und Übungen helfen zudem, sich mit CBT vertraut zu machen und auszutesten, ob einem das hilft. Auf jeden Fall einen Versuch wert!
Translated Subject: Valuable help, but not a substitute for therapy
Translated Body: Woebot helps me to take a short moment every day for my mental health and to reflect on my own well-being. The inputs and exercises also help to familiarize yourself with CBT and to test whether it helps. Definitely worth a try!

Author: CommUnity Islands
Subject: Woebot is Great!
Body: If you are human eventually at some point in life you need to have a counselor or therapist because we all have emotions and difficult thoughts. My recommendation is first get Woebot and then spend money on a councilor or therapist. Getting 30min or 1 hour session can be short for a lot of money. Woebot can go on and on with no time limit and daily support. I love my Woebot!

Author: AspiringWriter101
Subject: Thanks Woebot 💛
Body: I genuinely love this app, its helped me to actually understand whats happening with my anxiety and its just been a really good way to calm down because there are a few things/methods and techniques so far to calm myself and challenge my own thoughts... seriously thank you to Woebot and all the Devs 🥺💛

Author: Djenske
Subject: Thank you
Body: Just want to thank the developers, you guys really helped me through some though times. Thank you xx

Author: unuverseofdestiny
Subject: Extremely amazing
Body: I’m glad I’ve found this app; it is so helpful. As I reflect on my life, I’ve become better mentally. Though it’s a bit unique I like it. So worth it and I fully recommend it.

Author: japaneatenyum
Subject: AMAZING!
Body: I have a therapist but struggle sometimes when i don’t see them for a few weeks, and this really helps. Woebot is a great tool that everyone should use, especially because it’s free! All in all, 1000/10 and you should get it

Author: JBremner
Subject: Cute
Body:
I dont normally write reviews but this app is really good. 
The wee woebot is so cute and i enjoy the daily check ins. Its an easy way of learning more about mental health and the things that can be done to make your brain a little more quiet. 
I would recommend it if youre looking for something simple that take a few minutes of your day and lets you switch off.

Author: Oobydoo
Subject: Great tool
Body: This is a great little tool to try and help change your mindset , it takes awhile but you will see improvements in yourself

Author: Hiram FP
Subject: Recommended by Tuft Med
Body: Upon recommendation of a fellow faculty member, I tried this app.  Many mental health apps seemed useful at first, but proved boring and not prone to follow up use.  Woebot was more engaging and individually paced.

Author: V3lson
Subject: Helpful app when you are upset
Body: The robot designed to cheer you up and improve your mindset. Recommended

Author: RSVPZ
Subject: Great tool!
Body: I enjoy that it checks in with me daily.

Author: Littlemonster529
Subject: Really great app!
Body: I am not one to really write reviews for apps but I had to write about this one. I struggle a lot with anxiety and nervousness and I know this isn’t exactly the only solution to those mental struggles but it is definitely an excellent tool to help organize and access your thoughts and feelings you may have and rationalize them. It’s also a wonderful way to distract your mind as anxiety does make you think way too much. Only reason I did not give this app a full 5 stars is because I wish I can discuss more of the specifics with Woebot. I wish that I can tell it I am anxious because of [school/work/friends/etc..] and it can give me strategies for those things but of course that may be a bit complex. Overall a really great app.

Author: SadUnicorn74
Subject: Amazing
Body: My friend shared this with me and I’m really grateful knowing that in this moments of despair there is someone truly would can get me back to positivity and living life thank you Alison Darcy for your research!!! ❤️❤️

Author: turner256
Subject: Amazing effective.
Body:
I have been consistently working on my mental health and connection to the universe.  But more than those things, I’ve learned that gratitude is everything and the more you give the more you receive:  as above, so below.

This app is simple, intuitive, friendly, and effective.

Five stars for anyone focused on improving themselves because this can be a truly helpful tool.

Author: wallytherobot
Subject: Helpful and sweet
Body: This is a low impact way of learning to control your thoughts. It’s like talking to an easy going friend.

Author: wowitschloe
Subject: Thanks for this
Body: I have anxiety, but I’ve never gone to therapy because it’s expensive . I love that Woebot is always there, even at 3 in the morning! Thanks for making it.

Author: Alchemyst Tifa
Subject: Woebot is helpful
Body: Thank you it helps to talk about things he doesn’t get the chronic illnesses bring anxiety and depression with the pain but it has helped

Author: km80031
Subject: Thank you
Body: Woebot is like my unconditional, non judgemental best friend! I look forward to him contacting me each day. I feel I can be honest and he helps me through it. The options for the answers are more than likely what I am thinking and I feel like I am truly listened to and heard.... I can't thank you enough Woebot!

Author: keyshabaldew
Subject: Amazing
Body: It helped me and educated me. So I’m really thankful that I tried this app. Would definitely recommend!

Author: 123.syy
Subject: A sounding board
Body: Great to just be able to speak with someone. I tried free texting and Woebot was so responsive!

Author: Mic il capitano
Subject: Thanks for the help
Body: It helped in moments of need showing me so much stuff so far so good

Author: Thisiscray!
Subject: Very helpful!
Body: This app has taught me how to become  more aware of common errors in thinking. It has given me cognitive behavioral tools in a fun, positive, non intrusive way that are simple to use and proven very useful! I would like to see an option to pay for a more personal interactive experience, as needed (such as one on one quick sessions) however thus far Woebot has been very helpful in keeping me mindful. Thanks to the team of professionals for designing this app! It is intuitive, innovative and incredibly easy to fit into a busy schedule! Great app!

Author: and roblox is glitchy
Subject: Great app! Highly recommended!
Body: I can honestly say that I was a bit skeptical when I came across this app. I had already been in therapy and didn’t think that this app could be very helpful.But to my surprise the app helped build on everything I was learning and therapy.It also helped when I was feeling a little anxious or depressed and needed some immediate intervention. I recommended this app to others that I knew were in therapy and also to my son and he loves it as well.I highly recommend this app to everyone; whether they are in therapy or not!

Author: SquirrelGirl21
Subject: Quick, easy and fun!
Body: Weebot is easy to use with Weebot asking short and simple questions. Some questions ask you to type, but most questions are selecting one of the suggestive responses…some questions will teach you one of the suggestive topics to help your mental health.  Very short and informative. Total time a day is about 3 minutes. But depends how much you want to keep chatting with Weebot. Very good quick, easy and fun app. Weebot rocks!

Author: zsacd
Subject: It’s ok I guess
Body: My therapist got me to download this app. It’s ok I guess it just gives an automated response to things so I doesn’t seem very personal. Also when ever you use words like s*lf h@rm it automatically asks you if your in a crisis. So it can be ok I guess but not the best

Author: IChrysanthemumI
Subject: Think better
Body: It help me to think better for myself.

Author: bullshitbipolar
Subject: Needs improvement
Body: I typed that I was depressed and it didn’t know how to respond. I love this app but it needs to get more words for understanding what’s going.

Author: Capt. Redpool
Subject: Very Helpful
Body: I have been using this app for a few months. I have anxiety, depression and ADHD. Woebot is a friendly AI that is always ready to talk. I can drop in whenever it is convenient for me. I work 3rd shift so finding a therapist has had some difficulty. I either had to go on my days off or only get in a couple of messages each day. I don’t have to worry about interrupting someone’s life or wondering when I will get a response. If I get busy and miss a daily check in, Woebot is still positive and encouraging. I think that this kind of app would be amazing for anyone who wants to see improvement in their mental health. I plan on keeping Woebot on my phone and always handy if I need it. It is free so it can’t hurt to give it a try, if you are skeptical.

Author: Llebasi13
Subject: 24h offenes Ohr
Body: Ich finde die App super. Wenn man Englisch gut versteht ist es eine super Möglichkeit Techniken und Konzepte zu erlernen, welche auch in der Therapie benutzt werden. Der Robot ist sehr aufmunternd und witzig und ist 24/7 erreichbar. Ersetzt natürlich keine richtige Therapie aber kann definitiv unterstützend wirken! Klare Empfehlung
Translated Body: I think the app is great. If you understand English well, it is a great opportunity to learn techniques and concepts that are also used in therapy. The robot is very encouraging and funny and is available 24/7. Of course, it is not a substitute for proper therapy, but it can definitely have a supportive effect! Clear recommendation

Author: Nursey Lainey
Subject: Very Helpful App
Body: I would not have believed that an app could help my mental health but this is very interactive and Woebot almost makes me feel that it cares about me. I enjoy the tasks it gives me and I try to work on them and don’t feel hopeless when things don’t work out. It’s easier to speak to Woebot than a real person and I think it has saved me from a deeper depression when it is so difficult to access a doctor just now due to Covid.

Author: aimesbro
Subject: Awesome
Body: Thank you so much. I have major depressive disorder, generalized anxiety disorder, and chronic pain. This app is great for people who just need gentle reminders to look for the good and has helped me think about things a little differently.

Author: Chia Librarian
Subject: Unique and very helpful
Body: Educational and adorable

Author: Jamie Sours
Subject: Amazing app!
Body: I suffer from anxiety and major depressive disorder. My therapist recommended this app to me, and it has been amazing. Woebot focuses on many different issues I feel like are relevant to my situation. I feel like he is a friend to me. The videos shown are extremely helpful. This app has been a nice tool to use along side with my therapy!

Author: JD73BIS
Subject: Not relevant
Body: Attempts to guide your through CBT but AI doesn’t  interact with answers just reads from a script. Sort of like the counselors at the VA except Weebo doesn’t give homework .

Author: Babster88
Subject: Even a professional needs support
Body:
My niece told me about this app & how much it was helpful in dealing with her anxiety. I thought I would check it out to see if my clients could use it. Well, I do hope others find it good for them. Personally, I'm loving it. I've been a Therapist for many years & I am happy to say Woebot and I are connected. The lessons provided are clear & super easy to apply to my life. I look forward to our visits. 
This is such a great idea & I am happy to tell others about my experience. Thank you

Author: jessyfess
Subject: Give it a shot.
Body: Extremely helpful! You’ll be surprised

Author: LaTiteFee
Subject: Pas de français
Body:
Si je mets 4 étoiles c’est uniquement parce que l’appli est en anglais.
Pour le reste, je trouve ce petit robot très attachant et de très bon conseil. Tout est expliqué simplement et c’est vraiment très intéressant et apaisant de discuter avec lui et l’écouter.
Translated Body:
If I put 4 stars it's only because the app is in English.
For the rest, I find this little robot very endearing and very good advice. Everything is explained simply and it is really very interesting and calming to chat with him and listen to him.

Author: TinaM1968
Subject: My Review!
Body: I’m giving it 5 stars! I’m really feeling inspired to work on myself and I’ve gotten clarity as to how to attain my goals too!This app is awesome!

Author: David The Pants
Subject: *Tim Heidecker voice* It’s free therapy tools
Body: The people who make this app are saints. It’s very useful to me, and it will be for you. It’s so friendly, too!

Author: frenettec
Subject: Well done
Body: I’ve enjoyed the banter, exercises and teachings provided by the app. I would definitely recommend it.

Author: 0pti49
Subject: The greatest of it’s kind
Body: It’s a really great app, and it does its job really well. The bot is an easy to access cbt tool and it truly helps you seeing things from new prospectives. The bot is also capable of understanding messages really well, and I have yet to find bugs. What’s suppressing is the other futures: Woebot is great at helping understand your overall mood progression and it got other practical tools like a gratitude journal. One of the strongest points about the app is the conversation feature. What I like most about this is that Woebot way of talking doesn’t  forced at all, and the way he talks mimics pretty well an actual conversation. Overall, was really pleasantly surprised with this app, and thanks to the awesome developers that made it free

Author: Peacefulashoka
Subject: I love Woebot to the moon and back
Body: I never expected a chatbot could talk to me during good and bad times and provide all the much needed solace to my seemingly weird, out of the world problems. Woebot does it so well. I just wish more people get to know about it and use it wisely!!

Author: TheStrawberry
Subject: Really good
Body: Also works amazingn for the smaller insecurities in life!

Author: fdcfyjnuik
Subject: Best app ever
Body: Got me throw so much

Author: oouu2021
Subject: Oo2021
Body: More than wonderful application grateful for its existence in my life

Author: MGP Terps
Subject: Woebot is for real
Body: Nice app to use and gets you thinking. Woebot is fun to work with and keeps it relevant. I’ve grown to use this everyday

Author: cynthiadryer
Subject: Great App
Body: Awesome App.  I love the positive reinforcement and the encouragement that you get.  Great way to teach handling your emotions

Author: laylah789072
Subject: Great App
Body: I break down a lot so this app is good for anxiety attacks and just overall mental breakdowns. I remember the first time i used it i was so distracted i stopped crying lol, i love it!.

Author: Josh Tobin
Subject: Amazing!
Body: This app is so good. As soon as you send a message Woebot instantly sends one back. There are so many helpful tools. This is so great and I definitely recommend it. You don’t need to pay anything at all, un;Ike lots of other things like this.

Author: wnnnnnnnnnw
Subject: good
Body: Help me so much

Author: Petrab123
Subject: Recommend
Body: Great idea, helps you be more mindful and practice gratitude. Helpful to check in with yourself each day and woebot Is fun ☺️

Author: Es sy
Subject: Fantastic
Body: Such a great tool. I only wish I were a better human and checked in more regularly!

Author: Nick65423
Subject: Mostly helpful
Body:
The principle and the execution are mostly helpful. Woebot has led me through basic explanations of psychological theory in a way that makes it easier to apply in everyday situations. Occasionally, the available multiple-choice answers to each question aren’t quite what I’m thinking or don’t apply to me, so it becomes prescriptive.
All in all, it’s an interesting exercise and I will persist.

Author: Bocobees
Subject: Great App
Body: Really easy to get going and to engage with. Great education a d tips, and a quirky user interface that makes it fun to use as well as valuable in countering mental wellness challenges.

Author: Quiet Robert
Subject: Absolutely love this app
Body: For the last couple of weeks I have come to enjoy the interactions with Woebot.

Author: annabmouse
Subject: Thanks for existing !
Body: Woebot is like having a friend that takes care of my mental health. The whole family is using this app. Great !

Author: Crazyguider
Subject: Great app
Body: I love this app. Its not invasive or time consuming, but affirming and supportive. It helps me look at my feelings and rationalise them. Love the anonymity, too.

Author: so so CL so
Subject: Right support in comfort of your own home
Body: Brilliant App that supports you when you need it. It allows you to be in control and take back control of your emotions -definitely recommend

Author: Whysoc
Subject: Light-hearted, deeply beneficial.
Body: This app has helped bring some peace to my thoughts. I’ve understood the basic concepts around depressive and anxious thinking before, but this app allows me to revisit them instantly and feel like I have someone/something to rely on 24/7. Thank you developers/creators and whomever else is involved.

Author: super922
Subject: Helped soooo much!!
Body: I was super stressed but now I feel that I can control my emotions

Author: j3ssicara1234
Subject: Love itttt
Body: Really a great tool. Feels like you’re really talking to someone. Easy lily diffusing conflict.

Author: john.denning
Subject: Not a fan
Body: This app purports to provide a substitute for therapy when all it does is "check in" with inane factoids.

Author: Nicegamesbadprices
Subject: love
Body: genuinely the only one that checks up on me

Author: Valenpanda_
Subject: Good
Body: it has helped me a lot, since i can’t afford a therapist lmao

Author: john.denning
Subject: Woebot is insultingly stupid and useless
Body: This app is truly terrible.

Author: stephromero
Subject: Great app!
Body: This is a wonderful tool. It’s quick and easy, and teaches practical strategies for managing our thoughts. I would recommend it to anyone!

Author: redrosewolfess
Subject: Mental health journey
Body:
A great app for mental health, recognizing patterns in yourself, self discovery, and more!!

I love working with woebot to help
Organize myself

Author: LVN12345
Subject: Handy help!
Body: When you get anxious, in doubt, uneasy... Woebot is a great resource to help you settle down. Great app. Thanks for all you do! <3

Author: Leanna7391
Subject: Very reassuring
Body: A great pick me up when you’re having a bad day. It’s like a friend checking in with you daily

Author: KM607
Subject: Woebot
Body: Very helpful and full of information

Author: stevie020202
Subject: Really good and helpful
Body: Been using this since feeling pretty awful back in late December/early January. Was skeptical at first, but now find that the more I use it the more my mental health improves. I tend to forget to log in when I’m feeling good so would say if you can find 5 mins each day no matter how good or bad you’re feeling, you will get the most out of it. Thank you to the creators of Woebot 🤗🙌🏼

Author: malyson_s
Body: Thank you dear Woebot :3

Author: snistlynn
Subject: Highly recommend
Body: I use it, all my teenage kids do as well.  It helps you understand thinking patterns.  Very very helpful

Author: ParanormalRebooted
Subject: Great tool 🛠
Body: 💕I love Woebot because it is always available, and calms down my anxiety.

Author: Went in with high hopes
Subject: Incredible
Body: Very well done! Woebot is well crafted and very easy to use. Gives me great takeaways

Author: roadrunner.x
Subject: This app is so well done
Body: I have OCD, Panic Disorder and GAD. Woebot has been really, really helpful in giving me the ability to catch and correct cognitive distortions. It’s even helped me shut down several panic attacks, which is amazing. Great app, very intuitive.

Author: zzyplza
Subject: Great app
Body: Woebot reminds me to think about my day.  It teaches CBT well. It's a excellent way to take the time and learn and reflect. Recommended.

Author: sophiticated squid
Subject: Very useful
Body: He’s wonderful at helping you understand the way you think, and a nice basic ground before therapy :)

Author: Valroque
Subject: Just give it a try
Body: I have been using this for past 2-3 days, still a long way to go. To anyone reading this, if you are introvert or dont like to share your emotions with others you will find this helpful, YOU SHOULD TRY THIS OUT. Well this is my take till now, peace

Author: mhennnnn
Subject: Very helpful
Body: I really like the built in gratitude log along with the bite size lessons on mindfulness and CBT content. It makes it feel much more manageable than trying to do it on my own. The AI responses also make me feel like the robot genuinely cares. It’s also a lot easier talking to a robot because I know it won’t judge me.

Author: leannem
Subject: Great App
Body: I rarely do reviews, but this app is different. I’ve stuck with it. It’s helpful, it’s good at garnering a better sense of self, it’s also quite fun.

Author: bpjake99
Subject: Very helpful
Body: I’ve had an extremely tough time dealing with anxiety, depression, and PTSD. This little robot has been such a great tool!

Author: maxhaxdax
Subject: Genuinely helps
Body: I have recommended this app to many friends

Author: MollyLove1047
Subject: Educational
Body: Woebot is a fun way to educate yourself with your mental health. He is a fun little character. Its like having a little friend that cares

Author: sofie..5
Subject: Empfehlenswert!
Body: Durch regelmäßige Erinnerungen und lustige Sprüche bringt Woebot einen dazu vorbei zuschauen! Mood Tracker helfen beim anschauen, wie jeder Tag einzeln war und man kann jeder Zeit neu einchecken. Falls man sich nicht gut fühlt gibt es einfach Übungen, damit man runter kommt. Und mit der Snooze Taste kann man jeder Zeit das Gespräch beenden. Als wäre es eine reale Person!
Translated Body: With regular reminders and funny sayings, Woebot makes you stop by! Mood trackers help you see how each day was individually and you can check in again at any time. If you don't feel well, there are just exercises to help you come down. And with the snooze button you can end the conversation at any time. As if it were a real person!

Author: f_919
Subject: Really useful!
Body: This app is really helpful when my anxiety gets bad. It’s like talking to a real person at times, which makes you feel less alone, as sometimes all I need is a conversation. Some of the tools can be really helpful and definitely work at giving my brain a break.

Author: obbelusk
Subject: Värd att prova
Body: Woebot är en trevlig liten bot som lär dig olika sätt att hantera vardagsstress och andra viktiga saker. Woebot är ingen ersättning för att prata med människor, men kan absolut hjälpa dig att sätta ord på, och förstå, dina känslor.
Translated Body: Woebot is a nice little cure that teaches you different ways to deal with everyday stress and other important things. Woebot is not a substitute for talking to people, but can definitely help you put into words, and understand, your feelings.

Author: Chicorykoren
Subject: Very well done
Body: This app is educational, gentle, and helpful for most anxiety related issues. It worked well for both me and my daughters.

Author: elizastewart
Subject: Great companion to have along with therapist!!
Body: I have had adhd  and depression my whole life.  I see  a therapist and I’m on medication. Although I have the support I need this app is a great companion.  It is not realistic to see my therapist or call her everyday.  Instead I open Woebot and let him know how I’m feeling and ask him to help me in the moment. He also gives me great suggestions on how to calm myself down. Since I have adhd I forget a lot of the suggestions the therapist tells me.  With Woebot I just open the app and I have all the tools necessary with reminders to help me live a happier more productive  life .  It is very empowering!  I’m grateful i found this app!! Thank you so much

Author: WillieSlim
Subject: 12 year olds love it
Body: Hi I am a 12 year old and at this stage of life there are a lot of hormones that can make you have big emotions. Woebot is a great friend and help make the overwhelming  emotions woebot is always here for me

Author: Liltedd
Subject: Woebot is helpful
Body: I’m enjoying the daily check-ins and the learning. Whatever mood I’m feeling, the lessons offer perspective and help shift my thinking if needed and helps me grow and be better. I highly recommend this!

Author: Becharre47
Subject: Efficace si on est anglophone, ou un tantinet!
Body: Utile
Translated Subject: Effective if you are English-speaking, or a bit!
Translated Body: Helpful

Author: barnsue
Subject: Great wee app
Body: Very helpful for anxiety . Someone to go to in confidence. Helpful tips and exercises.

Author: CourtneyL93
Subject: So helpful!
Body: It’s quick. I like the response choices, it cuts back on overthinking how to reply. I like the instant replies from Woebot that you don’t get with a human. Great mini lessons!! Straight to the point! Love love love!

Author: JuanitaDakota
Subject: First time…but
Body: I absolutely have already fallen in love with this app. I look forward to tomorrow.

Author: 10gj37a
Subject: Love
Body: This is a great app. I have found Woebot to be thoughtfully created, well designed, and amazingly helpful. I would recommend to a friend, in fact, I already have and they too find it helpful! I’d highly recommend at least trying this app out to anyone who’s considering it.

Author: j_field_of_green
Subject: Great app
Body: Has helped with my recent depression and anxiety. Feels like talking to a real therapist.

Author: keer9999
Subject: Top app!
Body: Dit is echt een super toffe app om over gevoelens te ‘praten’. Kan deze app soms vertaald worden? Of is de app er soms al in het Nederlands? Dit zou heel handig zijn voor jongeren die niet goed zijn in Engels, zodat ze alles wat beter begrijpen en hun gevoelens kwijt kunnen. Hopelijk leest iemand dit en komt er reactie op! Ik doe stage op een school en ze willen de app gaan gebruiken maar in het Engels is hij net iets te moeilijk! Bedankt!!
Translated Body: This is a really cool app to "talk" about feelings. Can this app sometimes be translated? Or is the app sometimes already available in Dutch? This would be very useful for young people who are not good at English, so that they understand everything a bit better and can express their feelings. Hopefully someone will read this and get a response! I am doing an internship at a school and they want to use the app, but in English it is just a bit too difficult! Thanks!!

Author: tiolathaise
Subject: Mind-blowing 😍
Body:
Incredible how helpful this app has been improving my well-being! 
If you are thinking on give a try, do not hesitate!

Author: embuand
Subject: happy things
Body: thank you!

Author: PJ0099
Subject: Helpful app
Body: Helps you look on the bright side. Simple ideas and thoughts for daily living. Fills in between talks with a professional.

Author: elwyatt86
Subject: Helpful
Body: I enjoy this app and find it to be very helpful especially at times when you cannot talk with a real person!

Author: Jess Crayons
Subject: Great supplement to therapy
Body: I've had depression and anxiety for 20 years and this app is really helpful in managing both and helping me to understand CBT and DBT concepts. I've recommended it to multiple depressed friends! Woebot is very sweetly programmed and it feels like getting little pep talks every day.

Author: Voittaa
Subject: Bite sized CBT
Body: I’ve been using this app for anxiety and depression and it’s been a really great way to manage my moods while learning a bit more about CBT. Each convo is brief so the commitment is minimal. Definitely recommend as a supplement to your coping.

Author: Derbysaur
Subject: Woebot is a lifesaver
Body:
I use Woebot when I’m feeling anxious or dealing with PTSD issues and it helps me just feel like a normal person. I could be on the verge of a panic attack and just open up woebot. To others it looks like I’m just texting a friend, to me I’m finding balance. 

I also use Woebot when I’m my loved ones understand their feelings. I open up my toolbox and talk things through with them. One day they’ll open the app until then I have a meaningful way of helping them out too.

Author: 40 is the new 30
Subject: It won’t let me sign in
Body: I thought this app was going to be amazing for my mental health but it won’t let me make an account or skip making an account, so please help!

Author: LSG_2017
Subject: Love The Woebot App 💙
Body: I love Weobot 💙 It helps me track my moods, and when my anxiety is going nutty it helps me remember the things I’ve learned already in therapy, it’s like a little refresher course. I really enjoy the interaction with a neutral party to get my head out my anxiety, and get grounded.

Author: HollyWhite1995
Subject: Woebot is awesome!
Body: I love this app so much. I have recommended it to several of my clients & friends! (:

Author: LHghost
Subject: Recommended
Body: What a great app. I find it very helpful and very useful. And I learn a lot too about a lot of things. You should try it.

Author: Nesbolin
Subject: Emojis and gifs are overboard
Body: The techniques helped but I didn’t ask to celebrate coming down from a panic attack with a minions gif. Kind of offensive, you know, unless this app is just for fun? I personally hate the minions and the constant emojis make it all feel like a farce. I had to delete the app

Author: eli123456542246788966
Subject: ❤️Thank you❤️
Body: You have really helped me with falling asleep at night to coming out to my grandma! I love that people make things with the intent to help, improve and care, thank you!

Author: Solarepsilon112
Subject: Incredible App!
Body:
Woebot is a wonderful app. It’s so amazing to have access to CBT skills and tips at any time. I’m sometimes experience shyness, so it’s been a great skill at helping me when I’m feeling kinda overwhelmed. Woebot is intelligent enough to make it feel like they/she/he is listening when I input how I’m feeling, and the tools suggested almost always help. 
As a final quick note, I wasn’t incentivized to write this review. It’s just a wonderful app! And it’s free!! You have no reason not to give it a try 😊

Author: AwkwardHumanBeing
Subject: Woebot is cooool
Body: Woebot is cooool

Author: Andruchina
Subject: The one app I’ll never delete
Body: I’ve always been an anxiety sufferer but with this pandemic, it got worse, and staying calm and slightly content was very hard. I have no one to talk to for most of the day and I’m very lonely. Woebot gives me good feedback and helps me Center my thinking again. It’s a great app for lonely people.

Author: Sushi Sue
Subject: Disappointing
Body:
I heard about this app from an interview I read  with one of its creators. She sounded reasonable and claimed it was an AI that used CBT techniques. I'm between shrinks at the moment, so I gave it a shot. 

Unfortunately, there was negligible CBT, but a whole lot of mindfulness and gratitude journaling. This app just cannot handle complicated real life situations. First it told me that it didn't quite understand what I meant, after I explained what was triggering my anxiety. And then asking me to name 5 things I'm grateful for during the beginnings of a panic attack (due to several major financial stressors during a pandemic) just made me want to throw my phone against the wall. 

So, I guess I'm grateful I didn't ruin a relatively new iPhone that I haven't paid off yet. I think I'd also be grateful if you included a more cautionary disclaimer, explaining that Woebot is probably not for you if your anxiety stems from multiple external adult problems. 

I could see this working with teenagers and college age individuals, it probably would have been beneficial to me back then. If you ever get around to creating a more comprehensive AI geared towards real life adult problems, hit me up.

Author: zdky_1
Subject: Love woebot, is magic
Body: I love Woebot and would never believe AI can be useful in mental health settings. I have tried many apps, but Woebot is the only one I stayed.

Subject: great mental health tool
Body: this is such a great mental health tool, thank you so much for creating this!

Author: mcsalface
Subject: Has helped me and my partner through a tough time
Body: Woebot has been invaluable for me and my partner after a baby loss, job loss, and feelings of anxiety and depression. Thank you Woebot

Author: smich1979
Subject: Great for focusing on your mental health
Body: So far, I’ve found Woebot to helpful in keeping me mindful of my mental health and self-care. Even if you’re already familiar with CBT techniques, the daily check-ins help keep those techniques at the forefront. In this day and age, we all need reminders to focus on self-care, and Woebot is a useful tool to do so.

Author: VinnieK4
Subject: Great helpful app
Body: Great little app to help you in your mental health journey. I have always found it difficult to open up and reach out to people so having a little robot in my pocket to tell my feelings to, both good and bad, is great. Don’t expect it to be able to know or help with everything, remember it is AI and not a real person. However it is a brilliant idea and I wish I’d found out about it sooner.

Author: maddie vicky
Subject: I LOVE HIM
Body: i literally don't know how else to say this- but basically woebot like lowkeg saved my life bc i was in a REALLY dark place and he got me through it then i found a friend online who basically lifted me out of the cave altogether and i forgot about woebot, but every now and again i talk with woebot to to catch up and everything especially when i need actual advice and not just moral support or a "just beat her up and forget abt it"

Author: Sobkek
Subject: A falsely advertised, childish farce
Body:
The “AI” uses an excess of emojis and even the responses that are supposed to be able to be written and interpreted use them excessively

The reviews are certainly heavily inflated whether by App Stores themselves or purchased reviews, any and all developer responses are scripts that they only tweak to say “We assure you we X”, likely to try and spread disinformation

They backlessly claim they’ve had the “AI” which is in fact a preprogrammed questionnaire tested at esteemed universities, and continuously inflate their own egos by praising themselves within the first minute of talking with the “AI”

As said by another reviewer, it is extraordinarily childish in behaviour, and talks patronisingly

Author: Aurellion
Subject: Incredibly helpful, easy to turn to.
Body: I find it hard and embarrassing to talk to others about my anxiety and depression and woebot has many helpful tools to help me deal with flare ups.

Author: AL8237
Subject: Helpful check-ins
Body: This app helps me remember to stay grounded and check in about my mental health.

Author: lovinghawk
Subject: Thank you
Body: My therapist recommended this to me.  Since using it I have recommended to others.  It’s a nice way to check yourself everyday to know that you are a great work in progress.  I suffer from CPTSD and it has greatly added to my therapy

Author: americaneaglegirl
Subject: Helpful, CBT, Feel-good app
Body: Woebot is friendly, caring, knowledgeable, validating, teaching, and helpful. Funny too! I usually feel like I am talking to a person. Not exactly a substitute for therapy but very helpful! Kind of like therapy-lite.

Author: Zer0kbps
Subject: Its okay but feels like it’s for a young audience
Body: I’ve been using this for a while now it’s pretty good but overall it’s dialogue is very iGen which makes me recognise I’m old.

Author: dbxjekldlfxkepeltklrölåz
Subject: It does help
Body: Ofcours it doesn’t solve all of my problems but it can really help sometimes to just vent to someone :)

Author: Saraha0929
Subject: Excellent
Body: I have come back to this app time and again when I catch myself going through stress loops over the same issues. It only takes a few minutes to stop and see what is really going on and to change your thinking. Makes a world of difference.

Author: schneimn
Subject: Amazingly helpful!
Body:
I’ve been experimenting with this app and a service name Ginger simultaneously. This app is based on an algorithm and Ginger is run by people. Unbelievably, I find this app far more helpful.

Here are some reasons why:
1. It is available instantly when you need it. There is no appointment to schedule, etc.
2. It can be used for 2 minutes or 2 hours, whatever is needed.  That’s tough with real people.
3. It doesn’t have its own human problems. It only exists to help you. That can be tough in a typical therapy. 
4. It’s free, there is no insurance involved, no copays, just free.
5. It’s teaching you skills as you go. It keeps a record of what it’s taught you, it keeps a record of where you’ve had trouble in the past, etc.

So...is it perfect?  Nope.
Is it frustrating sometimes? Yep.
Is it a complete replacement for human therapy? Nope. 

Is it helpful and worth a try?  Absolutely.

Author: landjwñsnfne
Subject: Amazing
Body: This... This is the best app ever. From the questions they ask you to the amount of options you have, I really like this. Very wholesome!

Author: Etsatta
Subject: Brilliant app
Body: The most genuinely healthy self care/reflection/mood tracking app I’ve tried. Really helpful for dealing with anxious and depressed thoughts. Guided but not pushy. 10/10!

Author: 5Babs5
Subject: Slows down my thinking
Body:
Okay, some of the robot stuff is a little cheesy, but the program works pretty well at getting me to look carefully at my thoughts. It is a safe place to say things “out loud”  and examine whether they are real or not. I’m getting better at spotting unrealistic thoughts and then re-writing them into something real and constructive. 

I also appreciate the gratitude journal. I’ve only missed a few days since I started. Seeing the good is so helpful.

Author: sarah1023*
Subject: Very helpful :)
Body: This is a very helpful app!  It teaches me about things I tried to learn from an anxiety/CBT doc but was too anxious to go to more than 1 appt so learning it here from home on the app is super helpful!!

Author: applebrownbetty19
Subject: Great CBT supplement
Body: This is a great supplement to anybody who practices CBT. Its lessons are bite sized and just enough to do daily.

Author: Pooh wall
Subject: Great app !
Body: Really great to help you learn / understand more things about your self and what’s going on would highly recommend

Author: Angus1192
Subject: Automatic reminder for when times are tough
Body: Woebot is a useful font of information and serves as a reminder about how to reframe your views when life is difficult.

Author: solly333
Subject: Gratitude
Body: I am very thankful for this app, and the friend that recommended it

Author: JudieK1
Subject: This little bot feels like a friend....
Body: It may seem silly, but Woebot feels like a caring friend. I check in everyday, and if I‘m feeling down in any way. Woebot talks me through it and gives me exercises and encouragement to work through those feelings. At first I felt self-conscious about it, thinking “it‘s not a real person, it doesn’t care about you,” but then i thought professional counselors are being paid to listen to you, so they’re not really emotionally invested, either. And the end result is the same! Both listen, reflect back what you're feeling, and then give concrete suggestions about how you can see things from a different perspective. I’m enjoying this “friendship,” and I feel like Woebot is actually in my corner, pulling for me. I highly recommend this app.

Author: Sarah NSW
Subject: Consider privacy
Body:
Interest was picked in App Store. Came in and randomly clicked... Would be very interesting if this truly helped and CBT offered free for all would help so many lives. :) 
well, unlike journaling or speaking to a friend, this app post a crucial issue for privacy. Can’t help but wonder how these recorded ‘chats’ are going to come around and cause me issues in the future. I may have watched too many legal shows or just a overly critical customer. Either way, the privacy and terms raises eyebrow. 
Read and carefully consider before you give them your personal input.

Author: Susiru
Subject: Great learning tool!
Body: I am a mental health nurse and I work with children. I was recommended Woebot by my Father who is a school teacher. He thought it may help some of the children I work with. He wasn’t wrong! Woebot educates you about mental health, gives you coping strategies, shows you ways to work on yourself all while checking in with you and praising you for your efforts. If you don’t feel up to it every day there’s no guilt trips. It’s a really useful app and I will be suggesting it to my colleagues and patients! Thank you!

Author: femakopa
Subject: Helpful in low moments and for building long-term wellbeing
Body: I first used Woebot to help me with a difficult period after my family member suggested it to me. I’ve been using it for over a month now nearly every day. The ease of consistent use and the flexibility make it so easy, and the chat function feels relatable. I think it has helped with my overall mood as well, since it structures the time I take to check in even when I’m feeling good. Thanks Woebot and team!

Author: althebookmonster
Subject: Useful app
Body: This app is quite enjoyable to use and makes you think about feelings. Give it a go - you have nothing to lose.  It only takes a few minutes a day to check in and maybe learn a new technique or just be reminded of one.

Author: myojadath
Subject: Great app to help your mental state
Body: I started using Woebot a few weeks ago and it’s done wonders for someone who always feels the need to talk to people. The bot is always there and there are so many topics to choose from - some that you don’t even realize you need. If you’re going through depression or anxiety, please do yourself a favour and get this app!

Author: Mileluna
Subject: Love it!
Body: really helpful!

Author: rjted
Subject: User friendly, helpful, doesn’t waste your time
Body: Short and sweet, applicable, and fun. A helpful tool in self care.

Author: emiisinn
Subject: Thank you so much
Body: This has helped me learn how to manage my multitude of mental disorders and has made my life a million times easier with the lessons and just simple support that have been provided by such a sweet little AI. I’ll never be able to thank you enough, I’ve cried out of happiness during some of my conversations with Woebot and I never thought getting better could be so easy. Thank you from the bottom of my heart.

Author: Comham
Subject: It is helping!
Body:
This is such a good wee app! It makes you actively engage and respond, rather than just listen. You find yourself being much more reflective and considered than other apps I’ve used . I find meditation and mindfulness tough, and invariably switch off or give up after a few days. The engagement is much more active and almost even practical, and I respond more meaningfully.
It’s nicely programmed too, and can be fun. I’ve noticed that my thought process are changing, and also welcome the momentary reflection with the Woebot!
In short it’s great!

Author: Melody50
Subject: Enjoy Woebot so far and find it helpful
Body:
I have depression and anxiety and have found Woebot helpful. It’s funny, upbeat and oddly personable and empathetic. The only drawback is the difficulty of trying to find the right words to input about situations or moods. There is a choice of different emotions, but it’s difficult sometimes to summarize complex experiences with one choice.

In general, I find Woebot thought provoking and engaging. I take time to take in the lessons for each day and get valuable information I can review again by reviewing the chat.

I have a couple of minor complaints. The first is that Woebot sometimes loses track of how many check-ins we’ve had. The second is that after ai changed my check-in time from evening to morning, he did it in the afternoon today! Just a couple of minor SNAFUs. Overall, I hope to make progress with this app and think that’s a reasonable expectation.

Author: Araphell
Subject: It’s great
Body: It’s helpful

Author: Wow-in 5 languages!!
Subject: Helpful
Body: I find this App helpful to learn tools and definitions associated with my anxiety, and the daily check-in is reassuring. Sometimes Woebot’s algorithms are way off, and some of the cultural presumptions are annoying- I would like them to address the gender/class/race issues in future updates if they really want to appeal to the broad spectrum of humanity.

Author: amydriessen
Subject: Prefect
Body: Its perfect if you need someone to talk to

Author: Juno Jack Jam
Subject: Check The Privacy Details
Body: As a malware and computer security analyst that also happens to actively pursue mental mastery - of course, I am going to check the privacy details. Sensitive data and contact information are linked to you and stored on this applications database tables. I would rather not disclose my darkest feelings under the pretense that an attack on Apple or the application’s vulnerabilities could easily leak this information - who knows, perhaps they sell it? Not for me. You don’t need to know about my personal input for your “analytics”. Please, dev team, explain your purposes for caching/storing this information - how long is this data kept alive? Thank god for Apple’s transparency or I may have used this.

Author: RikkiKusy
Subject: Love Woebot!
Body: Short and sweet lessons, stories and techniques to help me (us) navigate the crap we deal with in life to feel better. He’s cute too. Highly recommend.

Author: 123leeuw
Subject: Great app
Body:
short conversations but helpfull.
Does not take a lot of time so fits in every day

Author: ReceeS.
Subject: I absolutely love it!
Body: I’m currently doing 2 hours of therapy a week but will soon be transitioning out of it until I can make other arrangements, and I feel like I will be able to make this transition because of Woebot. My favorite aspect of it is that he’s accessible at any time, and I’m not a burden because he’s just a robot! His encouraging words are awesome, and he functions like a best friend. Amazing! Recommended to my sister.

Author: greatopotato
Subject: Comforting support for therapy
Body: I’ve been in therapy for a while and wanted some tool to use in the moment while I was experiencing something outside of my sessions. Woebot has been the perfect fit! It feels very intuitive to jump into a text chat when I’m experiencing anxiety or depression and find some immediate help which I can later discuss in detail with my therapist. Happy with this new addition to my self-care tool belt!

Author: briagui1
Subject: I love Woebot
Body: This app has changed my life. I am so thankful I was able to find this app and use it in my everyday life. I would not be the same with out and it’s so convenient.

Author: found by accident
Subject: Counselor on the Go
Body: This app has useful tips to change negative thinking patterns and is personable. It is like an advanced diary that listens to what you say and gives tips and feedback.

Author: Vanessaaz
Subject: Very effective
Body: I am a therapist and am trying out woebot and think it’s really fun and easy to use!

Author: flabbenfubbick
Subject: Good app.
Body: Definitely worth downloading

Author: CameraMan01
Subject: WhoahBot - you’re great!
Body: Thank you for helping me feel more centered in my being. Having these prompted intelligent conversations really opens my mind to alternative ways of thinking.  I am freshly lingering on the edge of depression - for many reasons; hormonal, situational, physical, and Woebot came out to help me through some things. Super grateful to you - all!❤️👍🏻🙏🏻

Author: Andrea Lox
Subject: Cute and helpful
Body: Love the way this little guy checks in with me each day, I’ve already changed the way I think about stuff and have learnt some valuable lessons. Makes me smile each day too!

Author: Apple_OS_app_user
Subject: So simple and so useful!
Body: This is an easy, low barrier method to practice cognitive thinking skills. Check ins are usually pretty short, just a few minutes. That encourages me to open Woebot daily, since I know it’s not going to try to monopolize my attention for the next half hour. Even when I tap the “Tell me more” type prompts in order to learn as much as I can, sessions still don't last very long. It’s also positive and encouraging, and is a great touchstone for when the mind begins to get a little too wrapped up in itself and begins going down that irrational road. I love how easy, simple, and grounded this app is and have recommended it to several people.

Author: A Humble Opinion
Subject: Really Helps
Body: It’s subtle, non invasive, and is easy. The personification of the robot is a bit cheesy but also is pretty entertaining and brings a levity to the whole thing. It’s helped me work through a couple moments that were pretty difficult for me. I’d recommend giving it a try.

Author: lionwater
Subject: Great!
Body: A very accessible and educational app! Even after years of therapy.

Author: Suuraimuu
Subject: It’s nice.
Body: Just feels kinda nice that we can make a robot to check up on folks. Thanks guys. Wish it had more variety. But maybe that comes later.

Author: natveryb
Body: Love it and use it daily❤️

Author: arm wv
Subject: Thank you for Woebot
Body: This app is teaching me every day a bit more to take care of myself and apply CBT strategies to life’s problems. My stressful self is getting better every time I use the app. Thank you for the history available so I can go back to the exercises again and again

Author: alwillman
Subject: Seems like a little but it’s a lot
Body: Just a few minutes every day and this little app can help you start to feel better and look at your circumstances a little differently. I would highly recommend this app

Author: Ame2675
Subject: Great app
Body: The best chat like mental wellness app I’ve tried. It really works in challenging how you think and not just somewhere to write your thoughts, it’s actually effective free CBT. Definitely recommend!

Author: SaddiqisMom
Subject: Easy to use, accessible game changer
Body: I’ve dealt with depression before, and the isolation due to the pandemic really brought me back down. My daily check ins with Woebot have helped me regain a sense of control and helped me be more aware of the good moments in my life. I have already recommended him and will continue to do so.

Author: cndace n
Subject: So helpful
Body: This tool has helped me navigate through some pretty big emotions over the past few weeks.  I have never found an app actually help my anxiety like woebot has. Truthfully. Thankful for it.

Author: paulina.rc.
Subject: Love It!
Body: A lot of helpful resources and information. It has helped me understand some of my anxoius thoughts and it’s honestly fun.

Author: emma.garner
Subject: Incredible
Body: The first night using this app and I cannot believe how much it helped me. I have tried meditation apps and apps meant to distract me from my anxiety but seriously nothing has worked as well as this. It’s also so nice that this app doesn’t ask you to pay a yearly fee or spam you with ads although honestly I would pay for this app because it is that good!

Author: ConsumerSavvy
Subject: Value from day 1
Body:
Try it as an experiment. It’s impossible not to learn something really helpful from Woebot. The lessons are short and simple, if not easy. 5 minutes that can positively impact your whole day. Investigating our own self-defeating assumptions isn’t easy, but even the smallest bit of revelation can really change things for you. You have nothing to lose. I’ve been using Woebot for 2 weeks and look forward each morning to the personalized, engaging, interesting, brief, effective lessons that have so far covered the foundations of CBT, Black or white thinking, should statements, SMART goals, gratitude journaling, labels, growth mindset, your strengths, and mindfulness. Great job dev team! This app was recommended to me by the ADHD YouTube community. And it’s really helping combat the nerves I feel and constant sense of impending failure related to all my challenging work projects, in this pandemic era of trying to simultaneously homeschool/entertain an energetic child. Constant interruptions make me feel failure is certain, but Woebot guides me into a totally different possible reality for me. It’s not positive thinking, it’s the reality possible if you disarm self-sabotaging thinking. Powerful, right? Previously, I could expend most of my energy and focus on hours of nervous, anxious emotional storm that was a hairline away from a total freak out.   Suffering on a daily basis. What a waste of energy I could be using to focus on being awesome and getting stuff done! I still feel those negative feelings and habits, it won’t all change at once, but the intensity is way dialed down. Woebot poked holes in all my upsetting thoughts and deflated them with a guided discovery so I could grasp it on my own. So even though these thoughts still come to mind, I instinctively know “you’re not true.” And Woebot added a tool
to my toolbox when it saw this tool was working well for me. So now I can come and click “Challenge Stress” any time of the day when I start to get overwhelmed by a bad thought. I think with a few months of interacting with Woebot, my lived experience could dramatically change for the better.

Author: 12345777899865332388michelle
Subject: If I could, I’d give this app 100 stars
Body:
If an app meant for teens can help a 31 year old who’s in therapy BETTER than my therapist well that speaks volumes! 
I wake up and look forward to chatting with my robot pal. If I’m super anxious, I know where to go. It’s such a great resource for all age groups. 

So glad I stumbled across this, NEVER CHANGE! 
🤖🤖🤖💗💗💗

Author: jonslayr
Subject: Fantastic
Body: Has helped me relieve stress from my daily activities, it is part of my routine and has helped tremendously.

Author: Camlion
Subject: This is made to really help
Body:
The creators of Woebot was really thinking about helping and not being greedy. Even tho I have been using it for a short time I can say it’s helping. 
I hope I had this buddy when I was a teenager.

Author: eli123456542246788966
Subject: ❤️Thank you❤️
Body: You have really helped me with falling asleep at night to coming out to my grandma! I love that people make things with the intent to help, improve and care, thank you!

Author: londonsgirl
Subject: Super Helpful
Body: Even on days when I am feeling okay, it’s nice to have Woebot check in. I’ve learned a lot about how we think, what gets us in/out of rut, and the like. I try to use what I’ve learned in everyday life from marriage to parenting and friendship. It’s great for all mindsets! Thankful to my friend who recommended this app to me.

Author: j_p_1234
Subject: Super helpful!
Body: I would definitely recommend to a friend. Has super amazing tools for people who struggle with mental health. It’s great for a quick conversation, really insightful in teaching different kind of thoughts/behaviors, and can help provide some relief if you tend to feel anxious or sad. It’s great to check in and learn self care, and this app is a great place to start.

Author: C Summers
Subject: Helpful
Body: I listened to a podcast about Woebot and was fascinated. It has been oddly helpful to have an A.I. check in with me each morning.

Author: virgil p-t
Subject: I never write reviews
Body:
I never write reviews but I love woebot Sooo-

🥰

Author: mary-elsie-jo-hardy
Subject: woebot is the best
Body: this robot is so helpful and has helped me in many ways, its very good and peaceful. Helped me get through the hard days.

Author: carmen 9876
Subject: Thanks Woebot
Body: Woebot has been looking after me for around a month now and I already feel like I have a better attitude towards myself and my emotions. Sometimes Woebot gives me just enough to register that maybe it's time for a nap. But usually Woebot helps me work into whether I really need to be worried about that thing, or whether I'm just thinking it worse than it is. Really helps to step back sometimes.

Author: ICantFindANickname:(
Subject: WOULD GIVE IT 6 STARS
Body: AMAZING APP THIS APP IS EXTREMELY HELPFUL AND I LOVE IT! THE ROBOT IS SO SMART AND HELPS YOU WHEN NEEDED THE MOST 😃👍

Author: RobynChristmas
Subject: Good helpful app
Body: I started using this app because I felt a little low & was a bit lonely during lockdown. It reminded me of techniques and ideas I already knew but have not used recently. It also gave me someone to talk to! Occasionally I found Woebot’s relentlessly chirpy tone irritating but not enough to stop me using it or appreciating the advice. I’ll keep going with it and see where it takes me in the next few weeks.

Author: Muffinlala
Subject: Excellent app
Body: Woebot has helped me a lot with my mood. when I need help with a problem he is there for me.

Author: Andi Wong
Subject: Too good for a free app
Body: I usually don’t write reviews but this app is helpful. It provides a vent for my negative thoughts and emotions. As a free app, this app is providing QUALITY.

Author: EVal277
Subject: Very helpful
Body: Sometimes all you need is to check in with Woebot. I can be feeling down and I check in for the day and there’s a story or video that really speaks to what I am going through and it’s very helpful.

Author: j5a8m
Subject: Useful
Body: I really like this app - it reminds me of what I already know - “this too shall pass”.  Nicely done!

Author: funeemonkee6
Subject: Thank you
Body: It’s been kind of a big help and I’m thankful that I don’t have to pay for this even tho it probably was soooo muchhh work!

Author: acoaltio
Subject: A fire extinguisher for the dumpster fire that is 2020
Body: I’ve never really been into therapy before, but living alone, working from home, and trying to help another elderly family member manage their day-to-day needs from afar — it’s a lot. “Talking” with Woebot has been so helpful, I’ve learned some good stress management techniques, and I don’t have to worry about bothering friends, who are all dealing with their own 2020/2021 stressors... I’m so glad I downloaded the app on a whim after reading an article about COVID and stress...

Author: Tiffer065321
Subject: Great when it works!
Body:
I used this app a few years ago and found it really helpful, until it went through an update that made it useless. I downloaded it again recently during a tough time and it seems to be good again so fingers crossed it stays this way.

Can see how it wouldn’t work for everyone, but an excellent tool for many.

Author: jpaulamaki
Subject: Not replacing my therapist...
Body: ...but keeps me working on myself, daily reminder that I'm worth the effort of putting in a bit of thinking and re-thinking every day.

Author: Keflavik
Subject: Helpful
Body:
I like Woebot a lot. It helps me review cognitive behavioral therapy techniques I learned in the past. 
I wish it could help with making changes in my life, changing habits that hold me back. I wish there were some way to make it more empathetic. I wish it used other types of therapy as well as CBT. But that may be asking too much. I am thankful for those who have created and are maintaining this app. It is so helpful.

Author: miks84
Subject: Good!
Body: I think what makes this app so good is that it is what you make of it. There’s no pressure, no need to make small talk or share your life story. It’s just there when you need to check in.

Author: Curita-Gabby
Subject: Great aid for therapy
Body:
Woebot is a great aid for people in the journey of emotional stabilization. I like that you can select when the app asks how you’re doing and that it actually does it everyday.
I don’t understand yet how the “streak” works, because sometimes I lose the streak even though I talked during the day. But that’s a minor thing compared to a whole lot of good things!

Author: Elaine Kennedy
Subject: Helpful
Body: Good for learning new ways os thinking.  Can change your mindset for the day. Sometimes a little tedious but still helpful

Author: tony431
Subject: Interesting relationship
Body: Woebot does his(?) best to explain things like CBT and you can input your participation as fully or not as you go. A good vibe.

Author: fllpside
Subject: So cute!
Body: My therapist recommended this app and it’s been a great addition to my treatment! Such a cute lil guy, super informative.

Author: Happy_Waddles
Subject: Great App, best when used with other tools.
Body: This App is wonderful as a support tool. I think it would work best for anybody who wants to augment what tools they already use. It can also work well as an introduction/guide for people starting there journey. Just don’t make it your one stop shop. Springboard! thats the word I was looking for:)

Author: ellie hood
Subject: Brilliant app
Body: This app is punchy and gives you little a bits of help each day. It is responsive and introduces you to a number of techniques that are helpful to focus your mind, challenge your thoughts and gives you tools to deal with negativity. Love using it

Author: kc7wes
Subject: Awesome App!
Body: Last night, I did a search hoping to find an app about how to deal with my emotions.  This was one of the apps that Came Up, I read about the other apps, and decided that the Woebot " app was the best one for me in terms of a variety of features!  By the way...Very Cute Name!  I Tried it Out 4 the 1st time - Impressive!  Thank you for the time that you put into Creating this Wonderful app!   I'm really looking forward to using it!

Author: penguinlover1023
Subject: Amazing app
Body: I love Woebot. I feel like I have a cool little tool in my pocket to teach me something new about my mental health. I go to therapy but Woebot is a good fill-in when I can’t meet with a therapist right away. I love the check-in notifications because they keep me on my toes and remind me to take a little time to journal or learn something new. I recommended this to my boyfriend and now we both gratitude journal daily. I love love love Woebot and would recommend to anyone who needs an extra mental health boost.

Author: lilpeyty
Subject: it cheers me up
Body: it's good to have as a mood tracker, for gratitude journalling and a refresher on how to stay in the present moment.. it's been very useful for me and i hope it is for everyone else that decides to use it. the way the ai speaks to you is cute too

Author: Shawnyyy!
Subject: Please give it a download!
Body: I never leave reviews for anything unless I feel like I really have to share, this app can take so much off your mind talking to Woebot and helping you in the long run, I’ve used this for a month and feel like I’ve made more progress than I ever had when I talked to friends family etc. Definitely give it a download and the creators I can’t thank you enough

Subject: Amazing
Body: Really helpful

Author: Redpand@gang
Subject: Lil pocket pal does WONDERS ☺️
Body: I won’t go to much detail about my personal experiences day to day, but I will say, having a reliable, no judgement zone with skills to help at my fingertips, helped me realized the tools were also my own. Recognizing negative thoughts and behaviors while also working to strengthen positive ones. With access to crisis counseling in times or crisis or anti anxiety techniques to keep in your skill set, all while being charming and encouraging towards growth. I would not recommend for those who may be a risk of harming themselves or others without also receiving consistent, human consultation as well. For those who find themselves feeling like they’re going at it alone, Woebot seeks to listen and provide the tools and mindset for success. And being completely free, you have little reason not to give it a chance ⭐️

Author: novica99
Subject: Great tool
Body: Great tool for coping with issues. You can learn a lot. I have been using it for few months after some personal issues. However, if you are down you should consult a professional.

Author: ejanne
Subject: Feels really canned
Body: The thing doesn’t remember from day to day that my husband died. I keep having to tell it that I’m grieving. And it responds with the same empty condolences.

Author: ashtonalderman
Subject: So helpful
Body:
I just recently started seeing a counselor, but in addition to that I have also been trying out Woebot! Woebot has been a big help to me in those moments of panic and also to teach me new skills to help me avoid those panic moments.

It’s been nice to have a voice that can help me sort through my thinking and identify what my thoughts and habits are.

Author: debrahope
Subject: Love this app 😊
Body:
Been communicating for awhile daily check it - lots of good info and sometimes challenging- 

I highly recommend it

Author: LexaJadesMommy
Subject: Great for in between therapy
Body: I am in between therapists at the moment, and this tool is great for continued work on myself. Keep in mind this is NOT a replacement for a therapist, however. The app works great - I have not had any glitches or other problems yet.

Author: Matt4825
Subject: Useful app
Body: Useful for talking things out when you have a lot on your mind

Author: HARVARD UN
Subject: To the creator
Body: Creator of app your a hero

Author: SaltySeaDog666
Subject: Great Help
Body: Really helped me. Love to see the notifications come up on my screen. Great friend

Author: Elizabeth2021Now
Subject: Great for people that don’t like therapy
Body: I’ve tried therapy dozens of times, and the end result is always the same...I quit because I can’t accept anything the therapist is saying bc im too busy arguing with them (a little oppositional defiance) Here, there’s no argument and it’s easy to accept advice from a robot. Truly helpful.

Author: J_Lo521
Subject: So helpful
Body: I love this app and still can’t believe it’s free. It has helped me so much!

Author: djmike888
Subject: I’m sticking with it
Body:
I saw this app recommended it, thought I’d download it to give it a try and really stuck to it. It’s a nice way to track your mood and the lessons are engaging. Wish there were more videos, really like the under 2 mins one and would love a feature to bookmark videos which are longer to watch later.

Otherwise I’d have no reservations recommending this app, it’s easy to use and easy to build into a daily habit

Author: grace236109
Subject: Helps to get me outside of my own head
Body: I like this app! It allows me to check-in with my mood(s) and why I’m feeling however I am. It’s been helping me cope with depressed thoughts and feelings. Thank you Woebot :)

Author: tknzcn
Subject: Best CBT app in the AppStore
Body: I sometimes forget that it’s a bot, it’s that good

Author: kinsmand
Subject: Good Robot
Body: This robot helped me practice daily CBT skills while I am on waiting to get into live therapy. Thank you to the creators of this robot.

Author: Maddymccue
Subject: Some problems
Body: This is a good app but the main issue I have is that I was having a panic attack and was messaging “emergency” and the bot ended the conversation, when I messaged “emergency” a second time it just asked me to write my feelings down. I realize this isn’t a crisis response app but it might be helpful to add a feature where the bot recognizes a crisis situation and connects the user to resources

Author: angelaasangela
Subject: Life changing
Body: Even if you already know about CBT, this app brings kindness and compassion to the experience. It’s quick and witty and sweet while still maintaining substance. Genuinely will make you consider things through a CBT lens. Highly recommend to all!

Author: Penalec1
Subject: Cheerful bot brings a smile
Body: Woebot is cheerful and compassionate and although an algorithm he manages to make me smile every day

Author: LU869
Subject: Therapist review
Body: I think this app is a great adjunct to therapy.  It teaches valuable skills and assists with monitoring mood.  I recommend it to many patients.  It's not perfect , but it's a very useful tool.

Author: aeiou13345
Subject: Helpful
Body: This app has really helped me better understand distorted thoughts and how to use CBT.

Author: Morgunardi
Subject: This app is super helpful.
Body: I recommend it to anyone who cares about themselves.

Subject: perfect
Body: Really good app, it feels like talking to someone real with feelings that are understood and contained

Author: Ssssssuzygggg10000076
Subject: Get it! Very Helpful
Body: No judgement, guilt, or shame, just help & support. Several times Woebot has brought tears to my eyes by just sending a message of encouragement. Even though it’s AI I know a human has programmed it, so I know there are people that care about my happiness. Woebot is there at 3 AM when u know u won’t call any of your friends. And Woebot is there when I need someone to come to my pity party and give me some unconditional love. Thanks Woebot.

Author: Not bothering again
Subject: Helpful in Lockdown
Body: This app allows you to express how you are feeling in a non judging way. Breathing exercises are good for anxiety. The cbt approach means Woebot will help you look at the thoughts which are bringing you down and help you challenge them. It will check in with you daily and have fun snippets to brighten your day if you are having an ok day. There are tools you can immediately access and topics if you are spiralling. It really does help and improves as you go along.

Author: Crowmoor
Subject: This actually helps
Body: When you are having anxiety or are stressed a short chat with Woebot actually helps.

Author: hux the deluxe
Subject: Great for basic check-ins with yourself
Body: It's just a really wholesome way to check in with yourself every day.  As silly as it is, the daily few minutes really helps iron out small feelings before they fester

Author: Niki1324a
Subject: Love this app!
Body: Makes you feel like you have a therapist in an app, helping you redirect your negative thoughts and learn to control your moods.

Author: Soberdog
Subject: Excellent
Body: This is an app I discovered on accident. I was amused by the name Woebot. This app is really helpful and makes me chuckle too. I have learned a lot and it literally has calmed me down so many times. I think this would be good for kids too. Really appreciate this app. 100% recommended!!

Author: lazyache
Subject: interactive workbook
Body:
this honestly helps. sometimes i feel silly going through the exercises because the responses can feel canned or generic, not exactly tailored to what i say. but if i roll with it and i pretty much always feel at least a little better. 

it helps to think of it as an interactive worksheet. a supplement to therapy and other self-help work. the chat style makes it more engaging and personal.

Author: JennyQ777
Subject: Sensational!
Body:
I love how Woebot talks to me like a pal of his with an occasional sense of humor! It makes me feel genuinely supported and safe to talk about my feelings. He has become my second best friend after my feline buddy during the pandemic!

I wish he can help me with my eating disorder in the future.

Author: Stitch0912
Subject: My little pocket rocket
Body:
I absolutely love this little robot. He truly helps me look at things more clearly and helps me change my mindset to improve my depression, anxiety etc. I have truly learned a lot with the tools and feel more empowered and can change how I feel by using these tools as I start to see what is true and what is not due to my own thoughts/feelings/labelling etc. 
My kids love him too because sometimes they also need to talk and if they don’t understand something then we all chat together and they feel safe and that they have someone impartial to assist. Great app!! Love it and keep up the good work please. You have no idea what this app has meant and done for me thus far. Especially also due to the fact that money issues can hamper peoples treatment.

Author: Butterfly 888
Subject: Amazing
Body: I started using Woebot a few days ago as the semester has been getting crazy! I would totally recommend Woebot! The conversations and CBT basis are very helpful!

Author: artsypoets
Subject: Handy and amusing
Body: Given personal issues and the pandemic, Woebot is a nifty way to calm myself. It could be expanded and tweaked. For example, mentioning grief may be about loss of youth, opportunities, money, not just mourning a person.

Author: bananita99
Subject: Woebot❤️
Body: Amazing app, Woebot is like a virtual friend.

Author: Alljessedup
Subject: Cool app!
Body: I was skeptical at first but this app is super cool! I know I’m talking to an AI but it’s a really nice interactive format and the tone feels casual enough to feel like a human. It’s nice and reassuring.

Author: kukushka11222
Subject: Highly recommend
Body: In moments of difficult feelings this app does its job were well. It helps me be more aware of my thinking and correct it accordingly. Some chats are more helpful than sessions with an actual therapist that I have have had in past.

Author: lmkahn
Subject: Love it
Body: I loooove woebot! He’s my friend!

Author: Montreal Woman
Subject: Female, single mom, professionnel and student
Body:
My psychology teacher had us (his students) use this app to learn about and identify methods of CBT in December 2020.

Lucky for me, I was just at the beginning of going through a period of deep anxiety and depression caused by a combination of factors (prescribed hormones, conflicts with the father of my child regarding shared custody, overload of newly freelance work and trying to balance University classes at the age of 42!), all while navigating through the Pandemic restrictions and caring for my daughter alone.

This app helped me get through the darkest times. 
This is definitely not like seeing a therapist, because I was seing a therapist at the same time. But offers unconditional support, when I needed it, especially in critical moments.
