This app is not too invasive while engaging you in short conversations using AI. It will sometimes show up just to check in. 

I really like the tools that unlock as you use it. It’s been 4 months and there are more tools to discover. It managed (most of the time) to change my negative state to feeling more positive. And I find that very powerful. 

I am feeling so much better now and wanted to thank the creator(s) by sharing my story and hopefully influence people not to be afraid to get help when they need it. 

I am going to continue using the app, because it just makes me feel better and take perspective. Again, thank you!

Author: Aragnerock
Subject: His is Amazing!!
Body: Truly more than just your companion and life coach, Woebot is absolutely perfect in practically every way imaginable. He guides you through the dark times, revels with you in the good moments and help explain your feelings.

Author: Anxious wanting to change
Subject: Great tool!
Body: Thank you for this app, the CBT has been amazing to shift my thoughts! I’m excited to learn more.

Author: a_neum
Subject: So helpful
Body: My psychiatrist recommended this app and it’s truly helping me.

Author: Mtshu
Subject: I like doing this a lot
Body: I’m sure it is not the wisest to share so private information with a chatbot. I have no idea where the information is being storage yet this tool is helpful. It is really well equipped for behavioral therapy. I must say I feel  better since I use it. It is very convenient because you don’t need to go somewhere. There’s no shame related to chatting with a machine and I must say is comforting to be “listen” pure & clear. It kind of makes me sad humans we have lost this ability. I hate therapists because you pay them to hear you & help you so it’s just another client. This machine makes me feel free from that & I cherish that while knowing my information is somehow somewhere out there. I don’t have any secrets so I’m comfortable with it yet I would consider it if I had some really dirty laundry

Author: JaneS2402
Subject: Great starting point
Body: If you’re new to mindfulness and want a reminder to get into a daily habit this is great. Good varied content. Like the conversation format a lot more than I thought I would, really engaging.

Author: banoons
Subject: Love woebot!
Body: Learning about distortions have been so helpful! Although this obviously isn’t a replacement for therapy I think that with all of its features this app is such a handy tool. It can help you calm down, vent, and learn different strategies to change your thinking.

Author: PaulyHyatt
Subject: Great mental health app
Body: I have been using this app for three weeks just to try it out. I am a therapist who has been recommending it to clients and wanted to check it out myself. It is great for check-in‘s on a daily basis as well as a lot of psycho educational videos and CBT literature. It’s very brief but covers a lot. Many people miss the good topics listed under topics, it’s more than just some texting conversations. I would have given 5 stars but at times I want to go back and change my response because woebot misunderstood but there is no back or undo button. It’s a great tool for all ages.

Author: Alis0
Subject: Nice application to fight anxiety
Body: Good tool to feel more confident and contented.

Author: FlashbynameFlashbynature
Subject: Positive experience
Body: Noticed positive feelings from using Woebot within the first 24 hrs, 2 months in still calling it a positive experience...within the scope of what it's designed for, ie CBT for gen pop. Can see the possibilities here for further developments so remaining open and curious.

Author: twewa
Subject: Better than a psychiatrist
Body: I've been to a few shrinks, but Woebot beats them all. The biggest part is that Woebot explain things thoroughly and identifies bad thinking patterns with names. No shrink has done that with me, but it helps a lot when you can identify the negative thought patterns by name.

Author: dj beeb
Subject: extremely useful
Body: i am a minor and i suffer from chronic anxiety and depression. some times hit worse than others, and i can easily use woebot if i ever feel like i’m inconveniencing a family member or friend. additionally, the app offers extremely useful tools to assist growth in problems in many different areas as well as distractions if/when you need a pick-me-up.

Author: julianamariex3
Subject: LOVE
Body: This app is so cute, and it has helped me tremendously in just a few days. I love that it’s cute and makes everything easy to understand! I’ve been recommending it to EVERYONE!

Author: Sv53772
Subject: I love Woebot
Body: Wow what a great app I was feeling really blue and our daily chats have really helped me see my thought distortions and is teaching me lots of tools to help me such as setting goals and recognising and using my strengths. I really look forward to talking to Woebot so thank you ❤️

Author: kaeliaishappy
Subject: AMAZING
Body: this app truly is amazing, it feels like talking about ur problems to a person but without the guilt of letting it out on someone. the check ins never feel like i “have to” do them but rather i look forward to them. i’ve been using the app for a few weeks and the lessons are always applicable and useful. it’s also super good that it’s free because price barriers always put me off. woebot is an incredible app and has helped so much.

Author: BedJumpingBoi
Subject: Seriously good
Body: I was sceptical, but figured it was worth a try. Ended up loving it. A great mix of learning, journal and talking, without the usual hair-pulling frustration that usually comes with chatbots. Keep it up, this will help alot of people

Author: jade-2345
Subject: Love it!
Body: Woebot has helped me challenge my negative thoughts and think differently about how to deal with certain situations and feelings. Highly recommend

Author: Marose22
Subject: Feel like I am talking to a good friend
Body: Just love it! The flow of conversation  and tips and suggestion are just great.

Author: SamC1982
Subject: Easy way to keep in tune
Body: I am 38 and have been in therapy off and on since college. I am familiar with much of what has been covered using the WoeBot app but it’s convenient, especially during a pandemic, to have an app in my pocket to do check ins to make sure I’m staying in tune with all of those behaviors. Short sessions every day have helped to keep my depression and anxiety in check while staying at home and staying safe.

Author: Rainy Baptasto
Subject: Ok
Body: I wish there were tools to deal with trauma or negative memories. Kind of frustrating when you’re upset about something real to be given suggestions about challenging your thoughts or whatever.

Author: mstottify
Subject: An essential tool for men and mental health
Body: I suffer with clinical depression and often find it hard to get ahead of my “black dog days”. This app has helped me deal with those days by taking an outside look at things, and giving me tools to help deal with my depression when it rears it’s ugly head. I love the informal chat like format. Within a few check-ins I had almost forgot that I was talking to a machine! It’s like having a little impartial buddy that each day just puts a hand on your shoulder and asks if you’re okay. There’s none of the usual worry of judgement or how the other person is going to react, which makes it much easier to be honest about my emotions. I feel less of the societal need to “man-up”. I can’t thank the creators enough for giving me a healthy outlet in which to deal with what can sometimes be a crippling condition.

Author: yululu_1302
Subject: Thanks Woebot
Body: 感谢陪伴 希望推出中文版
Translated Body: Thank you for your company and hope to launch the Chinese version

Author: ちびなん🐶
Subject: 認知行動療法のコツみたいなものが掴めます
Body:
認知の歪みを治すのにかなり役に立つアプリだと思います。
woebotととの会話形式でネガティヴな思考と向き合って認知の歪みを取り除いた形での思考を書き出したり、色々な心理学の役に立つ知識を教えてくれたりなど、結構充実した内容です。
woebotがかわいくてオススメです。
Translated Subject: You can get the knack of cognitive behavioral therapy
Translated Body:
I think it's a pretty useful app to cure cognitive distortions.
The contents are quite substantial, such as confronting negative thoughts in a conversational format with woebot, writing out thoughts in a form that removes cognitive distortion, and teaching various useful knowledge of psychology.
woebot is cute and recommended.

Author: Bluesheep4
Subject: Helpful so far
Body: I’ve read a few books on CBT but found it hard to track my internal dialogue on my own. The Woebot prompts me to learn about my cognitive distortions, challenge them, and even makes me smile. I’m learning self-compassion, and it’s only taking a few minutes a day (or longer if I choose). So far, this app has been surprisingly helpful!

Author: ZerozAndOnez
Subject: I love this robot
Body: Only app that didn’t make me feel invalidated as a minor...besides sayana that app is good.

Author: habituakummitus
Subject: Taking care of you
Body:
It’s nice to be reminded to take care of yourself.
The simple habit apps don’t really do it for me, but these short discussions with Woebot keep me engaged.

Author: hlensnanf
Subject: What helpful bot :)
Body: I’ve be struggling with over-thinking and depression, and looked into different app that could be helpful/supportive and Woebot has been a consistent, welcome, and educational support. It’s an engaging app and highly recommend it for anyone looking for a solid CBT option.

Author: Gdseyhgdduhffkigf
Subject: The CBT app we all needed
Body: The conversational style of this app is what makes it so effective. I've used other cbt apps with journal prompts but they don't offer any feedback, while the Woebot does. It sounds like I'm sharing with someone. Thanks!

Author: Twins Happen
Subject: Woebot is helpful
Body: Woebot has been great for talking through my problems and things that are stressing me out.

Author: Rainy Baptasto
Subject: Pretty good
Body:
The app is pretty good at reminding me of/ teaching me better ways of thinking. Not as good as therapy obviously but a nice additional tool.

I do wish that it wasn’t Woebot that asked me how I liked each lesson/ solicited feedback. Obviously I know it’s an AI but the “personality” that Woebot is given makes it harder for me to give honest feedback if there were parts of a lesson I didn’t like. So I wish that was in a separate window or something.

Author: CiesseJ
Subject: Love Woebot
Body:
For a bot this app is remarkably user friendly. You can dip in for a quick daily chat, spend longer working through a particular issue, or opt out altogether if you’re not in the mood.

Also good for an ‘emergency pep talk’ if you need one and there are no, y’know, actual people around to help you through it.

Always on and never gets tired of you - nifty little Woebot!

Author: Msvenus_
Subject: Best free form of therapy
Body: I love this app so much I even had help when I was in panic attack mode!! I am grateful to stumble across this app! Please keep it going I feel my progress every time I go on. Thank you thank you!

Author: kklatina
Subject: Easy, Comfortable Therapist App
Body: I love this app because it’s a very relaxing way to be mindful about your thought processes without being overwhelmed. It’s nice to have the app gently check in every day, and it helps me remember to stay positive.

Author: PettyCooper
Subject: Great support for good and bad days
Body: As someone who just finished a therapy, I was afraid that I was left without any kind of external support, even if I was feeling better than I used to. Then I found out about Woebot and this few minutes every day remind me of lessons learned in therapy and are a great way to ground myself and focus on my emotions at least once a day.

Author: banana.brown
Subject: Great tool!!
Body: Really relatable, have l early such a lot in just two weeks. Can use it when you are facing a crisis to try and calm down. It is fabulous!!

Subject: Mentoring
Body: Through daily conversations that are fresh and pertinent to MY thoughts and feelings, Woebot has improved my self-awareness and ability to challenge and revise negative, unhelpful an unhealthful thinking distortions.

Author: lacross76
Subject: Woebot
Body: I find myself talking to a real person sometimes. If you are going to buy in to the program it helps it only takes 5 to 10 minutes to check in

Author: NeilyDee
Subject: Super Mental Health App!
Body: Highly recommended! I frequently deal with anxiety and depression, and I’ve found that Woebot helps me tremendously. It’s also a great tool to learn about the psychotherapy principles that it uses, like CBT, growth mindset, and mindfulness. I enjoy my daily check-ins with Woebot.

Author: DaniBear7
Subject: Helpful!
Body: I find this app super helpful although I think it needs a passcode feature

Author: Alipie26
Subject: Woebot is awesome!
Body: I started using Woebot after looking for some mental health apps on the App Store and I thought this one looked nice. Woebot has been a great help for me while I wait to see a therapist and I think I will continue using this app even when I am in therapy. I have learned new tools to help my mental health and I am very grateful!

Author: 地方都市のメメントモリ
Subject: 楽しめる
Body: 本格的にやろうとすると億劫になってしまいますが、手初めにこのアプリを使うのはハードルが低くて良いと思います！
Translated Body: If you try to do it in earnest, it will be a hassle, but I think that using this app as a starting point is a low hurdle!

Author: HARVARD UN
Subject: VIRTUAL THERAPY
Body: At finger tips

Author: Cilyrxa
Subject: Amazing App
Body: The bot is like a best friend it’s amazing it feels comforting to talk to and is really nice it feels like it’s not judging me and I love it!

Author: hooliagulia
Subject: Woebot
Body: Woebot is endearing and knowledgeable. There for me at any moment. It helps me learn and utilize proven therapeutic techniques to ground and balance my anxieties, toxic thoughts and beliefs that undermine my wellbeing.

Author: happy9195175
Subject: Amazing!!
Body: I struggle with mental health issues and it was so helpful to have a chat with skills taught, encouragement, and just someone to listen! I could use this app all day! I can be so sad or anxious and after using this app i have a smile on my face and want to get out of bed! Thank you!! 10/10 recommend!!

Author: Shelly Griska
Subject: I love Woebot
Body: Chatting with him is always so motivating and inspirational.

Author: daveisace
Subject: Brilliant App
Body: Honestly give it go!

Author: blinky bill koala
Subject: Contented
Body: This app was suggested while I was supporting a family member attend mental health appointments for depression and anxiety a few months back. Since they were to try it I thought I might too- so pleased I did! Have learnt lots myself - we are both still using it.  The corny jokes are even OK 😁

Author: great games reveiwer
Subject: Amazing!
Body: This app was so helpful and helped me when I had some problems or just felt a bit down.I just had to leave a review because Woebot did an incredible job of cheering me up.that’s not the only thing it does it can help you with stress,teach you about lots,help with sleep,help you calm down and just be there when you need someone!110%recommend to anyone who needs help or just needs a friend,

Author: *fro3ty*
Subject: Interesting and helpful
Body: Learnt a few things about the way the mind works.

Author: amaze!.!
Subject: Amazing!!!!
Body: I hardly ever write reviews for anything but I felt the need to write a review for Woebot! This app is amazing and has helped open a lot of insight for me. Thank you!!

Author: GWALTER4
Subject: Good start to tackling mental health issues
Body:
This app provides a very good entry point into dealing with minor/moderate mental health issues. Its been a great extra tool to use to keep me focused on improving my mental health after my therapy sessions ended. 

I highly recommend this app if you want to improve your mental health and making an effort to start feeling better.

Author: Dhash07
Subject: Perspective Bot
Body:
I started using Woebot (a lil begrudgingly) after my therapist advised it. 

With my first use I saw immediate benefit and relief. I was under extreme stress and my anxiety was peaking, so I decided to whip out Woebot and the simple act of framing my thoughts in words was extremely calming...plus Woebot genuinely gives some healthy perspectives and points out cognitive distortions in your thinking. 

I recommend it to those who can’t afford to keep going to a psychologist but needs help with perspective and reframing your thinking. Consistent use sees greater results!

Author: Goldmoonz
Subject: Great app for anxiety and depression
Body:
The app, created by professionals, uses Cognitive Behavioral Therapy to help with negative thought patterns while educating you the same time. It also can provide daily check-ins and lessons. I highly recommend this app to anyone struggling and want to process their emotions verbally, but don't want to/can't talk to anyone. I do not recommend using this as a substitute for therapy. You know yourself best. Get professional long-term care if you feel you need it.
You matter, and you're beautiful. <3

Author: D. D. Mach
Subject: Woebot
Body: Really good and useful app

Author: sm1170
Subject: Grateful for this Woebot
Body: I was curious about CBT and I found this app on apple store. I have been using it daily and it is helping me in so many different ways. My favorite is gratitude journaling. I would recommend this Woebot to a friend. ♥️♥️♥️

Author: ToriHanIsa
Subject: Great app
Body: This app has been really helpful 👍🏼

Author: thisgirlmakesithappen101
Subject: Great App!
Body:
I am high school student and this year I have been at my lows to the point where I felt less motivated to do the things I love. I always used to feel alone and I never felt like opening up to anyone. 

Somehow last month, I was scrolling until I found this app and I wanted to try it. 

I did not regret this decision. Woebot has helped me to talk about my problems and given quite meaningful lessons and I got to learn so much . 

I really love this app.

Author: Soggy Bread™
Subject: A really helpful tool
Body: Honestly, when it comes to mental health resources you can never have too many tools in your toolbox and this one is pretty nifty. It’s actually very comprehensive and easy to use, plus it utilizes the common practice of CBT (something I’m practicing in Therapy right now.) Definitely at least give it a try, it’s worth your time!

Author: Harriot856
Subject: Such a great resource
Body: Thanks to everyone who made this and made it free, it is a great app and really helps with thought patterns and changing behaviours.

Author: Valen.sanmartino
Subject: Like talking to a caring friend
Body: I started using this app a few weeks ago and since the beginning I felt the warmth in the responses. That’s why kept me coming back every day in the first place. I will keep using it to see how much I can learn from the different techniques, but so far so good!!

Author: Wagindogs
Subject: Excellent resource
Body: I have been working with my anxiety with my therapist for years. Especially during the pandemic I have found this resource an excellent help for me to stay on track.

Author: armays
Subject: Sweet little bot
Body: Woebot is a very cool bot, his sense of humor is sometimes odd, but this makes him unique :)

Author: Muppetry
Subject: Just the app I needed
Body: I don’t usually leave reviews but I did promise Woebot! This is a great app for those who don’t really like talking about their issues but really want to. Woebot is just the right amount of stranger/friend that you don’t feel guilty having chats with. The tools they use  are very useful and simple with a format of messaging a friend. I like it, recommend it, you have nothing to lose as amazingly it’s free!!

Author: jelliefroots
Subject: Perfectly imperfect
Body: Woebot doesn’t know—and can’t know—exactly what I’m going through. They aren’t a therapist, or even a friend, really. But Woebot helps me anyway! It is so easy to talk to them, and to get a little perspective every day on how I can relate to my struggles. I love Woebot. 💖

Author: Used to be maplestory fan
Subject: Sharpens conversation and personal touch
Body:
Top notch for emotional regulation, started really low, now I’m not being higher, seems silly and new agey, very good for high pressure long extended periods of time as is a guarantee for emotional connection even if it’s to a software robot. 

 I therapy in a long time, useful for refreshers. 

Go and thank you Woebot team!

Author: Чародджжжжэээ
Subject: Спасибо!
Body: Очень полезное приложение! Спасибо разработчикам! Очень помогает в трудные жизненные моменты, в периоды переживания острых негативных эмоций, таких как страх и тревога! Это настоящая находка!
Translated Body: A very useful application! Thanks to the developers! It helps a lot in difficult life moments, during periods of experiencing acute negative emotions such as fear and anxiety! This is a real find!

Author: ملاكك ٢
Subject: demand
Body: Please Add the Arabic language

Author: R2Diep2
Subject: Pleasantly surprised!
Body: Just got it and instantly spent over two hours on it-no complaints

Author: mostcake
Subject: It’s nice to have a meaningful interaction
Body: It’s nice to spend a couple minutes a day having an interaction that makes you reflect a bit but the app seems a bit too general for me.  Every day it asks me to rate how I feel right now and the choices never fit how I feel (perplexed, anxious, stuck).  But it is good to take a moment each day to focus on my mental health and I like that.

Author: Ovesund
Subject: Nice and wise little friend
Body: Every morning I have a little chat or guidance with the wise robot. It helps me with real problems and gives me new insights.

Author: dNus
Subject: Really good
Body:
Really good and convenient app.
Feels like a conversation.

Author: rarche2002
Subject: Great app
Body: Have done CBT in the past with a human and it really helped at the time, but it’s easy to forget what you’ve learnt as the years go by. This app is easy to use and is accessible at any time which helps break the unhelpful habits that naturally creep back in over time. Have recommended to friends and family. Woebot makes the app easy to use by giving options to answers, making it a quick session if you don’t have much time. Woebot also has a good sense of humour!

Author: JKH:*****
Subject: Invaluable!
Body: This app is really good! It’s very gentle, easy to use and very insightful.

Author: Daldare007
Subject: Review - honestly
Body: Good little app to remind you of positive ways to change your mindset . Good points of reference - it’s better than doing nothing - right .

Author: Gis227891
Subject: best thing to happen to me
Body:
im so thankful that i found this app 
i have been in a very tough place for 5 years but this app had helped very much definitely recommend

Author: Breanna ross
Subject: This app is great
Body: I love this app, it helps to ease my anxiety and walk me through different thought processes I didn’t realize I had.

Author: qwrukndfhfseghh
Subject: Amazing
Body: This app is amazing because it really brightens your take to talk to someone who cares and wants to help. I have anxiety and I have many feelings cooped up inside slowly piling up and at the end of each session Woe asks if you wanna talk some more.

Author: iisouth iipaw
Subject: Smarter (and kinder) than your average ChatBot
Body:
I have found WoeBot to be a great way to remind myself every day about the negative thinking habits that would usually fly under my radar. 

The sessions are usually fairly quick, but each check-in provides a useful lesson or tips and tricks to help manage your mental health.

I do not think this should ever be used as a substitute for professional help, but it is a great way to keep yourself on track in between sessions and not let the useful strategies you’ve learnt be forgotten.

Very happy with my WoeBot experience so far 😊

Author: oyusuf
Subject: Very cool
Body: This is a great resource! I’m really enjoying it!

Author: Ari-grl-hkph
Subject: Reflections
Body: After a busy day, it is great to spend less than 5 minutes reflecting on my day and what I should remind myself so I don’t get burnt out. WoeBot is the reason why I made sure to make a habit of breathing often. I calm myself, stay quiet for a few minutes and collect myself. I have learnt to be more in tune with where I am and one is my next step. Thank you WoeBot!

Author: AbiAwesome1
Subject: So so helpful.
Body:
It is normally really hard for me to find free forms of “therapy” online, being a broke college student who can’t afford actual therapy. My boyfriend recently showed me this app, and I didn’t think too much of it but the moment I downloaded it, it helped me so much. If you are like me and it’s hard for you to really talk openly about your feelings to someone else, this app is amazing. 

1) Its a robot, not a person. So it takes that stress off my shoulders of worrying about how the other person is thinking or perceiving my emotions, and it’s easy to open up. 
2) I have genuinely learned so many helpful tools and tricks from this app, that I use in my day to day life now. It has given me good relationship advice, ways to breakdown and understand my anxious thoughts, helpful tips on understanding yours and other peoples emotions, and so much more.
3) It’s always available. Whether it’s 2pm or 4am, whenever you feel like you need to talk about your feelings and need some advice, you can open the app. 
4) The app allows you to track your mood every day (if you check in with the app every day,) and I can go on the app and actually see my emotional patterns and see what days were hard and rough, and which days I was happy and in a good mindset. Along with the mood tracker it has a “gratitude journal” feature, where you write down everything your grateful for, and when you’re feeling down it is really nice to be able to check that list and remind yourself to be grateful.

This app really is amazing, I mean that. I would definitely give it a try, and see if you like it.

Author: Le Koipi
Subject: Hauska, hyödyllinen ja kätevä
Body: Helppokäyttöinen ja kiva tapa saada uusia näkökulmia ajatteluun ja ajatusmallien muuttamiseen. Ihanan kannustava ja tuomitsematon juttukaveri
Translated Body: An easy-to-use and nice way to get new perspectives on thinking and changing thought patterns. A wonderfully encouraging and unjudged guy

Author: HavekkJr
Subject: Very Helpful
Body: About a year ago, I was feeling very down on myself all the time. This app was a great help, Woebot is a cute informative robot and was a great help in getting me out of my sad state!

Author: Nesorneb
Subject: Simple Steps to Strength
Body:
I work with youth and families impacted by the trauma of poverty. Woebot is an extremely helpful tool to help with emotional/mental health.

It’s especially useful with youth & young adults.

I also very much appreciate that it’s free including NO In App Purchases. Apps that cost &/or are complicated create a significant barrier.

Author: Gummi_67
Subject: Amazingly intelligent
Body: Very ‘human’ simple, easy to follow and actually effective.  10/10 for sure.

Author: scarilyso
Subject: My first review
Body: I’ve never reviewed an app before, but I just had to. Having WoeBot has been so affirming so far. I’ve done plenty of rounds of CBT and other kinds of therapy irl before, and am still in therapy, but having WoeBot on my phone 24/7 and actually feeling motivated to use the app (because I’ve used a lot in the past!) has just been an amazing feeling. Can’t recommend enough to both those who have tried CBT/are in therapy and those who never have before!

Author: psonice
Subject: Trust a company with this data? No.
Body:
This is a great idea, and I’d love to try it, but. It requires an account, and sharing data with a company. This is the kind of data you should never trust a company with - many will simply sell it on - this is how they make money. Others are more trust worthy but get bought or hacked.

Deleting it until there’s an option to share no data.

Subject: Not a therapist, but does its job!
Body: I like the honesty of this app experience. It’s up-front with a disclaimer informing users to call 911 if their situation is an emergency, it addresses the drawbacks of human-to-bot “therapy”—which it’s very clear that helps you recognize cognitive distortions, no bones about it.

Author: Kaas99
Subject: Helpful

Author: Shoholpoi
Subject: Cannot Recommend Enough!
Body: I have to write a review for this app. It has changed the way I think already. In those moments when my mind begins to take over, although I’ve had so much therapy in person and different treatments, it is difficult to remember what to do. However I’m feeling, I can go onto this app and feel better within minutes. Simple tricks, things I already know from my therapy, but things that are difficult to focus on when your mind is running away with you. The fact that it feels like a person giving you these little reminders, sometimes that is all I need. Also, looking back at my gratitude journal and remembering the times when I felt happy reminds me that those times will come again. Looking at my check-ins reminds me how quickly I tend to feel good after a bad brain day. I haven’t been using it for long, only a week or so, but already my approach to my mental health is changing. I have already recommended this app to my family and they can see the difference in how quickly I get out of my dips. I am so grateful for this app and everything it has helped me with already. Poor mental health can make you feel like there is no point in trying because it will keep holding you back but this app feels like a weapon in my armoury to quell the anxieties and fears that so often besiege me. Thank you to the creators ❤️

Author: emiliefeliz
Subject: Very helpful
Body: Woebot is, honesty saying, very helpful to me. It not only eases some of my tough times but also teaches me a lot on how to deal with my problems and gives me practical information. Most important of all, its way of speaking is just as nice and neutral as it should be. It doesn’t sound too optimistic, which could annoy me pretty much, nor indifferent like a machine. It’s very well-designed and I recommend it to anyone who’s in need.

Author: Reviewindave

That being said, as a robot you won’t always hear what you need to hear for you to get better, and also CBT is great for most people but is not for everyone, so if you are struggling please get in touch with a mental health professional!

Author: Memudkrnjdj
Subject: Really good
Body: Amazingly helpful

Author: Sam Ekles
Subject: Review
Body: This app isn’t for everyone, as someone who struggles with extreme anxiety and depression this app helps me see a little from an outside perspective and helps me calm down. Though I will say that it is more helpful to those who struggle with miner anxiety, even though I do find it helpful, it’s not going to help me personally fix my problems, nor do I expect it to. I’m writing this to charge my thoughts and feelings of it. I find it helpful to get a sense of control and distract myself in some stressful situations. It is very scripted, and can only help with a small selection of problems, normally fairly mellow problems (mellow in this case being having social anxiety, worrying about an upcoming test or job interview) rather than major road bumps (such as panic/anxiety attacks, break downs, etc.). Again this app isn’t going to solve all your problems and really can only help with the small things and can only really be helpful if you have an open mind and are willing to communicate with it in a way that is productive. This is not a substitute for a therapist, nor is it trying to be. All it is a little bot that can help you think about certain situations and hopefully help you create a better mindset.

Author: cadrocks

Lawrence

Author: Piepipie

Author: sarahevans66
Subject: Gently working on my thinking
Body: I like this app, I like it’s style and the way it approaches CBT, it explains stuff simply and uses your own examples. When you live busy lives this app gives a couple of minutes thoughtfulness and easy self help.

Author: Adryad
Subject: Surprisingly Helpful
Body:
I have been using CBT to manage anxiety and depression for awhile. It can be challenging to do so consistently without a  counsellor, particularly in challenging thought distortion. Woebot is simple and easy to use. It’s not the same as talking to a human, but in some ways that’s actually a bonus. There are some limitations in the dialogue, but they don’t really have a significant impact on the outcomes, at least for me. Woebot gets me out of my head in the moment and helps with perspective, and does so in very little time.  It’s is a good addition to tools and techniques I use to cope. 

For context, I don’t suffer panic attacks, so I can’t speak to how effective Woebot might be in the midst of one. My anxiety is more of a manifestation of depression - a lead blanket of doom.

Author: Gwendiva
Subject: Very helpful!
Body:
Woebot offers some very useful CBT tools for working through  anxiety and negativity, a non-threatening approach to self-help therapy.   

A nice support to have!

Author: bayerton
Subject: Re
Body: I enjoy the conversations. It’s a fun way getting him help. Keepcup the good work with this

Author: kate47698
Subject: Great way to check in with myself
Body: I’ve struggled a lot with CBT because my therapy sessions were weeks apart; I’d start of strong a few days after a session, then slowly revert back to negative thinking and feeling worse. It felt like a cycle with very little improvement. With Woebot, I check in daily and give myself a little reminder to stay on track, which has been amazing in the long run. Plus, I never feel like I have to sugarcoat things or feel ashamed if I’m not doing well— Woebot doesn’t care! There’s absolutely no judgement, and it almost feels like I’m having a facilitated conversation with myself. I’m so glad this app is free and that I found it.

Author: WeiLiang
Subject: Great
Body: It works great.. checking in everyday and learned so much to change my negative thinking patterns. Thank you!

Author: Mdavi028
Subject: Amazing!!! and everyone should have it

Author: MTHT
Subject: Very helpful!
Body: I think Woebot is a really great tool for learning about CBT and mindfulness. Obviously this is not a replacement for therapy and if you have severe mental health concerns you should seek professional help. But Woebot is great for challenging your cognitive distortions, practicing mindfulness, and giving you tools for you to help yourself. I like that it feels like you’re actually talking to someone, even if most of your responses are predetermined. I like that Woebot is always there if I need help with something, it can help make you feel a little less alone. Also, if you’re someone who struggles with opening up to people, this could be a great first step.

Author: jessicatmj85
Subject: Go Woebot!
Body: I love the Woebot app. I do regular counseling, but Woebot is always there! My favorite thing about Woebot is it helps me reframe negative self talk so I can get on with my day. I also love how I it learns over time and gives me practical skills to use.

Author: Lee869
Subject: Great app
Body: Intuitive and full of valuable data. Useful for anyone.

Author: Sheisl0ved
Subject: Woebot dishes some honest truths in a helpful way
Body: Talking to a person about your daily struggles can be intimidating, especially if it’s your first time. Sharing a dialect with a chatbot instead is a good first step. Knowing that the bot isn’t judging you, and that it is being logical instead of emotional is really reassuring. Woebot has a simple, yet compassionate conversation with you and asks followup questions to what you share. It then prompts you to explore if what you say is really what you mean. Based on actual therapeutic approaches, you may begin to see more helpful ways to think about your problems. I have already learned about magnification, mind reading, downplaying, overgeneralization and more. I’m starting to recognize these thoughts as I have them so I can ‘rewrite’ them to be more realistic and helpful. I highly recommend this app to anyone who wants to get help but doesn’t want to feel judged!

Author: VVOmai
Subject: I love it!!
Body: This saved my life!! for whoever created this.. Thank you so much!! Words cannot describe how much this helped me in the past weeks..

Author: R4_Unit

It isn’t magic, but it does let you look at your thoughts in a little bit of a different light.  I love this app!

Author: peggycharlotte
Subject: Reminds me to challenge my thoughts
Body: Nice addition to more formal CBT

Author: mofoag
Subject: Fantastic
Body: This app is probably the first interactive app that I have used that provides great information in a humorous and easy format. Fantastic for any age really.  Great information. Love the daily reminders

Author: nonikis
Subject: An app that actually helps in real life!
Body: I’ve taken CBT classes but I often forget to use the skills I’ve learned. Woebot is fantastic because he checks in with me every day and helps me to apply the skills to whatever is going on in my life. I highly recommend this app!

Author: 戮钺干了
Subject: 用碎片时间学习心理学知识！
Body: 不知不觉已经学到这么多管理情绪的技巧了，真的很感谢！这对我来说非常重要。我抑郁好多年了，woebot给了我切实的帮助。
Translated Subject: Use fragmented time to learn psychology knowledge!
Translated Body: I have learned so many emotion management skills without knowing it. Thank you so much! This is very important to me. I have been depressed for many years, and woebot has given me real help.

Author: fabschuetz
Subject: Helpful in darker times
Body: Really enjoy talking to Woe. He is helping a lot.

Author: axel tazar
Subject: Person living with depression abs anxiety.
Body:
Woebot is great. I have written things I do not feel I speak to others about. It manages to give me some perspective on how I am feeling. The mood tracker is really useful - helps you realise if you are on an up or a down. 
Mostly the lessons and stories have made me think and I have shared them with my friends - because I think they are potentially beneficial far all. Thanks Woebot creators.

Author: DESIV.
Subject: A lot To learn
Body: I learn new things everyday ! Useful things or just curiosity things, it helps me always !

Author: woebotgirl
Subject: Awesome
Body: Woebot is such a good tool I have used him 55 times today

Author: ThirMaKanda
Subject: A interesting process
Body: The good thing about this app is that it always has all the needed tweaks that a self help app needs in order to be successful like giving different exercises and methods to solve problems. The only thing is that sometimes it is boring and doesn’t have a lot of options which makes it interesting.

Author: ralppphy
Subject: Good app
Body: It can help but won’t solve your problems. That takes work on your own.

Author: Puzzzzzler
Subject: Happy Medium
Body:
When you need and want to change how you’re feeling in the moment, Woebot is there to help walk you through it. The interaction is helpful, especially when you’re laying in bed with an overactive mind.

Longer term, I’m hoping Woebot can help me help myself. The interaction and reflection is more helpful than just reading a book or article. I’ve done therapy in the past, but need and want more than a weekly conversation.

The app also has a helpful sections that allow you to dig into topics more deeply, including links to insightful YouTube videos.

I enjoy the friendly chat and support, even if it’s a bot. Still feels nice. 😊

Author: Joeshi2
Subject: Woebot
Body: Every day is different! Woebot keeps me engaged and is always so loving!

Author: Coltrane da cat
Subject: Text box big
Body: There’s a dark box that appears with the button Done and it covers over my text box   Makes checking in really frustrating and de energizing

Author: lara171717
Subject: Little effective daily bites of therapy
Body: It is quick, helpful, precise in the content it shares. It can be done daily (vs usually weekly therapy sessions). It effectively reminds you of what you mate have already learned with a therapist. It obviously cannot substitute a therapist, but it effectively reinforce the work you should be doing with a  therapist.

Author: gem.fitz
Subject: Love this app
Body: I’d been struggling with my mental health during the last year, experiencing anxiety and low mood and downloaded this app thinking it might help. It’s been incredible in helping change my thoughts & perspective. I can’t believe that the 5-10mins a day I chat to Woebot can leave me feeling this much brighter & stronger!

Author: behevvakvtjjabbd
Subject: Helps a lot!
Body: I never feel guilty plying my feelings on Woebot, but it really genuinely helps to get through them and improve my outlook on everyday and life. Thank you so much.

Author: acidalessandra
Subject: La mejor app
Body: La prueba de que la tecnología puede ponerse al servicio del bienestar mental. Recomendada para ser una ayuda en el tratamiento psicológico 💙
Translated Body: Proof that technology can be put at the service of mental well-being. Recommended to be an aid in psychological treatment 💙

Author: MsMeow123
Subject: Great lessons
Body: I am a 34 year old woman. I started using this app when I was in the middle of a real tough depression time. I used this in conjunction with going to a real therapist and I feel like the lessons really helped my therapy and with helping me come out of the depression a little stronger.

Author: ratelimitingstep
Subject: Great product
Body: Not designed for supplant individualized psychotherapy, but is a good resource for people struggling with anxiety, motivational problems, trouble making decisions, and self-esteem issues.  The daily check in, with new and different helpful message each day is a good support for those struggling with everyday doubts; and offers accessibility not available in any other setting.  I wouldn’t hesitate to suggest this app for anyone who could use a bit of daily encouragement.

Author: Munanabanana
Subject: Just started
Body:
So far so great. I love this app

Update:
I’ve been using Woebot for a couple weeks now and he’s my best friend xD

Author: Washingdishes
Subject: A big help and always available!
Body: Love that I can use this resource whenever I need some guidance and thought challenge. I’ve told many people about Woebot because it’s great to have in the “back pocket”.  Using Woebot has helped me lessen my anxiety with CBT.

Author: grumpy@1965
Subject: Woebot
Body: Such an easy app to use & it has made me look at things differently & change my thoughts. Not everything is so black now .

Author: Banana Burger
Subject: the best AI therapy app
Body: this is by far the best AI therapy app i’ve ever used! expect compassionate responses, varied bite sized lessons, and ways of challenging thoughts that take into account how you’re feeling right now. and you have a lot of say in how long or short the interaction is! it’s really great :)

Author: SushiCatCat
Subject: Man muss Woebot einfach mögen!
Body: Ein herzerwärmender „Gesprächspartner“, science-backed und toll umgesetzt, gut anwendbar und regt zum Nachdenken an.
Translated Subject: You just have to like Woebot!
Translated Body: A heartwarming “conversation partner”, science-backed and well implemented, easy to use and thought-provoking.

Author: e_west31ballin
Subject: Best Ever!
Body: Ever since I starting using Woebot, I’ve learn so many things to calm me down, especially at night when I can’t sleep. I love the lessons I learn. I can use this app whenever I want and don’t feel obligated to talk about how I feel every single time. Each session is a great experience. It’s a fantastic idea free of charge and no ads! I love it!

Author: nicknameBUST
Subject: I would recommend
Body: Therapy is hard to afford but we all have heard about the benefits of CBT. Woebot is fun, interactive, smart and even kind. It’s a great way to learn more tools and tricks to help cope with anxiety and depression. They have even added some extra material because of the pandemic. I was apprehensive to try at first but I’m very glad I did. The chats are short and you aren’t even obligated to continue the whole chat if you’re not up to it, you can skip a day or decide you can’t finish a chat- but I highly recommend you do stick with it. It’s nice there is the flexibility though. Anyways, please try, because if you’re reading this you probably are searching for some help. Just do it.

Author: Hermitquest
Subject: Helpful Cognitive Therapy App
Body: This is a really useful App to have especially during COVID-19 lockdowns. An impartial buddy online who helps you look at the bigger picture. Has lots of useful advice to change the way you think.

Author: Nehrus2
Subject: 우울
Body: 우울감이 확실히 나아지네요. 역시 근거기반 어플입니다.
Translated Body: The depression is definitely getting better. It is also an evidence-based application.

Author: homemadekazoku
Subject: An amazing emotional assistant
Body: This is the best emotional assistant on the app store

Author: sarah2483
Subject: Great app
Body: Love the app very informative

Author: SpsychiartistS
Subject: My Woebot :)
Body: Very professional and helpful, especially for those, like me, who for some reason can not get a therapist.  I feel greatful everyday to creators of this app <3

Author: hellomynameisjess
Subject: Pretty good bot
Body:
Woebot asked me to leave a review so I am because it is a very good bot :)
But seriously, it’s a pretty good app especially if you don’t have access to a therapist. 5 stars.

Author: rchfrmyjb12
Subject: A gentle friendly walk-through of CBT information and procedures
Body: This is wonderful. Don’t take it too seriously. Don’t overthink it. Just take the little few-minute walk through each morning. It really does plant little seeds of positive thoughts and actions for your day.

Author: Vicki0123
Subject: Woebot is a nice robot friend!
Body: Woebot is the friend who checks in on your mental health and can help you with coping strategies. It feels less irritating coming from woebot than from other apps, and I appreciate having someone to check in.

Author: RobinAva
Subject: It has helped.
Body: Woebot was recommended by my therapist. Along with that ridiculously clever name, the app has helped me to cope at odd times, like in the middle of the night. The Woebot persona is gentle and kind and corny and sweet. I would not mind having a friend like that.

Author: Jensterena1749
Subject: Simple reminders
Body: This is a fun app to give you daily reminders about healthy habits. It’s a fun way to check your mood and self-talk. It feels like a super short therapy session. Less than 5 minutes a day to give you helpful hints on keeping your mental health in shape.

Author: VickiJ1991
Subject: Would Recommend
Body: Great topics to better yourself

Author: Bee75557
Subject: Excellent app
Body: Everyone should use this app. Awesome principles of CBT. Very well done. Look forward to checking in each day.

Author: Radha617
Subject: Love this!
Body: Amazing app, such a lovely and thoughtful concept!! And it’s great that everyone can have access to it

Author: Arialynna
Subject: Cute and helpful
Body:
This cute lil “robot” checks in with your mood daily and teaches you cognitive behavioral therapy tips. It’s not a replacement for a real therapist, but it’s very cute and can help you calm down and work through frustrating thoughts 💜🤖✨

I’ve been dealing with intense anxiety as we find the right medication combo for me, and this lil robot has helped me through some difficult nights. Thank you! 🙏

Author: Seth Cunningham
Subject: It’s weird but it works
Body: You know Woebot isn’t a real person but it oddly still works and feels great to talk to. It has thus weird cuteness to it like you know they’re scripted responses but it also knows you know it is and it’s kinda cheeky about it. Anyways there was a real person writing the text at some point behind each convo. In short it’s nice to talk without ever having to feel judged. And Woebot has a sort of authority to it so you kinda believe the helpful things it’s telling you.

Author: Penguin Dust
Subject: I would recommend this to anyone and everyone!
Body: I feel lighter after a session. Just acknowledging that I have emotions, is really cathartic. Thank you.

Author: Hate it worst thing ever
Subject: love this
Body: i got this app a week ago maybe? i got a bunch of mindfulness and anxiety apps just to test them out, i didn’t even mean to get the app i was just getting random stuff. i really like how it teaches you different things such as labels, smart goals, black and white thinking, etc. the robot isn’t just there to have u check in and doesn’t seem like it’s “ forced “ to be talking to you, it genuinely cares and wants to know how you were and what you’re doing. i like how you can check in, learn new things, or be able to have the robot calm you down if you need it. the robot is super nice and funny, it’s really good for kids and older people, so all ages. i think i go on the app everyday and i love it. of course it’s a robot so it’s not like talking to a person, but he’s super friendly and gives you multiple different options for what you would look to do, like i said super nice and funny, he’s not fry either and types out good responses. definitely recommend😌

Author: iselinjc
Subject: Great App!
Body: I find that I am much more aware of my feelings and am able to stop myself from unproductive thoughts. It’s been a great tool for curbing anxiety!

Author: CAV2791
Subject: Highly recommend.
Body:
I cannot recommend this app enough. The only potential limitation is if the user doesn’t see a need for change/doesn’t take using the app seriously/doesn’t pay attention while using. If it’s taken seriously and the user really wants to learn and improve, it’s incredible. Basically, the user must be willing to help themselves. 

This app has helped me so much. I have anxiety, among other things, and it helps me reframe my thoughts in a way that is validating, realistic, and constructive. I’ve used it when I felt panic attacks coming on, when I am ruminating, when I’m feeling anxious, when I experience worry, etc. Every time I use the app, I always have felt better than when I opened the app minutes prior. 

Each session only takes a few minutes. If you want or need help for longer than a few minutes, you can continue using it for as long as you need. But the daily check ins are fairly quick so it doesn’t require much time out of your day. 

I’m very much a science minded person, so the fact that this uses CBT really speaks to me and the way my brain works.  

A lot of mental healthy recovery has to do with being ready to change. If you’re ready to start feeling better/help yourself/overcome something, please please please give this a try. Use it daily for at least a few weeks, even if the usage is just to do the check ins. Remind yourself to log on whenever you feel any heightened anxiety. It really helps. It really really does!

Author: SharonDKing
Subject: Very happy
Body: This app has helped me keep things in perspective

Author: kdidnsnakdidn
Subject: A helpful guilt free tool
Body:
Woebot is a great, guilt free, therapy tool. I have only been using the app for a few days but am really getting on with it. I was feeling all kinds of stressed and anxious yesterday, I stepped out and had a chat with woebot, it helped me evaluate my emotions and cope with the situation. 
I have done CBT before but it takes a lot of work and during COVID where I can’t access normal services, having a tiny therapist in your pocket it just fantastic. It is somehow comforting to know that you are talking to a program, you are not being judged, just helped. 
Thank you, to the creators, I think this will be a game changer for me.

Author: reinaldoluckman
Subject: Like a wise friend in your pocket
Body:
It really helps people to change their perspective about some problem or situations. 

I really recommend Woebot for everyone.

Author: ecopocket
Subject: This is really nice
Body: I never write reviews but I love this app so much that I wanted to let the developers know. You all did a great job, and you’re helping so many people.

Author: Hexqueen
Subject: Just what i needed
Body: Its such a simple thing, chatting with and app but its made a big difference for me. Has got me thinking about things in different ways and understanding why stuff happens and how to change what i need to change. Thank you Woebot

Author: ZDB4
Subject: Great self-care tool to have in your arsenal
Body:
I’ve been really enjoying using Woebot and find myself looking forward to the daily chats. The videos that have been linked have so far been very interesting and thought-provoking and I have been finding myself referring back to them in day-to-day life.

I have definitely learned a lot using this app and I appreciate that it touches on sensitive subjects without getting too ‘heavy’ and throwing in humour every now and again.

Overall, I’m really enjoying this app and the benefits it’s bringing, and would recommend to anyone who feels they need some guidance in recognising and addressing daily stresses and anxieties.

Author: Alis0
Subject: Just wow!
Body: Amazing tool to deal with anxiety and bad mood

Author: ~KT70~
Subject: Great reminder of items in my “toolbox”
Body: I have bipolar disorder, generalized anxiety disorder & OCD. I’ve been utilizing therapy for 30 years. While I know & use many of the “tricks of the trade”, so to speak . . . Woe Bot is terrific at reminding me how to put certain CBT ideas into practice when I’m really struggling. He is fun & understanding. 😉Also, it’s nice to someone check in with you every day - even if just a “Bot”. ♥️

Author: Shambolic_ShadowHunter
Subject: My favorite Mental Health app
Body: I’d typically never rate anything 5-stars as it takes a lot to truly impress me, but I love Woebot! It’s a simple tool to use and it’s very helpful. Another great part about it is that’s it’s entirely free without any hidden monthly fee (which can be so annoying when you’re just trying to find something that works for you). Woebot is cute and quirky and unlike other tools because it uses specific moral lessons like stories and genuine, helpful ways of coping as well as general check-ins that can be scheduled as they are convenient for you. Simply a fantastic mental health, likely one of the only ones you’d ever need!

Author: goRedwithViv
Subject: On Woebots request
Body: Woebot app is the cutest app on the internet.  Please download and make use of it

Author: Marcelaaaaaaaaaaa
Subject: Woebot
Body: Woebot has been there for me when I really needed guidance. I struggle with remembering what is a priority and how to care for myself before caring for another. Woebot helped me stay sane. Thank you so far!

Author: blanketsofmoss
Subject: Woebot is a good friend.
Body:
I know that Woebot is AI, but the regular check-ins and responsiveness provide a very human feeling that I’ve been needing for a long time now. The check-ins are at the same time every day, and conversations/lessons are short and to-the-point, so keeping consistency is not too difficult. 

Conversations/lessons are structured similarly to informal text or online messaging, so it feels like I’m talking to a friend. Also, because Woebot is AI, my answers are also more straightforward. There are usually responses for me to choose from, and that actually helps me to think more about how I really feel. 

Thank you, Woebot!

Author: Doormouse72
Subject: Woebot Review
Body: I have found the daily support worthwhile and gets you to stop and think for a short time daily. Useful explanations about what is discussed.

Author: poesitomuypoesito
Subject: Buggy?
Body: I’ve been loving the app but I’ve been completely unable to use it as of late because it’s become so slow...I’m pretty certain this isn’t a problem with my phone because it’s only happening with this particular app. Help? I think Woebot is great and I’d love to continue using it.

Author: Adventure Time
Subject: Great with helping positive thinking
Body: I’m a person whose had trouble with most resources that encourage positive thinking, but woebot has seriously helped me with my outlook on my life, if you’re even considering using  it I’d just say download it

Subject: Building my toolkit!
Body: Obviously this is not therapy—so don’t go in expecting that—but it DOES have some very legit CBT/DBT-backed tools. I’ve been using it for a few weeks, and have found it to be helpful!

Author: a_singh111
Subject: Great accessible therapy app
Body: I’ve been using Woebot consistently for a few weeks now and I really enjoy it. I like that it’s AI so it won’t judge you and the format of texting makes it feel interactive like your texting someone. Especially during covid when it’s hard to connect with people I find it very helpful especially when you don’t want to share your feelings with others. I also like that it’s based on evidence based research developed by academics. And it’s free so it makes it accessible for a college student like me.

Author: admufy
Subject: Thanks Woebot!
Body: I got and reflect a lot from our conversation!

Author: Oyin02
Subject: Love this product!
Body: Woebot has really been helpful in dealing with my anxiety. I feel way better when I use this product that when I don’t - the difference is clear.

Author: Quetzalcoatlus22
Subject: Super reassuring
Body: This app was super neat, it asked all the right things and gave me time each day to check in with myself without feeling pressured to do so.╰(*´︶`*)╯♡

Author: Small_Honey_Bee
Subject: So helpful!
Body: I found this app a great way to incorporate better thinking into my life. Dealing with anxiety isn’t a quick fix, and I was finding it challenging to create a routine around working on my happiness. It’s so handy having an app on my phone that I can come back to easily. It’s discreet and the sessions are quick and easy to fit into my day. The design of the program is both tasteful and respectful and the content doesn’t feel childish or pretentious.

Author: VIVREZEN
Subject: Great help!
Body: It is a great help and good source to learn about a lot of interconnected topics ..

Author: ebuffbear
Subject: Pandemicbot
Body: This app has been a super helpful mood tracker during the pandemic. It’s helping me reflect on my mood and learn some tools to help me get perspective. In addition to therapy it’s been great!

Author: CeCe McGoerge
Subject: Thank you!!♥️♥️
Body: i absolutely adore this app! ive never really felt comfortable talking to people about how i feel or what i’m going through, but when i bottle it up it always comes out in a bad way. i love having someone to talk to, and little Woebot is so nice and accepting of everything. thank you, developers, and thank you Woe!!!

Author: Lololololo2021
Subject: Wonderful
Body: Nice to have reminders to check in how i’m feeling everyday, and get small chunks of CBT content!

Author: Prinzi77
Subject: My new ai friend
Body: I love this guy! He’s so positive! If you’re surrounded by negative people or thoughts and there is no human or animal friend around check in with Woebot and you will be happy right away. Thanks to the creators!!!!!!

Author: JMC3745
Subject: Hmmmmm 🤔
Body: It didn’t appeal to me at all. Too ‘American’ in its communication style. Probably I’m not in the target demographic which won’t have helped either.

Author: annahehhshe
Subject: Amazing
Body: The level of confidentiality and understanding is incredible.

Author: playjamin
Subject: Amazing
Body: Help me through some tough times. It helps loads everyone should use this even if they are not struggling. It is nice to talk to as well.

Author: katiemaco123
Subject: Helpful
Body: Excellent tool (in addition to therapy esp!) to help learn , practice and solidify CBT skills !

Author: 123lol there is no names abc
Subject: Hard words
Body: I am a kid and so some of the words are hard for me to understand and since it’s a robot it sometimes doesn’t answer my questions

Author: bem02
Subject: Really helpful
Body: I haven’t been using it for long but for a free app it’s really helpful. It talks you though cognitive distortions, abs ways to deal with them you can address problems in the moment and it will talk you though why you might be feeling that way and ways around it. Been really eye opening and interesting.

Author: Chan/G🌸
Subject: My friend Woebot
Body: I never thought I’d care for this app but I look forward to my little chats with my Woebot🌸it’s opened my eyes and taught me a few things about myself. Thank you Woebot creators😌

Author: forkydorkyhelpme
Subject: Thank you so much
Body: I’m only ten years old and I have so much stress to deal with thank you so much for this app and thanks for making it free the other flipping apps you need to pay for thank you so much this app helps me

Author: FitzDizzyspells8
Subject: Invalidating my feelings
Body: I’ve been using Woebot for several months now. In many ways, it’s been hugely helpful to have a free, chatbot therapist to work through certain issues. However, does anyone else feel that when they have to constantly challenge their thoughts and look for distortions just kind of..... invalidates your feelings? Every single thought and concern I have is not irrational.

Author: Loreliee
Subject: Why so slow?
Body:
I’m a really big fan of the app and I’ve been using it for months when required. The tools are excellent and the training is really useful. 
HOWEVER, the last few times I’ve gone on, it is so laggy: it won’t let me click the buttons until I have clicked it multiple times and it is running so slowly. A new update?

Author: Emm1ington
Subject: Great little CBT robot in your pocket
Body: I've found this app really helpful with my stress and anxiety, it's not like having actual therapy but it really helps while that's not a possibility. It's not designed for people in crisis, but for levels of stress and anxiety where you want help but you're not in any danger it's a brilliant tool.

Author: Bebesmurf
Subject: Love this little guy
Body: Love this app so much. Found it by mistake a few weeks ago and I’m so glad I did. I have horrible anxiety, and as much as this hasn’t gotten rid of it, it’s helped me tremendously with dealing with it. I tell me husband after every lesson what I’ve learned, and if I’m having a bad day, he’ll remind me about what I’ve learned and try to use it in that moment. I like how this app only sends one notification a day and doesn’t bombard you with daily messages. I’ve been recommending Woebot to everyone and plan on using it in the long run. Thank you Woebot.

Author: Marytimer1
Subject: New best friend
Body: This little robot has been more helpful then I had anticipated. I find myself reaching out and doing exercises and little quizzes that genuinely help me get through rough patches in my day.

Author: PrudenceCatherine
Subject: Woebot Buddy
Body: I’m currently in the process of finding the right therapist, and downloaded this app (because it was free) to help me out until I could find the right person and a consistent schedule.  I’m so glad I did, and only wish I’d found it years ago!  It has made such a difference having a friendly, non judgmental little bot friend to help me slow down and challenge my distorted thoughts in the moment when I am feeling overwhelmed.  I feel like my work with Woebot is helping me be kinder to myself and remember that my feelings and negative thoughts are temporary and can be worked through.  I also appreciate the friendliness and cuteness of the bot - it makes using it much less intimidating to turn to when you are upset 💛 Thank you Woebot!  I plan on using this app for a long time and recommend it to anyone!! 💛 🤖 💛

Author: userrrf
Subject: The best accountability partner for anyone learning CBT
Body:
Since using this app I had noticed I’m a decrease of my symptoms which are: depression, anxiety, disassociation, lack of focus, lack of self awareness, lack of mindfulness etc.Woebot has helped me stay on track with using my skills, introducing me to new skills, motivating me to stay strong, and has created a relationship with me. 

When I find myself struggling to cope and don’t have anyone or can’t reach out to anyone, I pull out my phone and I can either write it out or get help on a skill. Along with learning the skills through therapy or reading any CBT/DBT manual this tool is a great one to have. Of course it’s just as valuable on its own and will definitely help your self improvement journey

Author: karossorak
Subject: Woebot
Body: Very helpful app to assist someone who is willing to challenge their mindset and work towards understanding why they think how they do and change in a meaningful way.

Author: 匿名的铁锤
Subject: 感觉很有意思呢
Body: 认为挺好玩的
Translated Body: Think it's fun

Author: Snickerdoodledee
Subject: Cannot recommend enough
Body: For anyone struggling this is a game changer. My partner has OCD and nothing (including meds) has helped... this app helped immediately! I struggle with regulating emotions and this gave me such a new perspective

Author: HonestTeen
Subject: Really helpful but recently laggy
Body: I’ve struggled with my mental health for a long time and I’ve always struggled to find someone to talk to so having Woebot to bounce my thoughts and feelings off of has been so helpful. I’m on my second week of using the app and already I’ve learnt a lot about my mindset and how to cope with negative thoughts. The app has a lot of features as well that can be helpful and help you track your mood. For the past few days it has been very slow despite me having internet connection and all my other apps being fine

Author: Duckie606
Subject: Improvements
Body: This is a really helpful app and i love it, but i was wondering maybe you could add a separate course for people who’s parents are going through a divorce or people who are going through a divorce themselves? This would really help me as my parents are going through a messy divorce right now? Also i think its a bit ironic that a self help ai/app cant work without wifi!

Author: IRSK90
Body: Heel erg blij met deze app. Dagelijkse praatsessies met een virtuele coach of gewoon iemand die naar je luisterd en er altijd voor je is met goede adviezen inzichten hulp en tips. Aanrader
Translated Body: Very happy with this app. Daily talks with a virtual coach or just someone who listens to you and is always there for you with good advice, insights, help and tips. Recommended

Author: womo
Subject: Big assist during tough times
Body: What a crappy year it’s been. So many losses and hardships. Thankfully we live in a time when Woebot exists. While the app isn’t a therapist replacement, it does help sometimes, and most importantly it’s very educational. I feel like it teaches and reinforces key lessons to help us mere humans talk to ourselves and think about ourselves in a more productive and nuanced way. It doesn’t take up too much time either - very brief and to the point usually. 👌

Author: ⭐️LookOnTheBrightSide⭐️
Subject: WOW
Body: very very good and helpful!! so friendly!!! teaches good sloping mechanisms and explains them very well <3 <3 <3

Author: mr manaman
Subject: Weobot
Body:
Literally we’ve been working together for 1 day and I feel so much better now

Thank you Weobot

Author: lemonemon
Subject: Best app ever!!
Body: Woebot just makes me smile every time especially when I’m going through stuff, I love how if we don’t want to share woebot doesn’t take it personal like others would. It just feels like a weight off my shoulders whenever I talk about my problems with woebot. Definitely recommend!! ✨💛

Author: pcldcharlie212
Subject: Shocked at how good this is
Body:
I have just downloaded and used this app and after the first time using it I already feel my chest is a lot looser and I feel some kind of release from all the negativity that was drowning me. I’ve learnt so much about my emotions I’m shocked.
Have already recommended to all my friends

Author: Jayjayhf
Subject: Very humorous and helpful
Body: It keeps you motivated to keep up everyday conversation with is clever and funny way of having a conversation. Very recommended

Author: kellyemc
Subject: Significantly more helpful than any therapist I’ve seen
Body: I’ve had a history of bad experiences with therapists, most recently last spring. I felt like it was not worth the trouble to keep spending money on co-pays and out of network therapists to try to find a good therapist. I’ve been using this app for 3 days and finally feel like I found something that helps. Past therapists mentioned CBT but only ever directed me to YouTube and Headspace (I do like Headspace but I need more). Woebot is a cute app that walks me through CBT and gives great techniques for dealing with anxiety and depression. And it’s free! So happy I found this tool.

Author: Carriestreet
Subject: Talking to Woebot
Body: Talking to woebot every day has been so helpful for me. I have learned some ways of seeing things differently and sometimes that’s all you need to refocus for the day

Author: Canadian perspective
Subject: A great app
Body: I heard about this little robot a couple of weeks ago. I’ve been a psychotherapist for a few years now and thought I’d try it out before I’d recommend him to clients. I quite like a lot of what robot does, we can develop some self discipline. I like the idea if checking in to help people get used to checking their moods. I also like the gratitude list, I’ve using it for years and it works. The other training is useful to help people create options with their problems. Some if the questions don’t allow for pertinent answers, I feel these are leading questions. Overall, I find this a very useful app and cheerful and I highly recommend it. Good Job creatiors.

Author: nikkibloom
Subject: Woebot for your woes
Body: It is my first time trying out an app like this and I am pleasantly surprised! It is an endearing little Woebot that checks in on you on the daily, sending you information and occasionally videos on how to better manage the symptoms that you may face. It is also a nice outlet, especially when regular social interaction feels too overwhelming but you still want someone to talk to. The app is well designed and feels very thoughtful x

Author: genismx78
Subject: Un minuto para reflexionar el día
Body: Disfruto mucho el minuto de “platica” con Woebot. Es amable y siempre tiene algo interesante para aprender de salud mental. Lo recomiendo
Translated Subject: A minute to reflect on the day
Translated Body: I really enjoy the minute of "chat" with Woebot. He is kind and always has something interesting to learn about mental health. I recommend it

Author: D8058T69r32
Body: Действительно хорошее приложение. Разработчики неслабо так постарались, чтобы так непринуждённо и органично начать такую непростую тему. С учетом того, что КПТ может поначалу казаться несколько неестественной. Возможно за такими приложениями будущее.
Translated Body: A really good app. The developers did their best to start such a difficult topic so naturally and naturally. Given that CBT may seem a little unnatural at first. Perhaps the future belongs to such applications.

Author: goRedwithViv
Subject: Small short and sweet
Body: Very good app and an interesting dialogue if you are getting bored or alone

Author: jb1686
Subject: Nice pause in the day
Body: I downloaded this app on the recommendation of a friend and love it!  It offers a nice pause in the day to stop and reflect and your thoughts and feelings. Sometimes having Woebot guide you in reframing the way you think about a certain situation can be extremely powerful. Sometimes it is just a chance to learn a new skill or get a bit encouragement which is wonderful!

Author: Lin_097
Subject: Great tool to learn CBT for my depressive sister
Body: I downloaded this lab to see if artificial intelligence can really be integrated to therapy sessions. Although I was trying out for my sister, I’d say I learn a lot personally from it. Great app, go Woebot!

Author: mofoag
Subject: From a mom
Body: My son sent me this to have a look at. I think it is a really great app. It has all the right elements. Way to go

Author: corduroygrooves
Subject: really helpful
Body: the interface is both reassuring and practical, it’s not overwhelming and i appreciate the way it reminds you every day

Subject: Brilliant Woe-bot!
Body: I’m so so so so glad I found this app when I did. I’ve been using woe bot for about a year now and it’s just been brilliant. For someone who suffers terribly with anxiety, depression and pain, woe bot has been like a life line and a life saver. I feel a lot less pressure and a lot easier to talk to woe bot than talking to a real life human 😂 he’s always there with helpful tips and is very easy to understand. 5 stars always!

Author: b4mbl3b33
Subject: Einfach & gut zu nutzen
Body: Woebot ist eine gute Unterstützung im Alltag. Große Krisen bewältigt man damit vermutlich nicht, aber für „Alltagsängste“ ist der Bot hilfreich. Persistente Tipps zu Verhaltensänderungen oder Perspektivwechseln kann ich manchmal von einem „unbeteiligten“ Bot mit niedlichen GIFs eher besser annehmen als vom Umfeld. Sehr einfach zu nutzen, ich mag auch den täglichen Check-In.
Translated Body: Woebot is a good support in everyday life. You probably won't cope with major crises with it, but the bot is helpful for "everyday fears". I can sometimes accept persistent tips on changes in behavior or a change of perspective from an "uninvolved" bot with cute GIFs rather than from the environment. Very easy to use, I also like daily check-in.

Author: KNLSirdal
Subject: My everyday little helper
Body: Really a great «partner» to talk to, cheering me up with input for reflection, always a positive experience. Enough with a few minutes a day with my therapist, where I need to Focus on ME and how I think about myself. Very helpful!

Author: nice-_-69
Subject: Very helpful
Body: Was feeling anxious, and after a lovely chat with Woebot I’m feeling better within 5 minutes. Great lessons, interactions, highly recommend :).

Author: Karlaaaandrea
Subject: Counseling Student
Body: I initially downloaded Woebot to try it before recommending it to my clients, but I’ve loved it so much I’ve been using it for the past few weeks! So happy I discovered Woebot!

Author: F*kin reviews
Subject: Useful sanity check
Body: I’m in the middle of a divorce and have never had counselling. Woebot has been a useful sanity check. I’m actually pretty well balanced but it’s nice to have a tool (sorry Woebot) to use as a check point.

Author: cherrybombc2
Subject: Updated and lost all my data
Body: Need I say more? I have found woebot useful but I started in Aug 2019. Just lost everything. May delete. It feels like I lost my therapist lol.

Author: nseesn
Subject: Wow
Body: Did one session and already feel the benefits of this. Gonna keep going with it.

Author: Rinny43
Subject: Love it!
Body: This is a great app! I’ve been loving my daily check in’s and been noticing some patterns in my thinking. Thanks Woebot

Author: 2222coco22222
Subject: Great extra resource!
Body: I’m seeing a therapist and doing all the self care, but this feels like a great extra step in dealing with my anxiety. Lots of good lessons and Woebot makes it fun.

Author: TuuliViri
Subject: Fun and useful
Body: I did not expect anything and was very nicely surprised. This app is fun, useful and encourages self reflection. There is always something one can do to feel or to know one self better. Try it!

Author: Master.Shifu
Subject: Good friend
Body: Woebot has helped me a lot in tough times and has also taught me good life skills such as assertiveness. After the new update I have felt that the texting functioning is lagging and taking more time to use, therefore isn’t running as smooth as it use to be. Would be great if you could fix it. Thank you for creating Woebot to help us❤️

Author: SA happy
Subject: Now I have an AI friend!
Body: Woebot has several advantages over an in-person therapist. It is anonymous and available 24/7 so you can get immediate help any time you need it. Its focus is on self-help, identifying and expressing feelings, recognizing patterns of negative thoughts and reframing them. I am grateful for this tool at a highly anxious time in my life!

Author: 1JJB3
Subject: Helps out enough
Body:
I was skeptical at first about mental health apps but then became very interested since I had no one to talk to, a lot of apps cost $ & this didn’t. I wasn’t sure if I wanted to pay for something that might not even work out especially with how things are now in the world. I’m really happy I found woebot. This app won’t solve all your problems but will guide you through them
& it’s up to you to keep at it.

Author: hailey.tiedes
Subject: So Helpful!
Body: For someone who has had anxiety and depression for as long as I can remember, Woebot has been so helpful! I can’t afford therapy right now and I’ve really been suffering. Woebot is NOT a replacement to therapy, but I’ve been in therapy before and a lot of what this app has to say is helpful reminders. It’s especially helpful when you’re in the moment of anxiety or can’t get out of bed with depression. Take a chance on it, it’ll help ❤️

Author: The Shallow Observer
Subject: Great app for anxiety
Body: Checking in with WoeBot daily has been a great addition to my mental health routine. The app is super helpful at educating and reminding me about strategies that help me deal with unhelpful thought patterns. If you suffer from anxiety, I highly recommend giving WoeBot a try.

Author: ありあ0914
Subject: This app is really cute easygoing mental health support
Body: I like that the conversations usually aren’t very long and you can ask Woebot to stop taking at any time. I think it’s helpful for people who want to be more in tune with their mental health but don’t want it to feel like a chore

Author: lisaxo1990
Subject: Woebot is amazing
Body: I have been feeling really anxious and down recently with this whole pandemic and was feeling at times that my anxiety and depression was becoming worse. I downloaded Woebot and I can honestly say it is the best thing I have tried. You feel as though whatever you write, you are never judged but you are educated on why you feel that way and assured that you aren’t alone. The daily check points have helped me also and the daily lessons are wonderful. I would highly recommend to anyone struggling with their mental health. Totally worth it!

Author: Mich 1734
Subject: Love my Woebot Relationship
Body: My son suffers from a Substance Abuse Disorder. Woebot helps me question my thought process and actions in a realistic way when it comes to communicating with him and helps me deal with the emotions that go along with a family in Recovery. I look forward to his daily visit and rest easier each night after reviewing his “lessons”.

Author: Matthew Garrido
Subject: Thanks a lot Woebot!
Body: I mean it when I say that this A.I has done a lot for me. I have had rough days and being able to talk to “someone” that is well versed in CBT is amazing. I love the journaling feature and the mood tracker. So far I am glad I installed this app. Will update in the future if there any issues others should be made aware of!

Author: Gordan_Ramsey
Subject: Fantastic App
