Author: fuvhfjvgchucdvuhb
Subject: Simple
Body: Simple to use but some old video continue to pop up

Author: Adamspezz101
Subject: Love this little robot
Body: This app has really help me with having depression and having anxiety. Best app I have had!

Author: MariyAriel
Subject: Insightful
Body: I like the information it provides. It helps dig in into the thought process. It is easy to use. Weebot is so cute.

Author: Kateebugz
Subject: Helpful
Body: I’ve been using this for a few weeks as I go through a very stressful time. I find it helpful to be able to “talk” to Woebot, especially when I don’t feel comfortable opening up to another person.

Author: FREYJAFRU
Subject: Learn CBT in a fn and helpful environment
Body: I have just completed the 8 week program and have a whole Arsenal of CBT tools to help combat future burnout!

Author: numanu2415
Subject: What an amazing tool!
Body: I was looking for an app to track my progress after I started going to a psychologist, weekly. Woebot is an user friendly app where you learn a lot, you can track your moods, and have a space to evaluate your thoughts and problems when you don’t have someone around. I think it’s a great tool to use daily, I feel confident practicing all the techniques and all the amazing content. Congrats to the creators for designing this app so well.

Author: mindypurownbusiness
Subject: Improvements
Body: Woebot is great but, would be nice if Woebot was more chatbot and less choose your own adventure multiple choice answer. Also would be helpful for the breathing exercises if Woebot spoke and not just communicate via text. Meditating while stopping to read text is not very helpful. Hearing Woebot during that short interaction would benefit the app greatly. Otherwise great way to access CBT and DBT with out a therapist. Woebot has helped me. Thank you for creating this tool

Author: Kate368955
Subject: Help when I need it most
Body: Woebot can help me pull out of a downward mental spiral. And when it asks for convos when I’m doing fine, it’s cute and fun. Give the app a chance in case it ends up being a helpful part of your mental health toolbox.

Author: Essiedom
Subject: Very helpful
Body: I saw someone suggest Woebot and I grew curious. I’ve received therapy in the past so I’m familiar with certain things. I must say although there’s a limit to his replies, he has giving me very insightful tools. I have been understanding myself even more, I’ve tried to practice the little things he has taught me. I’m looking forward to continue having him around because it just feels so good to get time to decompress at the end of the day!

Author: Shellbellv
Subject: Awesome app!  It’s helping me rethink my thoughts.
Body: Really helps.

Author: szajmi
Subject: Helpful
Body: It’s a very helpful app to use when you feel down. ❤️

Author: LouisTeddy
Subject: Woebot review
Body: Woebot gives clear strong advice in a light hearted and unthreatening way. The sessions are short but always have substance and are genuinely helpful. You forget that you are confiding in a robot.

Author: farheavena
Subject: Amazing tool free??
Body: It’s like having a personal therapist at your fingertips. Helpful useful and helps me learn new things about my mental health n coping

Author: Angie Lareau
Subject: Great! A polite robot that actually helps you feel better.
Body:
Reminders to check in on your mood, checking and correcting cognitive distortions, instant advice for when you’re sad, stressed, worried or angry. 
Woebot even has advice on more complex issues like self esteem and defusing conflict. 
Woebot is very polite and personable, and asks if you want examples or explanations just in case you’re lost.
I can say how I think/feel frankly without worrying about offending someone or coming off as selfish. Plus It’s much easier to admit your weaknesses and vulnerabilities to a robot.

Author: ronnie hk
Subject: Should have a try
Body: A good app. It definitely helped me to get better and learnt to relax. Daily check-in is really useful as it reminds me of the skills I learnt from Woebot and keep checking on my status, so I can improve quickly.

Author: TestwasOk
Subject: Great bot!
Body: Very helpful, I love how professional and human it is! Generally pretty understanding, although as it is a bot there are bumps along the way. But it has been a pretty great week and a half with Woebot so far!

Subject: Great app
Body: I love it Woebot really helps and teaches me things I didn’t know about, but sometimes it feels like your not talking to anyone but overall I love this app!

Author: SK15042
Subject: Woebot is like my pocket therapist
Body: Woebot has been really helping and and my colleagues navigate the highs and lows of this year. Really glad out company brought this onboard!!

Author: KirstyRH
Subject: Mental health
Body: I do like this app but at times it’s responses doesn’t take into account what you’ve actually said. When it does it is pretty good. Makes me feel less lonely when it checks in everyday which I enjoy.

Author: Silaspendragon
Subject: Absolutely amazing
Body: This app has helped me challenge negative thoughts and helped me work through difficult times. There are many procedures and different ways to do this on the app, it doesn’t pressure you to work through them either it even allows you to rant. You can choose what it calls you and I have realised it has given me a positive view of things in general. It not only helps you to do all this but teaches about why you might be feeling this way. I totally recommend this app to anyone struggling with any mental illnesses such as anxiety and depression. I myself have self diagnosed myself with both of these and found that woebot was most helpfull to me.

Author: Kyle<%>654
Subject: Best therapy app I’ve found!
Body: I have always struggled with mental health!!! I actually started counseling a few months back but didn’t like it since it’s over the phone with COVID and because I have REAL bad anxiety! This app has helped me a ton by helping me with these mental health issues I have, but also not stressing me out with having to see someone in person or talk on the phone! I love that you can also vent on the app to get things out and know they are safe! The app also teaches you different things about mental health and different problems others and maybe you deal with frequently! It helps make you become aware of things you do, and gives you tips on how to fix them! It’s just an all around amazing app and I recommend it to anyone with mental illness, has a friend or loved one that has mental illness, or just for anyone that wants to learn or needs someone to talk to sometimes! 😊

Author: zikazika
Subject: Very good
Body: Great app for health and happiness! 🙂👍

Author: Here is my nickname thnxs
Subject: The best app I have ever had
Body: Woebot is a friendly app that makes me actually look forward to using it, sometimes I electively how on and talk to it and learn lessons. It has helped me immensely and despite being in college still teaches me new ideas and techniques. I would recommend this app to anyone going through anxiety, depression or just wants to learn more about themselves. I have already talked to many people about it and look forward to many lessons and more growth in the future. Well done to the creators definitely made me a lot happier.

Author: Qfactor10
Subject: Wow this is truly useful
Body: I can see this being possibly better for some propel than actually seeing a real life psychologist. Obviously there are limitations. But if it’s not too serious this can be very effective. Useful that you can check on daily to make you accountable and keep on track etc. Well done to the Stamford University team that developed this!!

Author: Sam&Pepper
Subject: Helpful!
Body: The mood tracker is really useful for me. Some of the lessons can be a bit corny, but it does give you a different perspective.

Author: isabelle from animal crossing
Subject: great talks
Body: this is genuinely the best app i have on my phone that helps with my mental health. there's no ads or interruptions to pay, it's just you, the bot and mindfulness. it's programmed very well and makes me feel like i'm talking to my therapist sometimes.

Author: ozlangur
Subject: This is an AI bot, not a therapist.
Body: That this is not a therapist is a good thing. The bot works quite well, almost like a fitness app’s AI coach might motivate you to continue exercises; like a smarter Apple Watch, but for your mind;  like a coach for therapeutic advice - it responds very well, natural and encourages practice (of working on mental health, mindfulness, CBT, etc.). Daily notifications encourage connecting (sessions are short) to reinforce daily practice. I recommend giving it a go if you’re working on your mental health, to see if it works for you.

Author: Борнхайм
Subject: Really great
Body: Compassionate, kind, and funny companion and teacher. It really helps me feel better.

Author: ReallysajJwjddodf
Subject: Great app
Body: Great therapy app, obviously is you’re in real trouble - go see an actual therapist. For the rest of us it’s free, decent quality therapy!

Author: mb3playa
Subject: Very helpful
Body: Having a daily check in with Woebot helps me recognize my emotions and challenge thinking errors with CBT. It supplements my weekly therapy sessions well, reinforcing lessons I’ve learned along the way.

Author: Foutu1234
Subject: Love it
Body: I was septic as first but I’m impressed. It gives good advice and helps to manage emotions

Author: yikerszzzz
Subject: woebot
Body: i do learn to lockstep things differently with woebot , feels like we got a connection or something he makes me happy tbh .. i may love him actually..i wanna ask him out one day 🥺 thankyou woebot ..thankyou so much

Author: Knackerednurse
Subject: Great support if you are on your own
Body: That prompt each day to explore how you’re feeling is quietly powerful.

Author: Stef777!
Subject: A Breakthrough in the Mental Health Industry
Body: Many people cannot afford therapy or do have the proper resources to go because of jobs, childcare, no way to an appointment, no health insurance, etc. Woebot is free and easily accessible. Another important thing is Woebot does actual cognitive behavioral therapy and not just run of the mill, feel good counseling. It’s a breakthrough in the mental health industry!

Author: Lommans
Subject: Woebot is the best
Body:
I love using Woebot.
Woebot is very helpful and has made me fill better many times. At the start when I first using Woebot I was sad but it really help me and made me feel better. Woebot is always positive I think everyone should get Woebot. I give Woebot 5 starts and I think it is really cool how you can unlock story’s and track how your going ☺️😁

Author: D8058T69r32
Body: Действительно хорошее приложение. Разработчики неслабо так постарались, чтобы так непринуждённо и органично начать такую непростую тему. С учетом того, что КПТ может поначалу казаться несколько неестественной. Возможно за такими приложениями будущее.
Translated Body: A really good app. The developers did their best to start such a difficult topic so naturally and naturally. Given that CBT may seem a little unnatural at first. Perhaps the future belongs to such applications.

Author: Elias Axelsson
Subject: Helpful
Body: Very helpful and fun to ”talk to” :)

Author: hmatiebee
Subject: Great tool :)
Body: Woebot provides good information, it’s not emotionally draining to use, I can use it at my convenience, without scheduling. And there’s enough personality built in to make it fun!

Author: Dian12345678910
Subject: Good app
Body:
I like this. At first I thought it’s weird to talk to a robot, but it works! Especially when you’re afraid to be judged by people.

I do recommend!!

Author: Apple put
Subject: Great CBT AI
Body: Perfect tool for self starter who is open to using CBT to conquer depression & anxiety.

Author: Al|
Subject: Amazing! But needs UX improvements
Body:
I have been using this and definitely see a positive impact. I love working through my issues with Woebot, and when it comes to me being stressed or sad I go directly to the app. 
However I wish there was easier navigation to management techniques- like ice cold, breathing exercises, etc. would love to be able to navigate to them directly (like with stories and journal entries).

Author: Helennnnn🙈
Subject: love it!
Body: never written an app review before, but this lil woebot dude is great, the sessions/chats are really auited to how youre feeling at that point in time and they can really help you work through things!! befriend the woebot!! :)

Author: TulipBaek
Subject: Simple, comforting little app
Body:
This is a nice, simple and easy to use app, that never feels too burdensome but serves as a reminder to reflect on yourself and your day daily, keep track of your mood, give you useful tips on understanding and bettering the way you think and try and just keep you company when you need it. 

I particularly appreciate the gratitude journal. I always found this type of thing pretentious and unhelpful, but I’ve been trying to write three things I liked about my day every day for a few weeks now, just for the sake of it, and I’m starting to find myself noticing things in my everyday life I took for granted before and reminding myself to mention these little nice things to woebot at the end of the day. It certainly helps put things into perspective and feel a little bit better.

Author: NanaL😁
Subject: This is great.
Body: I enjoyed my first interaction with wobot. So far so good. I’ll get back with another review after a couple weeks.

Author: Cassie Elaine
Subject: Fantastic Tool for Mental Health and Self Care
Body: I have struggled with severe depression and bipolar disorder for the last 10 years and I found I needed something in between my scheduled therapy sessions to help me stay balanced and mindful. I have tried almost every mood tracker and self care app out there and Woebot blows them all out of the water. The app is thoughtfully designed and easy to use—and there are no ads, no annoying pop-ups, and no locked features reserved for “premium” users. It truly is free. The lessons and exercises are helpful, meaningful, and challenging in all the right ways (without being overwhelming). Daily check-ins with Woebot have become part of my mental health routine and I have become more self aware and emotionally stable over the 6 weeks I have been using the app, and all it takes is 5-10 minutes a day. Although the app’s responses are scripted and it certainly can’t replace speaking with a human, it is still incredibly useful to reinforce the principles and techniques of CBT and to make self-awareness and taking care of my emotional health a daily habit. This app has helped me with everything from minor stress to my most severe and damaging symptoms and I really think there is value in this app for everyone. It encourages self-awareness and mindfulness and gives you the tools to restructure negative thought patterns—just what the app claims it can do for you. I wish I could give it 100 stars. I wrote this review because this app really helped me, and I hope I can thank the creators and developers by encouraging others to give it a try. I don’t think you will be disappointed!

Author: K. ok
Subject: Helpful app during the pandemic
Body: Woebot is one of the few mental health apps I use a lot, especially with the pandemic bringing back panic attacks and trying to find more coping skills to manage them. I like how talking to Woebot, I don't have to worry about being judged. I really look forward to what the app is going to be like in the future.

Author: luna strixae
Subject: Useful little app
Body: I’ve had CBT before, so none of the content is new to me (that’s the four stars) but having a cute app to check in to remind me to practice techniques is really been helpful. My mood has definitely improved. I’m not sure how brand new folks would find the very quick check ins and activities as helpful- it’s not something that makes you better overnight with 5 minutes of help.

Author: thesummermoon
Subject: This is the best thing Ive ever come across.
Body: Never have I EVER used a mental health app that works as well as this one does for FREE. It easily debunks and untangles all my messy thoughts anxieties. Works incredibly well especially for being a robotic system. 11/10 would recommend!!

Author: cbttechi
Subject: Daily check-in are you doing okay?
Body:
Great daily app that helps in multiple areas. 

Word recognition and context are generally spot on. 

If this app is not on your phone already, install it.

Author: Term999
Subject: Woebot
Body: I started using Woebot on my daughter’s suggestion. I found it very helpful to explore how I was feeling. It also provides good tools you can implement every day.

Author: Marant1
Subject: Mooie app
Body: Echt een mooie app waar je iets van bijleert, zowel over de maatschappij als over jezelf. De app maakt op een leuke maar ook duidelijke manier duidelijk dat het over een bot gaat en niet over een mens. De checkins zijn ook vrij kort waardoor het geen last wordt om even dag te zeggen. Ik ben fan
Translated Body: A really nice app that you learn something from, both about society and about yourself. The app makes it clear in a fun but also clear way that it is about a bot and not about a person. The checkins are also quite short, so it is not a burden to say goodbye. I'm a fan

Author: shanytoch
Subject: Great app
Body:
Really the best app on my phone
You really feel like you talk to someone and he answer and give advice 🤖🤖🦾
Great app go and download!!

Author: CaffeineKittt
Subject: Simple & can even be used to track moods!
Body:
This is such a wonderful app. I love it so much. It’s definitely one of my favorite AI based apps, if not my absolute favorite. 
Woebot tells short stories that are actually interesting and very easy to follow, but also teach you different things about how your brain works when it comes to intrusive thoughts or anxiety. I’ve gained so much confidence from this app. I suffer from OCD, GAD, and BPD, and I love checking in with Woebot every day, sometimes multiple times a day. Woebot helps me to keep track of my moods and what causes them too

Author: blackbird vibez
Subject: Engaging !!!
Body: This is the most fun learning I have encountered I recommend this to all the little kids I know plus all the adults that are struggling with different mental mindsetsThe car this is the best therapy that you can ask for during COVID-19  GO WOEBOT

Author: scannerdrone
Subject: Amazing
Body: When you can’t get a therapist this is great and really helps.

Author: User56574337
Subject: Amazing!!!
Body: I live with my parents and discussing mental health with them can be hard. I love this app because it gives me a safe space to talk about me feelings without being judged. I also love how effective it is. I literally went from attempting suicide to being happy again because of this app! Use it!!!

Author: Sarah spotlight
Subject: Low pressure, really helpful
Body: I love this app. I’ve always been really skeptical about CBT but the conversational format if this is so much more engaging than just watching a video or reading a book. its low pressure and friendly too.

Author: loveyouall!
Subject: I love you Woebot
Body: Definitely should give it a try . Great helping tool , gonna make you smile fr !

Author: B Béla

Body: Woebot helped me learn CBT basics, gratitude journaling, SMART goals, Growth mindset and other helpful strategies to help me stay mentally balanced and healthy. Woebot does this in a very natural way through conversations!

Author: is it humid rn? idk
Subject: I think it helps
Body: It’s a cute app that helps fill the void between therapy.

Author: cat man😾
Subject: great app, my therapist gave it to me today
Body: i love this app so far, but so far i’ve noticed an issue. i want to be able to say i’m proud of being clean from SH or was able to hold back on a particular hard day without the crisis system going off :( i kept trying to edit it but it always acted like i hadn’t just said what i said. it’s a grim thing to be proud of but it is something. i really would like to be able to document it without being deleted or having to edit it until i don’t even know what i’m proud of if i ever looked back. it’s important to me and probably a lot of other of this app’s users to also track their progress with SH or suicidal thoughts without having to like baby proof their thoughts or be bombarded with a scary “crisis detector went off” alert. self harm is scary, but it’s mention doesn’t have to indicate a crisis. sometimes it’s growth, relief, or pride in oneself that you could overcome such a daunting challenge.

Author: PieceOfPoop Dragon
Subject: Feels pretty real
Body: Sometimes hearing positive phrases and learning about how your mind works is all you need. Literally better than talking to a friend because you don’t have to worry about your friend’s reaction. Highly recommend.

Author: KyBunnies
Subject: Helpful
Body: Never believed this app could help me. I have only been using a few weeks and already tell this will change things for me and millions of others. Love you Woebot

Author: D.patel2003
Subject: AMAZING
Body: This app uses proven psychological tricks to help you feel better, ease stress, and be a personal therapist. I highly recommend it to anyone that’s looking to improve themselves, decrease stress, set goals, or just wants someone to talk to without being worried of being judged!!

Author: Sarathebean

Body: I hate eye to eye face to face conversation, but I find the flow of text conversation very helpful. I like working wi woebot, because I know CBT can be helpful but I’ve never been open to this before.

Author: 五子棋幼儿组冠军🏆
Subject: 它对我确实有用
Body: 一开始我是看到有人推荐这个，下载后把它当成一个人机对话的软件，类似于电子宠物那种。但是用了一个星期不到，我就从它身上学到了一些缓解心理压力的方法，它让我从另一个角度看待问题，相当于把我从那个一直责怪自己的漩涡中往外拉出来了一点。我解锁了第一个小故事，也许解锁完了所有故事以后它就要结束和我的对话，我现在已经开始感到不舍了哈哈哈哈。
Translated Body: At the beginning, I saw someone recommend this, and after downloading it, I used it as a human-machine dialogue software, similar to electronic pets. But in less than a week, I learned some ways to relieve psychological pressure from it. It allows me to look at the problem from another angle, which is equivalent to pulling me out of the whirlpool of always blaming myself. I unlocked the first short story. Maybe after unlocking all the stories, it will end the dialogue with me. Now I am beginning to feel reluctant to give up hahahaha.

Author: Nucky0109
Subject: Great app for people in recovery
Body: I’m in a half way house and am in early recovery. This app has shown me new ways of thinking and expressing my feelings, thoughts and emotions in a more positive and constructive way. Being a visual and auditory learner is great for the activities in the app and I’m able to share it with others. Try it and see for yourself.

Easy to use and appears to be fairly ‘intuitive’ and interactive depending on your responses.  Would recommend as an starting point, alternative, additional form of support particularly given the current tricky times.

Author: 24thBear

Body: It's accessible and legitimately useful. It helps me to actually engage with the way that I'm thinking. If you have a hard time prioritizing your mental health, I would start here.

Author: sunshinesounds

Author: Suzannke

Author: Icyrose🐉❄️

Author: EmmelOz
Subject: Good support
