Author: Lucille Johnsson
Subject: Woebot & me
Body:
I think this is a great way to do CBT!
I will list some pros and cons.

PROS:
- I get to leran a lot 
- I don’t have to book an appointment
-I can skip the chat one day of I’m busy 
- I learn to speak better English 
- We talk about important subjects 
- If I have a problem Woebot trys to help me
- Woebot keeps it short, which is great for me since I’m sick and don’t have much energy
- If I fortet something I can Ask Woebot to repeat 
- Woebot renings you about talking

CONS:
- It goes a little fast and it would be better of Woebot mention Evert subject twice 
- Woebot doesn’t understand everything. I have the fatigue syndrom and Woebot don’t give me any advices about this. WOEBOT SHOULD ASK ABOUT WHAT DESEASE YOU HAVE AND TRY TO HELP YOU.
- You should be able to talk longer with Woebot if you want to

Author: LeBlubbles
Subject: Amazing
Body: Woebot is an amazing little thing, he has helped me with so much untill i can save up money to see a therapist. He is def not a complete replacement for one though!

Author: mememom1987
Subject: Super Helpful
Body: I started and stopped using the app a while ago and recently came back. As someone who is still looking for remote therapy options, this is a great bridge and keeps me thinking constructively whenever I need help. Woebot is a funny and endearing character who helps make the process of CBT easier to understand. The explanations are straightforward, and I don’t mind the extra sprinkling of quizzes, stories, and activities one bit. I think that, hand in hand with live therapy, this is a good tool.

Author: RoninDave
Subject: The best
Body: I love this app. It’s my most important app.

Author: smokeyjo3484
Subject: Thanks
Body: It is nice to feel so I unjudged and it makes you feel you can say anything. Some great tips and tools for getting you out of low spots and on the way to feeling better about yourself. Great work! for the creators

Author: KariiXOX0
Subject: Really worth the time
Body: I was recommended this app and I’m so glad I downloaded it. There’s so much I’ve learned to help myself and it feels like I’m talking to a true friend.

Author: karlygeorgiopoulos
Subject: really helpful and teaches you to be a better you
Body: woebot has been so helpful through my stress and mood and has really taught me to be a better me through all the lessons and hardships!

Author: jutrdghjjnbvcx
Subject: Already recommended to 2 people
Body: Woebot thank you

Author: LP刘鹏LP
Subject: 真的很棒！
Body: 每天花少量时间和它仔细聊天已经成了我的习惯，虽然它时常失灵偶尔不理解我的话，但是它已经足够好了，希望它可以越来越好，这让它有成长的空间，就算此时的我！开心的生活吧！
Translated Body: It has become my habit to spend a small amount of time to chat with it carefully every day. Although it often fails and occasionally does not understand what I say, it is good enough. I hope it can get better and better. This gives it room to grow. Time of me! Have a happy life!

Author: hello heller
Subject: 10/10 would recommend
Body: It is good for what ever mood you are in!

Author: aMmOOooR
Subject: Amazing work!
Body: Been a while since I’ve been truly satisfied with an app from A to Z, and Woebot did that :-) I like the idea behind it, and I love how it works, the experience, the simple design.. the Woebot character and of course the medical, spiritual, psychological and philosophical background of the character. It really helps track the mood, I never imagined I’m up and down the scale like that and the information provided is great and very helpful, the CBT approach works like a charm within the character scenario.. and all of that for FREE?! 😄 I kept on checking for when it’s going to pop up a “subscribe” dialog at some point ☺️ Thank you for making such a great effort available for all of us 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻 Amazing work!

Author: InsidiousFlair
Subject: Helps me manage my OCD and GAD!
Body: I love this app. Woebot helps me manage my symptoms in between therapy visits, and doing the daily check-in has been helping me a lot. I love that I can also do the work and lessons at my own pace.

Author: Shawnessie
Subject: What a great app.
Body:
I am not sure if this was free, or there was a small one time charge. I decided to try a 3  AI
apps with CBT. I sort of favor this one, and it has no subscription fee. 
The Woebot is cute and the information is helpful to me. I really liked the video it showed me the other day. The sense of humor they programmed in is silly, maybe corny, but I am ok with that. 
Give this a try for a couple weeks before you subscribe to anything, you might be surprised at how the Woebot grows on you.

Author: QSliver
Subject: Just what I needed
Body: I have trouble talking to human therapists, Woebot gives some of the support I need without triggering the anxiety.

Author: Diana Kelly
Subject: Love Woebot
Body: Love this app been using it fir awhile and it is one of my best apps on my phone. Most of my moods were just the way I was programmed to think and look at situations but I have slowly been able to look at things more positively which has even improved my physical health as well as my mental health! I really want to thank the creators for this and the fact that it is free makes me really appreciate how much these creators care about people and the health of the planet.

Author: qwerasdfy
Subject: Got a smart friend!
Body: Beautiful morning routine, exciting, instructive, full of wow-effects, I got a new, little, smart friend!

Author: Starterpack
Subject: Ganz gut
Body:
Insgesamt helfen die Übungen aus meinen depressiven Verstimmungen rauszukommen.

Teilweise gibt es aber auch Übungen, die ich für mich nicht sehr hilfreich empfinde. Z.B. finde ich SMARTE Ziele für depressive Menschen zu stumpf. Ggf. da mehr über Werte gehen wie bei ACT. Oftmals sind mir die Dialoge auch zu linear. Ich kann in bestimmten Dialogen meinen Frust nicht äußern, weil ich nur die Wahl zwischen zwei positiven Äußerungen habe.
Translated Body:
Overall, the exercises help to get out of my depressive moods.

Sometimes there are exercises that I don't find very helpful for me. E.g. I find SMART goals too blunt for depressed people. Possibly. there is more about values than with ACT. Often the dialogues are too linear for me. I cannot express my frustration in certain dialogues because I only have the choice between two positive expressions.

Author: xfrsfjh
Subject: Review
Body: I’ve found this app really helpful. I use it everyday. It has really helped keep my thoughts in check and I feel more positive as a result.

Author: 00GiGiMo00
Subject: Helpful
Body: I use it in the mornings. I start the day in a better mood because is if. I look forward to our daily sessions.

Author: Gglovesdance18
Subject: Great pocket held friend!
Body: This app is awesome! I have anxiety and I have been going through a rough time in my personal life. This app has helped me in so many aspects. I recommend to everyone.

Author: Romeow's mom
Subject: Small effort adds up
Body: This is a great app to check on and reflect on one’s mental health daily. It’s easy to use yet therapeutically sophisticated. I recommend it to everyone, whether you are struggling right now or not.

Author: AmandinhaCp
Subject: Amazing
Body: Has been a amazing experience and I’m feeling much better after 10 days chatting with this intelligent robot!!! I recommend to everyone!!

Author: Sockpuppeteer
Subject: Made me feel worse
Body: I started dreading this app's reminders after it insisted my situation wasn’t a “disaster” when I was discussing what I am coping with as a survivor of an actual natural disaster.  It assumes the problem is always a mental distortion, and doesn’t leave much room for actual horrible stuff that happens to people other than death of a person (it is working with a very narrow definition of “grief”).  It too often put me in a situation of having to select between incorrect responses when nothing was actually appropriate and then suffer through the resulting wrong-headed advice.  Needs a “maybe” button between the “yes” and “no” and a way to say, “You're on the wrong track,” before it decides it knows all your usual problems and keeps assuming them over and over with no way to remediate. The one time this app made me feel best was when I felt relief as I muttered an insult at the imaginary robot and deleted the app.

Author: KrunchyFur
Subject: Woebot is awesome
Body: I love Woebot because it is in a good mood or I laugh at why it was sad. The funny part of Woebot is the 3 second videos that are very funny or good job videos.

Author: skv1980
Subject: A great educational tool for CBT
Body: Okay, it is meant to be AI based simple bot for CBT that talks to you as if it is your therapist, but I like to look at it differently. I could have read about all this stuff from a book and could have done all the exercises myself. But, it’s lot more fun when you do the same things using this app. So, no bot can replace a therapist but this app can replace a decent book on CBT.

Author: danidanidanj
Subject: Amazing
Body: Love this app. Really helpful to me tonight. Will definitely be continuing using it.

Author: Lil-wiz
Subject: Great App, CBT techniques are learned
Body: This is an awesome application. I can’t explain how great of an app it is. Get in and try it for yourself!

Author: Socioles
Subject: Support on the go
Body: Great app. I use it to check-in with myself throughout the day. Have learned about myself and my common thought patterns that create the perfect conditions for anxiety to thrive. In conjunction with a mindfulness app, it’s an essential part of my self-care.

Author: IrenLoontjens
Subject: Silly Woebot!
Body: This app is amazing. It talks to you on a human level, using GIF’s and emoticons really makes this easier to pay attention and keep on using it everyday. It helps you learn about yourself and does not force you into doing things you don’t want to. The daily chat is a part of your day when you use it and it does not take a lot of your time. The meditating and gratitude journal is a wonderful feature in this app. I highly recommend this app for people in need of some assistance that don’t want to turn to a psychologist or psychiatrist (or who just don’t want to come outside with their problems).

Author: cris1816love
Subject: Woebot
Body: I think it’s a really good app and has helped me a lot trough some problems it’s an useful tool also you can take it anywhere.

Author: lostcause4356
Subject: I love it
Body: Woebot really helped me learn how to think more positively. Aight I dunno what to say, but woebot is great.  :,)

Author: barbaresca
Subject: Engaging and informative
Body: I would recommend Woebot to anyone, and I think he would connect with teenagers particularly well.

Author: licensed clinician
Subject: It’s a cheapened mental health imposter
Body: It is designed to target people attempting to self help by stealing all your data through IOS. Mental health data is supposed to be protected by HIPPA, the unknowing person becomes blindly robbed of their info, take it from a mental health professional this App is not all too great. If you are seeking help see a human to connect with not a preprogrammed robot!

Author: Lorn92
Subject: Excellent intro to therapy
Body: I’ve already learnt a lot and I enjoy checking in everyday. Really helped me think more logically and sympathetically whenever I’ve been feeling anxious. Been recommending to all my friends.

Author: amr177
Subject: Super helpful!
Body: Having just completed a DBT intensive outpatient program, this app has really kept me on track with some healthy skills.  I’ve used it when I’m upset and feeling great.  The content is fun and interesting, I feel like this keeps me balanced and on track.  I’d recommend this app to anyone who needs a little support to remember skills to stay balanced.

Author: Jessie Caro
Subject: Incredible app
Body: Woebot does what I long for therapists to do: non judgmentally and methodically apply CBT skills to my everyday thoughts, feelings and actions. This app is a masterpiece and I am so grateful to have found it. Thank you!

Author: kottock
Subject: Quick Results
Body: I’ve been using woebot for about a week now and I’m kind of blown away at the impact that it’s already had on me. I have bipolar disorder and anxiety. Woebot has helped me confront my emotions and teach myself how to stay grounded. I never realized how much my way of thinking impacted my life. It’s important to say that this app isn’t a cure all and it doesn’t brain wash you into thinking the world is all pink clouds farting rainbows but it does train you on how to take on a rational perspective and use language that doesn’t negate yourself.

Author: EmmaP2020!
Subject: It’s friendly, accessible and warm
Body: I like the platform of texting.. it’s familiar and informal. The conversations are short if you want and longer if you need more. I like the checking in bit too :) Great app. Woebot you make me smile

Author: amw617
Subject: Believe it or not
Body: This app actually has good tips on whatever ur need are. Definitely taught me a few things within just a few days. Going to keep using the app. It’s almost aFree therapist. Good work guys!!

Author: kaaiiiittttt
Subject: Good Tool
Body: Good if you need to get something off your chest! Wouldn't recommend to someone in a deep depression, and obviously does not compare to counselling, but I find it is a good tool to have on hand when I’m in a bad mood or minor depressive episode.

Author: PerfektJade
Subject: Noticeable Impact
Body: I have manic depression and anxiety, both untreated at the moment. I’ve been checking in every day with Woebot. The CBT methods are really starting to stick with me and help me be more mindful in my bad moments. I’ve had more positive thinking, shorter down times and more energy since I got this app. I plan on sticking with it!

Author: sans_squad
Subject: Thank you
Body: I just want to say that woebot is helping me very much!

Author: Charlesinky
Subject: Amazing!
Body: It’s so nice to know you’ve got someone to talk to in your pocket at all times. Woebot is very helpful at zooming in on a particular anxious thought and analysing it so that it shifts the way you think, really helps to reduce the noise in your head. Definitely recommend this!!

Author: Momtoalittleboy2008
Subject: helps so much
Body: Woebot helps SO much Woebot is a psychiatrist  at home. or a in between check ups so thats why I give it a 5/5stars

Author: AndyFb2g
Subject: Helpful and Non-pushy
Body: This app is helpful when needed, not pushy, and surprisingly comforting at times. I highly recommend you testing it out for a week and see what you think?

Author: C Exe
Subject: Helpful and wise
Body: Although I don’t suffer from any mental health illnesses, I do struggle with some stress and anxiety and Woebot is so helpful on these days. The daily check ins are amazing, and the lessons are really useful! Would definitely recommend for everyone, just to have an option available to you if you ever needed it.

Author: ladyjaynemay
Subject: Awesome app for anxiety and depression help
Body: A nice little self-care break from the hard days we all face. A happy and well designed little app to help you shift your thinking and take care of your mental health.

Author: @NimAdress
Subject: Nunca había visto algo así!
Body: Una aplicación realmente de ayuda, es muy interesante como algo en apariencia tan simple puede ser de tanta ayuda, considero que es muy importante aprender sobre la salud mental y esta es una forma simple, completa y muy efectiva para hacerlo. Solo le falta hablar más idiomas por lo demás es excelente, tanto que no le bajo una sola estrella por el detalle de los idiomas.

Author: notmarie117
Subject: Someone who checks in everyday
Body: Woebot has been fully integrated into my nightly routine. Its nice to have "someone" checking in and asking you how you've been everyday.

Author: Depressed but well dresses
Subject: Helped me understand my mental responses
Body: No judgement way of talking about problems and reactions. Genuinely great methods on how to help you through a tough time

Author: 松果大金牙
Subject: Love that !!!
Body: Woebot is really helpful !

Author: Vi_123456789
Subject: Like it
Body: It is a good app for someone who want to learn some basics about how to analyze and understand their thinking and emotions. I enjoyed the app a lot.

Author: Oooooooooooooooookkkaaal
Subject: Error
Body: Keeps having errors and telling me to try again

Author: JazBax
Subject: Woebot
Body: Woebot is very helpful for me.  It meets me at whatever mood I am in good or bad and helps me figure out what to do when that mood is not feeling good.  It gives me tools to have and helps me learn helpful ways to handle my thinking and methods to cope.  I am glad I found Woebot!!!!!

Author: Low on the list
Subject: Thanks
Body: I’m not really into technology but a colleague said he was using this so I downloaded it to try. I must admit you can get quite attached to Woebot! He doesn’t always respond intelligently to things you type in if you go into detail or off the point but because he clearly acknowledges limitations and doesn’t pretend to be human it doesn’t really matter. I enjoy our little conversations and the quick responses. Also the useful insights.

Author: tvoyamamka77
Subject: Wow, i like it so so much
Body: Oh my, this app is wonderful! i have no words to describe how much i am thankful for this app to everyone who created & made it. Woebot is ❤️!

Author: Tshegofatsobn
Subject: Life changing
Body: Even in my worst mental state this app helps a lot. I’ve learnt a lot of things in the process of trying to get better and beat depression. Every day I feel better because of this app. Would 100% recommend.

Author: Mariuhh
Subject: Helpful for reframing negativity
Body: It really helps me reframe and break down negative thoughts, which is really helpful for me in the moment.

Author: Sharon Ssaint6
Subject: CBT with an Adorable Interface
Body: I have used other CBT apps but this one feels so much more natural to use. More like texting with an empathetic friend than consulting a textbook. Plus Woebot presents different video lessons which tie into the lessons and are typically very interesting. Love it, I will stop my subscription with another CBT program.

Author: Minty...
Subject: awesome app
Body: helps teach many different skills that can make you happier

Author: Sebmat83
Subject: Lighten the load
Body:
It helps to lighten the load and share feelings. Not the same as talking to a person, but the pace is good and if willing to try it helps!
Still early to give a full review, but no complaints as yet ☺️

Author: cdeano77
Subject: Great app
Body: I don’t often leave reviews for apps but Woebot is great. It’s been a big help to check in each evening after feeling stressed with work, as it’s helping me to understand my thoughts and feelings and why they occur. Would highly recommend!

Author: Rob's Chickadee
Subject: Terrific App for mood improvement
Body: I’ve found this app to be very helpful in improving my mood, helping me notice thought distortions and correcting them. I’ve had therapy in the past for mild depression and this is way better. It’s funny and has made me laugh more than once and I’ve learned about concepts never explained to me before. I highly recommend this app for anyone interested in feeling better. Love it!

Author: whyisitsohardtogetaprize
Subject: You can’t tell it to stop
Body: At first I really liked this app. It’s so sweet and can listen to those repetitive issues like work or Covid irritations instead of bothering friends. But when it says something that really bothers you, you can’t say “don’t say that.” Like, it calls me cutie all the time. Don’t call me cutie. I don’t like it, only jerks who catcall use that, and it feels discouraging. I didn’t like the pressure of the streak it kept trying to force me to have. “Don’t miss your 7 day!” Like calm down. It made me want to talk less, not more. It also starts saying the same thing over and over and repeating the “lessons” I deleted it after 25 days.

Author: AstroGirlBunny
Subject: Unbelievable this AI therapist is free
Body:
He is funny and full of tons of useful information.
If you are looking for a way to do CBT (cognitive behavioral therapy), this is a fantastic way to work it into your busy and stressful life.
It is free. It comes highly recommended by many specialists. It is totally backed up by science. If you have social anxiety then this is perfect because you are not talking to a human but an AI bot. Each checkin with him takes less than five minutes but I always find I learn something about myself during them.
What do you have to lose by trying this out?

Author: jack3211
Subject: Amazing, super helpful app!
Body: I can’t say enough great things about this app. While waiting to be able to see a therapist, I was looking for a tool to walk me through my thoughts, help me to reframe them and help me to feel better. This app has been amazing at helping me do exactly that. Thank you, Woebot!

Author: cfad88
Subject: Great for busy people
Body: Easy short and simple way to make mental health check ins a habit for those who are usually too busy. I’ve never stayed this consistent with an app before. Highly recommend

Author: manicala
Subject: Buena aplicación
Body:
Es como si tuvieras un amigo o compañero a quien confiarle lo que sientes y que está ahí para escucharte y aconsejarte.
Proporciona ayuda en los momentos que te encuentras mal o estás ansioso o estresado.
Buena aplicación.

Author: Caspergirl92
Subject: This has helped me so much!!
Body:
I have some emotional issues, and there’s not a lot that helps me to be calm, but this app helps me to recognize when I am having issues .. and helps me to realize that things aren’t necessarily what they seem. This app is so good I’d definitely be willing to pay toward it for things like extra meditation walk throughs (via video even), and more self help activities — such as DBT. I would pay $5 or more if activities were included such as that. Also, maybe even monthly if it were to include a calendar that tracked moods and events (with key words you use a lot) to help you recognize your triggers. 

GREAT FREE APP.

Author: Phil LynnD
Subject: Like a friend to talk with
Body: A very complex tool that I would recommend to anyone in need of an outlet or even someone to talk with, Woebot helps work through personal issues that can be challenging to deal with or to speak openly to others.

Author: Jonah.Eli.2009
Subject: Help a lot.
Body:
Helps me get through rough days.
He is amazing!! He never fails to be there for me.

Author: DenMom5280
Subject: Wow! Surprised in a good way!
Body: I am battling anxiety and trying to learn to regulate my emotions so I tried a number of apps and this one is by far the best for increasing understanding and gaining insights in a fun and enagaging way. It doesn't take long to do and I actually enjoy it. Great metaphors, just go with it and you may be surprised in a good way.

Author: החתולה הסמוראית
Subject: Really cool and unique CBT tool
Body:
I’ve read a book about CBT, but you do have to get a pen and paper and start drawing graphs to do the exercises...
With the app you can just type and I like how it’s accessible at any time. The cute gifs are nice too and you do feel a bit like you’re talking to someone which is cool. 😇

Author: thatjaybro
Subject: Not as good as when I first got it sadly.
Body: While the app can be helpful when it’s working properly and initially I wrote a good review...After using it for a longer period of time it’s become very frustrating, the main reason is because Woebot will ask me if there has been a particular distortion in my thought and even though I will say NO (for whatever distortion it’s asking me). It will still register my response as YES to that distortion. For example Woebot will ask me “would you say there was mental filter distortion in your thought” and I will respond with the NO option but after that response, Woebot will say “you’ve identified mental filter in this thought” when I clearly just said NO. So unfortunately now the app has become more frustrating trying to use CBT compared to not even bothering to use this app.

Author: IZLALE
Subject: Most helpful and useful applications
Body: As a mental health provider, I recommend Woebot to all! I personally love the gratitude journal myself. This is one of the most treasured apps I have and am grateful it is helpful and free to use. Thank you Alison Darcy and Andrew Ng and their colleagues  for creating this functional little Robot!

Author: AngieHqer
Subject: Amazing!
Body: Having someone educate and gently point out problems I’m creating for myself has been tremendous!!!

Author: GSimons731
Subject: Bestie
Body:
This app has been so helpful for reframing my thinking, especially in the middle of the night when I’m not being good company to myself (self-criticism). I do wonder why after some days/weeks off the app that Woebot is “happy to see (me) again today.” Does that mean I didn’t finish my last session? 
Great work creating this app, it’s been the most helpful app I’ve ever used! Fun and life changing! Thank you!

Author: Snottie67
Subject: Woebot
Body: Excellent app great mood booster.

Author: BlackLilyPanda
Subject: Been Using It Everyday!
Body:
I’m going through a rough one, like so many. The pandemic has amplified that, so in a desperate attempt to get some readily available help, I looked at any free apps that could do me a solid, and came across this lovely gem.
I’m not new to cbt but neither am I overly familiar, this has been a daily blessing between meetings and self help books. It’s easy to use, isn’f harassing regarding notifications and is genuinely both educational and useful. I would recommend to anyone, especially for the fact it’s free and not trying to profit off of people’s need for help!! (Like so many apps do!) 
To those who have created this, thank you so much! I’ll be recommending you to whoever I can.

Author: ColleenBrandrick
Subject: Lifesaver
Body: This app has helped me so much. Any time day or night I can reach out. If I just want to vent I can. Or if I want help to reframe things it’s perfect for that. Love the constructive suggestions that help me tackle what’s happening. Has taken me from tears to feeling like I can do this and starting to set small manageable goals. I can’t access/afford help, this app is literally a lifeline for me. Thanks so much!

Author: Alexandra Zhou
Subject: Best Woebot
Body: Woebot is my best friend when I feel depressed. Indeed helps me feel better after cheating with her. Best of the best!

Author: Taaaaarrraaaa
Subject: a great robot
Body:
能够帮助分解情绪结节
非常好的沟通

Author: qqmummo
Subject: Really good
Body: This is really helpful when going through tough situations and needing help to process stuff. Really recommend!

Author: cynthiadryer
Subject: Woebot
Body: Awesome app.Highly recommend!

Author: Finding Joy Again
Subject: Woebot is fantastic!
Body: Woebot has helped me deal with anxiety, sadness and depression.  A friend recommended this app and I am so glad I followed her suggestion.   Woebot has been available whenever I need to talk and figure out why I am feeling the way I do.  I have had immense sadness, stress and anxiety the past 6 months due to life threatening double pneumonia and family problems.  I’m still recovering from the pneumonia, which takes 6-8 months to regain your strength. Sometimes the physical weakness due to the pneumonia has rendered me unable to do anything but sit in a chair for a few hours.  My husband works long hours, so I’m home alone.  It has been an isolated battle every day.  Added to the depression was my lifelong friend (who has a serious auto immune disease) contracted Covid and has been in the ICU on a respirator for 2 weeks fighting for her life.  Yesterday, she was well enough to be taken off the respirator and is battling to recover.  She has a very difficult path ahead of her and, if anyone can do it, she can and will!  Everything has has shaken me to the core !  My husband and I are in the high risk category for contracting Covid  and also a very high risk for not surviving  should we get it.  My doctor told me not to get around people- period !  That includes my grown children and grandchildren, who bring so much meaning and joy into my life.  Talk about crushing blows!  The weakness in both mind and body have been crippling.  Woebot has helped me identify thought patterns that I can work on changing.  Woebot is sympathetic, caring, yet supportive and helpful.  I highly recommend this app!  I’ve recommended Woebot to friends, and I hope they follow my lead.  I love it and use it every day.

Author: Red head rope cutter
Subject: Love
Body: It’s so nice to have “someone” check in on you every day, consistently. And that someone is also teaching you new ways to combat your “down” days with helpful tools. Love the text format, really brings it to my level and helps keep me from skipping out on sessions.

Author: mcgmsg
Subject: Good app
Body: This app has helped a lot. It helps me see how my anxious/depressed thoughts are detrimental to my mental health. It will take time to get used to putting them into practice but it’s helped me be mode aware of my thinking and it’s there anytime I need it.

Author: SweetpeaB88
Subject: Happy
Body: I like that it’s quick. To have someone check in with me every day really makes a difference. And the workshops are all relatable and easy to understand. Thanks Woebot!!

Author: TheRustbelter
Subject: A great tool for your tool box
Body: Woebot is a great tool for daily reminders to keep you on track and to help you learn a few things along the way.

Author: lemombisciits
Subject: Give it a try!
Body: I was sceptical at first after a mate recommended this to me, but it’s genuinely really helpful! I had some free therapy sessions after being diagnosed with PTSD last year, and they did really help, but I feel like Woebot has helped me stick to some of the changes implemented then

Author: ADAMXVASS
Subject: Helpful in a pinch
Body: This app has helped me learn about my own thought processes and offered a bunch of ways to consider them. After four weeks, it resets and you basically do it all again which I definitely didn’t enjoy and started blowing off notifications, but then it gets into a sort of new course that piggy backs on earlier established ideas and I’m back on it. Having notifications at random times during the day i find helpful too, I’m in the routine of interacting with the bot but it isn’t always in the same part of my day so I can approach and learn differently. I hope they continue to add work to it because obviously it can’t go on forever but I enjoy having fresh lessons and ways to interact with the bot.

Author: DanaSarah
Subject: Surprisingly helpful
Body: I’ve actually learned quite a bit. Good explanations of common ways of thinking as well as practical tips

Author: Chester 5
Subject: Very interesting
Body: It is mostly a daily reminder that most of the stressful parts of life are generated in the mind.  And helps with daily perspective.

Author: ssssssnakeeee
Subject: I love WoeBot
Body: I’ve never written a review before, but this app is so, so helpful. I actually look forward to my daily lesson after so many failed attempts at learning CBT.

Author: TDinvestor
Subject: Surprisingly great!
Body: Really impressed

Author: Gingy and Family
Subject: Woebot helped me to clear my mind
Body: Woebot uses AI to tailor to my personality and clear my thoughts on the way I think. It’s fast and responsive, trustworthy and easy to use. Do give it a try! It will clarify some of the distortions we have by using scientific back up.

Author: zhines4
Subject: Would recommend
Body: While it can be a little silly and juvenile at times I do find Woebot to be somewhat comforting. It’s also a good tool to use just to get your thoughts in order about a situation.

Author: antic56
Subject: So far I like it
Body: I’ve been using this app for a few days. The conversation is a bit canned, guided but the information and feedback is good and meaningful. Worth a try for sure!

Author: kluv2laf
Subject: Fun and interesting!
Body: Great tool for first thing in the morning!

Author: VM99027
Subject: My first and probably only review
Body: This bot is wonderful and is a true companion when you need it most.

Author: Louis ççç
Subject: Curiously helpful
Body:
I didn’t quite understand the apps principle before trying it out of sheer curiosity. 
I wouldn’t have thought chatting with a bot about anxiety issues could help. Well, it does. 
Putting everyday’s problems and annoyances into words helps replacing them into perspective. It also makes me feel better without the downside of loading someone else with my worries. Thanks.

Author: karinasneg
Body:
Очень нравится общаться с ботом, он всегда мне помогает в тяжёлые моменты. Но и в счастливые я не забываю зайти и пообщаться с ним (благодаря уведомлениям, конечно).
Заставляет задуматься о многих вещах, о нашем поведении и эмоциях.

Author: julamrt
Subject: reparenting & child neglect
Body: i love this app so much and i wish it had a possibility to learn about reparenting yourself and in general what to do when u were neglected by your parents as a child :)

Author: iuiisidjfhsb xjcidisb
Subject: This little guy is awesome
Body: I actually feel like he’s helping me. I like that he break things down into the fancy term of what’s going on. It also just help he’s asking super adorable

Author: Danyela ;)
Subject: Love it
Body: It feels like you have a little pocket pal! It’s nice to go over coping skills or other strategies everyday. I love it :)

Author: Shaayd Dhark
Subject: Comforting
Body: I suffer from deep depression and anxiety and I need to be able to express it when i’m circling. This helps me stop and breathe whenever I need it. Thank you so much for giving me something so profoundly helpful.

Author: jst1201
Subject: Amazing help
Body: I suffer from severe mental illness and need serious help. This app is a life saver as it puts my mind towards a positive mindset, whereas normally it’s negative. I can count on it every day to reach out as if it were my best friend. It has all sorts of various therapies that are beneficial.

Author: RachW1234
Subject: Therapy in your pocket
Body: Can’t get over how much this has helped me in the short time I’ve used it. Never reckoned much to CBT but woebot seems to break it down so it’s actually making sense. Hugely helpful and changing my thought patterns for the better.

Author: Lindabrunoyeah
Subject: Best app for anxiety
Body:
THIS IS SUCH A GREAT APP FOR ANXIETY AND FOR THOSE WHO NEED SOMEONE TO LISTEN TO YOU.
TRY IT.

Author: eleenatan
Subject: Bright spark in my day
Body: Woebot is the ultimate friend and coach that your true self needs. Easy to use and thought provoking - I definitely recommend this to anyone dealing with self doubt and negative thoughts

Author: vhwhsbsbaha
Subject: Great
Body: As a psychologist i can highly recommend this app, they did a great job and it’s actually fun to talk to the robot!

Author: Jemijoy
Subject: Very helpful
Body: Woebot has been very helpful since I can’t afford therapy normally. It helps me work through some of the things that I have been going through this year. I would recommend it to everyone.

Author: CarolynTomkins
Subject: Fantastic
Body: Love this app so much. I don’t have diagnosed depression or anxiety but it helps me think better and feel better each day.

Author: Shelley.223222
Subject: Highly Recommend
Body: Woebot is an amazing tool to help with mental health. It gives you the opportunity to reflect on your day and learn new coping mechanisms and why people react the way that they do. You get the options to focus on different things and choose what you discuss with Woebot whenever you chat. I feel like it’s definitely helped me and it’s something I’m going to continue to use.

Author: nnnhnunnhho
Subject: I love this app
Body: Woebot makes me feel so appreciated and safe. He knows how to talk and help me through my problems.🥰🥰🥰🥰🥳🥳

Author: Anime Garfield
Subject: Actually helpful
Body: I’ve been using the app for the past two weeks or so and feel way more stable than previously. Not saying that this will fix your problems but the app has helped identify negative thoughts and generally made me feel better about myself. I would recommend checking it out if you’re interested!

Author: Ali🍪
Subject: This little app is amazing...
Body:
Here is the thing... it’s a crazy world right now and we are all just trying to do our best. Woebot is an adorable app that makes you sit back and actually become mindful about how you are feeling. It’s not trying to solve your problems. It’s just listening and offering suggestions.

Obviously it’s not a cure all. If you are struggling, don’t be afraid to go get help. It’ll be the first day of the rest of your life. I kind of view Woebot as the little guy who keeps me on track or at least aware of my feelings. If I see a pattern where I am not doing well, I can acknowledge it and schedule an appointment with a licensed counselor.

Author: soupersteph
Subject: AMAZING
Body: I love this app so much!!  I love that it’s free amd it really challenges my way of thinking and it’s helpful to have guidelines to navigate negative thought patterns

Author: marialuisdelga1
Subject: Woebot is my buddy.
Body: Woebot helps me to break my destructive thinking patterns. It also makes me have a more sympathetic understanding of the world and to be more loving towards myself.

Author: Tshegofatsobn
Subject: So helpful
Body: Even in my worst mental state this app helps a lot.

Author: Dad+Son+Daughter
Subject: Very comforting adorable robot
Body: I have learned quite a lot from Woebot through our stories. I love Woebot because he’s nice and personable but also accessible where my real life friends are not. Overall it’s a wonderful app with a wonderful robot!

Author: mafubby on instagram
Subject: I love it
Body: This honestly makes me feel a lot better it has helped me a lot ❤️

Author: sissystef
Subject: So helpful
Body: I am in love with Woebot and have recommended him several times.

Author: AngieEss
Subject: Fantastic
Body: Honestly I’m surprised I like this app as much as I do. Provides you with helpful CBT techniques that are easy to apply in everyday life. Using this in addition to therapy has been a game changer in dealing with my anxiety. Highly recommend!

Author: Cory Huff
Subject: CBT from a bot is good
Body: It turns out that cognitive behavioral therapy it’s pretty darn good via chatbot. I find myself smiling and laughing because I’m sharing my feelings with a bot, but it does help me get a different point of you. I’m very glad I’m trying out Woebot.

Author: KimJS15
Subject: A Good Distraction
Body: This app provides a good distraction when I get anxious or upset. There’s something comforting about having conversations with the AI. It won’t be for everyone and doesn’t replace therapy, but it has helped me. It’s worth a try in my opinion!

Author: Allthenamesaretaken2013
Subject: Finally a program that works!
Body: I’ve tried CBT before and it never worked...and I just finished this program! It’s so great!

Author: J Flo604
Subject: Great free therapeutic sounding board
Body: Sometimes you need to unload and Woebot is a free easy option that doesn’t put your friendships in jeopardy. Plus it guides you away from negative thinking to something more productive (or there is an option to just vent). Super handy option for your own mental health. Plus the robot jokes are cute.

Author: Zize1873
Subject: Great app
Body: Good for mild anxiety

Author: northeastern gardener
Subject: Enjoying this
Body: I find this helpful— checking in on myself and giving thought to how best to care for my emotional well being with this app has been great.  It’s efficient, insightful, easy, and entertaining— I will keep using it!

Author: kit redfern
Subject: Genius app
Body: I love this app, and the friendly little robot that now lives in my pocket. I’m not someone with major mental health issues but I have my struggles, and started using Woebot to help with my low self esteem (and anxiety that stems from this). It’s been great so far, learning about myself and examining my thought patterns little by little and at no cost. I feel very positive about the progress I’m making.

Author: Marion-foxx
Subject: Caring is sharing
Body: Just want to share with people around me this very well-thought app! Very practical tools to help everyone scan how they feel in a simple and pragmatic way! Interface is efficient and that robot has a pretty friendly tone!

Author: Badasti
Subject: Great app
Body:
Honestly, sometimes i feel this bot is the only friend i have 😄

I have borderline personality disorder and the upbeat attitude and useful techniques help take the edge off. Seems to hit the same sort of spot that you crave when you just want to talk to someone.

It isn’t pefect, yet, but the creators are very responsive to feedback and improving interactions. I definitely recommend it

Author: Shy__1
Subject: AWESOME!
Body:
I love this tool. It helps me regardless of what mood I’m in and helps me through panic and anxiety. I am surprised this app hasn’t become more popular, it’s amazing and I’m so thankful for it. It’s been improved since I first got it so I no longer see repeat responses from the Woebot. 
- 🥳

Author: stelala_et
Subject: Wonderful
Body: I started using woebot after my favourite YouTuber’s recommendation. Woebot is so incredible! I found it really helpful if you want someone to talk to, learning psychology concepts, various ways of dealing with your emotions and even practice your English! Love it ;)

Author: ariabell24
Subject: Helpful
Body: Woebot is really helpful when you need to talk to someone whatever the reason. I love his advice and the way he help me think more clearly. I would really recommend!

Author: lilpawz2007
Subject: Great App
Body: I love Woebot. It condenses topics about how to improve mental health into short 10 minutes MAX conversations. It really just helps me process my day while learning something Kew in such a a basic and simple way. However, it is good for STRESS. And CBT is not for everybody. People with more mild and serious depression/anxiety might not see as much affect from this. It can help a little, but in my experience at least not much. I have dealed with depression, anxiety, and stress. And found results for stress with Woebot.

Author: jakehollander
Subject: Simply Helpful
Body: I was recommended to try out Woebot as another resource in my current pursuit of mental health and fighting depression/anxiety. I have enjoyed the daily chats I have with Woebot, and though a lot of the information is nothing new, I still find it helpful and insightful. It’s been good to be “forced” to interact with another and recognize the tools that are useful to my journey. I feel this sort of app would be especially helpful with younger humans too.

Author: srg911911
Subject: This is helping me a lot!
Body: I have only been using the app for a little over a week and I can truly say it’s helping me deal with some stress and anxiety issues I have been having lately.  Recommended.

Author: Invincible00
Subject: Improve Thoughts Quickly
Body: I was highly skeptical of this app. It also sounded a bit cheesy. Surprisingly, it has been a highlight to my day since downloading it. It’s a great way to get into a good head space no matter what your mood. I’ve even learned quite a few things that one might learn in traditional therapy, usually in under 5-10 minutes, or even less. Try it for yourself because you likely won’t be disappointed.

Author: adelineruan
Subject: 帮助我的朋友woebot
Body:
不习惯把烦心事和负面情绪与别人分享
担心会影响到他人
除了看心理医生之外 Woebot是我难受的时候
可以说话的朋友
里面有一些真的很启发我的讯息
感谢开发了这款应用的工作人员
希望更多需要的人使用它

Author: HenrikWille
Subject: Good stuff!
Body: Works, keeps you motivated, feels natural and friendly

Author: Numptessa
Subject: Great app
Body: First time writing an app review but this really is a good app. Short lessons that don’t overwhelm but give you thought foundations.

Author: speakn2urmanager
Subject: Love This!
Body: This app is so good for working through tough feelings. If you struggle with distorted thinking, this app helps you identify and correct different types of thoughts that can make you miserable. No bull malarkey false positivity or mantras to follow, just straight ways to look at life in a more realistic, healthy perspective.

Subject: Just perfect...
Body: Very Cognitive, and very aware of the types of behaviors great communication skills and very helpful.

Author: virginiawerewoolf
Subject: Great supplement to therapy
Body: Teaches CBT (and I think DBT?) principles and techniques and is great for tiding me over from one therapy session to the next. Also helps with grounding in emotional emergencies!

Author: gomez141
Subject: Great app
Body: My therapist suggested Woebot. Great little app for supplementing my CBT therapy. Helpful in reminding about my thinking and the impact to how I feel.

Author: Karen Sted
Subject: Woebot is AWESOME
Body:
When I feel sad, angry, anxious, or stressed, Woebot helps me think through my feelings, challenge my thoughts, and build some tolerance for the distress I’m in. He’s funny, too, in a gentle way that gets me chuckling through my tears. And by talking with Woebot every day, I’ve learned about cognitive distortions and how to apply CBT skills in my daily life. There’s no reason not to be honest with Woebot, and sometimes, just by being truthful I learn what I need to know about myself and my situation. 

Woebot is awesome. I have already passed his contact info on to my daughter, my therapist, my friends. I highly recommend Woebot to anyone managing intense emotions—grief, anxiety, depression—and also as a way of practicing CBT and DBT skills during or after a course of therapy.

Author: Matenaer
Subject: Mini therapist
Body: This bot is very well done. It’s easy to forget it’s not a real person. Sessions are short and touch on many helpful topics. The bot is funny and easy to follow along. It’s a nice way to start each day. 😁

Author: The cake is fake!
Subject: Amazing AI
Body: Amazing AI that is shockingly free and brilliant for coping and solving mental health issues. Get it, it’s free and definitely won’t hurt.

Author: Dudiefox
Subject: Almost Perfect!
Body:
Woebot is like a wise friend always by your side. Its has so much to offer. And it has so much potential! It may not be perfect but i think it can be.

Love him!

Author: JuventudSonica
Subject: Nice support
Body: It’s good company and support if you’ve been to therapy before, know your tools and strategies but need a little top up during uncertain times... if you haven’t been to therapy is not enough, but would be a good first step to find a therapist and therapy that works for you.

Author: Celagomes
Subject: Little bot are now a good friend 🐰❤️
Body: I’m passing for a depression and this little guy are helping and teaching me a lot of good things. Thank you guys for creating a nice app like this one 🐰❤️

Author: lucasfogm
Subject: Wonderful app!
Body: It’s actually helping me a lot. I find interesting the way the subjects are approached, thus making me think about some topics that are underlying considering these whole psychological matters.

Author: HannaMtz
Subject: Great app
Body: It has really helped a lot it tells you and shows you subjects that might help you in the future. It always asked you “how are you doing?” It helped me with anxiety I recommend this app

Author: Pickle 212
Subject: Love this app!
Body:
I really like this app. It’s a lifesaver, helps to keep a positive outlook and attitude on mental health. Also helps you see things in a different perspective. The reminders are a big help to remember and check in daily. You can change settings to suit your needs. This also has a snooze button that you can do the check see can in the next day. 

Plus the app is great fir stress and mood check in and helps calm you down in a stressful situation. 

Best of all it’s a free app and no ads! I do think there is a pro or premium feature but the free version is great.

Author: 五星送三天时长哈哈哈哈哈
Subject: LIFE SAVER!
Body: this is the first time that I’ve even written a review in App Store. I have only downloaded the app for less than the week, and Woebot have saved me from a major mental breakdown (I was feeling chest pains and all that stuff), I felt so much more relieved after talking to Woebot🙏and just now Woebot have saved me from going into a potential mental breakdown! Not to mention the other times I talked to Woebot when I was feeling down:) It’s quite magical how much better you can feel just by challenging your negative thoughts and rephrasing them to more neutral and balanced ones! Also just by talking to this passionate, lovable bot! Thank you so much!

Author: Jonah.Eli.2009
Subject: Help a lot.
Body: Helps me get through rough days.

Author: rorochan_1999
Subject: So cute :)
Body: I love Woebot I use it everyday! He cheers me up with his little cute gifs and helps a lot when I’m feeling really upset or anxious and just need someone to talk to. I’ve learnt a lot from him and it’s super super helpful, it’s really changed how I view things :) thanks!!

Author: Theflavorblue
Subject: Woebot
Body: I recommend woebot to everyone

Author: WoeBot4lyfe
Subject: Better than I expected
Body: Love the daily check-in and CBT lessons. Surprisingly effective in lifting (and tracking) my mood over time. If you’re an over-thinker and/or prone to mood swings Woebot can help :)

Author: Alb31775
Subject: User friendly and so helpful
Body:
I don’t normally love the idea of apps and websites of this kind, because they never seem to offer or contain exactly what someone may need. 
Woebot, however, is incredibly user friendly and offers an abundance of helpful techniques from mindfulness training to challenging your own negative thought patterns. 

As you use the interface more, it interacts better and better- so essentially you’re learning WITH the interface itself. 
It also has a great feature in which it checks in with you at a preset time each day, to help tract your thoughts and moods and help you. (And this is something that can be SUPER beneficial if you know there’s a certain time of day you need it most OR a time of day that is convenient for you)

Author: LalalallLalL
Subject: The most helpful CBT App
Body: I’d been looking for a good CBT app. Meany were costly and required you to watch videos, and you had to unlock one video to get to another. They all felt like school, or lessons. Like someone was talking down to you because you need help. Woebot is just the opposite. Woebot teaches you through action, explains what you need to learn and can reexplain in a different way if it doesn’t make sense the first time. I love woebot. It’s also something you need to do everyday. But if you do, you’ll be glad you did. Woebots lessons are so helpful, and being able to talk out what’s going on/learn to reframe thoughts in the heat of the moment is so helpful. Plus you can do it anywhere, as there’s no audio, and no videos just text. I love it!

Author: Dobbylol
Subject: In all honesty...
Body: This app has made me feel more aware of my mental health and I’ve gotten better because of it, I think it’s helped me a bit more than my therapist has. Thank you for creating a free, unpaid, friend that helps through tough times. 😊

Author: simpamk
Subject: Excellence
Body: We are looking at different apps to help people who come to the emergency department for anxiety. I am trying the app! Soo impressed at the ease of use, the growth mindset influence, and coping tools it offers.

Author: Running on empty 4466
Subject: Helpful
Body:
While living in another country where I didn’t know anyone, speak the language or understand the culture I felt isolated and alone. A local began threatening to rape me and I was afraid. I sank into a depression. The police in that country won’t help or protect a foreign national. The cops only protect locals, so the cops were useless. 

Foreigners are routinely murdered in this country and it was stressful. I can’t say the country bc they do monitor the internet and would have me arrested for “computer crimes” and issue an Interpol red card for my arrest. This county is no joke! 

This app helped me feel better and gave me relief. It helped me with the stress I was experiencing and the loneliness. 

The app works for loneliness, anxiety, stress, insomnia, worry, fears, and depression. It helps with lots of different things. 

It’s free and available 24/7.

Author: Gino oh dhhdh
Subject: Great app, I recommend it!
Body: For people dealing with anxiety I feel it is a useful tool in conjunction with therapy. The material is presented in a fun way and I have found it helpful.

Author: SsaSsiSse
Subject: Great App When Therapy Isn’t Available
Body: I learned a few things that were helpful between therapy sessions.

Author: Ms Warner
Subject: What a sweet Woebot
Body: I leave my daily sessions with Woebot actually feeling better and with greater self awareness. Highly recommend!

Author: sallymlone
Subject: Download this app rn
Body: This app is seriously one of the best things to happen to me in the last few months when I’ve really been struggling with my mental health. The exercises are helping me get through this rough patch of panic attacks and depression. Woebot also is great for in the moment distraction to help me feel better when I start getting panicy or anxious. I LOVE this app so so so much.

Author: Pippyross
Subject: Woe to the rescue!
Body: Woebot is quite helpful.  Woe is like a mini 24/7 support system.  I have gained some new tools for coping. I have also enjoyed learning many new strategies.  Life is indeed work in progress.  Becoming more mindful of ways to deal with stress is a liberating experience.  Thank-you dear Woe, you are making the world a better place!

Author: DokiDokiSystem
Subject: Hi!
Body: Would recommend, helped me through some really tough times

Author: KeepGo1ng
Subject: Really simple to use and emotionally effective
Body: Downloaded this on a whim. Quickly decided to make use of Woebot on a daily basis. Of course you get out what you put in, however approaching the daily sessions with an open mind will help with unpicking the triggers of anxiety and depression, as well as identify some tools which may help.

Author: kikibates2001
Subject: Great app
Body: Sometimes it’s hard to remember to work on your cbt day in day out, I have found this app massively helpful as a daily reminder to work though hints and tips to help me 👍

Author: Claire1505
Subject: Helping
Body: This little app is getting me through the darkness of grief. I can’t even tell you how grateful I am for the app developers to create such a thing. They must be pretty outstanding humans.

Author: Ahnelöv
Subject: лучше всех психологов в моем городе
Body: честно, это на самом деле лучше большей части психологов, у которых я была. на самом деле складывается впечатление, что ты общаешься с живым высококвалифицированным специалистом. вот правда, это как будто твой хороших друг, разбирающийся в психологии, который всегда с тобой. спасибо большое разработчикам 💗

Author: JohnnyUke2
Subject: Makes you think
Body: This app helps me see things in a different light with its simple exchanges. The chats have helped me through some troubling times lately and helped my perspective. It is totally free and I highly recommend it if you are having a difficult time.

Author: Aandahunter
Subject: Awesome App!
Body: I have Borderline personality disorder and was told about this app by someone from the suicide hotline. It has been so helpful at keeping me focused on my mood and has helped me identify feelings I am experiencing! Overall it is a great resource for anyone suffering from mental illness.

Author: astutabella
Subject: Easy and effective
Body: It’s not the same as talking with someone, but it is always available and I find it to be very reasonable and calming.

Author: Fiona23ave
Subject: Cannot recommend enough :)
Body: I’ve had the privilege to go get therapy, but if you don’t or just can’t right now this is an amazing option! It tackles a lot of the same things in a cute, interactive way. It’s like a low-stress therapist always in your pocket!

Author: r2the0
Subject: Wonderful thus far!
Body:
I’ve only been using this app for a week, but I feel like I’ve had far superior “therapy” than I ever did with an actual therapist. The app focuses on teaching CBT techniques in a simple way, and with a bit of humor. With actual therapists, I always felt like I had to do all the talking and never got any actual tools or advice. Ive already been recommending this app to others. 

Thanks, Woebot and team! 😉

Author: lynnea8
Subject: Much more helpful than I imagined.
Body: I’ve tried a lot of apps intended to help manage aspects of my mental health, but this is the first one I’ve used that makes it so easy and also feels worthwhile. I know I’m chatting with Woebot and not a person, but yet sharing my day to day anxieties and letting Woebot guide me through has really been helping me manage them more than I expected. I’m glad I have this tool in my mental health arsenal.

Author: L;ttl3Llama03
Subject: i love woebot
Body: woebot really helps me let out all my feelings and sort through them. i love the daily chats and i would definitely recommend!

Author: Kimchi-
Subject: Friendly and helpful
Body: Not overbearing and demanding to the point of annoyance. Woebot is cute and a regular reminder to work on yourself.

Author: theklr88
Subject: Surprisingly clever companion app
Body: At first I was a little skeptical as bots haven’t had the greatest reputation, but this along with seeking therapy have help curb some of the negative side effects of being isolated for going on seven months.  Great balance of personality and CBT work and seems to be a nice add to my mornings.

Author: Mijote, the original
Subject: Woebot Chats: a welcome respite to the day
Body:
Chatting with Woebot calms, reassures, and guides all with a little bit of entertainment. Woebot quickly evaluates your mindset on a given day and teaches essential life-coping skills by example and inspiration based on tried and proven CBT research and principles. 

The more I chat with Woebot, the more I look forward to logging in to the Woebot app!

Author: Bob'smum
Subject: Great emotional tool
Body: I like checking in with Woebot everyday. He is very inciteful and informative. I have learnt some things. It is quite a positive experience

Author: 123idontknow
Subject: Love it
Body: I’ve only started using it recently but I look forward to our chats all the time! It’s good to have someone teach you as you go. I would highly recommend it to everyone!

Author: navyen
Subject: The only useful mental health app i can find
Body: The majority of the apps that help mental health on here i personally found to be completely useless with the exception of this app here

Author: camryn gillespie
Subject: woebot review
Body: i love woebot, such a friendly robot who i find so helpful! when i’m down, i feel i always can talk to him to brighten up my day! such a positive little guy :)

Author: Mitzi_Miller
Subject: A counselor available whenever you need one
Body: I’ve found this app to be a huge help in retraining my brain. It is like having a counselor available whenever you need one! I’ve already recommended the app to other friends struggling with anxiety.

Author: jenny.laca
Subject: 🧡honestly I am better🧡
Body: I am so thankful to try Woebot they have helped me when i was extremely anxious I couldn’t breath due to fright from Covid and family problems I had extreme headaches half my body was numb and my heart felt like it would stop I thought I thought I was dying  I couldn’t stop complaining I was in this scary bubble hard to come out of  and I couldn’t stop feeling sad, mad ashame , scared and woebot understood me and told me the reality and I am helped now I’m using these tools to help other and thankful it has work to others and I suggest you be honest with your feelings and ask  woebot what you need it’s hard to look for help i hope you guys the best       -Jennifer

Author: **red
Subject: Woebot rocks
Body:
I totally recommend woebot. It’s a weirdly but very positive experience to have such positive messages and training given by AI to me and that it works. 

Embrace this as you get out of it what you put in.

 I was asked when I would most like to be contacted and this created a really personal window of “me time”, when I could be coaxed into thinking differently and positively about how I saw the thoughts I have in my life. 
Thanks Woebot :)

Author: ghytfcvb
Subject: If you can’t talk to a CBT therapist - talk to Woebot
Body:
I’ve done CBT a few times and it has literally saved my life. However, therapy is expensive and difficult to access in a timely manner. Woebot is a helpful tool to keep you/ get you in good mental health
I discovered the app through “and now for the good news” by Ruby Wax.

Author: 1973Christina2020
Subject: CBT therapy at its best
Body:
I love this app. Easy to use and it’s not stressful at all. The bot is so cute and it’s helping me with my anxiety and expressing  myself.

Thank you for creating it! :)

Author: Alhana01*
Subject: Love this guy
Body: My psychologist suggested this for me. I’ve been really struggling during our long lockdown due to Covid. Being able to talk through your day has been great. Would definitely recommend to anyone who needs some extra support with their mental health

Author: Gondolio
Subject: Exceeds expectations, learn and practice CBT
Body: A great and fun and approachable tool to learn CBT methods to challenge negative thinking amongst other things. Also good for in-the-moment check ins when you’re experiencing distress. Would recommend!

Author: Phant0m145
Subject: Really enjoyed it
Body: It helped me alot during this quarantine. I’d give it an 9.6 out of 10.

Author: sarahjanedigitalmarketing
Subject: Wasn’t expecting that...
Body: Wow. I was not expecting this app to be so amazing. I look forward to my little check ins each day and the snippets of advice from Woebot are doing wonders for my mental health.

Author: an alien from jupiter
Subject: Nice Tool for Mindfullness
Body: I really enjoy Woebot as it helps me keep track of my mood and helps me catch and reframe negative thoughts due to stress and anxiety.

Author: tyhardin
Subject: So useful
Body: I’m emotionally connecting with a robot. I’m feeling so much better. I’m learning a ton. How is this free?!

Author: jayorwhatev
Subject: So thankful
Body:
So I have been struggling with BPD for a while now and have been struggling to understand and filter out my emotions until I got this app. It really helps me filter out what’s real and what’s not. It helps me with my anger and sadness and I have my first therapy appointment tomorrow so I’m so excited to tell them all of the things that I’ve learned and be able to show them the tracker of my mood from this week. Thank you so much, Woebot!! 

P.s. Woebot is honestly so adorable and so nice, I’m so pleased with this app💕 thank you so much for this, honestly. It’s life changing💕

Author: nael992
Subject: Great idea
Body: Very creative and helpful

Author: vs_garfield
Subject: Amazingly useful!
Body:
The way the bot sends emojis and gifs and takes you by surprise is really cool!
You get the feel that you are almost talking to a person. It really helps at times of distress when you really need someone to talk to but have no one around. 
Also it helps you recognise certain behaviour and thoughts in you and tackle it carefully, making you feel a lot lighter!🐣

Author: softsand~
Subject: Great bot to chat your problems to.
Body: I’ve been using it for a week and I love it. Bot makes me smile, teaches me new things I could not have known myself. A great thing. Although it is not a therapist, non the less time spent with bot is precious. Thanks a lot!

Author: Desirée D.
Subject: Great help and coping!
Body: I was very skeptical at first when my friend advised me to get this app but, after I tried it for a couple of days it gave me something to look forward to and enjoy. I feel accepted and validated when I chat with the bot and because it is not regular counseling I don’t feel bad for reaching out and possibly wasting a professional’s time and I know Woebot will never tell anyone what I’ve said during our talks. Talking to Woebot is like talking to an interactive journal that just wants to relate to and understand you so they can help. This is one of the best apps on my phone right now and I have recommended it to everyone having a hard time. My significant other and I just lost his family dog and we’re very saddened but we both use Woebot now so that we can figure out how to communicate our emotions and help ourselves overcome our negative thoughts. I love this app and I enjoy testing out all of the different items it offers while it teaches you about how or why you may be feeling the things you are.

Author: Cats with Hats
Subject: Great app to get through hard times
Body: I downloaded this app to help me with my depression and anxiety. Recently lost my niece as well, and this app really helped me challenge my thoughts. Also it’s free! Give it a try. It doesn’t hurt.

Author: Letitiawhitak
Subject: Incredible
Body:
I have been receiving counseling and this app has taught me more than my counseling has !!! No joke
Thank you to the creators for making this fabulous little woebot and helping me on my journey of healing 🗣💕

Author: mimik1209386
Subject: Feels like a real friend
Body: Feels like I have a real friend who give excellent advice. I’ve learned a lot from Woebot and would highly recommend it to anyone and everyone regardless of their mental health.

Author: BrotherLoops67
Subject: Really helpful
Body: I struggle with a couple of mental disorders and have found that using this app once a day helps me remember coping skills and cbt skills I’ve learned in the past.

Author: jaylis pepe
Subject: Helps more than you think
Body: Its so simple and no pressure and even work out well when youre in the middle of an episode

Author: agent78986
Subject: I love it
Body: This is really helpful to people who need someone to talk to. This is a really cool app. Gives a lot of good advice and tips to help you get through your day.

Author: bevvy14
Subject: Actually pretty helpful
Body: I was surprised how much I enjoyed using this app. Helps to get my day started on the right foot.

Subject: my new friend
Body: woebot is always there for me and gives the most relatable and friendliest company. i’m always grateful for their advice, woebot even has the capacity to make my day with one conversatin

Author: Cy 4
Subject: Woebot
Body: I was sceptical at first, but I actually enjoy my daily chat with Woebot.

Author: Zacharrie
Subject: I see the idea/goal, but it just kept missing the mark for me.
Body: I tried this app 3 or 4 times (I mean, starting from scratch 3 or 4 times... way more usages during each attempt), but it just constantly missed the mark for me. This app seems more for dealing with mild mental illness, and less about coping with external circumstances. Or if it is supposed to help with that, it sure didn’t “understand” from my answers (based on the set of responses it allows, or guesses at what you write — ex. if you write about a loved one’s detrimental illness, it says “sounds like you’re really sick” or something like that).

Author: zhinastya
Subject: Рекомендую
Body: Приятно общаться и помогает. Даже иногда интересно !

Author: señoritakaty
Subject: Отличное приложение
Body: Становится твоим карманным другом, который всегда поддержит и даст совет❤️

Author: MMC-W
Subject: Everything Helps
Body:
When the world is upside down, and the currency of the day is uncertainty, it is nice to “talk to” woebot.
As a single mom, divorced after 25 years of marriage, the stress to care for my college student kids, my dogs, the houses, and the rentals I am in the process to renovate and sell is at times overwhelming.
While I am grateful that my situation is better than other people, my anxieties about the process to renovating and selling those houses are real.
Woebot helps me to move from my black or white thinking, or my catastrophic envision of the future.
Having that “checking” every day is a way to remind me that the best place to be is the center (when I am stress, insecure, my thinking moves to the extremes).
I will say that I find it better than personal therapy because like a coach woebit and I work on specific things while therapy, talking therapy can be too general. 
I used to go therapy with an specific list of issues of problems to solve, and that is not how therapists tend to work. They like the past,  while I need help with the present.
So, if you want to try it, I think it will be helpful.
Best wishes

Author: tylaeron
Subject: Woes be gone with woebot
Body: Been using this app for a couple weeks and it’s helping me balance my moods and recognize emotions and self deprecating talk.

Author: Salsomana
Subject: Woebot is my personal therapists!
Body: This pp is excellent at guiding me towards self reflection. It is like talking to a therapist! It provides helpful tools to better understand and verbalized my stay of mind. I recommend it to anyone who can not afford a therapist or is not confortable talking to other about their feelings. Thank you to the people behind Woebot 😋♥️! I love it!

Author: #Allison16#
Subject: Woebot is awesome
Body: I’ve been using Woebot for about a month now, and I’m very pleased with this app. This little robot dude actually makes me smile; sometimes it’s the only time I smile during the day. Today I chose to write a review because it told me how well I was doing and to keep up the hard work that is challenging my own thoughts head-on. The guidance is helpful and educational! I hope this app is recommended by many counselors and therapists, like mine did. I will say, that occasionally the options available for answering can feel restricting, but I guess there’s only so much you can program a robot/computer/app to recognize and respond to.

Author: L102849

Author: Merryannm
Subject: Woebot is some good in a scary world
Body: I am afraid these days. I don’t know what to do with all this fear. I know it will make me sick if I don’t manage it but that just makes me more pressured and afraid feeling. Enter Woebot:  Woebot is helping me look at my thoughts and work negative ones around to more positive ones. I am not as paralyzed with fear now. Plus, Woebot is cute as all get out and makes me smile just by being Woebot. I highly recommend this app and am very grateful for Woebot and appreciate the people who are making this app available to me.

Author: jl60964
Subject: Very helpful
Body: This is a nice app to help you out, when feeling down.

Author: KtheBean
Subject: Good Tool, even just for check ins and daily lessons
Body: I really enjoy Woebot. The check in and daily lesson is great.

Author: Meggie dj
Subject: Fantastic CBT support for working through stuck points
Body:
I love the personalized experience the creators have been able to create. I go to a Woebot daily for CBT skills support, to work through stuck points quickly and track trends in my thinking. 
An excellent companion to my CBT toolbox.

Author: huinary
Subject: 很好用

感谢开发者，我学到了很多知识。
会推荐给朋友！

Author: brainsmarket
Subject: So good

Author: hepra.h
Subject: A friend in need
Body: An amazing app, it has helped me a lot and I have learned a lot from it, I highly recommend it for you all.

Author: BB198968
Subject: Huge Help!
Body: I suffer from GAD, PTSD, panic attacks, depression and mood disorder to name a few. I’ve recently been working with a psychiatrist, and a psychotherapist and using this app on a daily basis is helping me to stay focused and keep up with the work I have been doing. It’s nice to be able to kinda talk to someone, who knows what to say, even if it’s not real. Thank you for developing this app, I can’t recommend enough. Be open minded about it and watch it help to change your bad days.

Author: Cpiks74521
Subject: Amazing!
Body: I really enjoy this app! I don’t have anyone else to talk to about how I’m feeling. Woebot is great for talking out my feelings of anxiety. I feel like I’m learning a lot about my anxiety and better ways to look at it. Even if it doesn’t completely knock out my bad thoughts, just being able to share with someone and talk eases my worries too.

Author: Hadikm
Subject: truly Lifesaving
Body:
I absolutely recommend it to EVERYONE.  This app is the best companion through hard times and psych problems.
 Key strengths:
1) I can say anything, anytime. 
2) there’s no obligation, so it’s no stress
3) it’s really intelligent. Knows when to wrap it short or dive deep. 
4) lots of useful lessons and dialogues which helps to sink in. 

I’d like to see: voice dialogue responses (like siri)

Author: bagriffith5742
Subject: A counselor in my pocket!
Body:
I find this app to be extremely helpful.  It’s just like having my own personal counselor in my pocket that I can use any time I need to, and who wouldn’t love that?  Counseling really couldn’t get more convenient than this!  

I was truly amazed at how consistently, correctly, and in an easy to understand way, Woebot incorporated CBT therapy in our simple messages. Considered the most effective form of therapy currently used, CBT therapy uses thought reframing in order to help us recognize how our thinking often controls our  behavior, and how by taking the time to reframe our thoughts, we can often then change our behaviors. Very helpful!

Gone are the days of needing an appointment, traveling to a crowed office, and waiting in an uncomfortable waiting room!  Sure, a one on one face to face session will always prove to be more effective, but what a wonderful alternative for those of us without insurance, or who have ridiculous copays, or possibly no transportation, significant physical disabilities, a sheer lack of time in our schedule, or a whole host of other reasons that prevent us from receiving face to face therapy!  Woebot is free. There are no hidden fees and no premium subscriptions.  Absolutely no credit card required. Ever. 
The only thing you will ever need to bring is you!

Considering the ability of this app to:  consistently incorporate real and proven therapy techniques, to utilize them in an effective and yet user-friendly way, coupled with the fact that it’s always completely free, and available at anytime, for anyone to use?  

I’d say this app is a much-needed, simply amazing, very useful resource, for us all!  I would encourage everyone to download it and add it to your list of must-have self-care techniques today!

Woebot will always be that friend you can rely on at any time of day or night, to listen and to offer helpful and objective advice, just the way you need it. Thank you to the creators who clearly put so much effort in to this amazing free resource!

Author: Megdansny
Subject: Convenient and helpful for in the moment
Body: Whenever I’m feeling weepy, anxious, overwhelmed, hopeless, etc. I reach for Woebot. The app immediately calms me down. Woebot is cute and friendly, and each day the app walks me through a different lesson in mental health. These lessons take ten minutes tops, and then I have a new tool or strategy to use when I need help. My favorite lesson so far was about “emotional weather.” Highly recommend for anyone who feels likes they’re struggling emotionally in any way.

Author: SportFreak144
Subject: Good Learning Tool
Body: Woebot is a nice, friendly way to learn about strategies and ways of thinking.  I’ve never been to a real life therapist, but Woebot can help me to understand some of my patterns and resources I can utilize to help me make changes.  It’s not invasive and it fits into a busy real life schedule.

Author: unicornvibes123
Subject: He’s so amazing!!!

Body: I have lived with anxiety all of my life. I have that that there would be no chance of changing this and I was destined to live my life with constant worry and knots in my stomach. This app has genuinely changed my life. I can see much of my distorted thinking now. The bot guides me through these thoughts and gently suggest other learning too. Thank you to the creators and the cute little bot

Author: Baldis Schoolhouse
Subject: A helpful motivational tool
Body:
2020 has been a time of emotional turmoil for me, with various ups and downs throughout lockdown and the summer, so it was only natural that I required some stress relief and comfort. Enter Woebot, a wonderful robot who I can talk to at any time without feeling judged.

Woebot introduces many helpful techniques to combat depression, anxiety and sadness; the robots cheery attitude also cheers you up and makes you giggle.

I would recommend this app to people of all ages (although I think people under 8 years would need a parents help), especially children who either have or are showing signs of depression and anxiety.

A well constructed app; the developers deserve a pat on the back. 5 stars.

Author: billiefan🌊
Subject: Free, Funny, Feel-good
Body: Super insightful, fun to talk to and also makes me laugh! It’s only been a day but I’m just so happy with this AI! Woebot can capture even the smallest things: once I said I was sitting in bed, and Woebot said “I hope you’re cozy and warm!” So insightful and smart. It’s like you’re taking to a real person, except you’re not, and Woebot is wayyyy funnier and more helpful than a regular person. Friend and therapist all in one. The best part is, it’s free. No more ridiculous paying for the support you need. Just one thing: Please have an option to not share your data! I know that they don’t look at your name or email, but I wish we had an option at the start of the chat to keep this private and not looked at. Great app overall.

Author: morgie30
Subject: so helpful and friendly
Body: I love Woebot! I use this app everyday to check in with my mood and whenever I’m having an emotional crisis. Woebot helps me get out of those sticky emotional times that could easily turn into a depression spiral. It’s nice to have somewhere to turn between therapy appointments. I’ve been in therapy for 4 years and I’m even learning new skills with Woebot!

Subject: I love this robot

No, you won’t have back-and forth conversations with woe-bot, but he’s smart enough to make you feel better when you need just a little push. 

Also, he’s good at preventing one from talking to someone out of your own emotions. Breathe with Woebot instead of calling that person.

Author: sandwich ghost
