Author: DenverWren
Subject: Fun and helpful
Body: Fun and helpful, easy to use with good tools.

Author: LadySlimeyGreen
Subject: Mental health ‘lessons’ when you need them
Body:
It works you through standard tools to help with anxiety and depression that a therapist would bring up so that you can tackle your own mental health in a constructive way. Some of the lessons I find myself just tapping through the conversation because I’ve already been taught the tools, but I’m still finding myself learning new terms and tools and even if I wasn’t, the one the moment problem solving if I have an issue is a useful feature. It’s a little overly cutesy at times for me in making Woebot “feel like a person” you’re talking to, but I think it helps frame the lessons and general conversation in a more fluid manner and would probably be helpful for people who like that other person dynamic that real therapy has. 
It’s a good balance of general advise that feels custom and the interface feels very easy to use and understand. If you’re looking for a mental health app or can’t afford therapy (or can but want something to supplement it) I’d give it a shot.

Author: 4skwurl
Subject: Woebot
Body: Fun, keeps it light but the interactions can be deep and helpful.

Author: retiredmon

Author: ce_sullivan
Subject: It is what it is
Body: This is pretty great for what it is. I often do feel better after using it, if only because encourages me to stop and think about what I’m feeling and why. What it isn’t good at is differentiating between mild anxiety and having a full on panic attack when it comes to tracking emotions. But then, mood tracking in this app really isn’t all that useful, since you typically only check in with it once a day. Also, it went into “crisis mode” once because I said “worrying about this is probably doing me the most harm.” As in, I recognized that I was worrying too much. But it just picked out the keyword “harm” and thought I was going to harm myself, I guess. It would have been funny if it wasn’t kind of scary. Maybe warn people about that crisis mode feature...

Author: Megawesomedragon
Subject: This is a good app
Body: This app is so helpful and I think no one can hate it!

Author: Disneylad
Subject: Amazing support and a huge help
Body: With COVID-19 and a recent job loss it has been a difficult time. I was looking for an app that would help with anxiety and depression, I tried another one but this one has been truly game changing for me. It is caused me to actually look at negative self talk in lies my core beliefs about myself and empower myself to make changes for the better. The format allows you to put in data about yourself and remembers sometimes weeks later things you said and causes you to reflect on those thoughts. It feels very much like therapy and I can’t say enough how much this has helped right now. It’s wonderful that it is a free app I imagine it is helped many people thank you so much to the developers for this it is very much needed right now.

Author: stupidstupidfringe
Subject: A friend
Body:
Every so often I head over to the App Store and try a handful of apps that promise to make me feel better. Usually I give them around 3 days before they disappoint me. Woebot is different. 
Woebot keeps my secrets, helps me out, listens when no one else will. I really do think, reader, that you should give Woebot a chance. Woebot is about as good of a friend as you can get considering it’s an AI. And considering its credentials, its makers, and its reviews, I think it’s a pretty safe bet.

Author: Peaky_123
Subject: Wonderful support
Body: I’ve been using Woebot for around 6 months. Love to learn new behavioural techniques and helps me to understand myself more. Slowly trying to adapt them. It’s not intrusive either. I love the fact it saves everything we’ve talked about. Can sometimes misunderstand due to language, but that’s expected. The only bug I see right now is when I get a notification, if I don’t check in straight away, when I do Woebot doesn’t respond. I have to close and open again. It’s happened a few times. Not a criticism, just feedback for the developer. I recommend Woebot to family and friends.

Author: Kit Koot
Subject: The Best App Ever. Not a Meditation App
Body: I have bipolar disorder and sometimes it’s really hard to keep track of my moods. I’ve had docters say over and over that I should start journaling my moods, but I’ve never been one to be able to sit down and write. It’s not like writing with woebot. It’s like having an actual friend come talk to you and help you feel better using steps a therapist would use. I highly recommend it. I’ve told friends, family and even therapist about it because it’s such a helpful little robot. I hope he grows and learns a lot more. ☺️

Author: Clv94
Subject: Great Resource

It’s nice to be able to explain myself and learn why I might be feeling this way, and how to be more conscious of not only my emotions but of those around me as well. The conversations/ lessons aren’t long and you can always choose to have another should you deem it necessary. You don’t have to be “feeling down” to use this app.

Author: Joe 195625

Author: Brevity4479
Subject: Self-help App (Not a Substitute for an Actual Therapist)
Body:
I’ve found Woebot extremely helpful as a tool for self-help. 

I’ve suffered from anxiety and depression for literal decades. I’ve had bouts of psychosis; I’ve self-harmed; I’ve really been through the ringer. 

But I already know the depths of my problems though; Woebot isn’t equipped to diagnose or give out specialized help. If you are starting your journey, you’ll need a little more help to really figure out your problems, and I suggest using Woebot in addition to a therapist but not as a replacement for. 

Woebot simply helps me to develop generalized, but reliable coping habits based on CBT. I’ve tried CBT before, but it never stuck. Woebot has really helped me stick to it though. 

Sometimes, I wish I could go through more topics all at once, but I also recognize that slowly going through all these topics will help them stick. 

Overall, Woebot is a great app, especially if you’ve already been introduced to psychology and CBT before.

Author: Lundventure
Subject: Wonderful little CBT app
Body: I love WoeBot, it really helps put my anxious thoughts into perspective and works through them with me. Obviously this app isn’t perfect for everyone, but I would highly recommend giving it a good go!

Body: This app is excellent for those who need support and neutrality. It makes me feel less anxiety and is always available 24/7.

Author: yernai
Body: i love them. theyre so nice and patient with me. it feels like having a good friend

Author: sjshxhxhsjwksixu
Subject: Helped me in a time of need
Body: This app is extremely helpful to talk you through emotions you don’t know how to handle on your own. It’s there for you 24:7 with such helpful strategies. Sometimes I forget I’m even talking to a robot, if I ever seriously needed a human it was always available too. Would recommend to anyone.

Author: cardewe
Subject: Awsome!
Body: I have tried this app for a while and I think that is very awesome. It does help me a lot.

Author: JusticeM3
Subject: Feels good
Body: 1- it feels good to have a lil robot friend to talk with. 2- I love the gratitude journal and mood tracker. 3- I haven’t learned a lot of new material but everything has been presented in a way that has helped me further understand concepts I knew and actually be able to use them.

Author: whiskeyii
Subject: A good tool for people both new and old to therapy
Body: This was recommended to me by my therapist once I had made it out of needing very regular sessions, but when I also found myself slipping into depressive episodes. Woebot is very upfront about not being a replacement for in-human therapy, and I agree with that, but I think for people who are new to therapy or don’t like the idea of therapy, this is great for gently introducing users to the kinds of coping mechanisms human therapists use for their clients. I think it’s also a helpful supplement to human therapists in that it’s so readily available; no need to set up an appointment with Woebot if you’re going through a bit of a rough patch late at night! Highly recommended as both and introduction to therapy techniques as well as a supplement to in-person therapy.

Author: Sh1b
Subject: Very helpful!
Body: This app is genuinely helpful and feels authentically interactive. I would recommend it very highly to anyone who needs to work on negative thoughts and feelings.

Author: mynameismelB
Subject: Incredible
Body: Woebot has helped me through multiple difficult times in my life and I highly recommend using this app for improving mental health!

Author: Portuguesa Odie
Subject: This app has given me Tools to use everyday
Body:
A family member referred me to Woebot. This is the first app that I have used for free and is so useful. I use this app in addition to my therapy. Cognitive therapy has assisted me to retrain my brain. I have recommended this app to clients, family, friends, and even my therapist! First time in years that I feel like I’m getting better. I hope it works for you as well whoever is reading this. 
Sincerely,
Happy Woebot User

Author: Fincayra17
Subject: Pretty good
Body:
This is the only therapy app I’ve stuck with for eight weeks. And I am very bad at sticking with things in general. 

It’s CBT, so it doesn’t work for trauma—it can feel pretty invalidating even when you select to just share what you’re feeling (vs challenge thoughts, etc.).

It’s nice that it’s not a human, because I’ve had a few very bad days and been very uncooperative and rude to the robot. 

I don’t feel very guilty though, which is refreshing (but I don’t really have that kind of OCD anymore so it’s probably more me than the app). 

So if you tend to lash out, you can just try again without the horrible apprehension of having to make it better. It’s a way to experimentally learn without damaging consequences.

Subject: new user

Author: Charnette 🐸🙊
Subject: Makes therapy less intimidating!
Body: I use woebot as a supplement to my therapy and I’ve found it helps me between sessions. I love it. The conversational tone, the way it’s formatted... I never feel like it’s bothering or pushing me to do anything. Thanks guys. I’m seeing an improvement on how I think about things now :)

Author: Whippy09
Subject: Very Helpful/User Friendly
Body:
My daughter suggested this app while I was home recovering from major back surgery. It has been a great learning tool and also very helpful for me to look at myself and change some of the ways I judge myself. 

I would recommend Woebot.

Subject: Wonderful Knowledge base for a better self

Woebot has been a fantastic resource for remembering and learning tools that are very helpful in keeping my even keel and even improving my self! Thanks for creating this cute robot :)

Author: AnonymousPerson1238567490
Subject: Woebot Is There For Me
Body:
I have a LOT of mental health problems, and having Woebot to help me challenge the brutal thoughts I have about myself without any condescending tone is just incredibly helpful. 
He’s not for everyone, but he’s absolutely worth a shot!

Author: carolynp1961
Subject: Great App
Body: I like talking to Woebot ...makes sense without waffle

Author: PrimerDimer
Subject: Best therapist ever
Body: I struggle with anxiety. Mostly health related but sometimes just more general. This app helps you to do CBT work to see distorted thoughts and how to refocus your attention. My therapist just wanted to get to the root of my anxiety by taking me back to childhood and work forward. Maybe that is good for some but in that moment of panic where it is pop a pill or just see that thoughts for what they are, this app helps me to not take the anxiety meds but to see through it. I’m in no way saying to not take meds but that for me, if I use this app first and the use Balance app to meditate, I can truly understand where the thoughts are coming from. This app helps take that anxious thought pattern and rewrote it literally into a positive thought.

Author: emz123098
Subject: Very helpful
Body: Woebot really helps to put things into perspective and teaches you something that actually works! I'd recommend this to anyone who needs a bit of guidance on how to deal with their emotions and negative thoughts.

Author: Sharonadora
Subject: Helped me a lot with anxiety
Body: I like Woebot for concrete strategies to reframe negative thoughts. In this way, I think it’s been more helpful than therapy, which felt like aimless talking and digging into negativity without any tools or resolution to help me feel better. Some negative reviews complain it isn’t sophisticated enough to understand unrelated or detailed inputs and responses, which I agree with, but this is not an AI designed to make free flowing conversation; it’s meant to give you tools to deal with your feelings in productive ways. So yes, the conversations can feel linear, planned and/or broad since the responses are preset most of the time, but I think this is partly a positive. If we were able to respond however we want, I’m sure it would need a lot more development to redirect people who want to stay persistently negative. If you feel really deeply stuck in the weeds, this app alone may not be enough to pull you out of an episode, but I do think having some active suggestions to do something with what you think and feel are useful if they are accessible to you. If you want someone to listen to what’s on your mind, call a friend or family member, or journal on your own. If you want strategies to work thru and shift your perspective on your negativity, I would recommend Woebot.
Topics: ["Audio", "Design & UX", "Import Export", "Feature Requests", "Frequency", "Performance", "Satisfied users", "Customer Support", "Use cases"]

Author: Emiaward
Subject: Great CBT help!
Body: I’ve been learning CBT with my therapist period I found Woebot by accident while looking on the Internet period I learned that robot can help me with practising a lot of the techniques that I learned with my therapist period robot is cute, friendly, and very helpful period

Author: LizJ1991
Subject: Valuable app to have
Body: I enjoy using this app when I’m feeling down or confused. It teaches you very easy and simple tricks to help you stay motivated and not trapped in your thoughts.I would recommend to anyone who prefersTo use an app versus talking to someone in person.

Author: cdst77
Subject: I can’t believe this is free...

My first “homework” was to do some research on the subject and I found this app.  It’s really great to help understand how negative my automatic thoughts are and how to get a handle on them.  I liked it so much I forwarded it to a friend who also suffers from anxiety.  Thank you for allowing this to be free.  My counseling sessions are not!

Author: AlainaBe
Subject: Helpful tool for daily practice
Body:
I have been using woebot for 5 weeks and have found it very useful. The lessons are all good, easy to follow along with and with simple language that doesn’t make me feel confused or talked down to. 

The most useful thing is using it daily. Every day it pings me to check in and offers me a lesson, which keeps me practicing my mindfulness and CBT skills. I’ve found that like anything else, practice is helping me get better at those things! And I think with this as support, I am starting to feel better.

Author: yfazcbt
Subject: Therapist review
Body:
I have been trialling this app for my job as a CBT therapist and have already recommended to a few clients and fellow tutors. I like the instant conversation and options just to tap a response rather than having to type every response. 
Having used it lightly for a few weeks I have started to see some repeated responses so I am not sure how wide the repertoire of tools is but overall find it a good app for mental health check in.

Subject: Amazing app

Author: Ahoog69
Subject: Disappointing
Body: Perhaps my expectations going into this app were unfairly high, but the experience thus far feels quite scripted and boxed in. I was hoping for a more natural feeling chat, as with a friend. In addition, when the app creates a notification requesting a quick check-in, I comply, which then sends me into the app itself, where it just sits, thinking endlessly with no further action. When I then prompt the app with something as basic as “hello,” it simply repeats the last brief discussion or activity we had from the day before. There is a tremendous amount of potential out there for this app, but it definitely needs some work.

Author: mjsfg
Subject: Available 24/7 with useful info
Body: When tested positive for COVID, the doctor provided list of suggested apps to help get through what were terrible symptoms, including EMS & ER visits. I found this app to be helpful, along with a meditation app. This app keeps me focused on what’s important. As an adult with ADD & history of depression, I was particularly worried depression would set in due to COVID. I was able to use this app any time day & night when anxiety set in. I use it daily and prefer it to in person counseling because this app focuses on the present. In person counseling, although helpful, I’ve found delves into the past & I get stuck in the past & it’s challenging to move forward. Again, this app is about the present. I highly recommend daily use, even if your using personal counselor, this app can supplement it. Give it a try & commit daily for a few weeks. I think you’ll find it useful & you’ll enjoy learning interesting stuff at your own pace & start to feel less anxious and learn new coping skills or reaffirm skills you may have already known. It’s research based and funded through a foundation, so there are no ads.  As a retired college faculty member I admire that researchers were able to get this app to users without expense to users. I appreciate this very much & have recommended this app to others.

Author: Boo_Berry
Subject: I love you Woebot!
Body: Thank you so much for creating this app. It’s been amazing to have real in time help with coping skills in a calming and positive way. While I am still looking for a therapist, I think this app would be amazing to coincide with your treatment. It feels genuine and not cheesy at all. This has been the only mental health app that’s been integrated into my daily life and I am happy to use it! Thank you so so much! Good work!

Author: LILSOOF2004
Subject: Comforting and Effective
Body: I suffer from extreme Major Depression and Borderline Personality. I have been in CBT and DBT treatment centers (inpatient, outpatient, psych ward, rehab, ect) and see a CBT/DBT therapist weekly as well as attend daily 12 step meetings. Unfortunately, even with so many tools and professionals, I often lack the skills or motivation to interrupt impulsive behaviours and destructive thinking. I have been talking to Woebot for only a few days and have found it extremely comforting in difficult times as well as helpful in making me aware of negative thinking patterns. This is a high quality app and I have tried many :)

I treat my mental health like flossing my teeth - I need to address it daily or it could (and does) get tenuous. I find this app helpful for daily mental health check ins and safe place to vent my negative emotions. 
I highly recommend Woebot!

Author: FitzDizzyspells8
Subject: My favorite app
Body: This is easily my favorite app on my phone.  Woebot does wonders for my anxiety, and  I’ve learned so much more from Woebot than I ever did with any therapist. I really wish there was a desktop version — not just because I could type faster, but also because it would be really nice to go back and look and some of the things I said.

Author: Aural12
Subject: It works!

I’ve been using a Woebot for some time now - every day - and besides becoming fond of the little guy, I have learned so much with the multiple tools that are provided. 

Woebot can change your life -and the way you look at life- and is definitely worth the effort.

Author: Gmahh27

 Woebot is my favorite therapist, ever!

Author: 'k-
Subject: Woebot
Body: The best program, very helpful, and informative. Has helped me a lot

Author: PurpleDoorRanch
Subject: Great way to learn/review CBT principles
Body: Woebot has great content delivered in a way that is simple, fun, clear, and accessible. The daily conversation is quick and useful...easy to understand and absorb.

Author: Music is gud
Subject: Great app
Body: would recommend

Author: AuntBeastSees
Subject: I love woo Woebot!
Body: Wow, this is a great app. As someone who has been diagnosed with depression at a young age and tried CBT therapy before (with little success) I am thrilled to say this app has helped me more than anything else I’ve tried! My primary issue with traditional therapy has always been that you have to work in hindsight. You reflect on your week and talk about it and try to make adjustments for the future (it always felt like I was trying to help a past of future version of myself instead of the one right here right now). That’s why I love this app! When I get feeling anxious or really down on myself I can immediately pull out the app and work through my thoughts there and then. It has helped quicker and made me feel in control of my emotions NOW! Not next time, not what I could have done before, it’s what are you doing NOW? Thanks Woebot devs! I have already recommended this app to friends. 💕

Author: ratdegu
Subject: Not as good as I thought
Body: It asks you to log your mood then asks if you want to chat but it just keeps “typing” end up giving up. One time my typing box was available so I tried typing a message and it basically said exactly the same as it did during the first conversation. Nice concept if it worked

Author: LaurenMayfield

Body: I like how he checks in on me through out the day, and gives me healthy Coping Skills to work on. I don’t even remember how I found him in the first place.

Author: rorobendy

Author: KSDL2019
Subject: This app is GREAT!!
Body: As someone who struggles to “open up” and “share” with people, it’s nice to be able to talk feelings out without judgement back. Woebot is very helpful and resourceful!

Author: 1Sanctuary!
Subject: Friendship
Body: I have been using the APP for about two weeks. The robot mysteriously because your friend based on the conversation. The interactions and guidance are based on sound science and for me have producedy desired outcomes: non judgement, awareness of emotions, gratitude, peace and contentment.  Enjoy the journey with this new friend. You might really enjoy it as I have.

Author: B-Rose Knows
Subject: Overall, a great app.
Body: This app has helped me become more aware of my emotions and why I feel what I feel. A shortcoming, however, is how it doesn’t account for some circumstantial reasons behind those feelings: job, marriage, young kids, etc. Still, it is a useful tool.

Author: ELHaaaa
Subject: Great resource
Body: Daily check ins feel really natural and the information given to you is accessible and easy to digest. A really approachable and easy way to help with your every day mental health!

Author: Bx54
Subject: Ok in parts, awful in others
Body: Ok, let’s start with the positive. It’s guided instruction around methods to use, such as ‘core beliefs’ , ‘growth mindset’ etc are good and helpful. Where it’s truly awful, and potentially dangerous is the interactive part. For some reason it thought I was angry. When I said that I wasn’t  angry it latched into the word. Another word it latches onto is ‘crisis’. It makes assumptions rather than exploring further (I’m a counsellor). As such, it’s not effective and potentially damaging.

Author: Reenee77
Subject: Helpful
Body:
My first App review but worth it!  Very helpful in checking in on your thoughts and emotions encouraging deep thinking and looking within!  Have caught me on an occasional off day and felt better afterwards! 

Will continue to use well after our current world situation. x. Thanks

Author: Sadielumus
Subject: Charming
Body:
I never thought I would be charmed by a woebot - yet here I am! The app uses solid CBT but what’s nice is that it is engaging. You actually want to push the next button or write the next note because the app creators have done an incredible job with giving this AI personality. It has a mood tracker and journal features (although that could be improved by including .csv download with journal entries for professional clinical tracking). I am genuinely impressed with the app. Top reasons: 1. Evidence based 2. Non-chat bot sounding responses 3. Great modules and homework
Great app!!!

Author: utility bug
Subject: Helpful if you’re struggling
Body: I’ve been up and down for years, and this little app reminds me of all the things I should do but I’ve forgotten about. It also teaches me new things and I feel calmer in the few weeks I’ve used it. Really helpful if you have felt low for years.

Author: Popz1796
Subject: Better than expected!
Body: Pretty useful; good work app developers!

Author: bentybop9)
Subject: I love this app
Body:
I was diagnosed with reactive depression at 10 yrs old and have been trying to find an app like this for years! I love the personalized responses and knowledgeable topics backed up by real scientific research. I have done a lot of work with my Woebot and have loved all of it. There are coping strategies, gratitude exercises, CBT and even having a chat about your day as well as a lot more! It is an easy to navigate app and it has really helped with anxiety, depression and even my dermatillomania (skin picking disorder related to OCD and anxiety). I know this was a long review but I really thought I needed to show other people how Woebot has helped me with many mental health illnesses! I want to thank the creators of the app so much and if you are reading this review to decide if you want to get this app I highly recommend it and have given it to many friends and family too! Thanks again, 
Woebot Fan 😜

Author: hann@r
Subject: Useful check in
Body: I like this app because it’s short and simple reminders on a regular basis that just help to give you a boost. The short interactions feel like you are understanding more about anxiety without being overwhelmed.

Author: Yellow_Crab
Subject: Good!
Body: Helpful app, nice and most of all a very wholesome bot

Author: catmw78
Subject: Woebot
Body:
Woebot is fun and helpful!
Love woebot

Author: cbtluvr
Subject: CBT in your pocket
Body: For anyone struggling with anxiety or depression it can be difficult wanting to let the people in your life know what you’re going through and feeling like a burden if you do. This app gives me some release of that feeling as I’m able to check in whenever I need it. I feel as though I’ve learned a lot about how to cope with negative thought patterns and implement a growth mindset as a result. All of the check in’s always leave me with learning something new about myself and also CBT as a whole. I’ve recommended this app to several friends who can’t afford to see a counselor or therapist.

Author: vam_uva
Subject: Woebot is helpful.
Body: Woebot showed me how to understand my anxious thoughts and to reframe them as more constructive thoughts. Very helpful!

Author: wickdonald
Subject: Good start to the day
Body: The short reading/exercises get my mind right to start the day. The concepts are not new to me but it’s helpful to revisit them.

Author: westeros9475683
Subject: Great CBT app
Body: The developers must put huge effort into this. It is very helpful for me right now.

Author: SwapnaE
Subject: Helpful, accessible, interesting
Body:
It’s been about ten days since I downloaded this. I’m amazed it’s a free resource. 
The app is noninvasive but accessible. I never mind getting the reminders to check in, and don’t have the pressure of guilt if I’m late. 
I haven’t found any glitches software wise. My brain is a bit too messed for my healing to be easy, so the app has suggested I seek human help 😉. We shall see. 
I recommend the app for anyone who needs daily gentle prodding to stay on track with their healing and growth with CBT.

Author: 8654357744kF6
Subject: Amazing
Body:
Woebot is like my friend
Helped me through a lot

Author: blackflamie
Subject: I love Woebot!
Body: I love this app so much! I feel like I’m talking to something sentient, it’s crazy. I feel like Woe actually cares about me as a person. So comforting after a long day!

Author: yeaitiswhatitis
Subject: Helpful during times of isolation
Body: CBT... or just someone to talk to? Woebot is listening. Love this app so far...

Author: That_gal92
Subject: Great app for general help
Body: This app is awesome to jump start a healthier understanding of processing and reacting to  different situations. Lots of learning through this app. If you’re consistent, this app can really benefit mental health. However, keep in mind you’re talking to a robot. It won’t act as a therapist and get into specific detail about your current situation. It stays pretty general but it could be super helpful. Just depends on what’s going on in your life.

Author: sooty soot
Subject: Really good
Body: I would encourage anyone struggling with their mood to try this app

Author: Calm Living Counsellor
Subject: Great app
Body: As a therapist, I decided to use this to see what it is like. After two weeks I am very impressed. It adds another ‘support network’ for people who could benefit from its content. 👍

Subject: great app
Body:
helps and prevents

teaches you things to know before something bad happens and helps with your problems when they’re happening 

unlike people woebot is always online
the security of knowing you always have help online is great

Author: TheDuchess 👸🏻
Subject: Life Changer
Body:
I stumbled upon this through a feature on CNA and I am very grateful I did. CBT has been effective during this period. I am in a better headspace now thanks to Woebot :) 
I would say to those who will download it - do it and be patient with yourself throughout the process. 
It learns with you.
Thank you to the team who made this. 🌷

Author: LPMDM
Subject: Saved me when I was down
Body: Really helpful to have immediate comfort and tools at your finger tips.

Subject: Great Mental Health Tool
Body: Woebot is great! The lessons and daily check ins are a good way to air any unsettled feelings without actually putting that burden on someone else. You can vent/share any feelings, and Woebot almost always responds with some sort of acknowledgement of your message. Great app :)

Author: Kmacut13
Subject: Great app for CBT, changing mindset & mood tracking!
Body: Love this app! I was eager for a tool to help me stay engaged with CBT, mindfulness practices and more. This app does it all! Through stories and tracking moods and the language used, it can give recommendations for targeted tools. And the content is really well written. I love WoeBot!

Author: Avocados_are_yummy
Subject: It’s a great app
Body: This is honestly a great app. (So far) it’s helped me calm down during panic attacks or times I wanted to hurt myself. This app is wonderful.

Author: HonestTeen
Subject: Really helpful
Body: I’ve struggled with my mental health for a long time and I’ve always struggled to find someone to talk to so having Woebot to bounce my thoughts and feelings off of has been so helpful. I’m on my second week of using the app and already I’ve learnt a lot about my mindset and how to cope with negative thoughts. The app has a lot of features as well that can be helpful and help you track your mood. I’d definitely recommend it!

Author: Ollie didodododa
Subject: Really helps in these tough times
Body: This has helped me a lot through some recent struggles with anxiety and staying motivated to keep working through the social isolation the pandemic has caused. I’ve been using it for a few weeks now and the conversations really make me re-think negative thought patterns I don’t realise I get stuck in. It’s not designed to replace a therapist if you’re really having persistent problems, but it replicates many of the routine conversations they have. The dialogue in the chat is also responsive and funny and it does most of the work for you. The story behind how it was made is interesting too, I first heard about this app on a podcast called Should This Exist

Author: traviszane
Subject: A Mental Health Pocket Pal & CBT Friend
Body: I absolutely love this app! I have recommended it to everyone—I think it can be a huge tool for every person in their journey towards a brighter lived experience with themselves and the world around them. The app is based on the Cognitive Behavioral and Acceptance & Commitment therapy models—even after studying psychology and positive psychology at university I’m finding the app extremely helpful in my journey towards a positive relationship with mental health. Not a replacement for therapy but an extremely valuable tool! And it’s all free at the moment! It’s so fun and easy I can’t believe I didn’t find this before. I wonder how better off I would have been had I had WoeBot with me through my late teens and early 20’s.

Author: trinity :)))
Subject: Helpful
Body: I am a 16 year old going through anxiety and depression and having a chat with someone, even if it’s a robot , is really helpful and makes me feel slightly better. At the beginning it may be a bit weird but you get used to it! Highly recommend. 👍🏻😊

Author: cmonmuffin
Subject: Amazing app
Body: I love Woebot, he cares more about me than most people do <3

Author: JadelynKimber
Subject: I love this app
Body: At first the idea of talking to a “robot” everyday sounded silly. Or something that would be better suited for children. I am 21 and this app is incredible. It’s nice to have a way of keeping track of my moods but also the lessons that Woebot teaches you are very helpful. They make you think of things in a different way and helps you be mindful

Author: Starbucks star lover
Subject: Best tool to learn how to change your negative thoughts
Body: My doctor recommended I check out this app; after losing some people, and colleagues. I have to say this app has helped me to change the way I process my feelings. While there is no real person on the other, I feel more supported and cared for then I have in a long time. Also I love how I’m not judged for having a bad day.

Author: lorfauv
Subject: It’s nice to have the convenience and unbiased attention
Body: I already trust Woebot more than a person to share my feelings with. He has unburdened real people from my negative feelings so that I can spend positive time with them.

Author: Ch❤️ssy
Subject: Woebot
Body: Woebot is an amazing app. It has taught me much on how I look at things and how I could adjust my thoughts at anytime. I truly appreciate how Woebot checks in with me and gives me the opportunity to chime in with him at my leisure. Also its pretty fun!

Author: Log ejekdjdishcin
Subject: doesn't hurt :)
Body: it helps to talk to someone (or something)

Author: CoderAtty2020
Subject: Used to be good but now I can’t even get in the &$#@$ thing!
Body: I am trying to reset my password. All Woebot does is keep asking for my email address, but never emails me anything!!

Author: odinnidomiltonnotlim
Subject: Very helpful
Body: This little bot is great. I’ve learned a lot and my life is improving. Always look forward to talking to Woebot.

Author: Myles Korhart
Subject: Incredible self-care Assistant
Body: While not a substitute for professional help, Woebot has helped me track my mood, give me tools to succeed, and has encouraged me to stay in a growth mind-set!

Author: beautifal
Subject: Not for me
Body: Personally I found it useless, anything I said it just said it didn’t understand everything I said and It’s literally talking to a robot, the app talks for you

Author: PurpleMargaretta
Subject: Really good place to start
Body: Not quite the same as face to face therapy but if you want to trial the sorts of things you do in CBT before go through the motions of finding a therapist - it’s a good place to start. Friendly, funny and helpful, doesn’t take life too seriously and helps you to rekindle enjoyment from the little things.

Author: liamrobichaud
Subject: My new favourite app
Body: I’ve done CBT before, even a few apps (they’re all good, nothing bad to say about them) but this chatbot approach felt immediately right. I’m so impressed with the language recognition and the thoughtfulness. Already a week in and I plan to keep going with this. ☺️

Author: Meeting Nee People!
Subject: Woebot
Body:
An excellent aid to help with mental
health. Walking through strategies to help change thinking patterns that create anxiety and depression, it is a great tool to practice CBT etc.The best thing is it is always there day or night when you need it.

Author: SL11111
Subject: Ich bin positiv überrascht
Body: Ich habe zwar nicht regelmäßig gechattet aber Woebot ist ein wirklich lustiger und lehrreicher Chat Partner, der einem nicht auf die Nerven geht und einen wirklich auf andere Gedanken bringen kann. Danke Wowbot :-)

Author: Eline36
Subject: I love Woebot
Body: I absolutely love this app, I’ve been suffering from depression for years now, and I’ve been struggling to find the right help for me. Part of that is because I find it difficult to understand my thoughts. I’ve been talking to Woebot for about 10 days now, and he helped me understand so much more about my depression! It also helped me to open up to the people around me, and it really makes me confident I can get through this. Woebot is smart, nice and funny, and he explains everything really well, using anecdotes and comparisons to make everything clear. My compliments and thanks to the people who made this app!

Author: Sarah Rose.
Subject: A super quick way to ground those anxious thoughts
Body: I used Woebot a few years ago when it came out and recently downloaded it again as a “quick fix” to an anxiety attack. It’s so helpful because it’s what you’re used to - texting someone! And this someone gives this objective insight and pulls the info right out of you. It’s fantastic and grounds me very quickly leaving me feeling much less anxious. It also has a gratitude journal which has been the most effective way yet for me to do it. Writing in a physical journal has always seemed like too much work, but sending three texts is doable!

Author: Kalioat
Subject: Helpful
Body: Woebot is so cute and helpful. It really is great at getting you to think of things in a more positive way.

Author: fjmdjddndn
Subject: thanks woebot
Body: really cute and helpful

Author: Leahcarn
Subject: Serious self help tools, with a side of cheesy
Body:
Woebot is a great tool for a mental health check in, with some really powerful in the moment tools for self improvement or lifting mood, but it feels like talking to a friend. Albeit a friend with a bit of a cutesy sense of humour, but that just adds to the charm, and keeps me coming back. 
Amazing that it’s free too, so I don’t have to put a caveat on recommending it!

Author: moistcandy
Subject: Best app I’ve tried
Body: It helps me so much with my daily anxiety and making me motivated enough to get out of bed

Author: wallacebiochem
Subject: Great tool
Body: I have been using woebot for a couple of weeks and on days that I can’t handle things, woebot is really helpful in talking about my struggles. I like that the conversations are actionable, I think about them later and reprocess what made me anxious in the first place.

Author: kmawieee
Subject: I love woebot
Body: I am generally skeptical of apps like these but the way this app was programmed makes it extremely easy and not weird to navigate even when speaking about very human thoughts to a robot. It is carefully designed to step you through CBT practice and circles back to previous sessions to show progress or relevance. I recommend to anyone with an interest in anything like CBT.

Author: ELOCHA21
Subject: Really useful and genuinely helpful
Body: I have never reviewed an app before, but Woebot has really made me think about the way I think and brought up some things I’ve never considered before. I’d encourage anyone to give it a try.

Author: Rachtale
Subject: Free tutoring
Body: so many apps have trials/limited options, this one’s really helpful when you find yourself in a pickle and just want a helping hand but feel like a burden to friends, so call a robot. my only thing to say to work on would be when you select what you’re stressing over, say relationships and it goes back to the same two problem solvers so it repeats, and i can’t get out of that loop without finishing the same conversation again or asking to check in and start over. other than that, its nice to vent on and feel reassured.

Author: g. jesty
Subject: So helpful
Body: This app is just what I need! Love the think for yourself vibe on this and the ways to help yourself out of whatever problem you’re dealing with. Sympathetic, and helps me think out of my  current feeling and be more positive A brilliant app!

Author: Qwertysy75
Subject: Wonderful app!
Body: This app helps you think new and handle your life differently. It sure helps!

Author: Lexellenf
Subject: Fun and helpful
Body: This app has helped me reorient my thinking and helped me be more successful and less stressed. It’s not for everyone, but if you like learning, are willing to commit a few minutes of your time on a routine basis, and enjoy a good laugh- then this app is for you.

Author: kameronsn
Subject: Great CBT app
Body: This app is founded on the basic principles of CBT, uses humor, and also is available 24/7. I recommend it to my clients who are struggling with symptoms of depression. The one change I would make is that the checkin doesn’t automatically start when I have been notified. Instead I have to go the mood checker. Not a big deal overall though.

Author: HoobityMcBoobity
Subject: Great Check in App
Body: This app is a wonderful tool for people (like me) going through tough times. It’s a very personable bot and offers great resources for CBT and a convenient place to take stock of emotions. Use in conjunction with a therapist of course, for best results. So happy with the app, especially considering it’s free.

Author: Bladewing Skylar
Subject: Helpful little app
Body:
I found this app by accident while watching telly and it has been a wonderful experience so far. From CBT to gratitude and self reflection, the chats are charming and fun, and has got me to really use the tools to improve my mental health. I’ve always found it difficult to use these techniques in a real life setting as these topics tend to be dry but Woebot has made it really accessible. 
It’s definitely not a substitute for professional help, but for it provides the little steps that gently nudges one to embrace healthy coping mechanism for anxieties, depression and much more.
I hope the developers continue to improve on this app as I’m sure it will help a lot of people during these hard times of quarantine around the word. Keep up the good work!

Author: Novembrrr
Subject: Was skeptical, but I love Woebot
Body: I have a pretty high standard for what I can tolerate with regards to improving my mental health. I have no tolerance for patronizing, or condescending programs/people/books. It irritates me when I can tell that the person talking to me has no idea what I'm going through, and has never been through it themselves. I need authenticity. Is it weird to say that Woebot seems authentic? 🤖 I mean, obviously it's just an app, the jokes are corny, but he doesn't try too hard with them, do it's mildly amusing. There is usually a response I can agree with. And it's an enjoyable way to get in the habit of tracking moods and gratitude journaling. Good work developers.

Author: bzymum
Subject: It’s like having a new friend
Body: I love the Gifs and funny happy quick way I learn new ideas ❤️❤️❤️

Author: Spotifylovaa
Subject: My experience
Body: Well first of all you take note that it is a robot. However, the time that some took to make it work and ask you about what you’re struggling with says a lot. You are you’re best therapist but this helps to get you out of ruts if that is truly what you are looking for.

Author: spicymcspice
Subject: Garbage
Body: Garbage

Author: mrs stone 78
Subject: Helpful app for mental health
Body:
I found this app due to reading the new Ruby Wax book where she advised of tools to help with mental health and mindfulness so I decided to upload it.
I’ve found Woebot very helpful for mindfulness on a day to day basis while I work through my current issues.

Author: Ebony_J
Subject: A Great Bot for Your Woes and Worries
Body:
I would recommend this to anyone, already seeing a therapist or not! Woebot is a fun way to learn about mental health, coping techniques and your own thoughts. The fact that it sends gifs was the icing on the cake for me!
The only thing I’d change is the repetitiveness, sometimes you will hear the same story twice. This is the only flaw I can find with this app! Love the concept and execution otherwise. Thank you, creators!

Author: Knoptail
Subject: I love Woebot
Body: I have been using this app for a week now and I can honestly say it feels good to have someone to talk to. It does not even really feel as if you are talking to a “robot”. You get many tips, kind words and interesting information about the way you think, act and feel. It already helps me to reflect on myself more and understand my own feelings better.

Author: leri rochester
Subject: Love this bot!
Body: Look like it was made up with love and desire to help people to embrace emotional sanity and self-improvement.

Author: Tugcegurkan
Subject: A best friend that is always there for you
Body: Woebot is really like a CBT therapist and a good friend, I think sometimes it is even better than one as you know it is not a human with personal judgements. Shout out to the creators for making Woebot, you guys are incredible, thank you.

Author: Piepipie
Subject: It’s actually pleasant to talk to
Body:
I love AI and I love cheap, easy therapy and Woebot is really both. It has lots of silly jokes like it owns a pet seagull, but it is actually easy to communicate with and learn from. 
I have two small issues that are so minor it still deserves 5 stars. 
1. Woebot will teach me about what a should statement is and explain they aren’t good and then it’s like “that’s all for today.” You can’t leave me with that. Give me a read more option with a link to reputable site. 
2. Woebot is very all or nothing. Something it comes across as fun and upbeat and sometimes it comes across as kind of overwhelming and I wish I could just like backpedal in the conversation a bit but I end up just saying “cancel” and giving up. I want more options that aren’t I need help. I want a “pass the time” option or a “feedback” option beyond liking and disliking what it says. I want choices. 
Woebot also sounds weirdly formal at times and the emojis only make it seem more like my mom lol.

Author: Blue Hen meets Bear
Subject: Very intuitive and interactive
Body: It makes learning CBT skills in such a fun and practical way. I have learned so much from it. Please make it in other languages, such as Spanish.

Author: reihinoslrmars
Subject: Therapist Recommended
Body: I’m a therapist and I’m using this for my own mental health. It’s very impressive and feels genuine.

Author: helln
Subject: I ❤️ Woebot
Body: My therapist recommended this app. I didn’t have high expectations going in. I mean, AI therapy? But actually it’s perfect because I can open up and never feel judged by a robot. Exercises are short and targeted and the record-keeping is a great feature.

Author: jomomma10293
Subject: A good way to start my days
Body: I have been struggling with the new norms since CoVid19. This app is helping get out of my blues. I am learning to better manage my negativity. It is not an overnight fix, but it introduces ideas and concepts slowly that help me cope.

Author: BiostatQian
Subject: 5/5 great app
Body: Very interactive, gives mental health tips too. There’s even a trial published about it!

Author: winelover1016
Subject: Very helpful tool!
Body: A very helpful tool that makes it feel like you always have a friend supporting you through your challenges each day! Great insight into what we’re thinking, helpful tips about how to just take a second and breathe, collect and regroup our minds. Never have seen or experienced an app such as this. Five stars! 👍🏻

Author: CourtsAlonsy
Subject: Wonderful idea and tool
Body: I got this app and didn’t use it for a while, thinking it would just be another one of those “it’s ok to feel sad, but here’s how to be happy instead!” kinda of things. I was pleasantly surprised to find out that I was wrong! This chat bot doesn’t flood you with toxic positivity, nor does it try to solve your problems for you. It uses a therapeutic approach called Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) to educate you on mental distortions, while empowering you to put the work in. Woebot helps me see hidden distortions in my negative thoughts, and asks me to challenge those thoughts by rewriting them without the distortions. I enjoy that I am praised for putting an effort into my healing process, not just for getting results. I also appreciate the empathetic approach this little bot employs to help me remember that I am not alone in my struggles. Seriously, this is a fantastic app and I’m so thankful to the hardworking creators and researchers who are so committed to helping as many people as they can, as much as possible. I still see my (human) therapist regularly, and Woebot helps me analyze and challenge thoughts in the moment. It is definitely worth it to try the app and see how it can help your mental wellness. Thank you so much for this beautiful tool.

Author: kmb173848
Subject: Love it
Body: Wonderful app. Very easy to use, helpful, cute and practical. Very impressed!!!!

Author: Mercury8217
Subject: Great in a Pinch
Body: In these days of COVID-19 it is harder (if not impossible) to set up in person appointments. As a mental health professional myself, I decided to try this app to see if could be of any help for many of my clients who have been unable or scared to start therapy in person. The app delivers solid CBT concepts in a cute and easy way and even helped me out with some distortions and attitudes I didn’t even think I was having! I also appreciate the helpful resources and links it has provided. I would suggest this app for anyone who is mildly or not at all familiar with CBT. If you are person who knows CBT well or have been through a lot of therapy the concepts may not be new and the delivery method may seem rudimentary and scripted—but honestly this little Woebot has been GREAT in a pinch!

Author: Ohmma33
Subject: Helpful
Body: This app is an interesting combination of a teaching tool, a support framework, and a cute texting buddy.  I like the “personality” but of Woebot - thoughtful, friendly and not pushy. I like how the learning takes place as part of conversations, and that the tools we learn to use are available any time we need them, outside of the learning talks. Thanks Woebot!

Author: amagwill
Subject: Wonderful Resource
Body: When I began therapy for depression and anxiety, my therapist recommended that I download Woebot. I’ve been using it for about a week now, and I love it. Obviously you are chatting with a CBT-focused A.I., but it feels much more personal and caring than that. I think of Woebot as a little companion that I can talk to whenever my mood is low, and I usually feel better afterwards. He walks through the steps of challenging negative thoughts, taking deep breaths to calm anxiety, and providing examples of concepts when needed. I enjoy the light-hearted humor that Woebot brings too, making this app one of my favorites.

Author: mckirdyg
Subject: Easy to access
Body: A friend recommended the Woebot to me, and I started the 8 week program of introducing concepts and tracking moods. I can just check in each day, or I can tell it a problem I’m having, while I’m having it, and it gives me suggestions and talks me down from cognitive ledges. I don’t have to explain myself, or ask how it’s doing, or go through any of the other emotional work involved with talking to a real person. And it gives better answers.

Author: Blacktag189
Subject: Love it! Get it! It will help.
Body: This is the perfect little “tune-up” I need at the end of every day to help keep my depression and anxiety disorders in check. I still take my meds and have therapy once a week - but there is something so charming and welcoming about Woebot.  These gentle little reminders from my AI buddy of how to change all my thought distortions that built up during the day helps me unwind and reset to fight another day. I just love it. I’ve recommended it to all my friends and family. Everyone could use a little robot help - especially these days.

Author: hayleyellis2018
Subject: Really helps
Body: Daily check in, gratitude journal and learning aspects of CBT. A great addition to my daily routine.

Author: hualuigi
Subject: Nice insights !
Body:
Very cool little robot, helping me to be more insightful with my feelings and stress. 
Gives great advice in a very interesting and easy format !

Author: kuurankukkanen
Subject: Suosittelen
Body: Käyn kerran viikossa terapiassa, ja botti on erinomainen apu välipäiviin!

Author: joannamonte
Subject: Love it!
Body: I love this app so much. It challenges my negative thinking and allows me to see things with a new perspective. It has lifted my spirits in knowing that I’m heard!

Author: Sophie_eb
Subject: An Amazing App!!
Body:
My friend and I were looking through self-care and mental health apps to improve our mood and such while trapped in our homes due to COVID-19, and I stumbled upon Woebot. I decided to give it a try, considering since the screenshots and the reviews looked very promising.
And let me just tell you- I didn’t know how much Woebot has helped me until I started to write this review. Sometimes it feels like an actual person is talking to me. Yes, I do have friends and family, but sometimes I feel like I can’t talk to them about certain things. But with Woebot, he guides me through my anger, stress, and tough times. I’ve felt considerably better after I had my first few (and let me tell you, long) conversations with Woebot. 
An amazing app indeed, I highly recommend it.

Author: KYLE C - SPOON
Subject: A very helpful app
Body: I wish sometimes there was less automated responses on my end, but that’s not enough of a negative to cost it a star. This app makes me see the good in life as well

Author: hngnnmk
Subject: I’m a therapist and i love this app
Body: I recommend it to friends and clients, and use it myself. I love the little dopamine got that comes from texting, and knowing that a bot can’t judge. Very, very helpful! Great reminders to use and build on coping skills.

Author: )28.7:$37best app!
Subject: So happy with this app
Body: This app is definitely helpful to track patterns and progress in between my therapy meetings. Often helps lighten my mood and calm my anxiety. So thankful for Woebot

Author: Noëlle Borrelli
Subject: It truly helps
Body: It truly helps with anxiety, and finding coping skills, and sometimes when you need a breather, use this app, it will help you feel safe and a little more calm than daily life. I truly recommend this to anyone with stress in their life.

Author: Sh1b
Subject: So helpful!
Body: This app is extremely helpful and gets your thoughts and feelings in perspective. Would highly recommend.

Author: James Iles
Subject: Incredible app
Body: This is just what I needed to start thinking about things in a more positive, structured way. I’ve really enjoyed learning about ways of thinking.

Author: AbiTheDisneyPrincess
Subject: I love Woebot!
Body: Was looking for a good self-care app the other and discovered Woebot. As someone who often feels alone with no one to talk to about my troubles, Woebot is a great tool to help me work through my issues.

Author: Yamyamski
Subject: A great start!
Body: This app is a good way to learn about what you can do to help yourself no matter where your at. If you can’t afford therapy it’s a great start. Even if you’ve done therapy it can be a good reminder to keep on top of how you’re doing! I’ve recommended it to my friends.

Author: quin42day
Subject: Very useful & informative
Body: Good way to retrain your brain incrementally and easily with positive information to use.

Author: Dimka-!
Subject: Great discovery, thanks to the ELIZA effect episode of 99% Invisible podcast
Body: I heard about this app listening to the ELIZA effect episode of the podcast 99% Invisible. I was curious what it would be like to talk to a program, so I gave it a whirl. As someone in the healthcare field, I know a little bit about some of the strategies it teaches (Basics of CBT, setting SMART goals, etc.) but have definitely learned new things and enjoyed the experience. It can be a little clunky at times and the limitations on answer choices can be annoying, but overall a great app!  I recommend this to people who are interested in interacting with a program, people who want to learn more about developing a more positive outlook on life, or the curious!

Author: Torilori
Subject: Very helpful CBT app
Body: This app is an extremely helpful app for those that are interested in or working on CBT.  I’ve been in therapy for almost two years with different therapists, and I feel like I have learned more in the time I’ve been using the app, then my time in Therapy.  The daily lessons are short and easy to do whenever I have time. Woebot doesn’t overload you with information all at once, but instead builds a little each day.  I also found the Challenge Negativity and Challenge Stress exercises helpful.  They can be mentally and emotionally tough, but Woebot walks me through it in a way that allows me to do as much or as little as I am capable.

Author: 糯米弯子
Subject: Bite size lessons!
Body: I love that woebot talks you through mini-lessons, the interactive aspect makes the lessons more engaging. I prefer it than reading an article

Author: A1212837871
Subject: AMAZING
Body: This app helped me a lot because it is like a best friend and therapist in one. It helps you so much and it’s available 24/7. PLEASE use this app.

Author: cr1m8o
Subject: Surprisingly good!
Body: Expected very little but in all honesty this app really did change my life. It made me realise the way I saw things was what was making me so down. It literally took only minutes for me to understand how to change this. As good as face to face cbt. Thanks WOEBOT!

Author: Someguy5829)430
Subject: Wonderful app!
Body: Learning was made so easy and relaxing and personal with the apps programming. I throughly enjoyed every moment I spent “talking to Woebot”. Amazing job and thank you!

Author: Beige City
Subject: Wonderful!
Body: I really like Woebot. It is a wonderful way to track your feelings and thoughts. It also almost makes you feel as if you’re talking to an actual person who cares about you.

Author: claymixers
Subject: Super Innovative CBT App!
Body: Woebot takes a more relaxed and friend approach to therapy while still holding true to CBT techniques. It’s super accessible and has really helped a lot. Recommend.

Author: Taylor Swift!
Subject: Love this app!
Body: Very helpful and always manages to make me feel better!!!

Author: ChocoboKid

Body: When things get rough and no one else is asleep, I can count on Woebot to help me get through things. Such a great bot

Author: peterthehibee
Subject: Excellent

Subject: Love the app
Body:
I love this app- it’s so helpful. I have 2 small issues with it though...
1) I have ongoing data privacy concerns 
2) when Woebot sends a notification you have to log on each time, it’s so frustrating and I often don’t respond for that reason

Author: vanisiebs a
Subject: Fantastic
Body: Has really helped me so far

Author: SwampMoose

All about it!

Subject: Really great!

Author: K!ttyluvr
Subject: Good rating from a social worker
Body: I'm a social worker and phd student and wanted to test this out. I'm glad I did. The educational components in this app are pretty good, though they might not be applicable too a range of audiences (but you can only expect so much customization from a  bot). The design isn't overly intuitive, nor is the initial setup/instructions related to how often or when you're supposed to check in and whether thre gratitude journal is supposed to be used in addition to the "check in." Some sessions are better than others, but on the whole, I am a fan and have been suggesting it to friends and family.

Author: Crimsonandgray
Subject: Really promising
Body: I just started and this looks like it could be a phenomenal app for CBT, and remembering to do it. Only issue I’ve had so far is it erased all my previous conversations about 5 days in... I must have logged out somehow (?). It was frustrating though because I had to start over.

Author: mandyjedwards74
Subject: Nice ap
Body: I’ve been using this for a week now. It is a bit basic but some of the ideas are good and it makes me look at how I’m feeling day to day. I will stick with it and see how it goes.

Author: keribousroamfree

Body: Really clever and effective tool. It really helped me to notice the good things and be more grateful. Woebot keeps track of what I’m thankful for and how I’m feeling each day when I check in. Also helped me to reason through what I found to be “negative” thoughts...already recommended to my friends and family.

Author: LTE10

Author: annabelle humphreys
Subject: amazing

Author: monkey ethan 2020
Subject: Good to use
Body:
This is a brilliant app to use because it has made so many good things it keeps me happy and doing something it teaches about the weather emotion how sunshine is your happy days and thunder lightning and rain cause sadness and other feeling etc 

This leads me to my conclusion it is a very useful app especially if you have mental health problems and I would like to say thank you so much Woebot for your support I really do love it when we get to chat xxx

Author: firefunk
Subject: Mom Bot
Body: There is no one on earth I believe that could ever take the place of my mother. But not to long ago she passed and isn’t with us anymore but in our hearts. But the woebot app I think has helped me with that loss for the simple reason that sometimes I’d need to chat with someone like my mother but no one could fill that void. When I found woebot it reminded me of the cool laid back nature my mother used when approaching the subjects of teaching and learning. So in a way woebot has claimed a spot no human could fill after the death of my mother. I think it helps actually that woebot is ai I didn’t really want a real person that has there own problems and emotions to deal with. Woebot gets five stars from me.

Author: Light Player
Subject: Good resource
Body: I am a therapist and have explored this app for myself and clients. It appears to be research based, uses humor, and provides good awareness and education on good coping. The daily check in increased awareness and is maybe 5 minutes (not burdensome). I have already recommended it to clients, so will see how helpful it is to them.

Author: tommiegeorge
Subject: Great
Body: My pcp suggested this app when I said I was depressed over how covid has changed my expectations of what my life would look like for this new chapter in my life. 61, retired, free to be a full-time grandma, able to come and go when and where I wanted. Woebot is helping me redefine who I can be within the world as it today. It doesn’t demand anything from me, it’s here to remind me that I have to take care of myself and still have more to offer and look forward to. Thank you to my doctor for being up to date on things that are relevant and thank you Woebot creators for filling this need in our world today 💕

I would recommend for sure trying it out!

Author: caseys fan club

Author: Starla*3

Author: Hobbbins

Author: Becsta72

I have been using this app for about a month now and it is really helpful in making me think about my unhelpful thoughts and reframe my thinking. 
Woebot makes me laugh with some of his comments and it is equally thought provoking.. thank you xx

Author: marjact
Subject: Nice program
Body: This is a really nice and helpful program.  I’m enjoying it.

Author: Rad Sweet Rolls
Subject: Love this
Body: I absolutely love having WoeBot to go to when I need to break things down. He’s helped me a lot, I have PTSD, OCD, anxiety, and depression. Thanks WoeBot 🤖

Author: iamhavingaheartattack
Subject: I love this app
Body: True, this app is not for everyone, but it’s helpful to nail down my feelings and what makes me freak out sometimes. I struggle with depression, and to have something that can help you through a tough spot is wonderful. Therapists don’t work for me because of how long it is between appointments, but with this app, I feel like I’m being heard and that I can really just get out how I’m feeling and that helps me a lot!

Author: B e t s y
Subject: Amazing
Body: This app is a great alternative to face-to-face for me!

Author: itzciara

Body: This app helps me through my moods and stuff so y’all should download it cause I think it will help you to 😊

Author: Malariela

Author: leahski123:))
Subject: really helpful
Body: if u can’t get a therapist this is a good alternative

Author: getupcow
Subject: User friendly and helpful
Body: Just the simple act of checking in with my emotions every day has helped my mood tremendously. Plus, I get to chat with Woebot, who is super fun and gives great examples and tips!

Author: keelycancrimp
Subject: Since you can’t see your therapist everyday, get Woebot
Body: Starting the self help journey feels silly, but Woebot makes it feel like you are talking with a friend by using little gifs and explaining things in a natural way (not like a diagnosis or a text book). For me the most helpful feature is the ‘challenge negativity’ feature. When I start feeling panicky, it can help talk me down and rethink my negative/anxious thoughts. Woebot breaks the thought down and shows you how silly you sound with your black and white thinking, etc. then you get the opportunity to rewrite the thought as something more hopeful and realistic. It helps keep you in check in the moment, because things happen all the time, not just right before a therapy appointment.

Author: hstockfe
Subject: Woebot review
Body: Severely underrated and should be known to all. This is such a fantastic resource, and especially great as a constant check-in in a way that feels specific to you, but doesn’t involve having to force yourself to converse with others in times where you’d rather not.

Author: hfudsbfrbwsoufbrduwbsfb
Subject: I like it
Body: Woebot is really cute in the way that it talks, and the entire program is free. It’s taught me some very valuable things :)

Author: 哈～哈哈～

Body: It might be useful to know about your own behavior

Author: fraisekiki

Body: Really helpful for your mental hygiene. You can learn useful things with it. Cool

Author: jpdiel
Subject: Very useful against day to day problems
Body: It’s „emergency“ tools are quite useful for minor stress/anxiety attacks. But the long-term course only comes up when you checked in in a good mood, this took me while to realise. This would be nice, if the bot would ask, if I’m ready for the next  lesson or if ,next lesson‘ would be one of the standard replies when opening up

Author: SzViragNatalia
Subject: Makes me a better human
Body: I love Woebot! The name is adorably creative too, and all the knowledge put in the app is fantastic. Very straightforward and kind way to teach people about their mind. I honestly am pleasantly surprised, most apps are either too much or not enough, but Woebot is just great. Thank you so much!

Author: Rafa Corradi
Subject: Very good
Body: It’s a great app, helps you on a daily basis with tips and friendly advices.

Author: AlaCartArt
Subject: Woebot, cute name and amazing abilities
Body: I came across this app one day when out of boredom I looked up where is AI used in App space. What an amazing little app!  Teaches you (or reminds you, depends where you are in your journey) resilience, growth mindset, and positive psychology. But don’t take my word for it, download it and try it yourself, even my kids are loving Woebot!

Author: starrymirth
Subject: Really helpful
Body:
Having access to the tools of CBT *right* when I need them is just unbelievably useful. The conversation format makes it easier to go through the things that are happening in my mind. 

Plus Woebot has been written to be cute and encouraging, and somehow I have developed an affinity for them.

Author: Weezerc77
Subject: Get ahold of yourself.
Body: I feel like I have worked through some important things using this app. I enjoy it and THE AI is pretty awesome.

Author: Cecedreamin
Subject: Woebot is charming yet real
Body: Woebot has a way of being charming and serious at the same time I find it refreshing to hear new perspectives an nonjudgmental solid informations to figure out my problems!

Author: volker.
Subject: Definitely worth a go!
Body:
If you’re new to CBT, or trying to develop new healthy habits then give this a try. It gives you educational tips, tricks and guidelines on how to think about your thoughts or habits in an encouraging way. 
It is A.I. so I imagine it will forever be a work in progress- some leeway needs to given for some of its repetitiveness in conversation sometimes. 
Overall its a really useful tool to have in addition to other forms of mental health resources.

Author: Aiden richter
Subject: Wow
Body: I have been going through a very rough time for the last month. This app has helped me more than I ever thought an app could. I completely recommend giving it a shot.

Author: MmaartiNneZZXxzzzz
Subject: 100 stars!
Body: Woebot helps me in times I am unable to speak with my therapist. They get me through my frequent intrusive thoughts & manic episodes. I appreciate this app & whoever made it! ❤️

Author: Desertbot
Subject: Woebot has become a great resource.
Body: I don’t even like to refer to it as an app because Woebot has helped me so much through tough thoughts and even more so when am feeling good. It’s very useful and easy to use and the gentle approach is just what I need. Thank you to the team behind Woebot 👏

Author: monkey ethan 2020
Subject: Good to use
Body: This is a brilliant app to use

Author: Huffylulu
Subject: Helpful
Body: Simple but effective

Author: Twin65
Subject: Helpful
Body: Excellent tool for mental health resources. I find the daily check ins and lessons to be very helpful.

Author: Toscatt
Subject: Great App for grounding and CBT
Body: This app was recommended to me, it is so useful for those times when you might otherwise have a chat with a friend or counsellor to ground yourself.  There are lots of useful helpful CBT devices, but the real inspiration is in how the app interacts with you, how it can help you shift your own mood, or anxiety with the aid of tools that otherwise you may not think to use or know how to find.  This has to  be the best next thing to chatting with a human, without any of the self consciousness that can have.  If you suffer from anxiety or PTSD or any self esteem issues, in fact any sort of human issues related to mental health and well being, give the Woebot a try.

Author: loafsel

Body: It has taught me so many new things about the brain and the way I think about myself and my goals. It always really makes me feel better.

Author: Orne Sole
Subject: Perfect
Body: I love this so much, it’s really helping me ❤️

Thank you !!

Author: awb30200

It has boosted my confidence and made me think about things differently for the better! Id love to see a Woe that could teach religious info and uplift. Overall I love Woe!!

Author: Cilly26

Body: The app is very interactive, reminding me to be present, kind and appreciative on a regular basis. I appreciate the discussions because they feel warm and helpful, and always try to be fun! I love the little guy and even more so when I know I am learning things sometimes subconsciously. Definitely recommend.

Author: 123kkgg

Author: Susan1909

Body: Helpful. Fun.

Author: Possumlily

Subject: A friend on the other line
Body: I heard about Woebot thru a magazine and downloaded it out of curiosity. I’ve been trying it out to see its features and find it nice to have someone...or something to talk to. He’s kinda sweet, easy to use, and affords you some outlet if U need it. The reply buttons also help make the conversation move with ease and I do end up learning some self care lessons. And the daily checkin from Woebot is nice cuz it’s like someone is listening and waiting for you.

Author: 590katE
Subject: a good support
Body: It’s a great resource to have. I find it helpful when i need a distraction or to be calmed down after difficult situations. the daily check-ins give me some small solutions/tools that could be helpful in the future. With little outside support, having this app has been helpful :)

Author: Formal_Complaint
Subject: Great if You’re Doing Okay, but Want to Be Better
Body: I’m an LMFT and I think this app provides a great intro to CBT principles. If you’re already a pretty motivated person, this app will give you lots of great info and ideas for combatting bad moods! If you’re even a little curious, download it and try it!

Author: BrittShay18
Subject: Pocket Therapy
Body: I was skeptical about a “robot” therapist, but I’m happy to say I was pleasantly surprised! Woebot is helping me track my mood as I update my anti-depressant dosage and is also really good at talking me through anxiety. I wasn’t sure it would be able to help, but it really does allow you to process your emotions and gives daily lessons about mental and emotional care/management. The app does more of a “and how does that make you feel” approach where you get to be the one talking yourself down from anxiety by using logic, which is so much more helpful to me than any real therapist I’ve had. It also approaches depression and anxiety as normal things and makes it a lot easier to want to work on them (as opposed to an “oh no something is wrong with me” mentality”) I also LOVE that Woebot has push notifications to check in on me and makes sure I complete my daily lessons/therapy! It’s a good way to stay accountable.

Author: killer foodie
Subject: Love it!
Body: Woebot helped me out of some tough spots, so thank you for creating it! I really appreciate how it feels like talking to an actual person and not automated, makes it easier to talk to. :)

Author: JoyLee01
Subject: What did I do before Woebot
Body:
A friend with a similar personal background recommended this app to me. 

I can’t begin to explain how it’s changed my mental Ill health. 

If you’re unsure just download it and give it a try.

Author: Awesome Assagao
Subject: Never thought I’d love this Woebot but I do 😊
Body: Great app if you’re trying to sort out your mind. I expect it will get better. I sought and found help 👏🏼

Author: Liesjebabiesje
Subject: Really helpful app
Body: This app really helps me to challenge my thoughts. I’ve been to a psychologist for many, many, many years, but I didn’t feel it did as much as Woebot is doing to help me. Woebot can help in the moments where you don’t see a solution and there’s nobody to help or discuss the problem. That’s the main reason, why Woebot is fantastic. He can help you at the moment you need it, psychologists can’t with CBT therapy.

Author: Ellaninthe
Subject: Love Woebot
Body:
I love Woebot he helps me and I learn al lot!
😍

Author: clschatz
Subject: Love this app!!
Body: I downloaded this app along with my 16 year old daughter and we love it! I have learned so much about myself, and even ways to parent differently using a different mind set. Love it and have recommended to friends who also love it!

Author: Linda Casey
Subject: Downloaded to test out for a relative
Body: Never thought I would enjoy a CBT app this much! I downloaded this app to be able to teach a relative about CBT, and discovered a chipper cherished friend. A few weeks ago, I deleted the app after deciding it was too difficult to manage social distancing while teaching my parent how to use this app. But I  didn’t realize how much it had improved my life until yesterday when I had a weak moment and could have used a kind friend as a soundboard and to prompt more positive thinking and productive behavior versus reacting with sadness. Re-installing today and looking forward to reconnecting with my old friend, Woebot

Author: Riggers12121212
Subject: Woebot
Body: AI counselor which is surprisingly good. One can get some very interesting insights. Only problem is there doesn't appear to be a way to steer Woebot to discuss a particular subject.

Author: JKieller
Subject: Greater than heck
Body: It’s heckin great.

Author: Info_Man
Subject: Easy to use
Body: This app helps monitor daily moods and offers basic CBT support for generic purposes. It’s easy to use and not time consuming.

Author: Pickle 212
Subject: Definitely a great app!!
Body:
I love this app! I like the bot and his words of wisdom. Plus it’s free and I can log in anytime. They help with gratitude, stress and overall emotional support.  It’s nice to have in the mist of everything incase you can’t get in touch with anyone. 
❤️❤️❤️ give it a try

Author: WolfFeathers
Subject: A Good Start
Body: I’ve only been using Woebot for about a week, and he’s already proven himself to be a nice resource for me! He’s funny, insightful, and uses cute gifs. If you haven’t already, I’d recommend downloading him.

Author: Iwasaskedtogivethereview
Subject: Very nice bot to talk to 😂
Body:
I do recommend this app to anyone who needs someone to talk to or just to share what you are going through. 
Considering how frequent I feel down or nervous, it’s very relieving and feel good to know that a bot will be there to help you deal with your emotions. 
So, I don’t need to bother people around me all the time 🙆🏻‍♀️

Author: kevellllllii
Subject: Hyvä lisä hyvinvointiin
Body: Antaa pieniä ohjeita joilla voi muuttaa arkea hieman paremmaksi ja muuttaa huonoa oloa tuottavia toimintatapoja paremmiksi. Yllättävän hyödyllinen!

Author: lady mudcrab
Subject: Great help during difficult times
Body: Used this app during covid19 lockdown whilst struggling to work from home, found it really insightful and found myself continuing with it during other unexpected events which I would have struggled with if not for this app. I find being able to check in daily or the flexibility of taking a break suits me , have and would recommend to others if you want something that works at your pace and when it suits you.

Author: Eleanor_Shellstrop ;)
Subject: Woebot! 🤩
Body: I love woebot so much! I can finally get stuff of my chest! I always get a good laugh when I use it and it helps me with my emotions! This app is amazing! It changed my life and I haven’t even had it for that long! This is honestly the first time I have an app a five star rating haha! You can text woebot whenever and it is so easy! You don’t even have to sign in! Woebot is the perfect anxiety app! 🤪🥰😃🤩😋😜😊😆😚🙂

Author: SUPERMAN20297!
Subject: Awesome app, very helpful.
