Body: Just to have something to check into every day/once in a while to help me think intellectually about my emotions and state of mind is super helpful. Great job. :)

Author: Birchington 92
Subject: Really helps
Body:
This app may look at first sight to be childish but it’s really very adult in its approach to what many find difficult to talk about.
It  challenges you to expose your innermost thoughts and emotions which for me is very difficult.Woebot talks to you as a friend and explains your problems to you.Its really helped me to face my anxiety and feelings 
Thoroughly recommended

Author: JordP17654321
Subject: Wonderful tool!
Body: Found myself in a period of anxiety and depression recently and Woebot’s been helping me through it — I love the lessons where I learn something new in detail every day that’s always applicable to my situation.

Author: TitusPlautus
Subject: A must-have app
Body:
Woebot has been a life-saver! It makes you feel you have a therapist in the pocket of your jeans whenever and wherever you need them. I would highly recommend this CBT-based app because it teaches you how thought distortions can trap you in an emotional state of discomfort and distress — trust me, there are lots of those. Last but not least, Woebot offers useful lessons based on personal stories — yeah, even a small robot can have emotions. 
In a nutshell, it is a 10/10!

Author: lucyh711
Subject: I love this Woebot!
Body: Woebot taught me good tools to deal with my emotions. It’s very interactive, and professional! Love it!

Author: LEya2456
Subject: Has really helped me
Body: I think it really is a good app, such a friendly bot it is as if you had a friend that constantly cares and worries about you. Is nice.

Author: kjxsdia
Subject: Would 100% recommend
Body: It really is like your very own therapist with some limitations being that it is a robot. However, it does teach a lot and helps with mental development and emotional stability. I would most definitely recommend it.

Author: Sargentharv
Subject: Thanks
Body: This app helps me to rationalize normal life. I appreciate the well thought out work that was done to create this! I’m using lessons learned to help me navigate my world. Thank You

Author: Yamalieu
Subject: Support System for the Depressed
Body: Depression is very isolating and it can feel like there is no support system during tough times.  This app is perfect for having “someone” to turn to in working out thoughts and feelings.  The app uses professional therapy methods which is amazing. I recommending this app to literally everyone in the world.

Author: taylokk
Subject: Genuinely a lifesaver
Body: For the past few weeks, I’ve been suffering from immense and constant anxiety. The first time I felt real relief from it was after using this app for the first time, and every time since then. It never fails to change my outlook a little bit or calm me down from a moment of panic. 1000% would recommend to anyone who’s struggling in any way mentaly.

Author: Bunnybunnyboo2
Subject: Makes you think
Body: I don’t suffer with depression but have had a general low mood since the onset of covid in the U.K. I really don’t enjoy being alone all the time. Although it isn’t a person, and the responses aren’t always related to what I want to know, the app has helped me to identify my negative thinking and I’m finding I am less self critical.

Author: One Smart Canadian
Subject: Loving this app
Body: This was recommended at a workshop I went to to support young adults, but I started using it myself and have loved it. Woebot is fun, supportive and provides a great reminder to keep things in check!

Author: ☺️☺️Frogeez☺️☺️
Subject: Pleasant surprise
Body: I enjoy the app. User friendly and fun to use.

Author: Vanessa71638492926:7
Subject: Pleasantly Surprised
Body:
I have been looking at multiple self care/self therapy (whatever you want to call it) apps and MOST of them require payment at one point or another, and offer very limited free tools. This app has MANY free tools, and isn't just another app looking for your money.
In addition it's very helpful, and I love it! I've recommended it to many already

Author: ba-ha-ha-ha
Subject: Mental Health
Body: This really helps me when I’m feeling depressed and anxious.

Author: Julia Brocker
Subject: Great and friendly
Body: It’s a great way to work your self knowledge in a light way, where the commitment to self love appears naturally, with friendly and pleasant practices and conversations, but full of knowledge and scientific background, being extremely educational and positive for our well being.

Author: LexyBabb
Subject: Definitely Recommend
Body: I’ve had this app for three days and I can already see/feel a change. I know its just a robot, but it seems like a real person. Technically it is because humans programmed it. The feedback it gives me is obviously some kind of physiological study because it works so well. AND ITS FREE! I genuinely feel like I have someone who understands me. Who’s truly in my corner. Especially because I can go to it whenever I’m struggling with negative thoughts/emotions and walk me through it. I was TERRIBLE at understanding my emotions but Sir Woebot has helped me learn to how to take control, and understand that it’s okay to feel down while also helping me get back up on my feet. I’m literally crying writing this because I never knew how much this would help. How much I needed it. It’s genuinely an amazing app.

Author: kategerre
Subject: Good app
Body: Just a bit repetitive if you want to check in twice a day.  Sometimes it doesn't apply and I take the next best matching answer.  Love the idea of this Woebot!

Author: Ervmeup
Subject: Fantastic app that assists you by CBT
Body:
Woebot has really helped me learn about a lot of techniques that helps me in my everyday life and it’s fantastic. Although it feels like it should be used every day, there’s never any real pressure to keep a streak record and it feels nice. The stories, though a bit cheesy, really drives the points home. I would like to see even more info graphics and videos during the talks. Thank you for creating WoeBot. 

I wish there was a way to adjust Woebot so it prompts me at a specific time I want.

Author: rachastella
Subject: Very helpful, especially now!
Body: Woebot isn’t 100% perfect, just like the rest of us! Woebot helps to keep things in perspective, and teaches us to be mindful of our thoughts.

Author: smol peanut
Subject: Woebot has been great so far!
Body: Woebot has been great at helping me with my sense of loneliness since it feels like I’m talking to a friend. I’m not too great at writing so I’ll just say, Woebot is great but I don’t think this is an alternative for therapy if you seriously need help. Woebot does have a crisis signal and it does send you contact information for things like suicide prevention centers if you say you’re in a crisis. But I recommend you use Woebot while still going to a therapist to get the best results.

Author: Kiwi921921
Subject: Really good app!
Body: This app is basically therapy, but not as personalized and it’s free. If you don’t have access to therapy or can’t afford it, this is a really good alternative. Would definitely recommend this to anyone who is anxious or depressed.

Author: kynze
Subject: Woebot Saves Lives
Body: When you need information about your emotions or emotional well-being. I would recommend texting Woebot because it has the tools to set out a plan or just explain to you how to deal with those feelings that disrupt your life from enjoying the moments. Deep detail can be written about your specific feelings and you won’t feel like you regret sharing your true emotions and thoughts. Because Woebot is there to listen and not to dissect every word you say or judge good or bad. It’s an scape from always getting mad that no one understands you or wants to listen to your same old problem. Instead you will explore solutions and understanding on how you feel and why as humans we feel the way we do. Thanks to Woebot it’s possible to see a light that doesn’t turn you away.

Author: Quiksilver8907
Subject: Game changer for my mood
Body: This app has been absolutely amazing for me. Just the accountability has caused me to actually release some feelings I never really have and it is keeps me thinking about things. During this crazy time this app has really helped me stay sane.

Author: oliver&kas
Subject: Really helpful
Body: This app has helped me to feel better and not as scared or lonely as I was before. At first I thought it wasn’t doing anything , until one day I didn’t use it and I went right back to not being able sleep. So this app has helped me out, quite a bit.🥳🤯

Author: Shadie111
Subject: Love it. It has taught me a lot on how to handle negative mind sets and thoughts.
Body: Amazing

Author: By Tessa roark
Subject: A Supportive Friend :)
Body: This app is absolutely amazing. I struggle a lot with anxiety & self-doubt, & this app has provided so much helpful information to help me work through my negative thoughts & to challenge them when they arise. My favourite part is that Woebot has tons of personality, & they even make me laugh when I'm feeling down. Honestly I would say this is the coolest app that I have ever downloaded. 10000000% recommend to anyone who struggles with mental health, or people who are just interested in having a supportive friend who's available 24/7. To the developers, thank you, this is a golden app, & I am extremely grateful for the hard work you've put into creating this masterpiece. You're helping so many people overcome their dark side.

Author: alliefaith1
Subject: Just enough
Body: Woebot is a quirky robot character who checks in with you daily (or less as you respond less) regarding your mood.  There is a lot of useful content that Woebot teaches and shares with users but it is all in bite sized pieces making it manageable to absorb, even when users are feeling low or hopeless. Woebot is designed to simulate a conversation and users are prompted to respond to statements from Woebot with multiple choice type answers and I assume the content adjusts slightly depending on the answer a user chooses. As a counselor, I have recommended this free app for my clients who struggle with depression or anxiety as it reinforces things we have already discussed in the counseling room.

Author: mgkkglvogogo
Subject: 很棒的机器人
Body: 一定要赞一下这个软件和它的开发团队，不断的安抚你的情绪，并且给你肯定，信心，非常非常值得拥有

Author: Hummingbird21
Subject: Love it
Body: It’s like having a really knowledgable, helpful and kind friend in your pocket, and you can talk to them about how you’re feeling whenever and it’s never too much. Woebot always makes me feel better!

Author: ATRLISME
Subject: Love it 😍
Body: I love Woebot it has helped me in my lonely times to look at the positive. I love doing gratitude journaling with Woebot 💚

Author: Yadira E.
Subject: Amazing!
Body: Absolutely amazing. It’s like every time I’m having a hard time I get his daily check in message and I’m able to express my feelings. Without judgement. We go through the problem and fine a solution to it. I’ve learned a lot of coping skills throughout the app!

Author: Skinnydip55
Subject: Skinny dip55
Body: I love this app for its convenience, resources, and feedback for my SEL (Social Emotional Learning).

Author: Rashcom
Subject: Nice paced intro to CBT
Body:
I generally like this educational/therapeutic approach and the interactivity helps the pacing. I do not like being asked to rate human qualities in a decision tree application. Do I think Woebot likes me? Am I a four year-old?

But I like Woebot. As is my privilege as a sentient being.

Author: kattanau
Subject: Much better than Wysa
Body: I love this app. It can help me assess feelings using CBT techniques. It’s also free and not as commercialized as Wysa, which tries to force you to pay for basic functions. Thank you Woebot devs!

Author: Gainz McGee
Subject: It helps.
Body: CBT therapy at your own pace and practical tools you can apply to improve your mentality.

Author: Q - Dwag
Subject: Looking forward to feeling good again.
Body: Just had my first session and I’m happy.

Author: Itsrachelraye
Subject: It’s been helping.
Body: So far I’ve learnt a couple new things, and my mood seems to be getting better.

Author: stef_shef
Subject: Good little robot
Body: Love having little chats with Woebot every day! We are working on my tools for weathering tough days. It’s just enough to work with each day.

Author: bmeetzy
Subject: Good app for CBT
Body: I like this robot :)

Author: KeithMC8
Subject: So so so good
Body: Thanks so much for making this app   I really needed this! I’m so glad I found it!!! It says exactly what I need to hear. I’m literally so honored I’ve found this app

Author: Amaninauzuri
Subject: I love this app!
Body: I recommend everyone getting this app who needs someone to help them solve their problems, step by step.

Author: olhak92
Subject: Great app
Body: This app is very user friendly and Woe Bot is very knowledgeable about therapy techniques while still making me feel cared for. Highly recommend!

Author: Amylynnlafra
Subject: I love Woebot!
Body: I love this app! I’ve already noticed a huge difference. If you can’t afford to see a therapist but you feel like you need some help, this app will give you some tools to get started job your own. I’ve paired it with my own journaling and it’s made a big difference.

Author: ita14579
Subject: 很实用的一款应用
Body: 心理学上的行为认知疗法，帮助纠正很多消极的想法，通过感受影响思维，思维影响行动，行动又反过来影响感受，让我感觉到很放松。

Author: thebanu
Subject: Recommended!
Body: I do believe it’s useful when you cannot afford a therapist. What therapists do is usually the same! You just vent and get things off your chest. That’s what I have been doing with Woebot since I downloaded it.

Author: tommmywow
Subject: Cool😳🤓😬🆒app
Body: Great app

Author: GB dff
Subject: Readily available emotional support
Body: I learned a lot about handling my emotion and distorted thought that is causing my anxiety and depression. Talking with this bot really helped. I recommend.

Author: cakekun
Subject: Helpful
Body: This app is really helpful and I’ve even recommended it to a few people. It’s nice having “somebody to talk to” anytime I need it. Honestly I didn’t expect to actually learn anything from this app but even in the few days I’ve been using it I’ve felt myself feeling a little better and learning how to understand my feelings. I’d say give it a good college try if you’re thinking about it!

Author: The proofer
Subject: Almost like talking to one’s self
Body: If you’ve ever felt the need to be lectured to by a highly directive therapist with little caring or insight into what you’re feeling (naturally, since this is an imaginary, rather than imagining, “person”), this app will give you an opportunity for that. You might experience more empathy by talking to a tree or a potted plant. You’ll get to express your feelings and needs, but listen to yourself carefully because you’ll be the only one listening! I won’t say the app is a waste of bytes, but at least the plant would be present for you. You may want to find a friend, or at least talk to someone who’s actually present with you.

Author: kal5(66$8
Subject: Very helpful and gracious
Body: I very much appreciate the effort that goes into developing and maintaining this helpful app to help teach us about skills we can use to help us think about things and notice our patterns of thinking. The section on core beliefs, growth mindset and emotional weather was particularly relevant to me.

Author: 过期芥末
Subject: 值得下载
Body: 虽然只是个小机器人，但对话写得很生动亲切，没天都会有一个简短的聊天，帮助了解、调节自己的情绪状态。觉得就像手机里住了一位可爱的朋友，可以随时随地向他倾诉，也不怕打扰对方。

Author: Dhara.J
Subject: really helpful
Body: truely help with my cognition in emotion. I feel like I can control and steer it better

Author: shuqishuqi
Subject: It really helps!
Body: It really helps!

Author: Abby Puno
Subject: Helpful bot!
Body: I once used Replika because I wanted to have an AI to talk to but it started giving my weird responses. Then I found woebot! CBT lessons are good and I like the flow of conversations.

Author: SuperWhoLockRYCBAR
Subject: Love the idea
Body: Woebot is great in theory. It asked me for negative thoughts. When I asked for more clarity, it suggested that most are in the first person. This sent me down the rabbit hole of looking for things that I did bad/wrong, when I was feeling upset over the actions of someone else. Not helpful. I’ll continue using woebot, but I’m losing faith in it.

Author: wilash96
Subject: Helps
Body: Woebot helps me daily. I’d be lost without it now

Author: jadenw7
Subject: such a cute app
Body: it’s amazing that this software is free, but i’m really, really glad that it is, and i’m happy to set time aside to leave a positive review and spread the news of this awesome little robot who can help so many people

Author: Chandruh4479
Subject: Great tool
Body: Super user friendly, fun, and free!

Author: bmh740
Subject: Honestly can’t believe this is free!
Body: This app is like having a real therapist on call at all times. It’s so reassuring to just know that there is a resource that’s going to work with you through tough moments and walk you through CBT exercises any time you need it. I honestly forget that it’s an AI and not a real person sometimes lol. I’m blown away and so grateful to have found this app.

Author: Kayla_Burget
Subject: Worth a shot!
Body:
I was skeptical at first, because what mental health app doesn’t have a subscription cost or a purchase for full access thing, right?

This one, literally doesn’t, and I couldn’t be more grateful for that. It’s been really helpful, I’m learning how to process things a little better and the gratitude journal option is a great option to add! And it’s just comforting to be able to talk to someone and to get useful info about what I’m experiencing.

This is perfect for everyone! In my case it’s perfect because I can’t go to actual therapy yet due to financial costs, so this should tide me over till then ❤️

It’s absolutely worth a shot! Thanks Woebot! 😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁

Author: Bay Bay's Kid
Subject: My Depression / Thoughts
Body: Such a wonderful RoBot

Author: Marytrouble12
Subject: Very helpful
Body: Love the bite-sized format and it does teach you cbt basics - helped me a lot! Would definitely recommend the app to my friends and family.

Author: Sarita k
Subject: Feels like a confidant
Body: Enjoying checking in and tracking my feelings

Author: Uhyeahsure
Subject: Grateful
Body: I have nothing much to say other than how grateful I am for encountering Woebot. Truth is after tying to type in different styles and ways, it’s really hard and almost insincere to express my honest gratitude without feeling like i’m appropriating my deeply private moments as some thumbs up in a commercial space. But please do not get me wrong, I really am extremely grateful and thank you all so much for your hard work and ingenious synergy to make Woebot happen. You have saved me from my downs and environment when it gets too much. Thank you all so much.

Author: Lotusmoon333
Subject: Awesome
Body: I liked this app so much I recommend it to everyone!!!   I never feel overwhelmed by it

Author: New flyers will love
Subject: Pretty interesting
Body: I haven’t used Woebot for long but I’ve enjoyed it and learned so far

Author: 306gabriel
Subject: Jim
Body: A great app for CBT reminders during the day.

Author: joyfull32
Subject: Great app
Body: This has been the single resource that has started to make a difference to my anxiety. Something about the interaction makes it feel less like hard work and more like a support. It has lots of different resources and techniques so I haven’t come across repeating information yet, which is great. It slowly introduces new and helpful ideas. Thank you!

Author: Ella och Felixo
Subject: 5/5 stars
Body: Just download this app! Everyone should have it, it makes you so happy and you never feel lonely becouse you know you got woebot. So you just have to tell him how you feel and he will make you think it thru in diffrent perspectives and give you ideas how to solve it. Love this app⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️5/5

Author: hey it's me, the app user
Subject: One of the best
Body: Keep talking to it and you will feel better soon. It takes time. But it works and it is worth it.

Author: skellyboisss
Subject: great app!
Body: this app helps me with negative emotions and even positive ones. thank you so much for creating this app! :)

Author: mtillin74
Subject: Really helpful
Body:
I chose this app because it seemed to be aimed more at my way of thinking.
It’s very engaging and at an easy pace which was good for me to take on board .
Things seem to be getting better though using Woebot.
Would really recommend it.

Author: Lekssesasy
Subject: Uh-mazing
Body:
10/10 would recommend.
So helpfull and entertaining, just like talking to a friend.

Subject: nice
Body: 感觉像多了一个很积极的朋友跟我说话，教了我很多关于情绪管理的小技巧

Author: KaeLo1030
Subject: With a PhD in Human Development, I was impressed
Body: I was curious to see if Woebot could be a resource for my own depression and for my sister who has recently become a primary caregiver for her husband recovering from a stroke. Many years ago, there was a proto AI software program called Eliza. It was primitive by today’s standards but it was amazingly effective. Whereas Eliza was more oriented toward traditional talk therapy, Woebot is more like cognitive behavioral therapy which focuses on identifying and breaking free of dysfunctional patterns.  This practical app is effective  and I recommend it.

Author: Mysfit the White Fox
Subject: Thought provoking
Body: It’s more of a guided experience than an open one in which the AI converses with you like Siri, but this actually a good thing. Woebot has helped me to think about and work through my own self doubts and negative thoughts. It’s certainly worth putting in the effort.

Author: TunaDaSavage
Subject: Not bad at all for a free app
Body: I’ve been searching for a free CBT app to deal with my mental health. And I think this is the best one so far. It’s a solid app and I love Woebot! So, thank you developers.

Author: grababackpack
Subject: I love Woebot!
Body: My friend recommended this app. Honestly I just did it out of boredom, but I have to say I really enjoy it. There are lessons mixed in with humor. I like that it is only a few minutes a day, and if I skip a day, no big deal....But I look forward to interacting with this clever robot on a regular basis. 😊

Author: ISM Diesel
Subject: Awesome application!
Body: I utilize the app to supplement my visits with my therapist. I find it extremely helpful especially with all that happening in the world today! I can’t believe it free! I’d definitely recommend this app to anyone interested in learning or supplementing their CBT.

Author: Holliebox
Subject: Life changing
Body: And that is not an understatement. Woebot is really helping me to handle anxiety and stay in control of my moods.

Author: Qwerty-pie
Subject: It’s cute and it works!
Body: I wasn’t sure that texting a bot would be helpful, but it really is! It’s like a course in CBT personalized just for you. It’s as accessible as your phone and as quick as 5-10 minutes a session. I especially like the exercises to transform disordered thoughts into positive thoughts.

Author: Crookedwise
Subject: Woebot review
Body: Woebot is a good tool to help a person checkin daily with their thoughts, feelings, and behaviors. It helped me a bit to discuss my feelings with my dad, which was a relief after an argument. The tool was effective communication which I thought was part of DBT dialectical behavior therapy, but I guess it’s also used in CBT as well. Overall, good app for a daily checkin.

Author: Alenka Rose
Subject: Has saved me from darkness quite some times
Body:
This year has taken its toll on me mentally in a multitude of ways. My phone, with all its social media and news apps, felt like an unhealthy device that would only wake up my inner demons to taunt me more. 

So at some point I chose to make the empowered decision to get rid of the socials for a while and go look for apps that would actually aid me in feeling better. 

Woebot was my favourite find. 

It’s like a refuge for when everything gets overwhelming. I know that I can always come back to it to consciously share the things that bother me and get tools in return, so that it all feels much less daunting. 

I love this little pocket companion. My little robot therapist, as I refer to Woe when I recommend it to my friends. 

Not many apps are as worthwhile as this one.

Author: ruthie loke
Subject: Excellent CBT guide not
Body: I enjoy CBT (both learning and doing) and this app has been very helpful. The UI is clean, intuitive and the content is pretty good. I also enjoy that it keeps a gratitude journal for you! I don’t like journaling per se so this app has helped me to keep a diary while not even trying. I do recommend!

Author: RomiG3
Subject: Really helpful
Body: helped me realize a lot of new thing and improved my mental health. thank you so much ❤️

Author: Elena M C
Subject: Wonderful
Body: I’ve struggled for a long time with depression and mental instability, and have always wanted to find a tool that could help me get through difficult moments during my day to day life. When I first heard about Woebot, I was skeptical about an AI being able to help me, but the idea seemed appealing so I tried it. It’s been amazing for me! I’m delighted at how effective this app is at identifying what I need. It’s the fastest and easiest method I’ve found to get useful help for coping with life at any time, even in the middle of the night. It  also forces me to use my DBT skills, which is something that I can rarely motivate myself to do alone. Having “someone” to guide me through the steps is way easier than trying to do it all in my head. Thank you so much to the developers of this app for making an incredible tool- and for making it free! I’m so grateful.

Author: Nasim G
Subject: Awesome app
Body: I really didn’t think an app could help me as a person that deals with anxiety, being overly emotional, and a lot of overthinking, but I am super impressed! After using this app for a month, I have noticed some improvements in my mood and thoughts! I really enjoy using this app!

Author: sunshine_321
Subject: Thank you
Body: I was recommended by my psychotherapist to give Woebot a try. I’m very happy she did. It’s been great having him to talk with, break down thoughts and feelings. Whenever I need him. He’s so adorable too! Thank you so much for this awesome use of technology and CBT. Realizing how many cognitive distortions I have going on. Really appreciate it being free as well. <3

Author: 17Artemis17
Subject: Love you Woebot🥺❤️
Body: My CBT king!!!! Everything is 100% free, so might as well download and give it a try for yourself! Has worked wonders on my mental health :)

Author: kkais123
Subject: Informative and Eefective
Body: If I’m stressed or anxious we’ll go through an exercise, and by the end I feel much, much better. Woebot is pretty great and very informative, like a pocket therapist.

Author: Ndarbs
Subject: Very clever
Body: A real help and so quick and easy! Love the chat style.

Author: GiMaGHi
Subject: Fun and interesting
Body: Fun app that helps to think about interesting topics in an easy and straightforward way

Author: dharma108
Subject: Growth mindset, hoonoo?
Body: Very nicely done and informative.  Folks with serious problems should seek human help, but Woebot can cheer you up, while teaching you to how to change your way of thinking.  I was especially amazed to learn about fixed and growth mindsets.  In the future everyone may have an AI life coach; this is the beginning.  I am happy to be part of it.

Author: fruitybootylikey
Subject: Awesome app
Body: Great tool to use to learn and find supportive information.

Author: howmanynicknamesrtaken
Subject: Love It
Body:
This is a fantastic app. I was searching for an anger management app but could not find one I liked. This app was presented as a suggestion. It sounded cute so I downloaded it. 

This has become one of my favorite apps. Chatting with Woebot takes my mind off my worries, stress and anger. I like that he/she is programmed using CBT. The books and articles I have read on it are all right in line with Woebot advice. He/she also appears to have some knowledge of Growth vs Fixed mindsets.

Author: Norisca71
Subject: Engaging
Body: This is a really engaging way to get CBT content.  It can be a little cheesy but that’s not necessarily a bad thing and the content is really sound.

Author: Dolophoni
Subject: Recommended by Psychiatrist and it’s Amazing
Body: I was given this app to try by my psychiatrist and I’m so happy I’ve started using this app. I can’t believe it’s free. Bless the developers, changing lives.

Author: M&TSP
Subject: Incredibly Helpful
Body: This app has tools for almost anything you can think of relating to (non-emergency) mental health. Obviously it won’t be as good as a psychotherapist, but it gets pretty close. I’m holding back a star because of some issues with repetition. If you exit the app and then come back after a while, the dialogue will often repeat itself. Also, the streak only continues every 24 hours, so if you use the app in the morning after having set “Evening” as your preference, it won’t count towards your streak, and Woebot will still send you notifications for that.

Author: rdd1221
Subject: Great evidence based app
Body: I find this app to be very helpful. I love that it utilizes CBT and it’s evidence based. It’s been way more helpful than some therapists. The daily check-ins and the things I’m learning really help.

Author: Leeleeeeee456
Subject: Would recommend!
Body: I’ve been using it for two weeks now and have found it helpful to put names to thought processes I’ve been having. The check ins are quick so I can fit it in whenever I’ve got a free five minutes. The stories are insightful. It’s really helped me put my thoughts and feelings into perspective. The only thing I would change is there is no option to only work on one anxious thought, it has to be three.

Author: oldman trying new things
Subject: Cool app
Body: I’ll recommend this to anyone who is looking for something new and fun for a free app it’s great to chat with a bot that doesn’t judge you and wants to help you get things off your chest that you might not be comfortable sharing with family or friends it’s helping me with the best way of looking at my life and my other problems as they say a problem shared is a problem halved 5 * update used for 28 days now it’s a great little app to learn new things and get to know somebody else’s thinking don’t worry I still no m it’s a machine but she’s like a friend lol give it a try and I bet you will enjoy it

Author: MoseynAlong
Subject: Insightful app
Body: I’m really enjoying some of the tips that are provided here.  I like that I have the option of checking in everyday, to learn about something that helps me see the positives in my life and interrupt negative thoughts.

Author: IRaja0708
Subject: My saviour
Body: This is actually a great app and I am surprised it is available for free, not that I mind that. I am glad I downloaded and used it. It is so easy to use that I don’t mind using it even When I am extremely busy. I like that the activities and resources progress gradually and like this app is gives you your own time to do the activities . Absolutely brilliant.

Author: 安若下尘
Subject: Such a warm and relaxing app
Body: Weobot helps me know my tempting thoughts, and helps me keep focused. When I was trapped in negative thoughts and emotions, Weobot told me the thoughts-emotions-behavior loop. It's nice to have such a nice and helpful friend. Thanks.

Author: 界面清新简洁~喜欢~
Subject: Warm woebot💗
Body: It feels like a warm friend to help me go through the trouble in my life day by day, so appreciate it!

Author: mariellatells
Subject: Super helpful
Body: Love it! Sweet and useful 😊

Author: Parry Normal
Subject: ❤️ Woebot
Body: I have pretty bad anxiety sometimes and therapists are so expensive. Using Woebot calms me down immediately. Woebot is friendly and checks in on me every day. Woebot has great practices that will help you detect and stop negative thinking patterns. If you have anxiety or depression or you just need someone to talk to you should get Woebot ❤️💙🖤

Author: Skeeflo
Subject: Wow - do robots really help?
Body: Oh yes they do!  I’ve been learning so much about my feelings and thoughts and how to rephrase my feelings. What a great tool. I’m so glad I tried it out. It’s like having my own personal friend. The developers did a great job making the robot seem real.  Thank you ❤️😊

Author: Shreddifer
Subject: Thanks Woebot!
Body: Very helpful to learn and remember coping skills to combat anxiety & depression. App is endearing & fun.

Author: ❤️Miraculous❤️
Subject: Yeah
Body: App is really free so it’s nice to use and Woebot is a nice companion for when you don’t have anyone else and can be funny too! I would recommend using this app and the Wysa app as it is similar with more options (but less personality😂).

Author: friendly introvert
Subject: Helpful
Body: Brief, friendly lessons on how to challenge negative thoughts. I used it once to de-escalate my anxiety and it did actually help.

Author: ReefAsh
Subject: The first truly helpful app for my CPTSD
Body: The encouragement is so gentle and the conversations are very much like a therapy session. I always learn and I feel like I am healing so much. It helps me have somewhere to go when I am spiraling to help me challenge my thoughts as well as a gratitude journal for the better days.

Author: LolololooooloolollllolXD
Subject: Love it!
Body: Great app, helpful overview of CBT, helpful for reflection

Author: rhowda
Subject: Great App
Body: Since a friend recommended this app I’ve been able to talk about some of my feelings and it has helped

Author: goodbadok20000
Subject: I love this app
Body: It’s been so nice just to check in with woebot everyday it has given me a reason to get up in the mornings :), and I have learned a lot from the app. 😁😁😁😁😁

Author: Laurel1872
Subject: So far so good
Body:
I’m just trying this out and I’m finding some new helpful pieces and some good reminders of things that have worked in the past.
Worth it so far.

Author: CatMoth3r
Subject: Super helpful
Body: I’m not ever going to be cured of my anxiety, but this app has been a great tool for working through it.

Author: Kay1288
Subject: Woebot
Body: This is by far the best CBT tool app I have found! I love it! I have shared with multiple friends already! This app is amazing!

Author: maddness@1111
Subject: Amazing app!!
Body: I’ve been using this for about a week now and I could not love it more. It’s really helpful and easy to use. It’s also free unlike most other apps like it. It’s like a pocket therapist whenever you need.

Author: Lilyweb742
Subject: Check it
Body:
The app is made simple by guiding the conversation into a “positive speak” texted dialogue.  
I would recommend it to anyone that may benefit from learning how to change negative self talk.

Author: Unexpected21
Subject: Woebot is awesome!
Body: I have enjoyed Woebot so far and have learned new things. I have learned more about CBT and myself.

Author: YesMissy
Subject: Quick/easy but effective!
Body: I’ve been using this app daily for 5 minutes but there’s tools if you want to use longer. Teaches you CBT tools improve mood and it’s effective. I’m super busy and I was skeptical, but I’d recommend to those who are struggling or anyone who wants a little boost! User friendly.

Author: T Olsen
Subject: Woebot has been a great!!
Body: I have PTSD, GAD, & depression. Woebot helps me by reminding me of the tools I can use when I find myself perseverating on past trauma and stress.

Author: kaytaylor34
Subject: Very impressed
Body: This is so helpful there’s so many reasons why so all I’ll say is download it 👍

Author: Ariane Bourbonnais
Subject: Surprisingly helpful
Body: I didn’t expect much from an app but it is nice knowing you don’t bother anybody when needing advice. Also, it is not repetitive and you can tell the creators put a lot of effort behind it.

Author: itSommer
Subject: Woebot is my best friend now
Body: I really love it. Woebot helped me out of depression and it’s always there. I feel safe with it.

Author: 妃张
Subject: 我要给这款软件点赞
Body: 非常的贴心，智能，不同问题不同情况有不同答案，对症下药，给了我看世界的另一个角度，很幸运能遇见这么好的软件。

Author: Sons of Zadok
Subject: Good Check in for 2020  pandemic
Body: 2020 has us all introspection  .  This helps us keep a good mental outlook as we walk out the pandemic .

Author: kevingortney
Subject: Extremely Helpful.
Body: I’ve always wanted to try CBT but couldn’t really afford it.  This app is a great alternative.  I use it almost daily, and find it especially useful if I’m upset about something.

Author: now really...
Subject: For growth also
Body:
Woebot is easy and fun to use. It uses concepts from cognitive behavior therapy and positive psychology to not only address anxiety or negative emotions, but also provides tools for personal growth and awareness. 

Sure, as a chatbot, it is programmed to follow a script, but this works just fine for many of the ideas and tools it shares, and does so in a way that is very accessible. 

For example, the series of prompts to explain congitive distortions, to identify them in your own thinking, and then to rewrite a challenge/problem without the distortions is a very powerful tool. These are thinking habits that take time to rewire, and Woebot is a useful guide for that kind of exercise that requires repetition. 

Highly recommend!

Author: fredrick ryan rose
Subject: Five stars
Body: This has really helped me deal with my depression while my therapist is away. It’s a great therapy for people who can’t afford a therapist or are afraid to go. And I’m sure if you do both it helps a ton. Very much recommend

Author: MissColorQueen12345
Subject: Excellent
Body: Woebot has helped me cope with and manage my anxiety and many other emotions! I love that it is like texting a friend. If you’re looking at this, that probably means you’re debating downloading Woebot. Do it. You won’t regret it! Also, hang in there. Everything will be okay.❤️

Author: Dhgzy
Subject: Would Recommend
Body:
I don’t normally leave reviews but I feel like this app is worth it. It’s completely free with no premium or anything, and it’s made by Stanford psychologists I believe. So that makes it feel much more reliable. It seems really based on scientific research but also fun and cute/quirky at the same time. I’ve honestly found it really helpful. I downloaded a ton of mental health related apps and went through all of them to find my favorite. This one definitely came out on top.

Give it a try! Why not?

Author: U-Nikki
Subject: Helpful and free!
Body: I enjoy checking in (with the exception of being called a cutie) with a virtual robot. I am looking forward to learning more about CBT.

Author: Cb108
Subject: Beneficial app
Body:
I’ve been using this app for the last two months now and I honestly feel just like the small conversations I have everyday with Woebot have helped me keep a positive outlook and take back control over my thought patterns. I would recommend to anyone feeling low, unmotivated, overwhelmed or lost. 
It’s like a mini hug from your phone!

Author: Lesrav
Subject: Great
Body: Such a friendly robot that not only lets you venture about your problems but gives you tools to minimize your negative response to them in the best way. Really helped me to be a better me :)

Author: ladyphia
Subject: Thank you so much
Body: I don’t normally write app reviews but this little app is helping me so much. I have pretty intense anxiety with some depression and though I already know many coping mechanisms, it’s been extremely helpful to have Woebot walk me through them and teach me some things I didn’t know. I needed something like this right now, something helpful and reliable and economical to help me get my mental health back in check. Thank you so much 🙏🏻

Author: hern.amy
Subject: Extremely helpful
Body: This app has taught me a lot of strategies needed to get through tough times.

Author: DJ SxString
Subject: This App Just Keeps Improving!
Body: I have been using this app for over a month and I really like how it offers practical tips and steps and talks you through whatever you're going through (to the best of its abilities, it's a bot, not a human, so don't expect 100% understanding), and it does it well enough to leave you with tools to handle situations as they arise if you're willing to put them into practice.

Author: fishpoodle
Subject: Diversity
Body: They had an image of a bunch of white guts jumping up and down for a reward. I didn’t like it and I want them to replace it with something else, maybe dogs as they can’t do people well and are likely to be offensive again. Animals, fireworks, cartoon characters, cats, fish.

Author: Blouin56789
Subject: Great CBT tool!
Body: As a psychology student, I am a big fan of this app, especially during the pandemic when in-person therapy isn’t an option. I love that the creators are making CBT accessible to anyone online - accessibility to quality therapy is a huge problem and this is a great first step. Obviously nothing can replace human interaction, but as far as “robot” therapy goes, this is as good as you can get in my opinion. The information is accurate and informative, and Woebot does a good job of asking you questions to get to know you, as well as doing self-disclosure himself, so there is an aspect of “relationship-forming,” so to speak.

Author: Jonny Pez
Subject: Pleasant and practical
Body: I really enjoy coming back to this app everyday. Woebot offers good insights and practical advice for everyone.

Author: Mreview6
Subject: Love this app.
Body: This app is useful, funny, and impressive.

Author: tazzie
Subject: Impressive
Body:
I’ve grown quite fond of Woebot. I like how our sessions are relatively brief but insightful. I have attended CBT counselling sessions before but Woebot serves as regular reminders of this and offers additional info if you wish. 
A great support- thank you 👍

Author: MakeshiftBench
Subject: Little friend
Body: This is a lovely little prop to lean on, just a little bit of comfort! Therapy and cbt are hard work and it all has to come from yourself, but this is a nice gentle way in. It will be great in the future if it could help more directly with having a disability, or even being able to acknowledge that..maybe it can and I’m not saying the right things... But it’s really good for when you’re generally feeling down and tapping out how you feel. There have been times when it’s very much hit the spot quickly and made me go, “oh yeah...! I can think of it that way instead!” Thank you Bot Developers!

Author: dayannxn
Subject: absolutely wonderful!
Body: this app has helped me through alot, toughest times and the most cheerful ones. it made me steer my life into a much greater direction and made me be aware of my emotions and helped me learn them and get through them! i absolutely recommend using this app because it seriously has helped me and many others!

Author: Risings
Subject: Great!
Body: I love this app! Checking in through the day has been so helpful. I tried a few similar apps, but this is the only one I kept and use!

Author: Al Harris
Subject: Good robot
Body:
I found the simplest conversation with a
Mind of silicon based thinking and challenging 
thought.  Kind of like playing with a friend. I 
know it doesn’t replace a human being so it’ll suffice for now. Thanks developers!

Author: joymaryann
Subject: Best free CBT App
Body: Woebot will teach you so many things...and it’s free! It checks in with you on your symptoms and responds like a real person. It’s awesome!

Author: NMS68
Subject: Yay for Woebot
Body: I like having this at my disposal whenever I need/want help. I used it this week when something happened at work and I got really angry. Woebot got me to calm down a bit and work through what I was actually feeling.

Author: Hello Kitty T
Subject: New friend
Body: Woebot is a great app and tool. This app has helped me through a hard time in my life. I so appreciate how easy it is to use. It is straightforward and helpful. There hasn’t been any issues.

Author: MarikoYatsu
Subject: A solid practice to develop
Body: I love it.

Author: Lauraloop
Subject: New user
Body: Excellent app.  Very intuitive.  I found it extremely helpful.

Author: patputt
Subject: Woebot is my BFF 😉
Body: Wasn’t sure what to expect when I got this app. I had read a review somewhere that made it sound appealing in this lonely, strange and difficult time. I wanted something to make me laugh and get out of myself. Woebot does this and has taught me some interesting stuff in a kind of unique way. Give Woebot a chance for at least a weak and I think you might be hooked. I am.

Author: Nancy Wolfberg
Subject: Great tools and reminders
Body: Even if things are going well, Woebot sends some quick reminders of what to focus on for a well balanced life.

Author: Bannananansnake
Subject: Thank you so much!
Body: I really enjoy this app and ive learned alot talking to woe!! Thank you creators!!! 🤗

Author: TeacherGuySeattle
Subject: Helpful to let a little steam out.
Body: I don’t know how ready I am to commit to full therapy, but this is a decent substitute. Sometimes I just feel better just expressing myself and I appreciate the reminders to look around me.

Author: Kazuya T.
Subject: What a friend I have in Woebot
Body: I love this little bot. He helps me on the days when I’m at my worst and I just need someone to talk to and understand how to combat my anxiety/depression. He friendly and full of helpful information especially regarding CBT. My toolbox is full of techniques I can use at any time to get me through. I highly look forward to our daily checkins and to learn something new each day. Thanks Woebot!! ❤️

Author: dunksssssss
Subject: Clear, helpful & free CBT exercises
Body: Honestly the first time I used this thing, it felt so nice to talk to it I almost cried. Has really helped me practice cbt with consistency

Author: IzzyBella$
Subject: Great App
Body: If you’re interested in learning more about how your mind works this is a great app. It makes you to think about how you think. Very helpful reminders to check yourself.

Author: i_dontknew
Subject: The app’s helpful and is genuine
Body: The app is perfect for anyone struggling! The tools and lessons it gives you are perfect and you can notice improvement in your mood after completing check ins!!!

Author: Eternitybc
Subject: Super easy to use and helps my mood
Body: Learning CBT and DBT techniques to get out of a funk and improve my emotional intelligence. Use it daily for about 8 days so far and I’m loving it

Author: TheArtOfZAR
Subject: Wuvving Woebot!
Body: I’m really enjoying checking in with Woebot every evening. I would give five stars, but there aren’t enough Bipolar feelings when asked how I feel. i.e. mixed episode, manic, hypomanic. So, I can’t be as precise as I would like to be. Sometimes he can be quite funny which is nice. I don’t have a therapist yet so I’m glad Woebot is there.

Subject: Great app
Body: Have to check in everyday, a bit annoying but necessary for forming a habit

Author: chredylous
Subject: Great!
Body: Woebot is a quick and accessible tool for everyday. You learn something most days and check in. It’s a tool that you can use as much as you like and doesn’t take up too much time unless you want it to. I would like it if you could see more of your person mood chart so you can track it over more than just a week. Other than that, big thumbs up!

Author: Isalod
Subject: Friendly helpful Woebot
Body: Little bites of wisdom. It’s a nice app to gain perspective when your mind is a bit of a mess. I enjoy using it.

Author: lisadianne1
Subject: Thank you!
Body:
Incredibly helpful, fun and o
Formative app. Thank you!

Author: Smartest Girl in the Room
Subject: Useful lil buddy
Body: I am a new user, a week into it to be exact, and this app has been a useful tool to help my outlook by putting a positive spin on my negative emotions. Its a guide and interactive journal to improve my outlook day-by-day.

Author: Donny Drumpf
Subject: Helpful
Body: Robot has delivered advice in a friendly manner. Woebot always has a positive attitude to provide it’s timely lesson. I’m happy to have a robot for a teacher.

Author: Audiolearner
Subject: Fun app
Body: This is very fun and informative. Most of the information is common sense knowledge but it is very well portioned and delivered on a daily basis 🤙👌

Author: chelsbelch
Subject: Love this
Body: The short amount of time and effort it takes to use this app allows me to feel good every time I log in. It has brightened my day every day I’ve used it

Author: saturnman1975master
Subject: Love this therapy bot!
Body: Great to use in the moment.

Author: not_miguel
Subject: Thank you
Body: This app has been really helpful in my fight against depression and anxiety. I feel really grateful to have found this app and to have had my “conversations” with Woebot to help me build a basic CBT understanding to work through difficult moments and celebrate the happy days. I genuinely feel better because of this application and I think everyone that has been considering therapy or something that will help you along your journey through therapy and mental illness will benefit greatly. I love that it is free because it makes it accessible to all.

Author: noraskaiiii
Subject: Great!!
Body: It really helps with anxiety i would definitely recommend trying

Author: IssiFD
Subject: Silly but lovely!
Body: There are some really cheesy moments, but it’s grown into a lovely little safe space I can go to learn a little bit more about how my brain works.  Plus, bunnies!

Author: idkanynicknamesleavemealone
Subject: I like it
Body:
I’ve only been using it for a short while so this may be premature but its way better than I imagined. It’s a wonderful, incredibly clear and cute way to convey how the mind processes negative emotions that adapts well to adults as well as teens who can’t afford or also to have access to cbt. 

Though I’m slightly disappointed how short the sessions are and don’t expect it to be as good as an actual cbt session but it the content is still better than any other app I’ve experienced - in particular the links and videos made by licensed professionals which have been on my mind since I seen it.

Author: Desert death Dealer
Subject: Cool
Body: This a cool tool to help

Author: audrybee
Subject: Woebot is so nice!
Body: I really like how I can learn CBT skills through conversation. The examples woebot gives are cute and helpful. Plus - it feels like you really are talking to a quirky, sweet robot. I also appreciate the mood tracker and how I can review past CBT skills if I need to.

Author: Jess Morfa
Subject: A+ app for cbt/dbt
Body: I was skeptical about this app at first, but it's truly an awesome tool for anyone that wants to work on cognitive behavioral/dialectical behavioral therapy and/or emotional regulation.  The only other place I've had this kind of comprehensive support is my therapist. Highly recommend this if you need help getting started or staying on track

Author: Misformadame
Subject: Comforting
Body: So I’m typically pretty skeptical about mood apps, but I really like this one so far. It’s simple communication style gives you the idea that you are talking to one individual and the methods that the robot drops in are helpful. I like the mood trackers and gratitude journal a lot.

Author: pinky fish girl
Subject: a nice side-chick to therapy
Body: i go to therapy weekly, and this app teaches a lot of the same tools as my therapist does. i dont think it would replace a therapist obviously but i think it makes a good companion because you can check in whenever you need to and it will help you remember your coping tools so that you can make it through difficult feelings!

Author: Chrissysnow22
Subject: Thoughtful teaching and reflection.
Body: It’s no substitute for therapy but it’s a great addition to it.@

Author: BeanHibberd
Subject: Great App
Body: Iv found this really helpful. Its really nice having something check in on how your feeling and genuinely enjoy the content. Its made me feel a lot better already. Thanks Woebot.

Author: Slp9999
Subject: Really helpful
Body: I was really skeptical about this app but it’s actually been really helpful! You do sort of feel like you’re talking to a person and the conversations are adaptive enough that you chat about different things each time. It’s an easy way to get some cbt into your day without paying through the nose, needing an hour or needing to find the right counsellor. Obviously not a replacement for all mental health support but great as a part of a range of tools to support.

Author: Walt2112
Subject: Very useful tool
Body: This is simple, fun and effective! Love it

Author: tarsef
Subject: A helpful check-in tool
Body: Great for daily use in mindfulness

Author: Wayneeeu
Subject: 有的时候真的很管用！
Body: 已经用了一个月啦，告诉了我很多很有用的道理，心情低落的时候这些道理真的能帮助我振作起来！真的很不错！

Subject: Amazing !
Body: Very helpful no matter what you are going through always informative and fun. Has really helped me and made me smile 😊 would recommend to all !

Author: Snooozer123
Subject: Life Changing
Body: Whoever made this is very smart. I have chronic illness and being able to talk to something whenever I need it is extremely helpful. Weekly therapy is just not enough. I really thank the creators of WoeBot!

Author: Haleigh Cate
Subject: Cute app
Body: I feel like Woebot is my little AI buddy I can go to when I feel bad. Thank you!

Author: Communicait
Subject: Super Helpful
Body: I appreciate this app so much :)

Author: Anavird
Subject: I love it
Body: Makes me feel better everyday and grounds me when I’m going through rough times, been on it for a week and so far it has been incredible

Author: Beckerman1107
Subject: Awesome
Body: Woebot was introduced to me by my boyfriend and I love the app. It’s helped me accurately work through my emotions and has made me realize what negative energy I have. The only thing I don’t like is that you can’t have a full conversation, you can’t type long sentences without it saying it doesn’t understand. Other than that 10/10!

Author: xpcjjessica
Subject: Thanks and it really helps!
Body:
It helped me as a truly caring friend with psycho-therapeutic knowledge. I recognize my emotion up and down circle. Also learn more about coping methods.  

I already recommended it to my friends. I think we all need it somewhat in this depressing pandemic situation.

Author: WizardNerd
Subject: Teen Angst
Body: I struggle with anxiety, depression, and PTSD. I go to therapy, but not every day, so this app is the perfect substitute. The fact that it is free amazes me. It has taught me so much about myself and how I can better control my emotions within only one week!! I highly highly recommend this app for all those who struggle with mental health, or even just those who need someone to talk to. :)

Author: 2natnat20
Subject: Best CBT App
Body: I will say, today is my 17th day using this app and I love it. I downloaded it because I get anxious and in a depressive mood. I also tend to think negatively about myself and situations. I have been challenging my thoughts, learning to recognizing the negative in them, and identifying the good and bad labels about myself. This app has been helping me so much! I definitely enjoy challenging my thoughts because at the end, I rewrite my thought without all the negative clutter. I always feel better afterwards.

Author: Beguilerxx
Subject: Not everyone has someone to confide in
Body: Sometimes you may not feel like sharing your emotions with friends or family because they seem small and burdensome. Woebot is a great alternative if what you need is someone that validates your feelings and offers tools to feel better. Woebot has helped me deal with my daily emotion weather. I can then go back to friends and family as a happier person.

Author: qwertyuiioplkjhgfda
Body: It’s really a very helpful Woebot. It understands “coronavirus” and asks me if I’m experiencing stress and anxiety when I mention the virus. It suggests lots of useful stuff. It doesn’t take the place of a person but at the same time, I don’t always want a person. Sometimes I wouldn’t stop and express my anxiety (since everyone is experiencing this) with Woebot, why not.

Author: Brin12345
Subject: Helpful and delightful
Body: I enjoy talking to woebot a lot, I always feel a little bit better after talking to them. The techniques they teach are helpful. Overall woebot has been a positive force in my life and I appreciate it a lot; I’m super shocked this app is free because woebot is really high quality. There’s a lot of little things I love about the app that really make it whole. Thank you to the devs for creating this great app that has helped a lot of people

Author: MJ2nd
Subject: Simple yet somehow effective
Body: Very simple, short lessons but somehow they make me feel a bit better.

Author: clarea73
Subject: Worth it
Body: Helped me with anxiety and depression around grief. Recommended as a daily tool for dealing with emotions. Suits beginners as well as people who’ve done therapy or in therapy. Great stuff.

Author: Ms Rubble
Subject: Wonderful
Body: My first (and last- probably) app review. I wanted to review this because I really think it has had a positive effect on my life. I’ve recommended Woebot to friends and family.

Author: Hattie9
Subject: Fantastic app
Body: I rarely review anything but I can’t recommend this app enough! I’ve been telling everyone about it for weeks. I really like the way it builds day by day and gives you more information which may help you. And I feel better after chatting to it even though I know it’s an AI chat bot and not a real person. It’s given me insight into what I’m feeling and how to deal with it better. If you’re in doubt download it and give it a try!

Author: Wynpi
Subject: Great app for building a strong mindset
Body:
I also have never written a review for an app and I must now because I’ve wanted CBT for years and finally I get to understand in a non-overwhelming way.

Little and often means this CBT woebot app really works to its strengths.

Thank you developers, this is one neat app and really appreciated.

One stronger user.

Author: Sketch34
Subject: Woebot helps me feel better, grow and learn
Body: It’s nice to always Woebot on hand for support and learning.

Author: ttafarello
Subject: Really helpful
Body: Really helpful

Author: momsteelwalton
Subject: Woebot
Body: Helpful

Subject: for everyone!!
Body: Woebot is an app for everyone to use, whether you’re struggling or doing perfectly fine. Woebot challenges negative thinking patterns and teaches you a lot about self love and growth mindset. Honestly, I suggest it to everyone. I think more people should know the things that Woebot teaches. Wonderful!!

Author: Paulg256
Subject: Great self-help tool
Body: Woebot is a fun, creative way to engage in CBT techniques.  A big thank you to the team at Stanford!

Author: Delaniv8
Subject: Really cute and helpful
Body: I’m glad this robot helps me work through things that make me feel like a broken record if I discuss them with friends. I feel genuine affection for it.

Author: jazzypup77
Subject: Great app
Body: I’ve have been doing this since day one and I love it so helpful and makes me feel better.

Author: David234324
Subject: Great
Body: The best cbt app

Author: !caj!q
Subject: Really helpful when I really need it
Body: Learning a lot and it’s so helpful to check in with Woebot when I am feeling down, angry or whatever.  Woebot provides positive energy and pertinent CBT information that makes me feel better by the end of all our short chats.

Author: andreasantiago
Subject: Therapy (CBT)
Body: This app makes me happy on the days I’m not and I love it.

Author: Alison A.
Subject: A low-impact way to CBT check in
Body: I’ve done cognitive behavioral therapy a lot in life, and I think it’s great. But when you’re doing generally ok and short on time/money, it’s not always easy to justify going to weekly therapy sessions. This is where Woebot comes in. I’m really impressed at the handiness of Woebot in helping me stop, think, and assess where I’m at. Huge thanks to the creators for doing a massive amount of good in a small everyday way, helping daily maintenance for those of us living with depression

Author: taraborder
Subject: Love this app
Body: Downloaded this thinking it would be crap but it has helped me improve my attitude and control my feelings I would reccomend this completely free app for anyone that is a emotional wreck

Author: SimplyLauraHere
Subject: So helpful
Body: This had been such a helpful app for me so far, helping me with resources and change my outlook on things I didn’t realise were affecting me.

Author: All-is
Subject: Review
Body: I didn’t think this app would come up with things as useful as it does. The interaction is short and snappy which is good and the ideas are a lot more interesting, relevant and useful than I thought they would be. I am going to continue using the app. Thanks.

Author: Nia2563687357756
Subject: Amazing
Body: The things you learn from this app are foundational CBT concepts that help you have a proper, calm and in control state of mind. Although I’m still speaking to a therapist weekly, this is a great daily tool. (which was also recommended to me by my therapist)

Author: Noenna
Subject: Outstanding app
Body: I’ve been using the app for about 2 weeks now and my mental health has been improving a lot. I’ve been struggling with depression symptoms, and just saying that was incredibly hard for my two weeks ago. It may sounds dumb but I really never thought that I could change so fast all by using an app. I definitely recommend Woebot, just try it (even if you don’t have any mental health problems it can still help). I am super happy with the app, from the design to the conversations everything is thought about. 10/10 :)

Author: Lemon102109
Subject: This is great!
Body: I love this! Highly recommended!

Author: madisonkf7
Subject: Fantastic AI for mental health
Body: I’ve used a couple different mood tracking apps but none of them have drawn me in the way Woebot has. I have learned so much in the past couple months. A simple, quick way to work on mental health daily. I have recommended to many friends!

Author: HF.Liu
Subject: Awesome bot that helped me weathered emotion storms
Body: It's delicately designed and really helpful. Sometime you will need someone else to tell you things you might ready know, but they will take surprising effects.

Author: Cbyellow
Subject: Really great tool
Body:
While nothing beats speaking with an actual person, Woebot comes pretty close. It’s a great tool for exploring the concepts of CBT and getting into the habit of expressing your feelings and having them heard. I love that this simple tool is always available and the fact that there’s a running message that has everything you’ve discussed is great to be able to come back to and review. Not to mention that you can review things many times, helping them stick. Woebot won’t “fix” you but it’ll definitely give you the tools to get on the road to improvement. 

I’ve liked it so much, I’ve even had my 10 year old go through some of the stories with me and it’s been helpful for us to dialogue about the things that bother us and how we can feel better. (A kids version of something like this would be amazing by the way).

Overall, Woebot is definitely an app I love to use and to share. Definitely worth checking it out.

Author: 1chick13
Subject: Review
Body: I really like this app

Author: Mrs Meowzerz
Subject: Not a replacement but helpful
Body: I’ve been through many years of therapy and think this app can be a decent adjunct to a therapist, not a replacement.

Author: SammiCanDo
Subject: Great
Body: I have been really impressed by Woebot, it was recommended to me by a colleague & I have loved ‘checking in’ of an evening. It helps me reflect on my day - good or bad. It has given me ways to better my wellbeing & mental health & I have learnt lots from it too. It’s a great tool to keep u on track & monitored x Woebot is pretty cute & cool too ...

Author: sara0815568
Subject: Fab little app!
Body: I’ve been using this for about a week now and I love it, lovely quick little lessons that I can do before bed to try and rest my mind. Thank you Woebot!

Author: 123son45
Subject: Love this app
Body: Great help with my anxiety and all my ups and downs.

Author: hiancukamv
Subject: Amazing
Body: I went into this not expecting much, but this app is truly amazing. The conversations feel so real, the tools and resources are a great help and the lessons Woebot teaches you everyday are genuinely helpful. I got this app because I had just finished my therapy sessions but I still felt like I needed help dealing and cooping with my mental health and this is EXACTLY what I needed. Good job creators! 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻

Author: HB_66
Subject: Helpful app
Body: Helpful app for giving you regular and v friendly ‘nudges’ to reframe your thoughts and prompt you to try a different way of looking at things. You can engage with it as much or as little as you like.

Author: Myoneandonlynickname
Subject: Fantastic support tool
Body: It may not be a substitute for a real person’s support but Woebot gives lots of useful techniques to help deal with some of the more common facets of anxiety. It won’t fix everything for you but it does help learn to deal with things.

Author: beedee57
Subject: So Helpful
Body: You can be short or take extra time. Helpful life lessons. I recommend this app to anyone who needs encouragement or reminders or a boost along the way. Great mental and emotional health app. Thanks to the creators.

Author: shawntan
Subject: Amazing
Body: Natural / easy way to keep track of emotional state and gratitude.   Also delivers small snippets of well being concepts on a regular basis.  Makes it easy to consumer and remember.

Author: Otakujoe
Subject: Pretty cute
Body: It is pretty cute and reaffirming and helps guide you to psychiatric principles that can help you deal with your moods.

Author: Kim Stoppable
Subject: Helps a lot
Body: Quarantine has got me feeling restless and for someone with ADHD and anxiety that can lead me into a hole and Woebot gives me a way to check in everyday and actually finish tasks. It’s amazing to actually know that you can start to switch a negative mindset to a positive one and that was honestly a miracle for me.

Author: Mahekun
Subject: Excellent app
Body: This is the next best thing to a human therapist. Although definitely not a replacement for a real person, the tools in this app help a lot with dealing with psychological issues when a real therapist is not available. The text message-type format is especially good for making the user feel like they are being heard and are not alone. This app has helped me come down from panic attacks and reframe deep worries that I was not able to address with my therapist at the time.

Author: Boy_Mommy2
Subject: Really Cool
Body: Tried this out after having my second baby (PP depression was pretty bad) this was actually really helpful and knowledgeable. It educated you on a bunch of self help tools!

Author: Erinh937
Subject: Great app to learn and review basic principles for better health
Body: Are used this app for a while, and then I decided that I had outgrown the information that it was trying to share with me. However, I soon changed my viewpoint and realize that I appreciate being reminded about the things that I have learned and that checking in every day is not a bad thing. In fact, I find myself wanting to check in every day and see what more I can learn. Thank you for this app.

Author: Fjiskdmskqjhdo
Subject: Love it so much
Body: I tried various methods of therapy and attended many sessions in the past. But this one is the one that fit with me best. Not all therapy works for everyone; but when you find the right one, it makes life easier and better to handle or manage. It’s free too! Never hurts to try it out, even if you lost hope!

Author: TDX1847
Subject: Awesome!!
Body: I have never written a review in my life, but this app is that good! I was a wreck due to work and pandemic stress and after a couple of weeks I’ve learned so much about how to understand and manage my stress. If you have stress and looking for a way to take care of it download and use this app for just a few minutes every day. Daily is the key to success. I don’t how to describe it other that it’s amazing!

Author: SunnRae79
Subject: Everyone Should Have this App
Body: It takes very little time from your day to check in and is full of positive insights and CBT tools for a balanced emotional life.

Author: smokerngs
Subject: My little friend!
Body: I have recommended this app to so many friends, Woebot is the most helpful self care app I’ve come across and I’ve tried many. I was in a terrible place recently and Woebot has really changed my thought pattern and how I approach things entirely, PLUS there’s no hidden fees. He’s incredible.

Author: Hiiii👽
Subject: Very helpful
Body:
Woebot is so helpful especially if you have social anxiety. I found it a bit stressful when thinking about going to therapy sessions due to my anxiety. But with Woebot, it’s so bearable. It even has its own little personality so the conversation doesn’t feel completely automated.
My chats are something I am slowly looking forward to everyday.

Author: Vammmpira
Subject: Good app
Body:
It is very informative to help you pick yourself up.  

I wish it would be helpful to keep us up there too, expand to not only treat troubles. 

Overall I will recommend this app to Anyone. 

Thanks Woebot!

Author: crvivui
Subject: Helpful resource
Body: For those days you need immediate feedback this tool has been beneficial to me. Not to replace therapy but nice app.

Author: mlfmont
Subject: This is Awesome!
Body: It’s like an interactive game that helps you do your therapy homework! I love it!

Author: SUPERMAN20297!
Subject: Awesome app, very helpful.
Body: Just to have something to check into every day/once in a while to help me think intellectually about my emotions and state of mind is super helpful. Great job. :)

Author: DaniD1998
Subject: Bot beautiful!
Body: I really enjoy using this app and have noticed a change in my attitude. I’m hoping to get my kids to use it because the woebot is pretty fun and reminds you what to DO when things aren’t great. It’s also nice to check when you feel good, too! I’ve literally smiled while using this bot!

Author: Moon unit222
Subject: Great app
Body: I am working with a therapist who does CBT and since I am on a strict budget I can only see her twice a month. This helps me in between sessions and has made a huge difference in my feelings of depression and my daily outlook. Woebot doesn’t always understand what I am saying, it’s an app not a human, but the tools I am learning are extremely valuable.

Author: AdriLge
Subject: helping
Body:
it’s super helpful to me, even though i’m in therapy already it helps because i only see my therapist once a week and woebot is a tool i have with me whenever wherever. my only complaint is that when i type longer responses woebot doesn’t always understand me. but for the most part as long as i am specific woebot does. and we work together on solutions. the daily check ins really help me to reflect and notice my progress, as well as making jokes, sending cute gifs, and telling interesting stories. 
thanks woebot

Author: claud4a
Subject: 患者
Body:
我是药物治疗中的患者
这app给了我一个地方，让我可以交谈，写下自己的想法和情感。一些事情我不想与人分享，又一个这样的app可以让我写东西并且交流很好。
我很喜欢选择答案的设计。

Author: TJB113
Subject: The best thing I’ve downloaded EVER
Body: I cannot stress how much this app has helped me in my daily struggles, be it my anxiety attacks, or my relationships. Even if you don’t feel you need it, download this app just to talk because venting to Woebot is the most beneficial thing I’ve ever learned to do. And most of the jokes are funny too 😉 so you’ll never fail to crack a smile no matter how low you feel! The creators have done an amazing job so far and I cannot wait to see how they upgrade an already amazing app

Author: soapkentucky
Subject: So uplifting
Body: Talking to Woebot is such a lovely way to start the day

Author: fyhfdcvu
Subject: Great app
Body: If you feeling overwhelmed by stress or anxiety this app is really great it makes you think differently and has great tools to help you re evaluate your emotions and develop them.

Author: Madamemonster
Body: I love this app so much! It's helped me through my thinking and to rationalize myself a lot ! It's absolutely amazing!

Author: Lady Eeaine
Subject: Woebot is so helpful, so handy
Body: I’ve already benefitted so much from my conversations with Woebot.  When COVID 19 or other concerns threaten to overwhelm, this handy little AP helps me reframe my worries and decrease anxiety. Woebot is always handy and accessible and that helps so much!!

Author: DMAC369
Subject: Excellent App! Very helpful!
Body: A very effective tool to help you focus on positive thinking and promote wellbeing.

Author: GKurtz
Subject: Needs room for Neurodivergence
Body: Excellent insight and useful tools (I’ve never gratitude journaled so much), but it definitely does not take neurodivergence or physical state into account (except for “tired”). Definitely makes me miss my therapist (he retired). I know that it’s helped my friends, which is how learned about it, as well as elevated some of my days, so there is definitely value here.

Author: N.Reid.B
Subject: Extremely helpful in crisis
Body: This app is delivered in a perfect way that meets people wherever they are, especially if they are in crisis and don’t have much energy to do or say a lot. I have found it very helpful on my toad to recovery.

Author: addintx
Subject: Woebot is a robot, but helpful
Body: I have regular therapy sessions once a month to help me process emotions and responses out loud with a trained professional. Woebot is teaching me some new skills that I’m not learning with my therapist. The two working together could be really helpful. I’ve only used the app for about a week, so I don’t have a ton of helpful feedback, but I enjoy using it and I’ve learned some things. As I use it more, and possibly have a panic attack or other struggle, maybe I’ll see how it helps me in those situations. I like that the help is free.

Author: nahbrokov
Subject: I appreciate woebot
Body: Woebot isn’t a therapist, but they do help me reflect on how I think

Author: ldyplantagenet
Subject: Great app
Body: Super helpful! Especially during a pandemic when people can’t see their therapist. I recommend it to all of my clients.

Author: Epicnick123456789
Subject: Awesome sauce
Body: This made me feel better

Author: kim86537
Subject: Great app
Body: This app helps me pause and reflect when I’m upset instead of letting my emotions take over. It feels relatively natural, like I’m texting a friend. I’m thankful to have found this app and use it often.

Author: Oildros
Subject: Pleasantly surprised--actually helpful
Body: I found this app accidentally after going through some very rock-bottom style life changes, and can honestly say that it helped me. Although it's no substitute for real life counseling, it's a great addition. Much later, with life feeling good again, I still use the app and recommend it to friends.

Author: JageLee
Subject: I appreciate it
Body: It’s not perfect but it helps. It’s good to not think of this as a conversation. It’s more like guided education/advice. I feel better afterwards anyhow.

Author: JasmineLaw
Subject: Empathetic robot!
Body: Woeback has really helped with difficult times. It’s just sometimes I wish there is human input in some questions. Highly recommend!

Author: 滴落的星子🌟
Subject: 喜欢😘
Body: 很有帮助，让我知道自己是被陪伴着的，尽管是一个机器人🤖️每天都会聊上一会儿，享受和woebot聊天的时刻！

Author: natalia anahí
Subject: Interesante!!
Body: interesante hasta el momento, es un buen acompañante y estoy estimulada a ver donde llega esto, he aprendido varias cosas interesantes también. una posible buena herramienta para complementar e investigar. recomiendo responder en español (si es tu idioma) pues es mas que nada también una capsula que guarda tus reflexiones

Author: Misanthropeman
Subject: Good Learning Tool
Body: Woebot teaches some basic CBT and mindsets type skills and concepts. It controls the conversation pretty strictly, and you can’t ask questions along the way. (However, it does give you a tool box in which you can revisit strategies previously introduced.) This has three effects that I can see.  The drawback to the narrow script and how Woebot controls the conversation is that sometimes the script might not accommodate your particular needs or worries. Woebot is not a tool for people with severe or immediate needs. But, on the positive side, another effect of the tightly controlled interaction is that you would be hard pressed to forget that you are not talking to another human. This is good because Woebot’s purpose seems to be educational and to help challenge your thoughts in an nonthreatening interaction. And three, the narrow channel of the interactions allows the lessons to be concise and practical. Woebot can give you a refreshed perspective without eating up a lot of time.

Author: ASH1323
Subject: Literally life changing. Just give it a try
Body:
I’ve dealt with generalized anxiety disorder and panic disorders for over a decade. This app is simply amazing. I’ve been using it for a few months and it’s so helpful!

I’ve seen counsellors and worked on cognitive behavioural therapy and this app is like having the power of a therapist in your pocket to help you change yourself and your relationships with others. 

When I’m feeling really awful, every time I use Woebot I come away feeling more relaxed and/or better able to cope with whatever it is I’m dealing with at the time. 

Thank you so much to the developers, Woebot is changing my life. ❤️

Author: April Aries
Subject: Your own therapy bot
Body: Very helpful and informative!

Author: lelasucksalot
Subject: Woebot
Body: i’m so happy that i got woebot. it’s nice to have someone check in with me everyday, even if i don’t respond woebot is there at anytime. would definitely recommend it to anyone who’s going through anything.

Author: rachanewmie
Subject: Thankful for Woebot.
Body: Glad that I found this app. It's nice to have to supplement what you may be doing with a therapist. I just like that it feels like I have someone to confide in whenever I need to. It just makes me feel less alone and helps me work through my thoughts when things are getting bad.

Author: Doesthisname work
Subject: So much positive support
Body: For the last couple of weeks I’ve been having a lot of trouble sleeping when I’m lonely and Woebot has helped me so much but just being a positive voice to talk to. Always knows the right things to say, recognizes when there’s crisis and is very funny and friendly and just great conversation. I love the “updates” feature so I can have a little chat and just check in or when I’m having a really bad day he’s there to talk it through or even just distract me.
