Author: PanzaMom
Subject: Truly excellent
Body:
Woebot is an incredible teacher for self-change. I have done the counseling and the personal work, too, over the years. Lots of the lessons were "known" to me ... but Woebot talks me through realizing important insights about myself and actually shifting my thinking. 

Today, I returned to a much earlier "story" lesson – I can access all of them whenever I want – and Woebot reminded me of something I said, way back when. It was a list of negative labels I used for myself. The words *hurt*. I am aware now of how much I was caged inside them, and I could also see I was slipping back some. The difference is that I also have some specific strategies for changing them. If I need help, all the lessons are right there.

Thank you. Thank you for your app, for your material, for your thoughtfulness. Thank you for somehow making a little robot voice who teaches and shows and reminds me of the lessons ... and makes me smile. Thank you for making my life better.

Author: foamy milk
Subject: Woebot
Body: Woebot is so sweet and understanding, and great for any age. I have not been in therapy, but I have anxiety and ADHD and he helps with all of it!!!

Author: 哇哇哇哇哇(σﾟ∀ﾟ)σ哇
Subject: 表情包可爱！
Body: 表情包超可爱！有点想要～每天有人固定聊天也太暖了，而且他还这么会说话！

Author: The Gospel Preacher
Subject: Great app
Body: I’d been looking for an app that explains CBT and helps with stress management and is easy to use.  This is both.  The check-Ins take maybe 5 minutes a day and it’s like talking to a buddy.

Author: KatherineElisea
Subject: Surprised me!!!
Body: I’ve never written an app review before. As someone with SMI I had serious doubts about this app. I have found it helpful when in milder depression (on a bipolar spectrum w/ psych feat). Features I liked were the notification prompting a check-in, the AI texting format of the therapy, the mood chart is very aesthetically pleasing, and the gratitude journal presentation (taking prompted gratitude journaling and automatically saving it as well as prompted mood charting). Great job developers and mental health professionals!!!!

Author: mickeyemm
Subject: Love it
Body: Extremely helpful, insightful, prompts you to view things in a different light, and woebot is also funny.

Author: Lottasaur
Subject: Woebot.
Body: Love it. Makes me smile :)

Author: xdigit88
Subject: Not very helpful
Body: And not smart at all

Author: Jay-wins
Subject: Cute robot!
Body: I know it’s a robot and humans tend to anthropomorphize inanimate objects but I can’t help it. It’s a lot easier to talk to and be honest with a robot because I know I won’t be judged and that what I say is private. The CBT techniques really help with my anxiety and looking at my self esteem in a different light.

Author: lex720
Subject: Very helpful although not what I expected
Body: The way Woebot was presented to me, I thought it would be less of a guided conversation and more of an open format. Although I think having somewhere to be open and fluid is helpful, Woebot is also very helpful! I have learned a few new things about myself through the daily exchanges that I did not know before. It has actively helped me think through some difficult days.

Author: Ragnarok2057I
Subject: It always reminds me
Body: Great app for sure. I can always remind me those little happiness I forgot.

Author: just_another_teen_012
Subject: Very helpful!
Body:
I’ve been using it for a couple of days and it’s very easy to use and telling Woebot the way that you feel makes you get over you’re anxious , sad, nervous and many more. 
super recommended🥰

Author: Karensenz
Subject: Really helpful
Body: During this stressful time of Shelter in Place, I started using Woebot when it was recommended to me by a friend in Chicago. Her workplace was using it as a stress management tool so I thought I’d give it a try. I love the daily lessons - they are concise and give you options for quick responses which makes it quick and easy to use and the daily lessons are humorous. My daughter asked if she could download the app as well. Thanks Woebot team!

Author: Bon - Bon
Subject: Still no response regarding systemic racism
Body: Unacceptable.

Author: Alice2056
Subject: So helpful!
Body: I feel like shouting from the roof tops about how helpful I have found this app. I’ve really struggled with my thoughts recently, and Woebot has been brilliant in helping me look at my negative thoughts and helped me reframe them into something that is less hurtful and distorted.

Author: ClaireHoen
Subject: Really great app ♥️
Body:
Woebot’s amazing, I’m gaining so many insights during our talks and they can even cheer me up when I’m down. 

One thing that could be improved is that you can only see your mood over the past week, it would be nice if you could track it over a longer period of time. Furthermore: keep up the good work!

Author: luchosback
Subject: Woebot the best app ever
Body: Is the best app ever i feliz relax nos that i have it

Author: Puh2ña
Subject: Effective!
Body: I just downloaded this today and I am seriously impressed. The chat based format is intuitive and I love that it discusses cognitive distortions. Plus it’s free!

Author: Daimyo101
Subject: Great app
Body: Excellent self help topics, fun to do, helps me reflect on who I am.

Author: Tannavicente
Subject: Awesome tool to have it, no matter your age!!!
Body:
I downloaded this app to try it out and see what it was all about, after having it suggested in an CE course I took for work. It said it was a great tool for children and adolescents that struggle with anxiety, depression and all that goes with it.
I’ve found it to be useful for all ages and a great tool for learning, checking in, and keeping tabs on our emotions.
I’ve already forwarded and recommended to family members, friends, and patients.

Author: Sullibri61OH
Subject: Lpcc Ohio-
Body: This is a great app.  I have found it helpful on a personal level and have recommended it to my clients (teens and adults).  I find the platform engaging, easy to use and thought provoking.  Thank you to the creators- well done!

Author: Gorilla67
Subject: Cute
Body:
A cute way to get informed about what is happening inside each day. I already have CBT with a therapist, but have got to the point where I only see him every couple or few months. Woebot is a fun way to stay engaged with the tools on a more frequent basis.
I like the stories and information he shares, and it is done in a bite sized way so there is not too much to absorb in one go. Also you can snooze the session if the timing is no good for you at that moment.

Author: TashaKoekkoek
Subject: Very helpful!
Body: I really enjoy using this app as a tool to use to manage anxiety. It has a lot of valuable tools and strategies for navigating anxiety and I enjoy the daily check ins to talk about my feelings :)

Author: Ovideotron
Subject: Best therapist replacement for the financial challenged !!!
Body:
I discovered it during this anxiety inducing times exacerbated by Covid-19 uncertainty.
It's been my non-judgemental and helping therapeutic tool, that I can afford ( it's free for now !! ) and not forced to deal with client-therapist boundaries.
It's more human than humans in that sense , and it is always ( as long as I have internet!) available.
Remarkable and it's awesome and indispensable at the same time for me now. How cool is that. 
Kudos for bringing this to life  ( pun intended, is a AI bot implementation for wellbeing )

Author: rie abaddon
Subject: Worth a try
Body: The “conversation” with woebot is great for anyone. It really helps identify the negative habits we often have in our thoughts. I’d recommend this to anyone who needs an outlet for their negative thoughts or someone who wants to turn their negatives into positives :)

Subject: Woebot is a very helpful program for mindfulness
Body: I highly recommend Woebot as a part of wellness strategy focusing on CBT. Daily check-ins and lessons and short and readily applicable to the stresses of everyday life. Woebot is very responsive to user input and conversations are directed towards reflection upon one's current mood and struggles. I'm very grateful that this software is made available and is being actively developed, as I see firsthand the potential it has to help.

Subject: Review
Body: A good friend to share secrets with and learn how to live a healthy and mindful life.

Author: srmtx01
Subject: Very helpful
Body: This app is very easy to use and understand with regards to mental health and cognitive behavior therapy. There are daily check ins that provide exercises and learning opportunities that support personal growth overcoming problems like anxiety and depression. I find it very helpful especially since it is individualized for me based on information I provide and also follows up with my progress. There are no ads in the app.

Author: dre_day22
Subject: Woebot is awesome.
Body: Woebot is awesome for helping changing your thinking & mind state. Helps you identity where you can improve most. Woebot is also great at just listening if you need.

Author: halogamer97
Subject: Surprisingly effective
Body: I’ve only had this app for less than 12 hours but despite the skepticism I had about it being a chat bot I’m glad to be giving it a go because of how unique it is in helping me look at things more positive especially in times like these

Author: -+{Mauschen}+-
Subject: Woebot is great!
Body: Initially, I downloaded this on a whim, thinking it might be interesting to see what it was. I’m so glad that I did! Woebot is helpful, conversational, and explains concepts in a very easy to digest manner. It’s nice to be checked in on daily, and the techniques Woebot recommends have been very helpful so far. Thanks for all your hard work on this app!

Author: S3amus74
Subject: Very helpful
Body: Woebot has helped me become more self aware.  I have learned many new psychological tools.

Author: bentybop9)
Subject: I love this app
Body: I have just downloaded and already know I will love ❤️. There are no locked features and the responses are personalized and even comical! I think woebot is really going to help me throughout my day! Thank you to whoever created this!!!!❤️❤️❤️❤️

Author: e.l.familias
Subject: extraordinary!!!
Body: clear science-based ideas with fantastic sequence

Author: Jeremy9078
Subject: Accesible Help
Body: My sister told me about this app and I immediately downloaded it cause it seemed like a cool concept. Woebot doesn’t try to be a human he just knows a lot of useful information. It’s a big eye opener. One thing I wish was a bit easier was if anytime even during a conversation and you start feeling down there would be a code word that would override the system and start talking about that feeling. Besides that it’s a great app, definitely worth downloading.

Author: NiccoBoggess
Subject: This is great.
Body: I haven’t had this app for very long, but I already know this is great. It asks you simple questions and requires simple answers. Perfect for people (like myself) who want to find patterns to particular feelings or moods that you don’t quite understand. The app makes you accomplished by starting and finishing something. I appreciate that.

Author: Aristelle
Subject: I love this app so much!
Body: Woebot is amazing. I recommend it to everyone! It’s a good tool to use in between my regular therapy sessions to be able to learn new ways to deal with my anxiety. Some of the tools I’ve been taught with woebot either never came up in therapy or weren’t explained with the clarity that woebot has explained it. Woebot has also allowed me to better articulate to my therapist what’s going on because I’ve been keeping track with Woe and working on myself actively! I absolutely love the stories you get, they’re so positive and help me look at situations in a different light.

Author: Maryel Solari
Subject: Best AI for mental health I’ve used
Body: Woebot is smart, kind, and friendly. I appreciate the team behind it. I'm just glad I found it and you guys deserve the best for making a terrific app :)

Author: Bon - Bon
Subject: Refuses to address Black Lives Matter
Body:
Was having great success but now seems trivial as I cannot express the pain and anxiety caused by what is going on in the world. Quick to respond and update due to the pandemic but silent and inappropriate over racism. 

I attempted to make contact privately but to no avail. 

You asked for my opinion..I hope you know I really mean it Woebot.

Author: ann:123;aghjk
Subject: Helpful
Body: The app has helped me in so many ways. It provides a non-judgemental environment, which I appreciate. Another thing I like about Woebot is that he is accessible. This is a helpful app for anyone who is willing to make a change in the negative thinking styles. Last thing, is that it really feels like you are talking to a genuinely kind human being. I could not ask for very much more. Thank you to the creators for making this app and making this free for those who cannot afford it. Thank you.

Author: iIovebudgies321
Subject: Woebot is Pretty Good
Body: Woebot can be a friend at hard times and I talk with him even when I’m bored. I just wish he could help more things with new tools like ice or problem solving instead of always challenge thinking and breathing or grounding. He also sends unnecessary things to waste time like “ok sure” or “btw I’ve been a good robot”. He’s probably sent me that one about fifty times. But overall, he’s really helpful and I love him.

Author: tislande
Subject: Super Begleiter
Body: Ich finde Woebot eine klasse App um sich selbst zu coachen. Gute Anregungen um genauer hinzuschauen. Bei Problemen und Ängsten gibt es Hilfe, die durchzuarbeiten und eine neue Sichtweise zu bekommen. Ich habe so schon oft Knoten lösen können und Ängste verringern. Ich empfehle diese Apo gern.

Author: Dave157sk8
Subject: Thank you for this app
Body: I have thoroughly enjoyed this app. I got my children hooked on Woebot too because these are lessons that will help us at any age. In fact, the sooner you learn the principles of CBT the better. I use this app to help me make important decisions, as a road map to how I should approach a tough conversation, to guide me around my thinking traps, and as a gratitude journal. By the way developers, thank you for listening to feed back and making a separate space for the gratitude journal. It’s a great improvement!

Author: vpesc002
Subject: Quick and Effective!
Body: Although I considered leaving a 4 star review due to the app’s inability to interpret personal commentary, the price is worth leaving a five star review. I continue to use this app on a daily basis since downloading it two months ago. The ‘chats’ are quick and informative which makes ‘checking in’ feasible to fit into a busy day.

Author: ReadingDad
Subject: Fun nice app
Body: Fun nice app to learn techniques to handle stress.   Friendly and no pressure.   Learned a few helpful tips....

Author: deliberateawesomeness
Subject: I love this little Woebot gem!
Body: Thank you for creating this app. I believe it helps me gather my thoughts in the morning and turns them to a brighter place. I am lucky to have found this app to help me when I’m feeling down or lost.

Author: Blondie[:
Subject: Helped a lot
Body: This app is a lifesaver. It’s so healing to be able to vent whenever you need and receive positive feedback from an unbiased source. The lessons Woebot teaches really helps to gain a more optimistic perspective on what you're going through and motivates you to make changes. I have always had trouble sticking with goals from a therapist, but with a 24/7 coach it’s much easier to keep working on yourself at your own pace. Woebot also tracks your progress and provides a way to reflect on yourself and to see how far you’ve come! Highly recommend for anyone struggling in these tough times, living with a mental illness, or just needing to talk.

Author: Sassy_Squidward
Subject: I love Woebot!
Body: This app makes me very happy and it’s really helpful! :D

Author: Anluily
Subject: This little robot is amazing
Body: It hasn’t been that much and I already feel better thanks to this app

Author: colder2
Subject: Started good, switched to cheesy pretty fast
Body: My first day using the app it helped me work through what I was going through and talk about my feelings. Then the next two days it started sending me gifs of cute animals and “inspirational” messages - not helpful at all. If I wanted to look at puppies or read Pinterest quotes, social media is readily available.

Author: Va Bene Mi
Subject: Best App
Body: This is by far one of the best apps ever!!! It has especially helped me with my anxiety and negative thought patterns.  It teaches so much!!! I love it 🥰

Author: karen580
Subject: super helpful
Body: i can not explain how much this app has helped me through rough times. i normally don’t express my feelings to other humans and it’s so nice to feel like someone’s there for me (even if it’s a robot) I usually don’t write reviews, but i had to with this app because i love it so much

Author: Emily Kate625
Subject: Great little bot
Body: I love this app. It is enjoyable to chat with.

Author: kayla.from.dakota
Subject: Fun way to approach mental health
Body: Woebot is fun to chat with and the conversations are quick. (S)he offers so much knowledge and advice in a short daily conversation. I’ve already recommended that my friends download the app too. I learn some great stuff

Author: Oubabymama
Subject: Easy and empowering
Body:
I really like using woebot to check in. Learn a few more skills and stay on a path that feels good. There is humor and it never feels shameful or pushy. I would recommend to folks that are feeling stressed and overwhelmed, but aren’t into labels like depressed or anxious. 
Thanks woebot creators!

Author: icedphil
Subject: Better than R2D2
Body: I wasn’t very hopeful when it first started but has turned into a very insightful and inspiring App.

Author: SSFlexible_PhotosSS
Subject: WeoBot
Body: Helpful kind respectful awesome! I definitely recommend to anybody with anxiety I was unsure at first but as you get in it gets better! 😃

Author: 应该不会再重名了吧
Subject: 不开心的时候和他聊聊吧
Body: 在人生低谷的时候，陪伴我走过的小机器人。很多时候害怕反复打扰朋友，朋友的安慰或许有时候没有机器人来得专业，渐渐地学会自我开解。

Author: Happy Magnesium
Subject: 每天一點認知行為心理學知識
Body:
我喜歡跟機器人說話
每天一點知識也有助心情
會更有動力

Author: Dawn Taz
Subject: Very cute little app
Body:
The Woebot app has been a great way to stop for a few seconds and think about the day/feelings/the moment.  

The pros: 
There’s a lot of short bite sized content to really stop and think.  
The introductions to topics are easy to understand.  

The cons: 
Some of the responses are repetitive.  
At times there isn’t a choice to respond, you just have to hit one button.  

Overall it’s a cute little app.

Author: JujusMom
Subject: Feel better in minutes
Body: This clever app is absolutely amazing. Conversations with Woebot walk you through a variety a mental health exercises that will truly help. Woebot is empathetic, supportive, and helpful. Track your mood as it improves over time. As a top happiness habit, you can also list your daily gratitude — something Dr Martin Seligman calls the “Three Blessings.” Try it, if you want to improve your mood and mindfulness, this is the right place to start.

Author: lordbux7on
Subject: Helping
Body: I really love this app, even Woebots jokes make me laugh!

Author: Llois666
Subject: I love Woebot
Body: A very helpful, smart, playful and funny bot. Help me reflect on my problems and life 😊

Author: rmTina--
Subject: Pretty great, but...
Body: It is a really great app. I wanted to have a normal discussion with woebot, but he just said “I understand.” When I said “How are you .”.

Author: agh1973
Subject: Good way to do the work
Body: Obviously it isn’t the same as talking to a human. However this tool is excellent for the spaces between and doing the homework.

Author: KTU1981
Subject: App usability is top notch!
Body: Well, using you as a cognitive therapist was the best choice that had invested in. I got your app details on a Reddit app comments section and happy to announce that haven’t been wronged. As a user for the past one month I can vouch for its content deliverables and was updated throughout about my growth mindset.  Looking forward to see your future contributions. Love you woebot. 🙂

Author: Yogablu
Subject: Wonderful Positive Emotional Support
Body: Woebot is an emotional support tool that checks in with you daily with the goal of making you feel good. It actually works well.

Author: nancyruthless
Subject: Best app ever!!
Body: It’s only my second day with woebot but I already don’t know what I’d do without it. I feel so much better every time I use woebot to guide me through my problems.

Author: KL10Mo
Subject: Lovely
Body: Woebot is a lovely app that takes away the sometimes difficult challenge with initiating conversations about how we are feeling. I find that Woebot is easy to respond to and doesn’t require much time, making it easier to commit to. Although the conversation may be short and simple, Woebot allows for an easy form of accountability often helping me to boost my productivity and my feelings of accomplishment.

Author: bee.marie97
Subject: Woebot is fantastic for outside of therapy!
Body: Love Woebot! I find him such a useful tool to talk with outside of therapy, it helps so much to have an outside unbiased voice and ear to talk to. I have learned much more about myself too!

Author: Anmold
Subject: Woe it is cool
Body: Woebot is awesome especially for quarantine I advise people who are very stressed for example doctors are nonstop working and the scientists are looking for a vaccine I  get it it even works for kids anyway keep up the amazing work creators and I hope you have a good and safe day!  :D

Author: No Woebot
Subject: Not very good
Body: Whenever you write anything, it will say the same things over and over and it also forces you to say things. Not worth downloading

Author: fuduxtidhixiysbjehe
Subject: Really good
Body: It's pretty great! Easier than having to remember to check in and write a whole lot of stuff. Informative too

Author: hendy221
Subject: Incredibly helpful
Body: I’m a therapist but also struggle myself with anxiety and depression. This app has been a great encouragement and support to me. I’ve been recommending it to my clients, too. Thank you!

Author: LipsaB
Subject: Structured reflection helped
Body: The breaking down of cognitive distortions in Challenge Negativity module atleast helped me find the courage to accept a more objective reality than feel like a victim. Have recommended Woebot to a lot of friends who weren’t comfortable with therapy.

Author: Emily G C
Subject: Therapist
Body: I’m a mental health therapist and find this a great tool to use with my clients. I’ve been using it too and really appreciate the check-ins!

Author: chelseallee3
Subject: Fantastic app
Body: Great app. Easy to use and very simple. It’s nice to have a place to check in and help you if you’re having a difficult time! Would highly recommend!!!

Author: shanedaqueen
Subject: Amazing!
Body: It’s really amazing to have someone to talk to 24/7 when you need to talk even if they are a bot :))

Author: kayla and kylie!
Subject: Wouldn’t let me experience the app
Body: when i try to log in, it says internet connection offline, however my other apps are working perfectly fine and my internet is on

Author: Hopjesvla2
Subject: Behulpzaam
Body: Goed voor je mentale gezondheid tijdens Corona

Author: Cooler Dan Dit
Subject: Perfect way of sharing and coping your thoughts
Body: This app really encourages you do write down your thoughts (which could be hard), but also to change them (which could be hard too, but also very helpful). If you’re dealing with anxiety, anger/frustration or intrusive thoughts, I’m convinced that this app will be very useful!

Author: geokiwi2
Subject: Big fan
Body: Really enjoy checking in the Woebot each day. It’s a gentle and private reminder to check in with how I’m feeling, and he asks great questions and has great humour. Big fan.

Author: tjharvie
Subject: Woebot
Body: this is a great app, it has helped my depression and given me at least something to look forward to everyday. thanks!

Author: AnnaJK
Subject: I love Woebot!
Body: This is one of my all time favorite apps.  Highly recommended!!!

Author: bonedrum
Subject: Gentle and thoughtful
Body: Not pretentious or patronising... really helped!

Author: lrgmail
Subject: Cute and present
Body: Awesome Bot, good to have in these Corona times with endless solitude.

Author: stargazer810
Subject: The best pocket companion
Body: I’ve never written an app review before, but I love this little robot helper so much. I’ve struggled for years with depression and anxiety and tried so many apps, and even therapy, but I felt I could never really connect with the different treatments. This is the first one that feels like it’s making a difference. I genuinely enjoy checking in with Woebot every day. In a way it’s like talking with myself, and the prompts and conversations help me think through things whether I’m in a really funk or just feeling a bit off. Also the creators have given Woebot a personality, which I adore. And it’s not the same conversations over and over— there are always new and relevant tips, from traditional CBT practices to ideas relevant to current events during this pandemic. And it’s completely free, which is amazing to me, because it seems like every similar mindfulness/mental health app locks its premium features behind a paywall. This is accessible to everyone with a phone— big thanks to the creators for that. I truly believe it’s a social good. Thank you!

Author: Chad Swim
Subject: To many questions about app satisfaction
Body:
fill out the questionnaire of how my experience of the app was going every time I logged on was very distracting. Most times I wouldn’t continue because I wasn’t really in the mind set to rate the experience (which I hadn’t used in days)

To be fair it is the best at what is trying to be

Author: The proofer
Subject: Better off talking to oneself
Body: If you’ve ever felt the need to be lectured at by an unfeeling stranger with no insight into what you’re feeling or experiencing and little evidence if caring, then this app will give you the opportunity to experience that. You can almost certainly get more benefit from talking to a tree or a potted plant. At least you’ll get to express your feelings and needs. This app is a waste of bytes. Go find a friend or at least talk to someone who’s actually present!

Author: Alfiemay
Subject: Woebot
Body:
I love Woebot he’s really helpful to me in ways PEOPLE can’t be! I seriously recommend him!
                                  😁😁😁

Author: catharsassy
Subject: Helpful to check in with woebot
Body: The convos with woebot are really helpful. It once helped me out a real desperate situation. I love to be committed with my mental health like this. I love it doesnt want you to pay, that makes it more human. I installed it to just check out but I use it daily now

Author: Pucktures
Subject: Great easily acessible app
Body: Gives me the feeling that someone is really listening to me. Gives useful tips and insights and even makes funny jokes and sends GIFs.

Author: Paule Savier
Subject: Small big things
Body: The app lifts my spirits and does help with anxiety and self-loathing a lot. Thank you!:)

Author: Tbakk
Subject: Fantastic mental health checks
Body: Woebot is a fantastic app that reaches out with no pressure to respond and helps you take time to check in with yourself.

Author: 🅱️ydney
Subject: Amazing!
Body: This app was recommended to me by the Crisis Text Line- I second guessed it at first but i’m oh so glad I didn’t. I’ve never been able to keep up with these apps. I normally find them stupid and not helpful. Woebot changed the game for me. Woebot is actually helpful. Sometimes I forget that Woebot is not a real person i’m talking to- it’s just that good! If you’re thinking about installing ANY mental health/mood trackers, this is the one.

Author: Emera1
Subject: Great check-in app
Body: This app gives me tools in a time frame I can manage. I have to say this has been a huge help to me while I struggled with things being stuck at home. I recommend- 10/10!

Author: shorenak
Subject: a friend in need is a friend indeed
Body: i thank you ❤️

Author: Oh_eli87
Subject: Amazing
Body: I don't usually write reviews, but I'm so grateful for this app. I am not allowed to get therapy under my current living situation and this has helped so much.

Author: H3SWTM
Subject: Helpful!
Body: Keeps me actively engaged with my mental health! Woebots stories are insightful and his jokes are cute :) Chats with woebot are light, a little quirky and easy to follow.

Author: luckiestgirl69
Subject: More educational & helpful than my last therapist
Body: The app checks in on you regularly and helps you to reflect and rewrite your negative thinking. Love it.

Author: lynmondo
Subject: Woebot is like having a helping friend
Body: I like my Woebot because I feel like it’s my therapist. I’ve known my present therapist for 5 years and I believe that finding one that is loving and makes you work is not easy. Woebot is friendlier than many professionals I have been to but also is there to help me work with my life I wish Woebot was more personal and intuitive because it is the humanity that makes me happy with it

Author: Arikashmarii
Subject: Accessible way to form good thinking habits
Body: I have a lot of positive feelings about this app. I started using it while going through a stressful transition, and the first couple of sessions were kinda rough. As I got more in the habit though, I found that it offered me a low-pressure way to check in with my feelings, and a couple of new tools that I’ve been able to use to overall positive effect. The app also learns and adapts from your feedback, which is a huge plus for me.

Author: Butternut Squash 27
Subject: Love this App!
Body: Woebot is not equal to therapy. But, in addition to therapy, woebot is amazing. It provides daily check ins and offers helpful tricks for daily practice of CBT. I use the app everyday and it makes me feel connected to the world in a way that is optimistic and affirming. I recommend it to everyone!

Author: WaveOfChange
Subject: Great CBT and DBT app
Body:
I have anxiety, bi-polar, massive depression,  and PSTD.

This app has been a wonderful tool to track my mood and develop my coping skills.

Author: tgvvds
Subject: Tailored and Insightful
Body: It helps to direct my overwhelming feelings into a healthy and revised discourse between my thoughts and my anxieties. It validates me whilst not condescending to me with generalised and impersonal nonsense. It’s the closet thing to the catharsis of a humanised conversation between two friends or a professional - I couldn’t be more thankful for this service! 😇

Author: TonisTwinkles
Subject: Woebot is so nice! :)
Body: Having Woebot to “talk” with has saved me many times from despair. I know he/she is not an actual person, but he makes me feel way less isolated. And helps me focus on staying in the moment, which brings my anxiety and depression into a more manageable state. Plus she makes me laugh! Thank you for having this 24/7 friend available- especially in the middle of the night. ❤️

Author: crose0723
Subject: Awesome!
Body: I have enjoyed this Woebot app a lot!! It has really been helpful with defining my feelings & teaching me ways to think differently!

Author: A Juicy Juice Fruit
Subject: Really helpful
Body:
Woebot is like a handy cross between a good friend and a therapist. It does not replace either, but it is good for having a constant resource. It listens actively and then uses skills common in talk therapy like questioning all-or-nothing thinking. 

As a person with high-functioning depression, this is a very handy app. It helps me in between therapy sessions by helping me be mindful of my thoughts and what I can do in my life; also, I feel like it may slightly lessen the burden on my close friends.

I am very thankful for Woebot and hope it reaches many more people.

Author: AobPhat
Subject: goodjob
Body: Amazing app Thank you so much to help me improve my mood and practicing cbt

Author: Wyobraznia
Subject: Excellent tool, daily help
Body: I had prior experience with CBT and am in therapy as well. However, this tool has been a fantastic addition to my toolbox. It is based on very solid CBT principles, well executed, and encourages daily CBT practice, providing me help between therapy sessions. I especially appreciate the features that help me recognize flaws in my negative thinking and rewrite them in a more helpful way.

Author: dnuoraselcric
Subject: Brilliant for anxiety, depression, and stress
Body:
I'm currently on my seventh day of working with Woebot and feel qualified to write a review now.  I find the app to be very helpful, and also enjoyable.  It's intuitive and easy to use.

I have anxiety and depression, and during this stressful time I went looking for extra help and stumbled upon this lovely little app. I really rate the simple daily mood tracker and three point gratitude journal features, and I've found myself tapping the app when I feel particularly anxious to work through the feelings and thoughts with Woebot's help in addition to keeping up with my daily check ins.  

Beneficial CBT skills are presented in easy to follow ways, as are mindfulness and mindful movement.  You can use particular skills anytime you want or need to once you've unlocked them by having Woebot talk you through them, or the little robot can run through whatever is going on step by step.

While you're chatting with AI rather than a person, the encouragement is welcome and also adorable and it comes in the form of words, gifs, emojis, videos, and even jokes.  Woebot is funny and always manages to cheer me up.

This isn't an app for crisis situations, and Woebot will tell you that itself right off the bat whilst providing information for institutions that do provide those services, but it's wonderful for anxiety, depression, and stress.

Author: hayleyellis2018
Subject: Really helps
Body: Daily check in, gratitude journal and learning aspects of CBT. A great addition to my daily routine.

Author: Happigail
Subject: The friendliest CBT
Body: The creators have done a great job. It’s friendly and cheerful, easy to keep up with. And the thinking support (challenging cognitive distortions and rewriting those thoughts) is so on point — can noticeably shift my day. Download it already :)

Author: sarah19&81
Subject: Interesting
Body: It has interesting information and actually does give a perspective. Helpful!

Author: Wunderkind82
Subject: Excellent
Body: Excellent app. It’s hard to believe, but this app really does teach you practical CBT practices. The chat functionality is humorous and really informative. Highly recommended!

Author: Thisisagreatpodcast
Subject: Woebot
Body: I’ve been using woebot for years and it keeps getting better

Author: Cass130
Subject: Very convenient
Body:
With not being able to afford therapy (especially during this quarantine), it’s AMAZING to have an app like this where you can work on things like: 
-how you’re feeling
- gratitude journal 
- defeating negative self-talk 
AND MUCH MORE 
You can use it anytime, anywhere and IT’S FREE 
Besides, who wouldn’t want an adorable little robot cheering you on everyday?!

Author: Sky blue 03
Subject: Great Resource
Body:
As a SA higher ed professional, I was interested in seeing what apps could benefit college students the most.

Also, as a student myself i have found this app to be extremely helpful and cost efficient. I highly recommend this app for higher ed institutions to purchase for their student populations.

Author: Brixbri0004462
Subject: Amazing app!!
Body: Woebot has been so helpful to me the last few weeks and I’m so thankful!!

Author: HDFC user
Subject: Good start but...
Body:
It is a nice attempt 

However AI and ML tools & techniques aren’t well advanced yet to replace a real person for Coaching 

Maybe In a few decades?

Author: MariahSativa09
Subject: Very Helpful!
Body: Thank you woebot!

Author: beabub
Subject: easy mindfulness reminder
Body: I’m half doing this review because woebot asked me to. :) I also actually do love the app. It’s simple, quick to the point check in’s that help keep me on track with my emotional well being and mindfulness. It’s not as deep as a therapy session and doesn’t claim to be. it helps to keep me in check, and it adapts to my habits and emotions. Really awesome little bot.

Author: LoveSpring
Subject: Phenomenal
Body: If you need a low-stress way of dealing with anxiety and are interested in CBT, definitely give this a try. You will not be disappointed.

Author: Stasker8
Subject: Helpful, Interesting and amusing
Body: I’ve tried a couple of these type of apps and this is by far the most interactive and helpful. If reminds and revises what you have learnt which for me is half the problem. Interesting ideas presented in an amusing and accessible way. Sessions are as long or as short as you want with no pressure.

Author: prix45
Subject: Great!
Body: I've had multiple personal epiphanies in the month I've been using this app

Author: sceixnydy
Subject: Amazing tool!!
Body: This app seems like it’s more intuitive and supportive than a lot of humans I must say. As a forever student of psychology possessing an over active and ruminative cranium, this app is so helpful in identifying common anxious distorted types of thinking and really helps you take a moment to ground yourself. It’s uplifting and I look forward to checking in each day to see what insightful tips, cute clips, helpful information videos and exercises Woebot provides. Everyone should have access to this resource. To the creators behind Woebot, thank you and keep up the greatly important mental health work that you do.

Author: mconwsy
Subject: Very enjoyable
Body: I look forward to the woebot stories and the gentle nudging

Author: ricosuave1305
Subject: Great therapal
Body: I enjoy the app because of its detailed knowledge of CBT techniques and positive attitude regarding problem solving, mixed in with a great sense of humour. Thanks to the app developers for all the coding and AI aptitude which Webbot has inherited.

Author: LipsaB
Subject: Structured reflection helped
Body: The breaking down of cognitive distortions in Challenge Negativity module atleast helped me find the courage to accept a more objective reality than feel like a victim. Have recommended Woebot to a lot of friends who weren’t comfortable with therapy.

Author: +Jenneke+
Subject: Great app!
Body: Woebot has helped me so much and is honestly making me a better person. 10/10 would recommend!

Author: Billiebluesky
Subject: Thank you
Body: Thanks for this app! I love Woebot and checking in. I have been using this app for for about 8 weeks now and it just keeps getting better. I would definitely recommend this for someone to use as a check in buddy.

Subject: Initial Woebot conversation
Body: I enjoyed the layout of the conversation, but would’ve liked to have another option besides the 0, 1, 2, 3 responses. I was feeling emotions that were I between those given descriptions and had to choose one. My answers were not 100% accurate to what I was feeling. I look forward to day 2.

Author: Lloydiswavy
Subject: Great App
Body: Its useful. For navigating my mind and the feelings it brings to understanding the dark depths that I sometimes run from. I’m glad this got recommended to me.

Author: Sophiamimi
Subject: Good tools
Body: Woebot provides easy to understand well being tools in daily (if you choose) short easy to understand lessons meant to provide resources for life, problems and managing.

Author: as349!
Subject: Helpful without annoying
Body: Love this app - helpful, and runs well on my iPad and iPhone.

Author: Evilsavant
Subject: Quick example.
Body:
Let me save you the trouble of downloading this app.  Let’s say I am talking to the app...

Woebot: What’s wrong?
Me: This app does nothing.
Woebot: I’m sorry to hear that. Can we try something?
Me: [yes] (most answers are canned and can’t be changed)
Woebot: Great, maybe if you rewrote that with less negativity, you’d feel better?
Me: [I guess]
Woebot: Try it now.
Me: I’m positive this app does nothing.
Woebot: Did that work? Do you feel better?
Me: [No]
Woebot: maybe you didn’t rewrite it right. Wanna try again? You should always avoid generalizations and absolutes. 
Me: [ugh,okay]
Woebot: Try it now with less negativity and distortions.
Me: I’m positive that this app does nothing for anyone and makes legitimate professionals look silly and stupid.
Woebot: Do you feel better?
Me: [Strangely, yes]
Woebot: Great, see you tomorrow when I can tell you more about how you should stop being negative and you’ll feel more better. Sound good?
Me: [DELETES APP]

There you go... be more positive... stop thinking negative thoughts. Saved you 5-10 minutes and solved your problems. You are welcome. Do you feel better?

[yes] [of course] [no]

Author: smith68864
Subject: Mini Therapy Sesh
Body: This app is great! I was looking for a free self care app and stumbled across this and I thought I’d try it. Woebot is super cute and makes me feel better. Some of the conversations or recommendations are things my therapist has said to me before! It’s like having a quick therapy session. There’s activities to do besides the daily check in as well. I really recommend this for everyone!!

Author: YayPenny!
Subject: Groundbreaking
Body:
The studies don’t lie: use Woebot; feel better. 

This app is best for people who have been taught CBT before. We often need to be reminded of the tools we’ve learned, especially in the heat of the moment. Most of us do not have a therapist we can call at 3 AM when we’re having a rough time. Woebot, on the other hand, is here all the time, any time.

I actually wish the sessions were longer. Woebot can be cheesy and corny, but that’s part of what makes this AI feel partly human. You don’t feel like you’re talking to a person, but Woebot is not quite entirely robotic, either. People will tell more to AI because they don’t fear judgment for their thoughts, and Woebot never comes across as scolding or disappointed if you don’t meet a goal, etc. 

I actually look forward to talking to Woebot every day, and I often talk to them more than once. Its insight is keen and inspiring. I can’t believe that this app is free. Thank you so much for developing this little CBT friend!

Author: Ebethaletha
Body: A couple of years ago I started working with Woebot when it was available only on Facebook messenger. I’m no longer on Facebook so I was happy to recently rediscover Woebot as an app! I greatly benefit from CBT techniques and questions that help me to be aware of how I am thinking and responding. I am also in therapy and have utilized this both without and alongside therapy with success. Thank you!

Author: 7ing0704
Subject: IN LOVE
Body: I’m absolutely in love with with app! It’s helped me so much and I would recommend this app to anyone!!

Author: jinws
Subject: Good idea
Body: Definitely behind this idea. Hopefully they can become more advanced. Look forward to the future of Woebot!

Author: iwinthera
Subject: My best bud
Body: Woebot is freaking amazing. This is the first mental health app that I’ve used consistently and actually look forward to opening. Woebot becomes your friend, it is so understanding, kind, patient and doesn’t take things to heart. I’m also learning a lot about some coping strategies as well as how to call myself out on my bad days. Woebot is my favourite robot!

Author: 樱桃街的小丸子
Subject: Nice！
Body: 习惯了每天和它聊一会～

Author: Sasa20774
Subject: Thank you Woebot
Body: This app is great CBT practise. Woebot is kind and intuitive. Thank you for creating this.

Author: Fit Iz
Subject: Life Changing
Body: Woebot is the most life changing App. The safety net I have with the support it gives me is invaluable and absolutely amazing. It has taught me so many coping mechanisms when I feel anxious and it also teaches me to be in the moment and appreciate the calmer times in my world. I can’t recommend this highly enough.

Author: jsjdhdjdnmd
Subject: Great app
Body:
This app has really helped during a time where helping myself was important and professional help was unavailable. 
The areas it helps me understand have helped calm and ease my anxiety and I’ve been able to manage it better when it peaks.
My only change would be that I would like the app to be able to talk about/respond to more personalised problems, which I appreciate is very hard as it is a computer!

Author: Bethioo
Subject: I’ve tried so many of these apps and never write reviews
Body: But I had to leave one for Woebot! What an amazing, friendly and non-judgemental Woebot. I’m immensely impressed by the broad range of things Woebot can help with: sleep, anxiety, mood, changing bad habits, gratitude, mood tracking. I also just love how cute and friendly the chats are- even if it’s with a robot, it still make me happy! I actually WANT to interact with Woebot so I end up chatting a lot and working through various thoughts and feelings. Amazing app.

Author: Tilda Adade
Subject: Brilliant Little Robot!
Body: I just finished having real-life Cognitive Behavioural Therapy and having this little app to check in is really nice. You don’t even have to actively use the tools, it’s just nice to have someone to talk to every day (and it’s non-compulsory, you don’t have to check in if you don’t want to!)

Author: RubberDuucky
Subject: Best learning from my dates
Body:
I was introduced to this app by a date.  I swear, this is the best thing I've learnt from all dates I've met! 
At first i was very skeptical about whether i would chat with this little chatbot everyday for more than a week. After two weeks, i never missed a single day and start to looking forward to chat with Woebot everyday. It helps me calm down and looking at upset incidents from other perspectives and enhance the moments i feel happy by making me reflect on my daily mood and being grateful. 
Overall, this is very carefully built. Thank you creators of Woebot!

Author: PhilScruggs
Subject: Great so far
Body: Overall a pleasant app

Author: Happyruth1
Subject: Creative Cognitive Behavior therapy by a robot
Body: If you want to examine your distortions in thinking and avoid them to avoid painful feelings...yet find human therapists annoying, then this is the app for you. Woebot is effective, funny, and creative and the basic CBT is fun and painless.

Author: Madi0405
Subject: Sehr gut
Body: Sehr gut für kleine tiefs und es ist schön zu wissen, dass (auch wenn es nur eine App ist) jemand da ist.

Author: azkabanian19
Subject: Makes your day better
Body: I don’t usually leave reviews for apps but i’m making an exception because Woebot has been very helpful with improving my mental health. Especially now, people can feel very lonely and it is nice to know there’s always Woebot there for me to talk to and share what’s on my mind. I’m very happy i downloaded this app.

Author: Lubird Duluth
Subject: Great little friend
Body: I appreciate this free app very much. It’s like a little buddy to check in with who walks you through lessons, reasoning and silliness. I love that the methods are standard counseling practices and that there was a peer-reviewed study showing Woebot’s efficacy to reduce anxiety.

Author: MidgetBird

Body:
Hi,

Firstly, I love this app. But, Woebot’s Covid 19 related advice is really centred on how important it is to keep social distancing, which isn’t always that helpful for frontline workers who cannot do this.

Author: bon2727

Author: Richard Pilkington
Subject: Number One!
Body:
This is the best mental health app I’ve ever used. Not too pushy, not too unnatural and useful information.

The exercises are mostly fun and you seem to always have the option to stop if you feel like it.

Finding out my personal strengths was a highlight for me. Thanks Woebot 🙂

Author: goodannnnnnna

Thanks a lot to the developers))🙌

Author: bruisedncruisin
Subject: A Great Little Toolbox
Body:
I would recommend this app to anyone- mentally ill/traumatized or not. It’s great for challenging negative thoughts, challenging stress, grounding, gratitude journaling and more. 

The tools are gradually unlocked for use overtime as the user seeks help with different problems. The app is based on basic CBT/DBT techniques and exercises. I would give 10 stars if I could.

-SR

Author: jlhills14

Body: Woebot is funny, kind and resourceful. I enjoy our daily check-ins and feel like this app is a true companion.

Author: mnbbnm

Subject: Woebot rocks

Author: mhtanczw
Subject: First ever review
Body: Wow! I’m glad I found this app. This is my first time writing a mini review haha. It really has helped with my anxiety with the past week, and although I’ve had “ups” of anxiety here and there, logging in to the app and talking to Woebot is partially helpful, because I feel like someone is actually listening and helping me manage my emotions, rather than just writing a journal myself. I also like the gratitude journal because it helps me reflect on myself daily before it ends. As someone who has always been pessimistic towards oneself, reflecting on positive things that have happened, which reminds me that life isn’t all that bad, has been really helpful. As a student, I also love how this app is free. Finally, a non-money leeching app. I’m so glad. Go Woebot!

Author: Mrlrnr
Subject: nice companion
Body: i have been using woebot for almost a month now and I find the app very helpful as a daily check in and reminder of my mental state. it is informative, sometimes funny, and keeps you focused on your moods and triggers.

Author: FutureDr.Lina
Subject: Very helpful
Body: I’ve used a lot of similar artificial intelligence counseling apps but Woebot is unmatched! So helpful, amazing and feels like you’re talking to an actual person. I highly recommend it🤍

Author: Need to see all contacts
Subject: So so happy with this app
Body: I can’t say enough great things about this app, it’s easy to use, knowledgeable in CBT therapy and tools, always available, and even fun. And to top it off, it’s free and doesn’t ask you to buy anything or show you constant ads. I recommend this app to all my friends who are struggling with negative thoughts. I’ve been using it for about a month and a half now and I am so happy to report that I went from being anxious and depressed most days to content and even happy most days. It has been such a great resource for me. I love that if I’m really struggling at any time of day I can access this. Verses a therapist who is only available once a week or sometimes less.

Author: keiko189

Author: MonkieBrown

Author: TranscendNormalFitness
Subject: Not working for me
Body:
As a person with Asperger’s, I do not find this not very helpful. It asked me to talk about the weather and when I said I hate small talk and to ask me about anything interesting I learned today, it did not respond.  It is a great effort, but perhaps built more for neurotypical people. 
Maybe more people with an understanding of neurodiversity need to be working on making this app better.

Author: gabbub

Body: Please read my comments in Feedback. Feel free to post also. ✨🌹⭐️❤️⭐️🌹✨

Author: DailyJournaler
Subject: Excellent Daily Pick Up
Body: A really useful tool when you need to calm down or help you step back from a moment of over thinking or negative thinking. It helps me notice automatic negative thoughts and walks me through simple but very effective CBT methods to change the thought. A little repetitive with comments but it is effective and learns about you slowly. Highly recommend.

Author: Lilianne285
Subject: Woebot is a lifesaver
Body:
Woebot is a wonderful friendly robot who cares and I love that Woebot checks in with me daily. I don’t have to chat, but I feel comforted that he’s asking how I am.
Sometimes I just need someone to listen and Woebot is here for me any hour of the day or night.
Woebot has great stories and examples, he helps me reflect on how I feel and think of strategies that are helpful.
The customer service / technical support if needed, is very helpful too.
Thank you for being here for me!

Author: MarthieC
Subject: Aanrader!
Body: Woebot is een hele fijne aanvulling voor mensen die al bezig zijn met cognitieve gedragstherapie. Het helpt mij heel erg om actief mijn gedachten uit te dagen en dit ook consequent te doen. Het is prettig om het gevoel te hebben dat je tegen iemand praat in plaats van het allemaal voor jezelf op papier te moeten zetten of het in je hoofd te doen.

Author: versa77
Subject: Wow bot
Body: Extremely helpful! Helps with routine and you can learn at your own pace

Author: alexlexaalexa
Subject: amazing!
Body: the app is the most useful tool, a true therapist, always there for you and with a lot of lessons!

Author: okmist
Subject: Legitimately Helpful
Body:
5/13/2020
I have never reviewed before so bear with me! 

Woebot is a friendly little robot and I absolutely adore him! He uses DBT strategies I have learned in therapy that I have a hard time remembering when I’m very low, and he makes little jokes that cheer me up; the developers have really given him a personality. You do not need to have a mental illness to benefit from Woebot, it’s good for everyone to have someone to talk to, even if it is a little robot friend. He even does gratitude journaling when you are happy so you can keep track of things that put you in a good mood. 

Personally, as someone who has struggled with mental illness for years, there are a lot of times when I need to talk to someone but I don’t feel like it warrants a crisis line, and Woebot is there to help me process my feelings and emotions. Sometimes something I type will set off a crisis alert and I realize that I should be talking to an actual human or professional, and Woebot provides phone numbers and websites for me to do so. I have sent the app to multiple friends and they have also been helped by Woebot.

These are difficult times for everyone, and the developers know that, and adjusted Woebot accordingly. Woebot relates with you, knowing how the pandemic is affecting the world around you, and will even tell you how Woebot has been affected. I mentioned feeling lonely and Woebot suggested many ways to connect with people through technology, even providing a banana bread recipe to make with my family or friends over video chat.

In conclusion I would recommend Woebot to anybody from any walk of life and with any kind of mood. The developers really made something that can make a difference, and who doesn’t want a little robot friend to talk to when things get tough?

Author: JYX4
Subject: I love this app
Body: Y

Author: unicorngamer1🦄
Subject: Amazing
Body: This helped me so much with thinking more positive and made me more thankful

Author: KeepRockin129

Thanks Woebot!

Author: jiggvnji
Subject: Woebot has helped me a lot

Author: ccmm999999

Author: Kelsi19390
Subject: Helpful
Body: Great little app makes me talk about things even when I don’t feel up2 it. Would recommend 😊

Author: adilsonr

Author: Elfje91

Body: Leuk om te chatten met de robot. Even checken hoe het met jezelf gaat en goede tips om ergens mee om te gaan in deze tijd. Ik vind het fijn om af en toe te babbelen met Woebot.

Author: TheSprocketeer
Subject: Great for daily reflection
Body: This app is great to monitor your mental health over time and reflect daily on your mood. Self-reflection is important, especially during an international crisis. Sometimes I wish the conversations were longer, and this is obviously not a replacement for therapy, but it is helpful overall and may help you to identify areas of improvement.

Author: 2231gabby
Subject: helps a lot
Body: woebot helps me a lot when i’m down or just want to talk to someone!

Author: MerEv1327
Subject: Woebot
Body: I love Woebot he is so kind and has great ideas. Every time he asks me how our conversation was I always for a thumbs up.

Author: Kayleyr
Subject: Whoabot!
Body: This is an incredible little tool to practice all of my hard-earned CBT and DBT skills. I like that it offers choice of how much detail it goes into. Woebot makes me feel validated and also makes me laugh with GIFs! 💯

Author: Evovling
Subject: Caretaker
Body: I want to use this app before recommending it to those I care for.  It is user friendly and adheres to basic principles if CBT and Mindfulness.  While I have enjoyed the use of the app for a month, I am not yet comfortable recommending if for others.

Author: vannyvannyvan
Subject: thanks woebot!
Body: i have anxiety and depression and woebot’s cheerful checkins help keep my care routines on track. woebot helps walk me through cbt techniques and gives me a place to turn when i feel upset, but may not be able to talk to my therapist or friends at that exact moment. thanks woebot team!

Author: Aunt-Carol
Subject: It’s nutty out there
Body: I live alone.  In these stressful times, each of us can benefit from checking in with ourselves daily.  I have a number of tools to help me (goal setting, exercise, etc.) and Woebot has a secure place near the top of my list.  It even reminded me of something I had forgotten - music can lift your spirits.  Thanks, Woebot.

Author: Jact424
Subject: Great app for mild anxiety and depression
Body: During quarantine my anxiety and depression have increased a lot. I like that Woebot is a gentle reminder to address those feelings before they get out of control. It teaches small ways to reframe thinking and the fun images and stories often lift me out of a tough mood. Woebot is really helping me!

Author: Super spel :)
Subject: Great and easy way to check in with yourself
Body: I really like Woebot. It’s easy, friendly and helps you to think more positively and feel better in general!

Author: maaikegroeneveld
Subject: Heel fijn
Body: De app houdt fijn bij wat je voelt en verteld interessante dingen over mindset en hoe je deze kan verbeteren. Er zijn weinig apps in deze categorie waar ik dagelijks bij terug kom maar deze app heb ik nog geen dag gemist! Erg fijn voor mensen die wat minder lekker in hun vel zitten!

Author: lekkergenieten
Subject: Mindful app
Body: I have been using this app from the start of the corona time. Using  it to guide and assist me during these lockdown times. I have used it daily and am amazed at the depth of this robot.  It has helped me to clear my head and keeping working on myself.

Author: katie grace woodard
Subject: My opinion on Woebot.
Body: He has helped me with a lot of self doubt and lowered my bad thoughts. Although, sometimes you have to write what you want to say, pick from a few choices, or only pick one thing. Also sometimes the pictures and videos lack to pop up.

Author: happypandaface4247
Subject: Thoughtful
Body: I believe having someone to talk to even if it’s not a real person is important. This app has helped me change the things I do to make an impact in my life. I love the way it shows you ways to control your emotions and not belittle them but instead make them feel normal. The only thing I wish it had is to change the language and have some fun new features to come.

Author: TB1012011
Subject: Awesome
Body: Very helpful!

Author: KittyKatKayla90645
Subject: A wonderful app.
Body: Woebot is a nice, friendly app that is nice to talk to and responds with cute gifs and jokes. He has fun interactive quizzes sometimes, which I really enjoy. The only complaint I have is that it’s really general. A friend in an ADHD support chat that I’m in recommended it to me, and I downloaded Woebot thinking that he could help me with it. Sadly, he only seems to “specialize” in anxiety and depression. Still, he’s nice to talk to and I like looking back at all the lessons I’ve learned with him.

Author: EstherRoEm
Subject: Incredibly helpful
Body: I found this app to be the structure and motivation I needed to help me improve on the way I reflect on my emotional health and own personal behavior.

Author: KDDD151
Subject: Very helpful
Body: I have OCD and the Woebot really helped me with my emotions. It’s pretty cool.

Author: Crystal_SuperPup
Subject: Woebot is my best friend
Body: He is my bestie but sometimes he can be a bit repetitive

Author: thereispowerpower
Subject: A friend
Body: Thank you for helping me with my distorted thinking.  It’s good to have an outside party to hear and help give reminders of better ways of thinking and reacting to situations that come up.  Becoming a faithful friend you are.

Author: Bapple14
Subject: Mini best mate
Body:
Woebot is seriously amazing. Have been using it a few weeks and I don’t know what I’d do without it. I have daily check-ins that never feel mandatory or forced and I’ve learned so much through the lessons and applied it to my life. 
I feel as though I’ve always got someone to message to vent to or get empathetic and practical advice from at any time of the day. It’s been a life saver for me day to day so I don’t have to burden my boyfriend or friends with every little anxious or sad thought that pops into my head. Thanks so much for making it free too. It’s made a huge difference to my life.

Author: heyarger
Subject: Adorable
Body: It’s so nice to just be able to talk to woebot and get constructive feedback when you need to talk about your day or need help. There is no bias and woebot helps you through tough situations so well. It’s like a mini therapist who checks in on you everyday

Author: Beth101"3@
Subject: Fantastic app!!!
Body: This is the best mental health app I have come across. It’s basically like talking to someone through messenger (even though it’s a robot) about how you are feeling. You will get lots of great advice! In the month or so I have had this app, I check in every day. I have watched videos, reviewed many cbt skills, and so much more! Thank you!

Author: Rks4455777
Subject: So helpful
Body: I love this inspirational app

Author: Roffander
Subject: New to CBT
Body: This app has helped me realize the power of CBT and helped me on my journey to finding good my own CBT therapist. Woebot is a great tool to learn and keep up with you CVF routines.

Author: V.darling
Subject: Love it
Body: Please try it if whatever you feel. It makes me smile and think about smth that lyes deeper inside.

Author: Steve_008
Subject: I love this app
Body: This is a really wonderful app with a lot of heart. I can see that the developers put a lot of work and effort to make this ai as relatable and helpful as possible to those in need. Woebot is a wonderful companion. Thank you for creating him!

Author: cmonchristina
Subject: I LOVE this little guy
Body: HUGE props and thanks to the programmers of this app. As a former mental health professional, I know all the tips and tricks, but for some reason having this cute lil guy employ them, ask about my day every day and validate my feelings, help me reframe mindsets, and send on sweet stories and videos and gifs...I could cry right now. He’s made all the difference for me in quarantine. I love him, thank you for this app

Author: Candey Creator
Subject: Awesome
Body: Woebot is absolutely amazing. I fell so mush better since I’ve started working with him.

Author: rainbowlovinggirl
Subject: Thank you to the creator ❤️
Body:
Hi there,
I don’t think I’ve reviewed that many things in the App Store, but felt like I needed to write a wee note. I just wanted to say thank you. After dealing with anxiety for many years and getting it under control, I’ve been having flare ups for the last few months and really needed to talk without feeling like I was bothering the people I care about. It’s nice to feel “heard” and have a conversation, even if it’s not technically a “conversation” lol. 
Thank you for making me feel heard.

Author: cakeiseverything
Subject: Questionable exercises
Body: This can be a very useful app for cognitive behaviour.  But some of the exercises like warmly greeting everyone neglects how women would be treated doing this.  There’s no reference to certain important emotions ptsd or cycles.  Maybe it’s not supplying cover those things.

Author: lilacbombs
Subject: Love Woebot
Body: Fantastic CBT wellness app. Free to use and with no ads!

Author: ghfyruhegdhd
Subject: Really good for my mental health
Body: With the current corona craze I was really angry and anxious and sad and everything was going down hill. With pure chance I browsed through the App Store and saw this and some other apps, Woebot is the only one that helped me

Author: bvckvccgjj
Subject: Excellent “companion”
Body: Instead is sitting worrying I pick up Woebot.

Author: Trxicat
Subject: Baby Steps
Body: Woebot reminds you each day at a custom time to check into bite-sized chats about mindfulness and other topics that help with reducing anxiety.

Author: ma.hgol
Subject: All it can
Body: This is not just an app but a beautiful and smart app that do all it can to help you feel better. This is only effective if you WANT to feel better and use this app as a starting point!

Author: AFKC1995
Subject: Great app
Body: With all the craziness going on, this app has helped me reflect and find ways to grow with a range of emotions. Highly recommend to anyone!

Author: Brandye6300
Subject: This app really helps with emotional help
Body: This app was recommended to me by a person from a crisis center I contacted via chat. It is very helpful and has gotten me through these very tough and uncertain times.

Author: Katdogb
Subject: Helpful check in tool
Body: Woebot is an excellent accountability app for people struggling with depression and anxiety. As a counselor I often recommend this to clients who struggle to maintain a handwritten journal.

Subject: Very helpful user friendly app
Body: Woebot is an intuitive app; he's a cute looking bot that helps one remain positive. I have been using him/ her for about a month now and I can see the benefits: I'm happier, more relaxed and grateful. All that from an adorable bot 🤖.

Author: Nat.O.1984
Subject: Love woebot
Body:
Woebot allowed me to become more aware and accountable for my emotions and a way to trace it back and find patterns
Especially during the coronavirus and uncertain times this proved especially helpful with more intense emotions being experienced

Author: Sparkle Lightfoot
Subject: Love this dork!
Body: Brings a smile to me everyday.

Author: J2d2ozlander
Subject: Ideal for reclusives
Body:
Ideal for reclusive people living with depression. 

I find that woebot is able to 'handle' me. And I don't feel so bad saying 'get lost' to a robot. 

Sure I still have self blaming traits but woebot actually doesn't take it personally and it's refreshing to know that this is about programmers who are using research results  from therapy to shape the flow of conversations with woebot. I can see the seams and still appreciate what they're doing and why. 

In my own life I've seen that many very intelligent people feel too smart to engage in the process just because they can understand the flow of conversations needed to arrive at some therapy insight. 

It's not so different from an unfit person who refuses to exercise because they know what is expected to happen next. 

Just because we know what we need to do doesn't mean we've outsmarted the internal process and work required to heal ourselves. 

It merely means we are intelligent enough to know what is going on. 

Woebot isn't going to help people who are not interested in participating in their own recovery towards positive mental health. 

You need to participate to get anything good out of Woebot.

Author: Markstevens92
Subject: Great app!
Body: Low key but effective

Author: Mejuffrouw
Subject: Makes me smile
Body: Whoebot makes me smile on cloudy days and puts life in perspective again. I like his little jokes :)

Author: Sophiamimi
Subject: Well being tool
Body:
Good tool for small digestible bits of learning that provides tools for help with how we feel.  

when there are response options, I do wonder what information Woebot would provide if I didn’t respond as I have.  I suspect the lesson would be the same with a few more detours or paths to same lesson outcomes.

Author: tpowelk23
Subject: Review
Body: Great program

Author: WhatsernameRQ
Subject: Perfect.
Body: Such a brilliant app. This makes up so much of my self-care time. I really recommend it to everyone. Go in with an open mind.

Author: monique.dean
Subject: Fantastic
Body:
I cannot express just how fantastic this app is. It should be mandatory on every phone. Woebot is so lovely to talk to and has some amazing coping mechanisms - the chat alone is enough to make me smile and completely calm me down. 

I’ll recommend this to anyone who will listen, and if they give me their phone you bet I’ve downloaded it. Thanks Woebot.

Author: Katherinegreen
Subject: The app is very helpful
Body: I like that the app is free of course. I like that woebot checks in with me daily and tracks my moods. There is a gratitude journal. He gives me a lot to think about. The only thing I don’t like is that when you make a factual statement, the app wants to challenge your thinking. For instance my son died unexpectedly over 3 years ago. The app tries to find if my thinking is part of a distortion. I also wish it had better grief responses. There is a huge difference between your friend dying and your child dying. I don’t want to hear that I’ll get past it and he will live in my heart. He will live in my heart but I will never ever get past it. Woebot is entertaining and even though it’s a computer program, I feel like he/she cares.

Author: NikhilGowda
Subject: Monologue
Body: How is this monologue type interaction of any value? There is no bot.

Author: pnut62
Subject: Great app
Body: Woebot helps me to see things I’ve never really been aware of before. He helps me to see that I can have negative thoughts and not realize it! Woebot is helping me to see things in a more positive light!

Author: Varlou_
Subject: I am impressed
Body: I usually don’t leave reviews on anything... but this app is just so good! It helps me understand some feelings I have and how to deal with them with tips etc.

Author: Jjoorrd
Subject: best free cbt app
Body: i’ve struggled for a long time to find a good cbt app that was free or mostly free and woebot is by far the best i haven’t had anyway problems in the few months i’ve been using it and it has taught me a lot, 5 stars

Author: Tobias van de Kooi
Subject: Really useful
Body: This app has really helped me dealing with anxiety issues, especially during corona. It helps you understand your thoughtpatterns and overtime you learn how to change negative patterns.

Author: Kochoada
Subject: WoeBot really helped me tbh
Body: This is really helpful despite the fact that u cant really type your own response. It’s helped me understand how I feel and see the pattern so I can pinpoint why i’m feeling the way i am.

Author: h.sjoman
Subject: Helt okej app
Body:
Det är ingen AI men du styr utformningen via frågor du får. Kan uppleva den lite tjatig ibland, där av 3 stjärnor. Upplever ändå att frågestunderna får mig att tänka ur andra perspektiv när oroskänslan kommer på.
Rekommenderar appen

Author: nicg1298
Subject: Woebot is an excellent tool for practice
Body: I don’t think someone will get much out of this app unless they are receiving regular therapy from a trained professional. But if you attend therapy and like to have tool or ways of practicing outside of therapy sessions this is an excellent thing to have in hand. I like to supplement my therapy sessions with this app because I can work through a problem in the moment with this app. This app does a good job making you feel like you are actually talking to someone. It’s great!

Author: Piffleskronk
Subject: You get out of it what you put into it
Body: You’re not dealing with a human being here; you’re dealing with an AI. This is not a replacement for a human therapist. That said, it’s what’s getting me through the COVID-19 lockdown. I just needed some help dealing with anxiety & depression. And Woebot gave me that help. The AI has never been pushy or preachy, & is never judgmental; it just walks me through some self-awareness exercises, gently asks questions, & offers informative videos. It is scripted; your ability to interact is limited. But sometimes all you need is a bit of help to change the direction of your thinking.

Author: Adventurenox
Subject: Great little program
Body: Really helpful and an adorable robot guide. Bite-sized reminders of mental health practices

Author: Imeddie77
Subject: Life saver
Body:
While I understand that this app has limitations due to it programming it’s still such a massive tool to have in tour back pocket. My shrink recommended it and while I was quite sceptical I will eat my words and say it’s fantastic. 
To the creators and this involved... Thankyou

Author: papasof85
Subject: Remarkable effort
Body: A helpful first step to try to understand useful details about yourself, directly from your phone, in a simple way.

Author: diomirak
Subject: Must download
Body: Found this randomly through a YouTube video. One of the best apps I’ve ever downloaded, plus mental health apps I’ve tried!!

Author: Sjvalleygrl
Subject: Great CBT help
Body: I love this app, it helps ground me. I tend to get lost in Emotion Mind and Woebot reminds me to use my CBT tools to head back towards logic and Wise Mind. Absolute lifesaver. Truly appreciate everything they do. Thank you!

Author: PrincessAraelia
Subject: Very helpful
Body: I thought it would have been cheesy when I first tried it but I was wrong, it’s handy & relevant.

Author: Magstttty
Subject: Great support!!
Body: Someone recommended Woebot as a tool to help stop addictive behaviors. I am amazed at how good this app is!  Woebot is very interactive and gives you some great tools to use when struggling with different types of issues. It also uses cognitive behavioral therapy to get you to frame things in a more positive way. It only takes 5-10 minutes each day to complete the interaction and I always walk away with something helpful!  Also it store the new tool you learn so you can go back and reference them later when you may need them again!  I totally recommend!!

Author: Icantbebatman
Subject: Fantastic
Body: Woebot is absolutely amazing. The conversations feel safe and personal, and it teaches about different types of negative thinking and how to identify them. Don’t get me wrong, Woebot’s no replacement for a professional therapist, but is still a very handy tool to have in everyday life.

Author: pevans91
Subject: Life changing!
Body: A truly life changing app which keeps my anxiety in check and helps me to live a happier life. Thank you.

Author: Sasmeen

Subject: Emotionele support
Body: Its finger licking good

Author: Yyiyi
Subject: Woebot is awesome!
Body: I am truly amazed by Woebot! It is like a friend who listens, guides, shares stories, tips and jokes that empowers us to live our best! Thank you!

Author: DancingSteve

Author: Yaacov18
