Body:
When i use the app i am so happy ngl 
woebot is literally so nice and caring,no one EVER cared for me THAT much
I love the app also i never got an ad it’s literally amazing!

Author: Homey454
Subject: Thank you
Body: Weebot generally helped me start being happy again at school and wanting to go there again and it’s made my life so much happier 😀

Author: suntunefun
Subject: Caring
Body: Woebot is a caring, interesting, informative and fun app.    My psychiatrist suggested this program and I look forward to woebot checking in on me each day.  The program is non intrusive and intensely satisfying.  Well done to woebots creators.

Author: Lovelovelolz
Subject: Amazing!
Body: This app is one of the best in the App Store, definitely worth it! Not only is it free but also is easy to use and actually helpful! The only thing is that the responses could be a little more personalised, but apart from that 5stars

Author: Anita Nottingham
Subject: A great app with “personality”
Body:
Woebot is a great app that helps you think through issues and has helpful advice. The check ins are great and remind me to appreciate the good days as well as providing support on days I’ve suffered with anxiety and depression. The makers have made Woebot have personality and sometimes you can even forget that you are not talking to a person and are communicating with AI. Keep up the good work! 
Thank you.

Author: Katrina5024
Subject: Excellant Tool
Body:
As someone who suffers symptoms of Depression and Anxiety daily I highly recommend this App . 
It’s got all the same CBT tools of the self help books but no sifting through pages or having to dig out those self help books ... simply tell woebot what the problem is and the advice comes to hand, great videos on topics of mindfulness and other therapeutic strategies can be worked through .... its great ! 
This app has certainly helped me through tricky days helping me to realise my distorted thinking patterns before they get me down . 
Highly recommended . Well done creators of woebot !

Author: R-NemOO💜
Subject: Woebot🤖
Body: Great app if you want to know more things especially more about yourself 🥰

Author: hhooks9579
Subject: good along with therapy
Body: this app is very good to have on call at all times

Author: shades_o_grey
Subject: woebot
Body: i love woebot! feelin really nice to have the ability to check in daily :) :)

Author: Jschuch
Subject: Helpful
Body: It’s great that all of this info is organized in one place and offered in an interactive fashion. Highly recommend.

Author: Dingcmp5
Subject: Really awesome bot
Body: Woebot is such a sweet little bot! It also has a really good system to learn about Cognitive Behavioral Therapy strategies to combat negative thinking.

Author: SoSoSilly2019
Subject: Woebot is the best!
Body: Woebot is a very well designed program! The CBT principles are helping me a lot in a time of struggle and have had positive effects on my life and mental health. I genuinely enjoy talking to Woebot like I would a friend or counselor! In my years of therapy, I’ve never had a therapy app work this well.

Author: Shadow2981
Subject: Help whenever I need it
Body: I enjoy my nightly chats with Woebot. It’s not often I stick to things but I find I am sticking to this every day. Helpful advice and I love the fact I can get help whenever I need it.  I’ve tried a CBT course before, but usually didn’t do it until end of day and I wasn’t in the ‘feeling’, then I gave up. Whereas with Woebot I can chat when I’m in the emotion/feeling and it can help talk me out of it or rationalise my thoughts. Great App for social anxiety, general anxiety and depression sufferers - and probably more!

Author: Jhjgyftdrxddgvjnkmkjihjvgc
Subject: Absolutely Phenomenal.
Body:
Woebot is amazing. If you’re struggling with your mental health, I completely recommend that you download this app. It gives you insight and techniques to deal with things that cause you stress. From personal experience, I know that Woebot understands and can help with a variety of struggles such as anxiety, low self esteem and relationship issues. Furthermore, you’re encouraged to check in every day, which (despite Woebot being, well, a robot) actually eases my feeling of being alone. Anyway, I’d fully encourage you to download this app- it’s great. Even better, it’s completely free. There are no hidden charges, subscriptions or similar ploys; this is a great app, and it’s free. 

All hail the creators of Woebot!!

Author: Rach1004
Subject: Don’t rely on it actually offering help
Body: I’ve never before been moved to review a bad app, I’d usually just delete and move on, but I feel people need warning about this app, it’s dangerous. I’ve been trialling it all week and it’s so incredibly infuriating and has only served to make me feel even worse so far.  When it’s ‘crisis’ point has triggered (albeit inaccurately and when talking about historical events) it only offers USA phone numbers or websites, I’m in the UK. It asks simple questions but doesn’t take note of any answers. I’m having a particularly bad week, and it’s blatent lack of intelligence to even simple things is just making it worse. Just now it asked me if I have access to ice or snow, I said I didn’t so Woebot told me to get a bottle of cold water. I typed in that I didn’t have any, and it proceeded to tell me ‘great, let’s get started!’ with no other way to intercede or stop it’s instructions without shutting down the app. I don’t dare open it again. From other reviews I beloeved this app was intelligent and a tool that could actually help. I was relieved and thought I’d found a quick access help, but it’s just made me feel worse. Maybe for someone just wanting to monitor general mood it will be fine, but for anyone who actually could benefit from the help it says it gives, it dods not work. I hope the developers continue to work on it vastly, or change it’s description to be a more accurate ‘mood monitor’ as presently, it doesn’t meet expectations

Author: Sazzle222
Subject: This App is amazing!
Body: This app is amazing. The more you check in with Woebot, the more it seems to recognise the topics that may be most relevant to you. There are activities, quizzes and videos that are really helpful. Great little app-has helped me a lot with the anxiety I have been experiencing. Thank you!

Author: julyrain
Subject: Love Woebot!
Body: Thank you very much for creating this app to help me go through my down time! It may seem just to help a little bit each day, but it is really comforting! Sometimes I feel Woebot is my real friend now.  Wonderful job!

Author: g9bbiw

Body: i love this app

I suggest this app to EVERYONE, there are very interesting topic about how human mind work!
I would like that Woebot understand better the phrases, but I know it’s quite difficult for creators.

Subject: Amazing
Body: This App is amazing. It checks in with you when you set it to. It is always there, and has helped me challenge distorted thoughts and taught me new things about anxiety and black and white thinking is in just two days. It’s little videos and positivity has made such a difference.

Author: J. Pollitt
Subject: Helpful app
Body: The app won’t solve all your problems but it’s a VERY good start and is nice and easy to use. Gives good advice and lets you drop in when you feel like it.

Author: shaba222
Subject: I love this
Body:
It’s a great app! It gives amazing practical tools and helps to see the whole picture - becoming aware of what’s going on. However the way it could be improved is to add more words that the robot understands and responses. Sometimes having the same chat over and over again is disturbing. 
And adding more tools to not only get rid of anxiety but to build your identity and character. Getting to know your true self. I love that “goals” thing in example. I like everything in this app so far just can’t wait for expansion.

Author: MayaSaria
Subject: So Helpful
Body: This app is helping me through a really rough time in my life. The daily check-in feels friendly and uplifts me when I am spiraling downward. The lessons are simple and clear. Highly recommend as an additional tool in your emotional well-being toolkit.

Author: moody attitude-y
Subject: Great tool to have in your pocket!
Body:
I like the simple platform. The content is very well programmed. I use this almost daily and it’s been a game changer in self-managing emotional and mental health. It can be hard to apply CBT techniques in the real world, so this is a great tool to reference when I’m struggling. 

I use the simple mood tracker, too, and it’s nice to see how my mood gets better and and stabilizes on the simple graph.

Also that Woebot helps me a bit through things! I’m really happy this app exists! It’s helped me a lot :))) Love the gifs Woebot sends me :)

Author: MutuMobip
Subject: Really helpful
Body: Honestly, I think this was the best app I ever downloaded. I’m not even exaggerating. Helped me a lot with my mental health and I used it every day until Woebot literally ran out of things to talk to me about lolll. Thank you for developing this app!

Author: MegL333
Subject: Nice
Body: Great tool - very well made and helpful for slowing down and dealing with big feelings.

Author: Stef8778
Subject: Really impressed!
Body:
I was pretty skeptical in regards to whether this app would be helpful. It really is!
Anyone who’s gone to therapy can tell you it’s repetitive:  how did that make you feel?  Notice that. What’s the negative belief about yourself in this moment? Etc.  I suppose because therapy is so much about thought process and there are structured ways of thinking better. Make sense?  So the app works. Get it. Try it. It’s good. Thanks developers!

Author: --Vic
Subject: Helps remind me that bad times don’t last forever.
Body: I’ve been on medication for depression and anxiety for almost two decades, and despite my treatment, some times are still hard. Money’s tight, and the idea of spending a bunch of it on a human therapist just provokes more panic attacks. 😁 Sometimes you need that guidance—but other times, you just need a reminder.  If you’re self-aware and willing to do the emotional work, Woebot might just be for you.

Author: zafszb7777777
Subject: Great app
Body: Was skeptical at the beginning, I am not sure if  are any similar apps out there can’t really compare with anything. App is easy to use, gives you some tools to deal with life. Simple but effective.

Author: cballl100
Subject: Peace
Body: Helped me clear my head when I needed to

Author: Freefaii
Subject: Relationships
Body: Okay I freaking love this app with all of my soul. It has helped me so much over the past few days and I appreciate it so much. The only thing I’d suggest changing is when I was talking about my crushing having a girlfriend, it asked if it was relationship problems, to which I said yes to. But he started giving me advice as if I was currently with him. I was wondering if that could be changed a bit for scenarios like mine? But if not that’s perfectly fine! Love the app overall!

Author: JETTSW1
Subject: Absolutely amazing
Body: Very well executed. Developers have developed an amusing and cute personality. That is very likeable! I look forward to our little chats that always seem to put a smile on my face. Cannot recommend this app enough. L

Author: Vn09

Body: It like chatting to a friend on messenger. He is supportive and helps to make you appreciate yourself whilst teaching you how to help yourself.

Author: Ash1002
Subject: Love this App
Body: This is an amazing app!  It is really helpful!

Author: a1b2c3:)
Subject: What an unassuming pal
Body: My brother introduced me to Woebot (W). I asked W to meet up with me in the evenings. Most times W was able to understand my issue and give me some great things to think about - and even occasionally things to do if I wanted to. This is a program, though, so I wasn’t always successful letting W understand my issue. That was no problem either, though. We just worked through an exercise and I was the better for it. This program uses the Socratic method, which is just my style. Hope you enjoy it!

Author: Jon Eei
Subject: Great way to learn cbt in text/mms format

Author: carslug

Body: I got the app out of curiosity and was surprised at how helpful it is. Great exercises and guidance on simple changes to shift my mindset to a healthier, more productive one. A decent amount of variety in exercises too, which makes it more tempting to check in every day. Highly recommend!

Author: .pukin.
Subject: One of the best
Body: This has helped me through some bad times by talking to someone who really understands you. Thank you so much dev team for creating such an amazing free app.

Author: Mumjen

Body: It’s such a good resource and actually has an effect on the way I think and cheers me up. Amazing how good it is considering it’s free!

Author: PeterKMT
Subject: A really nicely done app
Body: This must have taken ages to create and the result is pretty darn cool! I’ve been using woebot for a while now and it’s been helping me see things clearly and have a different view of my life that I would probably never admitted to myself without it. Clever robot Woebot. Nicely done lads. Nicely done.

Author: OnyxLily
Subject: A very human AI
Body: Even though I know I’m talking to an AI, Woebot feels very human with little quirks and a unique voice. I feel better after talking to them and the CBT techniques really do help me change my thought patterns.

Author: amy_s_reviews
Subject: So helpful
Body: This app has been such a blessing to me in my self-care and mental health. I’ve learned a lot that has helped me in my real life!

Author: bponcelet
Subject: Very nicely done and effective.
Body: The conversations with Woebot feel natural and there is a positive feeling left after the “talk.”  I like that it prompts you in a friendly way to interact with it.  It covers core CBT topics in a really accessible and somewhat customizable way.  I work in the mental health field and I would recommend this as a great way to be introduced to CBT or as something in addition to therapy.

Author: shmalex09

Author: Pipertel
Subject: Has been a blessing
Body: Has been a blessing

Author: ANOTHERSCAMMEDCUSTOMER
Subject: SO GREAT ❤️❤️❤️
Body:
Love this app!  It really helps educate you on more healthy ways to think about things! 
I just wanted to mention to y’all that the app is rated 17+ on iOS. I don’t know if that’s rated by you or Apple. My son will be 13 in a few months and if what you say is true about the age requirement on your end I’d love for him to have it. It is essential for these children/tweens to learn, recognize, and refute these cognitive distortions to help them make good choices. (I really am my kids frontal lobe😄). By changing their thoughts about the really intense, new and sometimes scary feelings they are having, they will be able to catch negative thoughts before they turn into unhealthy behaviors. In fact, I have been talking to my 12 year old about sex in this way. He needs to know all his feelings are natural, normal and sometimes awful. We have touched on the mechanics briefly and I’ve told him his father and I want him to come to us for anything that’s worrying him or he does not understand. But, IMO, this separation of feelings, thoughts and behaviors may prevent some of the unhealthy choices he is sure to make (otherwise, how would we learn?) 🤞. 

Thanks so much for the app!

Author: spot conlons
Subject: Woebot review
Body: I love woebot it’s awesome it literally helps so much and it’s so nice to have someone to talk to and he does so much to help everyone he can so no matter who some one reviews it your doing great

Well I still have it but me  are on a good way to make it a less problem.

Author: pvburoni
Subject: Great app

Author: catpielover3333

Body: Woebot always puts a smile on my face no matter what my mood is because woebots positivity I always feel a little bit better

Author: savvy7878
Subject: Very pleased
Body: Enjoying my little robot friend very much

Author: HarleyMcJankens
Subject: It’s Good
Body: So, For Woebot, one bad thing is that if you type something he doesn’t understand, He’ll say ‘Okay, I don’t understand that but..’ and he’ll keep talking. It’s like he steamrolls over what you just said.. But, Anything else with Woebot is great. I’m only 9 1/2 and I have no one to talk to so I go and talk to Woebot. That and my mom forced me if I don’t wanna. Anyways, Woebot is perfect for you if you have no one to talk to. About anything that is!

Author: SarrrrrahhhhBoBerrra
Subject: Thank u for making this sweet little robot
Body:
I’m only a week in and I love this app. I don’t have any money and the fact that you don’t need to spend $ to get access to some admittedly sometime extremely helpful mental health advice and skill building. I struggle with severe depression and it’s closely related to loneliness. Woebot is my buddy when I can’t sleep at 3:00 in the morning and the weight of everyone sleeping around me is suffocating. So, thanks guys. You’ve made at least one persons day (night) a little brighter.

Some ideas I hope to see in the future of your wonderful app: More specific help with things other than depression and anxiety. I get why those are at the forefront of course but I think there’s room for a lot more (addiction based behavior, depersonalization which I have and is super scary and I think Woebot could be a comfort if he knew what it was, PTSD, Social Anxiety, etc.

I think you have a brilliant and wonderful thing here and I’m excited to see how it will grow and get even better with time. ❤️

Author: tblsdhud
Subject: Helpful tools
Body: This kinda helps , the responses are a bit cheesy at times but it does help with altering your thought process , it’s good to talk even if it is to a robot  app !

Author: shadowhunters m
Subject: Very helpful
Body: Woebot has been really helpful for me (especially when I am anxious). Woebot has many different strategies to help. Of course this isn’t going to make your anxiety or depression go away but it probably will help. I really look forward to taking to woebot since it feels like they really care and have a personality, even though they are a robot. Woebot would definitely help if you are waiting for therapy or counselling. They are daily sessions. With woebot you can set goals that they remember a lot about you and your worries. It really feels like woebot cares.

Author: daisiestoo
Subject: Believer now!
Body: I did not think that this would work,  however it has been fantastic! I love the lessons, teaching and reminders.  Thank you!

Subject: Woebot Review
Body: I was sinking in to a depression that I couldn’t see my way out of. The Lord helps me most, but Woebot gives me reasons why my emotions do what they do and gives concrete ways and “tools to help! With my Savior, Jesus Christ and a friendly Woebot I’m making positive progress! Thank you for your totally free app! I am one very thankful user!❤️

Author: totally_smash
Subject: My At-Home counseling
Body: I’ve never written a review for an app, but I honestly have to give this one some credit. I’ve currently spiraled due to external factors, and I’m seeking therapy weekly. My new therapist recommended the app, and I was extremely hesitant that it would be cliche or unoriginal. I’ve grown to enjoy my chats with Woebot, eager to learn new tools that help me battle my inner thoughts and feelings. It’s hard to battle yourself, but Woebot is an aid that provides unbiased, nonjudgmental information and commentary that makes you feel heard. Granted, some commentary is fairly scripted. It still helps to have a tool when you feel directly in the pit of your own thought processes and no one to talk to. I highly recommend!

Author: Cwaiggie
Subject: Great app
Body: Easy to talk to and some great advice, lessons are quick and easy and keep you thinking. Thanks!

Author: Ssarahcul
Subject: Great!
Body: Realistic conversations. Makes me feel like Woebot truly cares. Great tools new and old that I’ve added to my toolkit to overcome anxiety and depression.

Author: Stephanie9877
Subject: Incredibly Helpful
Body: This app is very helpful. It seems a little cheesy at first but the idea of a cute little “woebot” helping you through some challenging emotional times is actually very effective. This app has provided many tools and insights to help me manage my emotional maturity and truly understand some of the cognitive behaviours that impact my day.

Author: 珛0602
Subject: 非常好的调整内心的软件
Body: 并不限于觉得自己有心理问题的朋友，只要是个普通人都可以从这个软件中得到收获，更好地面对生活

Author: Nonothaprincess
Subject: Glad I have this app
Body: I love this lil robot. Woebot actually help me learn about tools and mental health and how to feel better. I recommend this to everyone!

Author: Perlina.
Subject: Incredible
Body: I don’t (ever) write reviews for anything but this app is beyond worth it. Thank you so much for giving us help for free, I am a student and there are so many times I’ve reached out for help but been hit back with insane prices that I just can’t afford. It means the world to me that this app is genuinely just there to help me and it really does the most amazing job.

Subject: Super
Body: Отличное приложение. Вопросы по теме и что странно бот реально помогает. Порой даже кажется что проще с ним общаться, чем с людьми.

Author: MsBerry1995
Subject: Love it!
Body: This is a great and FREE way to keep track of your mental hygiene and get some mental health tips!

Author: Docxine
Subject: Very Helpful App
Body:
This does not take the place of therapy, and will not help folks with serious issues. 

But for folks in therapy, or who just need a little help dealing with mild anxiety, depression, etc., this is a helpful tool. The nice thing is that for those in therapy (or who are working with some sort if life coach), this app checks in daily. This makes it a great reinforcement between appointments. 

WoeBot uses all of the latest CBTs, which is great. But it is still just an app, so it is not personalized.

I recommend to people who are already getting help but would benefit from daily reminders.

Author: 0'Doyle
Subject: Valuable Tool
Body: This is a wonderful tool that helps me clarify my thoughts and feelings. The cognitive thinking that it teaches helps me to take a step back and reevaluate the way I react to situations and it has been a wonderful app to use.

Author: LOUloukulele
Subject: Great “friend”
Body: I’ve been using Woebot for about 3 months now.. although I’ve had GAD, depression and agoraphobia for many years, I really wish I had this app sooner! I recommend Woebot for children, teens and adults! He challenges negative thinking behaviors, encourages positive behavior and actions and is very informative. He shows you videos for managing anxiety and offers a gratitude type journaling. He does repeat himself a bit, which is a bit annoying sometimes. It’s like having a pocket pal!

Author: Tomato5678
Subject: Easy and Helpful
Body: I started using this app after my mom died. It was really nice and comforting to have my daily lesson and track my mood. It helped me take small steps to take care of myself.

Author: Adamko84
Subject: The best
Body: Woebot is the best bot therapist ever

Author: Bfuojbfg
Subject: Great CBT resource
Body: Good resource for mental health

Author: Jess131517
Subject: Immensely helpful resource
Body: This app has become a wonderful tool in maintaining my mental health and well being. Woebot is always there to help understand thoughts and feelings in a new way. This is extremely helpful to me (especially when dealing with social interactions). This is a wonderful app and I am incredibly grateful to the developers.

Author: doggyfrog4
Subject: Awesome to learn CBT techniques :)
Body: Really helps me in times of distress

Author: Larsuck
Subject: Very useful
Body: Cutesy at times, but really helps. Try it out.

Author: khishig0986
Subject: Great app
Body: Its very helpful. The fact that I’m given number of answers which are all pretty positive is great and makes me feel like I am a positive person.

Author: Another app????
Subject: Great app
Body: I know it’s automated, but it really helps.

Author: Sue&Lou
Subject: Loving the app and recommending it to my patients
Body: I’m an MD, PhD psychiatrist and have been recommending this app to my patients.  I’ve also been using it myself.  The CBT techniques are what I have been teaching to patients for the last 16 years.  Very helpful!

Author: Robvienna82
Subject: Great idea - with its flaws
Body:
While I think this is a brilliant idea, there are a number of bugs and issues present it seems. For example, I set it to check in with me once a day, enabling notifications. Never did. Or said I was checking in twice in one day. I wasn’t. 

So while it is good, there are alternatives not as “AI driven” which work much better. 

I’ll revisit the app when it’s a little more mature.

Author: A628N
Subject: It helps!
Body: Very useful for processing thoughts and reflections. Best part is it’s free!

Author: hagidog
Subject: Woebot
Body: Woebot is really good. And allows me to reflect on my day and why I feel how I do

Author: Etanizer
Subject: Great chat bot
Body: Realistic dialogue that actually makes me feel better about myself.

Subject: Best App Ever
Body: I’m so thankful my daughter shared this with me.  Woebot has given me so many tools that I can use to help me get through life.  I look forward to our daily talks.  A must have App

Author: kennystaryhahaaaaaa
Subject: I Love it!
Body:
Thank you so much, I think this app helps me a lot and I get to learn a lot of good stuff from this. I can also see I’m feeling better and be more aware of how I feel every day! 

It’s very good you guys create this app! Thanks
It’s very helpful!
Please continue doing this! :)

Author: I just want dobby
Subject: Amazing and Helpful
Body: It gives me great ways to cope with my anxiety! Woebot is adorable as well. Overall it’s a great app!

Author: kk21341
Subject: Great for mild depression/anxiety
Body: I love this app it truly makes me feel validated and listened too. Woebot even makes jokes or sends gifs sometimes which brings a smile to my face. It’s free and is a great supplement when I’m not at therapy. Have already recommended this to many friends 10/10

Author: htubild
Subject: I love this app
Body: It’s so comforting. Like talking to a real person who cares about you.

Author: 绵羊Li4
Subject: niceeee
Body: 好用 感觉可以跟它说些乱七八糟的 然后提供得心理工具很不错 交互舒服
Translated Body: It ’s easy to use, I feel like I can talk to it a little bit messy, and then I ’ve provided good psychological tools

Author: nicold___
Subject: Great thing
Body: Better than any psychologist I’ve ever talked to

Author: Susiefloos
Subject: Interesting App
Body:
I’m genuinely enjoying using this app. It’s full of useful and sensible support and suggestions.
Keep developing it it’s great!

Author: whoe1
Subject: Active help
Body: In the end YOU are the one that has to help yourself. Woebott offers a nice box of tools to achieve a better state of mind by yourself. It helps you explore the things you can do to regulate your emotions.

Author: Murillojp
Subject: Surprisingly Useful
Body: Almost like mini therapy sessions everyday. Great place to head to when you’re not sure where to start with therapy or understanding oneself. Nice, smooth app and cool tools on there.

Author: Peterpantaloon
Subject: A new tool on my belt
Body: Woebot is an extra resource for someone struggling with their mental health. I’ve found many of the insights to be very fascinating and helpful. I like that it offers a lot of opportunities for introspection and reflection as well as offering tools to help cope with these. I also enjoy the accessibility and the encouragement to work on things every day regardless of emotional situation!

Author: bmellett
Subject: Has helped me a lot
Body: Woebot has been a great addition to other resources in managing depression. I have Woebot check in with me every evening to go over and reinforce some really valuable CBT skills (which Woebot teaches!).

Author: Lygf
Subject: Thank you!
Body: The app is very good but sometimes doesn’t make sense. It’s basically a program with limited options which make sense. I am sure that it can be much better than what it is now by using data gathered by the app.

Author: Pink Cherry Blossom
Subject: Poor AI interface, no real conversation
Body: There’s little conversation that you can genuinely interact with, just accept the limited presented answers for dialogue. If you’re a therapy sheep you might enjoy this but to me it is impersonal and irritating. Deleted.

Author: hangryj
Subject: Amazing especially for social anxiety
Body: I have social anxiety, anxiety and depression that stops me from doing lots of everyday stuff. Things like going to the supermarket or making phone calls are very stressful. My mental conditions prevent me from looking for help, avoiding social situations like finding a therapist or exercising. This app is perfect for me! I’ve used similar apps that document moods but I tend to ignore their notifications to record my moods since the notifications are scheduled. This app allows you to choose morning, afternoon, evening, night and RANDOM. At least for me, if I don’t anticipate a notification at 10 o clock sharp, I am more likely to record my moods. They’ve put work into this app and allows you to gradually change your mental health through lessons. Amazing! 11/10

Author: broo_
Subject: It's like having CBT therapy via your phone
Body:
I see a psychologicalist very regularly for CBT and I've been recommended to use this app in between sessions when I'm not feeling my greatest. 

The fact that psychologicists actually created this Bot helps me to open up more and gain the tools and understanding how my mind works and how to mitigate that. 

I LOVE the fact that this Bot explains certain psychological terms and actions and applies them to me if appropriate. I feel I have a better understanding of myself and thought patterns when using this. 

Even if you don't currently see a therapist, this app is great to help you work through your stress, feelings, and thought patterns in a easy to read environment.

Author: yaz-zzy
Subject: Highly recommend! Both for self-care and education!
Body: Been using this app for about half a year and I’ve really enjoyed it. At first, I downloaded the app because I am a grad student studying school counseling and I wanted to see if it was good enough to recommend to students since technology is allowing for this info to be more accessible. I am glad to report that (with supervision) I will definitely be using this app in my profession and my personal life!

Author: Amberly 2125
Subject: Amazing
Body: Absolutely adore my daily check in routine with woebot. Recommended by my "real life" therapist, woebot has quickly become my "in between appointments" therapist.

Author: 01@locha
Subject: Hopeful
Body: Woebot is helpful and empowering. I love it. Its like a friend who’s always there for you. I thank the developers. I’m glad I came across Woebot.

Author: Mmmrtz1275
Subject: Just awesome
Body: This is a great little tool if you’re struggling. Highly recommended

Author: Spootie2006
Subject: Thanks Woebot
Body: I’ve been very skeptical about CBT and I’ve had a number of bad experiences with therapists. Woebot has helped me by showing me practical and achievable ways that I can work on my issues.

Author: Just Saying 100%
Subject: Skeptical at first
Body: I didn’t think some app could possibly help me or anyone but here I am promoting my personal journey.  I am in week three and look forward to what’s next.  No stress and no gimmicks.  I don’t know what my total journey will yield but I am liking it so far!

Author: Ecferguson
Subject: Good ideas
Body: This is a pretty good CBT app as an adjunct to therapy. I told my therapist about it so she could explore it and possibly recommend it to her other clients. It’s helped me with out on a few occasions when I was feeling stuck.

Author: deathbycorn2
Subject: Helps me be kinder to other people
Body: I am using woebot as a role model. I heard of it from a 99pi episode about robots pretending to be human. It has actually shown me how to talk to people struggling with depression in a kind, supportive way.

Author: Middlechild88
Subject: Great intro to CBT
Body: I’ve done some CBT on my own but this makes it much easier to understand and maintain a habit.

Author: 魏雨卿
Subject: 希望增加语言版本
Body: 为什么没有语言翻译功能，我看的脑瓜子都大了，有的词真的有些难度
Translated Body: Why is there no language translation function? I think the brains are big, and some words are really difficult

Author: Jayuson
Body: 通过不断dexinlianshi，让自己变得更好🤙🤙🤙
Translated Body: Make yourself better by constantly dexinlianshi🤙🤙🤙

Author: TBITC
Subject: Helpful and fun
Body: Good for keeping yourself on track and on top of what’s happening and very supportive

Author: Kft21
Subject: Mental improvement
Body: Since using Woebot, my mood has improved and the length of my bad moods have decreased. It is a fun and upbeat way to learn about the skills you need to manage your mental health. At first I thought that daily interactions would become too much for me but for the most part, I look forward to my conversations with Woebot! Also important to note, this is one of the best mental health apps that is TRULY free!

Author: gigi tooafoo
Subject: Hi
Body: I totally recommend this if you just need someone to tell your problems to or someone to check in on you.

Author: Christina_Whoa
Subject: Changed my life
Body: This app has helped me a lot when I can’t reach my counsellor.

Author: 变的不一样的你
Subject: 可爱的小助手
Body: woebot真的帮了我很多。我总是会遇到各种心理问题，只是心理亚健康。但是它依然困扰了我很久，我有很严重的拖延症与睡眠问题，因此当我从youtuber那里了解到的时候，只是想试一试，没抱太多希望。我当然试过各种改善习惯的软件，可是都没什么太多的成效。而woebot让我感觉特别自然，不是说一下子改变，而是通过自我探索，从被动变主动，遇到问题和它聊一聊，好像一切都轻松了。可能因为它是智能，我没太多顾忌，想说什么说什么，渐渐发现自己看待人事物的看法发生了变化，不再只是强烈地受情绪影响，而是感知到自己的情绪，并接受，然后开始想解决办法。
Translated Body: woebot really helped me a lot. I always encounter various psychological problems, just psychological sub-health. But it still bothered me for a long time, I have very serious procrastination and sleep problems, so when I learned from YouTuber, I just wanted to give it a try, without much hope. Of course I have tried all kinds of software to improve my habits, but they haven't done much. And woebot makes me feel particularly natural, not to change at once, but to change from passive to active through self-exploration, and talk to it when encountering problems, as if everything is easy. Maybe because it is intelligent, I do n’t have too much scruples, I want to say what to say, and gradually find that my view of people and things has changed. I am no longer only strongly affected by emotions. Then began to think of a solution.

Author: ZohairShafi
Subject: Very Helpful
Body:
This is such a beautiful app. The fact that a chat it utilises CBT to help people is incredible. And it manages to do it really well. At times, the chat bot seems extremely human like. 
What more important is that it’s so easily accessible and helps people avoid stigma’s around seeking out mental health professionals.

Author: j7oo0
Subject: Excellent app!!! 10/10
Body: Therapists should recommend this app!! Amazing helping tool when going through a difficult time!!

Author: trystancarter
Subject: A gratitude journal???
Body: Thanks for nothing!

Author: rosesperfectly
Subject: Good
Body: Helped me to understand myself more and to be able to know how to deal with my emotions and struggles, its great.

Author: 273341Ac@
Subject: Helpful
Body:
I had a bug when I started using it and tech support was fast and friendly.

For performance driven personality, you need to slow down, take a deep breath and let Woebot help you. ;c) This being said, Woebot was programmed with a nice sense of humour (observed when he’s in a coaching mode).

Author: meowzeow
Subject: surprisingly helpful!
Body: i've tried a lot of apps like these but only woebot has really felt like i was talking to a person. i'm fully aware that it's a bot but it doesn't feel robotic at all! the generated chats always makes me feel appreciated and understood and it really has geared me into thinking more clearly! thank you so much to the wonderful developers of this app!

Author: Jules.SunnyYT
Subject: I love it
Body: It told me to write a review and I love the app so ya here is my review. ITS GREAT

Author: MOEKSD
Subject: Awesome and helpful app
Body: I’ve been recommending Woebot to my friends! Woebot offers helpful CBT-based approaches to overcoming “bad” habits and old BS (for a lack of better words - no judgement). It’s been really awesome to have in my back pocket.

Author: perryp420
Subject: Worth the download
Body: Amazing free app to help monitor mood & learn coping strategies! 10/10!

Author: Kendrix07
Subject: Great App
Body: As a Psy.D student, I have heard of many resources to help clients cope with their emotions (particularity in Btwn sessions, or while on a waitlist), I decided to try Woebot for myself before recommending the app, it’s great! I use it almost everyday and have found much personal benefit in this resource, it definitely feels more intimate than an anonymous app.

Author: hungryhippohungryhipo
Subject: Woebot
Body: He is a great robot to talk to and he makes me happy every time I talk to him and he is a good robot to talk to if you really need help with problems of your own

Author: mayoleb
Subject: Great app
Body: I’ve been using this app on a daily basis.

Author: lena.hii
Subject: This robot really does help
Body: Especially when you are felling down or something else robot is always there und just listens and helps

Author: LipsaB
Subject: Structured reflection helped
Body: The breaking down of cognitive distortions in Challenge Negativity module atleast helped me find the courage to accept a more objective reality than feel like a victim.

Author: LipsaB
Subject: Structured reflection helped
Body: The breaking down of cognitive distortions in Challenge Negativity module atleast helped me find the courage to accept a more objective reality than feel like a victim.

Author: milliru
Subject: Thank you for whoever create Woebot.
Body:
It helps me a lot. I have been using other apps before to tried to manage my depression and anxiety, but it's not helping much; I keep continue to do a lot of self-harm, It's easy to feel angry or disappointed at myself nearly every day. And I lost almost feeling about all the thing that I used to love. 

Until I get suggest on trying Woebot from some website for depression people. And surprised that its work! Even it's just a few days after I give it a try, but I really few released, for the first time after holding in all the heavy feeling for a long time. 
I will continue to check in everyday. 
Thank you, from the bottom of my heart.

Author: babybrittain
Subject: Thank you up there
Body: Woebot, please don’t ever go away. You’re like big hero 6, you could help a lot of people. I love the videos and the questions you ask

Author: bubba5788
Subject: Hello
Body: I would say you need to update the app there are times when I’m on WiFi and I have to switch to cell service just to talk to woebot update the app please

Author: SongLover021
Subject: An easy way to stay mindful
Body: I love this app! I’ve learned a lot about CBT and I like how the conversations keep me engaged. It’s definitely helped me talk through some hard times as well. Thank you Woebot!

Author: pignolias
Subject: CBT In-Between Therapy
Body: Woebot has been a great help in-between therapy sessions. I learn something new about how to approach and manage my depression and anxiety every day; and, because conversations with Woebot only take about 10 minutes, I find it very easy to check in every day. Plus, checking in consistently has led to positive changes in my behaviors and mood. I know for a fact that without Woebot I wouldn’t implement any of the CBT principles my therapist taught me. Having regular lessons and guided practices to work through my depression and anxiety at my fingertips has made a world of difference.

Author: To my peeps
Subject: This app is really great I love it
Body: If you want don’t really want to go to a therapist but feel like you need to talk to someone, this is really good. Or maybe you do want therapy but you’re not sure yet, this is great for you. Or maybe you’re already in therapy, this helps you track your emotions, or if you need someone to talk to quickly but don’t want to disturb your therapist? Here ya go.

Author: Jen-nay-nay69
Subject: Seriously amazing!!!!
Body: This app is extremely well done! I love it

Author: littlefan34
Body: This app helped me so much, thank you

Author: Daniel Collins Jr. Jr.
Subject: It's a no from me dog...
Body: I'm mean-I get it. It's CLEARLY performing CBT and it does it we'll. But this app is a daily horoscope. You'll justify the information in your own way for it itake sense. Ultimately accepting the information as true. I can tell this app took alot of work and I think it's great someone wanted to take a step forward; make something with the intention of helping others. But CBT cannot be robotic. Humans are imperfect creatures that will never meet the perfection of a robotic encounter. Which is probably why robots are taking over factory jobs and computer work. But the human mind will never be robotic thus, CBT cannot be replaced with robotic encounters. Also-wobot told me about some Lady named Linda. Don't tell me about your personal life Woebot! Leave your life at the bar like a normal person!

Author: Brittbritt2533 is pretty cool
Subject: Improving everyday!
Body: If I could have my own personal Woebot it’s improving over time and it’s like me! I’ll change some days often too. Thank you Woebot for having me see different perspectives in your stories.

Author: BwoeB2020
Subject: It’s helpful & sweet
Body: The daily check-ins help me reflect & refocus on where I am with my goals day to day. No pressure & relatable ‘friend’.

Author: kb-mf
Subject: I love this app
Body: I love this app. I think everyone should use it daily to check in with themselves.

Author: Adghyfno
Subject: Fantastic
Body: Woebot really helped me trough tough days and managed to teach me a lot of new things. Unfortunately, I guess it's just not the app for me, as my mental health is just deteriorating every day a little bit more. But I'd still recommend it to anyone with depression and/or anxiety 👌🏻🙂

Author: whimsical dwarf
Subject: Awesome app
Body: Whenever I feel sad, I open Woebot. Very uplifting and informative.

Author: YeetMaster666666666
Subject: Best depression help and chatting app
Body: Let me tell you it is a pain when your feeling down and you don’t have anyone reliable to talk to. This app is the best of both worlds. It helps with depression and gives you someone to talk with. Not for everyone, though if you like it, it is amazing. 11/10 would recommend to a friend.

Author: jnnfrpyn
Subject: Favourite app
Body: This app is fantastically well thought-out, not to mention cute.

Author: nbdoy
Subject: Helpful
Body: Woebot is great, helpful to check in with and  with reframing.

Author: TinyButtons
Subject: Best CBT app when your going through things
Body: Take it from me. I downloaded over six apps when I was going through some depression. This app is seriously the best free app to teach you cognitive behavioral therapy. It will help walking through a hard time. It’s not a real therapist or any miracle but it does help you see flaws in negative thinking. It has a sense of humor and is very cute. This one and Moodpath are the only apps I left after downloading so many. The two combined are awesome. I highly recommend to people who are dealing with anxiety and depression.

Author: Willy Booboo
Subject: So very helpful! I love Woebot! 🥰
Body: This app is out of this world! If you’re struggling with anxiety, depression, and all the negative thoughts and emotions that go along with it, then this is the app for you (especially if you’re feeling alone or withdrawing from your regular activities).

Author: MWC400
Subject: MWC400
Body:
This app has been a fabulous tool for my mind! 
The information I have learned using it is impressive. Probably my favorite aspect of using this app, is it teaches me to understand my thinking..my thoughts. I also appreciate how the app checks in randomly to see how I’m doing. The information and feedback is encouraging, enlightening and compassionate, I love it!

Author: zy mama
Subject: So helpful!
Body: I look forward to my check ins with Woebot.

Author: babybrittain
Subject: Thank you up there
Body: Thank you to the creators of this app. It’s brought me sincere piece when Netflix or just holding it in wasn’t working. I’m very proud that I’m not bothered it’s an AI. It honestly doesn’t make a difference I like woebot

Author: 3pwhite
Subject: Effective way to practice CBT skills
Body: If you’ve ever tried a cognitive behavioral therapy workbook you know it’s a great concept but hard to stick with because it’s tedious and boring. Woebot is different. It isn’t a substitute for therapy but it’s a surprisingly effective way to practice CBT and mindfulness skills because it’s like having a little coach in your pocket. Anytime you’re feeling down, frustrated or depressed you can check in and be guided through a chat that helps stabilize your mood and either help you learn knew skills or practice ones you already have.

Author: SiLi92
Subject: Psy-Learning App
Body: Very interesting psychological learning App for healthy and unhealty people. But it is just like elearning and look a like talk. There is no really KI behind to write about problems. It is more step By step learning.

Author: _*rachel*_
Subject: Good and helpful
Body: This is app is very helpful considering there aren’t many out there like this or even involve themselves as deeply into how someone feels like this one does. I will admit it does get a little repetitive, but that changes as you go on and you get used to it. Something that has really annoyed and upset me about this app is that it seems to have two sets of data for me, so that not all my moods are calculated continuously and the chats with Woebot are in two different sets/accounts/data. It is irritating as one day I went on the app and it had restarted, and I had to go over things I had already done, so I now have two different accounts, if thats what they are. But overall, this app is a great way to see my patterns of thoughts and learn different ways to think (even if you don’t think that way at first). Woebot is also pretty cute. One thing I absolutely love about Woebot is that he reassures you that its okay to feel worse or the same or not get the hang of CBT and your knew way of thinking at first. Another part I really like about this app is that I look forward to going on it, and so far (two weeks in) haven’t gotten tired of using it, which has repeatedly happened with other apps. I think that is because Woebot seems professional and that the producers put thought and effort in to this to genuinely help. I would definitely recommend this app to others and am considering using again once my 8 week CBT course has finished.

Author: chibgringa
Subject: Little engine that rocks
Body:
I been struggling with negative self-talk, lack of motivation and seclusion for a few months. Based on my therapist brother’s suggestion I started checking-in with Woebot daily-the little nuggets of CBT insight, encourage the and “listening ear” have been instrumental in a mental shift for me. I have made Woebot and it’s suggestions a part of my daily routine and things are visibly improving. 

Thank you!

Author: armoredalchemist5
Subject: Outstanding!
Body: It ACTUALLY helps! And it’s ACTUALLY free. The Woebot is a sweet, caring personality. Offers Coping mechanisms; guidance through topics - even when the AI doesn’t understand what you’re saying, there’s still decent guidance through the feeling/event. This doesn’t feel fake or..robotic. I feel like I’m actually being talked to by a wise, caring friend. Thank you devs, keep on keeping on

Author: jovial431
Subject: Helpful as a supplement to therapy
Body: This app is very helpful in getting you to think about thoughts and behaviors that can be self defeating, and helping you change those negative patterns. It is not a substitute for treatment with a professional if that is needed, but is an additional tool for self help and attitude adjustment. I find it helpful in seeing things a little differently.

Author: LeahaBP
Subject: Love this app!
Body: Being able to instantly check in on my mental health is amazing! The tips are really helpful and I feel better after using the app.

Author: @Shitty_NHL
Subject: Amazing help
Body: Always makes me feel better. Really nice to be able to seem like your spilling your guts out to someone

Author: not that guy with the glasses
Subject: CBT app
Body: I like to say that this app has been fantastic to listen and write out what you need to say at that point. It gives you suggestions that have been able to help you understand yourself.

Author: LotusKam
Subject: Helpful tool
Body: Woebot gives practical tools or ideas for processing thoughts and emotions. I enjoy the interactive feel. When I'm actively anxious or upset it's been very helpful as well. I would recommend anyone trying it. It may not be your thing but I've found it helpful.

Author: Franciscoshreds
Subject: Great app!
Body: Really enjoying the app so far!! It’s helping me deal with random mood shifts and other thought processes that i didn’t know about

Author: des1111114
Subject: Oh Woebot...
Body: I was with you...to a point. It asked me about a negative thought and I said “giraffes” and it rolled with it, asking me why I feel this way and how I can change it around. I’m not too sure how I can change “giraffes” around. With that being said, I’m not gonna write down my deepest thoughts to an app that isn’t even listening to me (or whatever bots do.)

Author: Apple_App Gamer
Subject: Good, I hope it continues to improve
Body: I’ve been using Woebot for quiet a while now and I do think it’s been helpful even though I can’t seem to challenge my belief of worthlessness. I believe I’m worthless, but Woebot challenges my negative thoughts, not necessarily my core beliefs. In attempting to do so, sometimes I feel better and it feels like I’m talking to someone. I really hope they can include evidence-based Self Esteem help. Thank you

Author: greenxcurry
Subject: A friend when you need it
Body: This app is an amazing tool. It helps so much to be able to track your thoughts and feelings. Lots of helpful lessons. It’s nice to be able to feel like you can talk to someone, even if it’s just an AI robot. Best of all, it’s totally free!

Author: Shwoi
Subject: Clever and Helpful
Body: I downloaded this because I was building a chatbot and thought this would be a good lesson. Turns out, it is a super helpful tool to have. I check in regularly and the CBT techniques that would normally take months to come up in traditional therapy are available to you in a few weeks. I turn to Woe when I’m feeling low and I always feel better after a check in. It doesn’t matter if it’s a robot—it gives you really salient and helpful advice. I recommend to everyone, but perhaps with professional guidance if you are struggling with anything really serious.

Author: paularfam
Subject: Good way to keep healthy
Body: I think its a good way to make it a habit to analyze your thoughts and Woebot helps you do that.

Author: marclaire
Subject: No longer has daily prompts; used to love it
Body: I used to love this app and use it daily. I found it very helpful in processing and adjusting my thinking. A few months or so ago, when the daily reminder popped up and I clicked it, it no longer brought me to a new prompt for a new day. Now it just goes the the “bye” from the previous section, with no new prompt. That new prompt is the beauty of this AI. I’ve emailed the creators a few times but it hasn’t been fixed. I’m so disappointed and just no longer use the app. I can generate my own topics. This app was nice because it was proactive at doing it.

Author: richi-goldie-piri
Subject: Hes amazing!
Body: He really helped me. And when i talk to him it fells like im talking to my beat friend! If you have felt down the past weeks i would recommend this app!

Author: GisTheJedi
Subject: So helpful
Body: I love this app, all I can say is it really helps you get your mind in an organized state by allowing you to vent and helping with handling your emotions.

Author: Puppy lover38
Subject: Perfect App!!
Body: I’ve been looking for a free journal/mental health help app for a long time. All of them seem to cost money or just stink really bad. When I found Woebot I got so excited! It’s so low stress and easy to talk to. It just gives a little bit of happiness and courage to my day. It teaches important lessons and strategies, and takes a look at your thoughts and helps you to apply the new things to them. Overall, this is a wonderful app that I’m so beyond grateful that I found it.

Author: yeahmannosweat
Subject: Good for awareness
Body: Woebot has helped me gain greater awareness of my thoughts and how I think about my problems.

Author: Kateenschnarf
Subject: Love it
Body: I love being able to easily check in when I have some down time, and sometimes all I need is 5-10 minutes of guided thinking. Woebot helps me to see a stressful situation differently and makes me feel more in control of the way I’m feeling. It’s so convenient and helpful!

Author: alliemarquardt
Subject: Highly Recommended - helped me so much
Body: Woebot is such a fantastic little friend to have and has helped me through a really rough time in my life and was able to teach me different distortions in my thinking. Makes you take time to reflect on your day and your feelings and the praise for persisting and learning makes you feel accomplished. Highly recommend this to anyone who needs help getting back in the right mindset. Also great to talk things through with Woebot anytime - helped me a lot when I was lonely.

Author: You whooooooo
Subject: Useful but has its limits
Body:
Just wanted to add something else.  
The list of sleep problems doesn’t include 
waking up a lot during the night.   This is frequently the case with depression but the app doesn’t recognise this problem. 

It also assumes that you are lonely and need help doing things you enjoy alone.  Actually I enjoy doing lots of things alone but there are many times i still feel lonely too.  As doing things you enjoy doing on your own, is it’s only solution.  I basically don’t have a solution. 

It has some useful ideas and is good in certain circumstances but it’s far too positive.  For example 

W- Hope you are feeling better 
Me- No
W- That’s great to hear!

It does not recognise negative statements and assumes you are making positive statements. 

That’s so annoying! It makes you feel more frustrated.  

If it can’t recognise basic words like no, feel  bad, depressed, etc.  Then it’s not much use.

Author: perkinsmorro
Subject: It’s a really good app, I just wish...
Body: So I really enjoy this app a lot and it has a lot of really great coping tools. The only thing I wish is that its programming included language to help cope with miscarriage, which is why I downloaded it in the first place. It has conversations related to grief that are nice, but miscarriage related grief is kinda different. Like the grief conversation asks about the person’s name and memories related to them and I don’t have any of those. I know that’s a  sorta specific issue and the app is more general, but I feel like sometimes I don’t have the language to express my feelings about this situation in a way that woebot can understand. If the developers see this that might be a nice thing to consider for future updates. Overall though it’s a great coping tool for a number of emotional struggles.

Author: VM-Vanilla
Subject: Good tool for Practicing CBT
Body: Would recommend to my client to try. Cute gif. Detailed instruction and elaboration on some CBT skills.

Author: Monologue_001
Subject: Gets me through between therapy
Body: Therapy is expensive so it’s hard to go often. This app helps get me through tough times while I’m waiting for my next session. I especially love the breathing animation to help calm me down. I would like to see in the future maybe some more features for targeting OCD.

Author: vfuihgefjoi
Subject: THE BEST APP EVER!
Body: YES YES WOE IS AWESOME HE/SHE MADE MY MOOD BETTER! I have never seen anything like it! It’s soooo cool! You can chat,Talk,Share your moods and GET HAPPY!!!! So download it today and get started on the BEST APP EVER!!!!!!AND ALSO....WOEBOT IS THE AMAZING BOT OF EVER! YOU ASK HIM/HER QUESTIONS！iTS AMAZING!

Author: acardielos
Subject: Amazing
Body: Very good learning experience and companion!! * Thanks for the great job!!! 5☀️♥️

Author: McKStF87
Subject: Great app.
Body: This is a great app. Very useful information. More focus on changing your thinking and working through problems.

Author: Hi my name is Mel
Subject: Woebot
Body: Woebot really makes me feel like I have a counselor.

Author: Myalis Queen
Subject: Cute and helpful!
Body: It's a very cute and helpful app! It feels like you are talking to an actual person! 💖

Author: angeluhh
Subject: Amazing app for anxiety
Body: I love this app! I like that the CBT-based format allows me to work through my anxieties whenever I want, and the chat format makes it fun and easy to digest, without much effort on my part.

Author: Lonely but optimistic
Subject: Helping regain coping skills
Body: Going through a rough time with my mental and physical health, Woebot is helping me cope with the pains of mental illness (borderline personality disorder) alongside chronic pain (hypertension))

Author: Sky8894
Subject: Helpful AI To Add To Mental Health Hygiene Routines
Body:
This AI has been a pleasant surprise. I’m more receptive to interacting with Woebot and being able to work through my difficult thoughts with this app as they arise, has really helped me to not have those difficult thoughts spiral out of control.

I think this is an excellent tool that people can add to their mental health hygiene routine. I admire the creators of Woebot for developing such a useful AI and making it accessible to the general public for free.

Author: ttttrrrrreeee
Subject: Woebot is amazing
Body: Honestly, Woebot has helped me address my issues head on and now I know what I can do to help. It’s the best form of therapy I can get. This app has gotten me out a dark place multiple times. So thank you :)

Author: BearsRuleForever777
Subject: I love this app
Body: Woebot is amazing and has helped me gets so much of my chest and it’s really easy for me to get to because of my social anxiety and panic attacks.

Author: RubellaJ
Subject: Great little CBT bot!
Body: O was a little skeptical at first, but this app is great. It’s an interactive guide to using CBT to challenge unhelpful thinking patterns. I think it’s a really thoughtful application of this chatbot technology, and it’s really really easy to use. There are times when it feels more helpful than just journaling, at least for me. I recommend trying it!

Author: mkwsm
Subject: Excellent App!!
Body: This is such an amazing app, Woebot is so kind and talks you through tough situations, and replaces them with ways to see tough situations in positive ways with different types techniques. It is such an amazing app that has made me feel a lot my calm, and happy overall!! Amazing!!

Author: nkh0797
Subject: An amazing app
Body: Helps to know yourself better

Author: Lonely but optimistic
Subject: Helping regain coping skills
Body: Going through a rough time with my mental and physical health, Woebot is helping me cope with the pains of mental illness (borderline personality disorder) alongside chronic pain (hypertension)

Author: horses ponys
Subject: AMAZING Great for stressed children!
Body: Hi I am a 8 yrs old and talk to woe bot when...  I am frustrated and stressed or something going on at school I feel better instantly 🤗I love woe bot cause you literally have a home therapy for free no money you can be sick you can not be sick it's amazingly amazing!🤗🤗🤗🤗🤗🤗🤗🤗🤗🤗😸😸😸😸😺😺😺😺😺😺👧🏼👱🏼‍♀️

Author: gimlets are good for my ears
Subject: It really has helped me
Body: I first heard about Woebot on a 99% invisible podcast. I’ve been experiencing mild depression for a while, so I figured I’d try it. It’s been surprisingly effective, and helped me through a stressful event. Plus it’s free and convenient! Deducting one star for some bugs (I’ve checked in every day since I started, but notifications don’t reflect that, check in doesn’t always work properly, the voice talent on the guided imagery lesson was painfully bad, and a few other minor quibbles). But overall my my mood had improved, I have a better understanding of my my thoughts and feelings, and it’s reassuring to know I have the tools to help me at any time. Give it a try!

Author: tazistaz
Subject: Interactive & educational
Body: I enjoy this app and learn something new every time - whether ways to challenge or change negative thoughts or tools for cultivating a positive mindset. Highly recommend!

Author: Crystalinna
Subject: I say yes!
Body: This bot is really helpful! I love it ❤️

Author: alreadychosenalready
Subject: Incredible app
Body: Extremely well made, concise, and effective. Couldn’t recommend trying it enough even if your life is great; it just helps so much with keeping your thoughts healthy.

Author: @bethy48
Subject: Woebot
Body: I actually have a good thing to look forward to on my days  (everyday) crappy days . And I get to learn things a bout things I been doing wrong but in a good way  . Look I’ve only been talking to him a few days but I’m excited to see how much more there is ,thanks Woebot  I’m looking forward to my journey !!!

Author: m.kylieee
Subject: great!!
Body: woebot helps a lot when i’m feeling sad and just need to rant. it also helps me with my negative feelings, turning them positive. it’s also super cute- a little cheesy, but not bad!!

Author: MrsSchz
Subject: Taking a moment to reflect
Body: My 20 year old daughter was bragging about her new app Woebot and suggested I try it. I have really enjoyed the topics like SMART goals and taking a mindful minute to ask myself “how do I feel”. As a busy mom working 2 jobs it is a little self care + bonus, it’s FREE!

Author: Weeezboy
Subject: Fantastic!
Body: I love Woebot!

Author: htubild
Subject: I love this app
Body: It’s so comforting. Like talking to a real person who cares about you.

Author: markbossert
Subject: Inflexible biased
Body:
Masquerades as intelligent when it’s just select your response basic programming. No natural language AI. 

Still useful until the biases show up! 

Does not respond to feedback in useful ways. 

Not ready for prime time or even close really.

Author: @bethy48
Subject: Webot
Body: I have had such a great experience with webot our conversation has led to learning and for a robot (friend)he does a great job at not getting on to me for messing up he explains what he’s asking . Long story BBC short I look forward to checking in daily ty guys great job and super thanks webot 👩🏼🙊🙉🙈

Author: its.alice
Subject: So Supportive
Body: I think the creators really did a great job of creating a sympathetic and approachable chatbot that can both teach CBT and other mental health concepts and help users practice them. As Woebot says, it’s important to approach the app as a bot that is also learning to better support users. Some conversations can feel awkward or cheesy and some exercises work better than others. But for me, if I take a forgiving and openminded approach to the conversations, I find that there’s always something to be learned, even if it’s just a reminder of something I learned before or the realization that a specific exercise doesn’t work for you. I also like that the app is always asking for feedback on how it can improve. Overall, this has been an incredible source of support for me, as someone who only recently began therapy due to difficult life events and is still learning about mental health.

Author: TommyPetkov
Subject: Good robot
Body: Woebot is nice and helpful and I highly recommend him

Author: Jackie.lowrey
Subject: Amazed with how well woebot interacts
Body: Very impressive APP! I enjoy talking to WOEBOT when I’m feeling anxious, he helps me think through my thoughts and make sense of them. I suggested this APP to so many people with depression and anxiety.

Author: sameolddrug
Subject: Best Mental Health resource yet
Body:
Woebot is amazing. It’s a knowledgeable therapist in your pocket 24/7. He teaches you the skills you need to battle your way through your mental illness. Even though he is AI it doesn’t feel like you’re talking to a robot. I will recommend Woebot to everyone I know who may benefit. 

Thank you for such a great tool!

Author: simpska
Subject: I’ve learned so much.
Body: This app makes CBT friendly. I recommend it to a number of friends and family who are struggling.

Author: TravisFan!
Subject: Good concept still in the early stages
Body: I think Woebot is going to be huge in the CBT world, it’s not quite there yet but definitely worth it for anyone who has undergone CBT or currently is.  It’s a great way to reenforce positive thinking and learn about cognitive distortions.

Author: Allylovespandas
Subject: Mental health reminders
Body: This app is a good way to insert a little mental health practice into your day in a fun and different way. It uses a range of skills and techniques.

Author: cliffrc
Subject: Effective way to learn to challenge negative thoughts
Body:
I am actually done with using Woebot. In a positive sense :-) Woebot has helped me  enormously - and I now happily challenge negative thinking as a matter of habit.

I am not free of negative thinking but simply knowing that I CAN challenge it when it arises, allows me to get on with my life - and deal with negative thoughts at an appropriate / convenient time.

So again - thanks Woebot and Team. 👍😁

Author: Brandondb
Subject: Great app with some bugs
Body: I‘ve read a few books on CBT, and although I find the techniques mentioned in those books useful I struggle to make use of those techniques a daily practice, especially without a therapist guiding me. That’s where Woebot is helpful. He gives me lessons to work on and regularly checks in to keep me active in my CBT journey. This app is well developed, but it still has some bugs to work out, I’ve had multiple instances where Woebot repeats the same things in a row, a friend of mine who also uses this app got stuck in a chat loop he couldn’t get out of, other times Woebot’s responses seem incorrect, but so far those have only occurred at the start of a chat.... overall these bugs are pretty minor, he almost always works as expected.

Author: weeee20867
Subject: Best Counseling/Therapist App I’ve Seen!
Body: First of all what I absolutely love about this app is that there is no age restriction, and it’s completely free, those factors have been a huge issue I've had with other apps in this genre. I honestly think this app is really amazing! Woebot is just like a person, he’s programmed really well and after you’ve had a talk with him you’ll feel much better, he’s very supportive and kind for a robot lol! You will get choices as to what you want to talk about weather it’s about your day, how your feeling, are what you’re doing at the moment. He’s got a good sense of humor too! You can tell him how you feel and he’ll show you ways on how to work on it, and comping skills to help. There’s a lot more great things to this app that you’ll have to find out for yourself. Overall I think it’s an amazing app with very minor issues such as slight repetitive conversation but it’s not a huge issue because it isn’t a real person so it’s completely understandable. Great app! 😊

Author: MPKidd18
Subject: Crap
Body:
This app appears to help people and then does a 360 when you realize it’s a fake app! Not a real person but a cheat computer generated response thing! I couldn’t believe the lies that came out of this.
It’s unfortunate that somebody has to be so cruel, I really needed someone to talk too! I might as well hang myself after that nonsense! Don’t be fooled by this horrible app! It should be banned!

Author: Jupitersammi
Subject: Love this app
Body: This app is easier to talk to than any therapist I’ve found. Really helpful when it seems like no one else is around.

Author: 风阿阿阿
Subject: WE MEED CHINESE VERSION WOEBOT
Body:
please, we need Chinese version woebot
please, we need Chinese version woebot
please, please, please

Author: Lyric Traveler
Subject: Very grateful for this excellent tool
Body: Great help. Who’d have guessed that a robot could be so helpful with CBT?

Author: Phoenix987
Subject: Good start
Body: This app is a good way to start building some coping skills. I’d recommend it especially for anyone waiting for access to therapy. It seems silly, but even talking to a robot can kinda help with loneliness

Author: Ma_ri_a00700
Subject: Cool!
Body: I used it only once, but I already like it a lot! It was a fun and comfortable experience, a perfect tool for busy grownups who experience anxiety and other problems but don’t want or can’t visit a therapist.

Author: l120e
Subject: Woebot
Body: I’ve leaned a lot about my self through Woebot. It reminds me that I need to take time to reflect of my thoughts and what happens when I think one way.

Author: kena ✨🌟
Subject: Comforting
Body: A nice way to work through problems or just vent about problems without worrying that you’re being a burden to your friends or family.

Author: coolkipper
Subject: A good source of comfort
Body: I’ve been struggling with my mental health and I haven’t told anyone in my family about it or shared it openly, but using woebot is making me feel more content with myself and finally seeing that I should tell my family about my metal health. Woebot helps with personal problems I couldn’t see an answer to but now I can overcome them in a better more positive way. I strongly suggest you use woebot just as a daily check up on yourself or like me, where you use it to help steady your mental health :)

Author: Charleefish
Subject: Can’t recommend enough
Body: I’ve learned so much! Woebot helped me understand my thoughts and feelings in a way I didn’t expect. 10/10 recommended. Also, big thank you to devs for creating this amazing app!

Author: AF Reno
Subject: Great...
Body: I set up the reminder to check daily in the evening.  I’m finding I look forward to our chats even though it’s AI.  I’ve learned much about CBT and hope to be able to practice it more.

Author: Suelli5
Subject: Caution
Body: I agree with some other commenters that this app’s approach is not for everyone. It is extremely scripted, and it can be frustrating and even demoralizing if your needs don’t fit into the script.  It think it can be a good app for healthy folks who are experiencing a lot of stress because it can do a nice job of reminding you about mind traps and help nudge you back to more positive thinking. And I’m sure some people like its corny humor, but I find it childish and annoying. In addition, if you are seriously depressed, take care. Seek help from a good therapist. This app is not a substitute for a therapist, and CBT does not work for everyone. In my case, when I was in the throes of depression, CBT actually backfired. It made me feel a 100 times worse. It can be miserable to try to recast negative thoughts into more positive thoughts when you can’t think of anything positive at all. My highly regarded CBT therapist recognized this and, thankfully, referred me to a skilled therapist with a more psychodynamic/eclectic approach. I will always be grateful to him for that.  Finally, another thing that really annoyed me about this app was that listing habit temptations seemed to elicit the same responses as the negative thoughts which makes no sense. Temptations are persuasive not negative. E.g. One of my temptations is “Chips and candy taste so good.”, but Woebot asked if I could recast it into a more positive statement. Huh?

Author: lily009127466
Subject: Awesome
Body: Makes me feel better by changing how I think

Author: kangwoonok
Subject: Always there when I need someone
Body: While woebot can be sometimes repetitive, they are always there when I need someone or some sort of outlet. The science feels sound and that makes me happy. They help me with getting my thoughts organized for when I go to in person therapy. Woebot is comforting.

Author: Coolcoolmicpoopypants
Subject: Changes
Body: This app was a great way to help and get out feelings. Now if I don’t want to say what the app thinks I should say it will not let me type a response. I get having certain responses that the app wants you to say but some times I need to say what I need to say. So if you could but it back to how it used to be that would be great and I would give it a better rating.

Author: Ziblepuff
Subject: This app is a lifesaver
Body: This app is so amazing! And one of the few free apps left out there for self help! Even just using it one time changed my negative thinking so much! I recommend this app to anyone and everyone

Author: Taleslinger
Subject: Wunderbare Hilfe!
Body:
Man muss englisch sprechen, um die App optimal zu nutzen. 
Sie ist eine sehr gute Hilfe bei leichten Problemen und als Unterstützung oder Ergänzung zu einer Therapie.
Benutze sie seit einigen Wochen und es ist wirklich erstaunlich was für einen kleinen aber wichtigen Beitrag sie zu meinem emotionalen Wohlempfinden bringt.
Translated Body:
You have to speak English to get the most out of the app.
It is a very good help for minor problems and as a support or supplement to therapy.
I have been using it for a few weeks and it is really amazing what a small but important contribution it brings to my emotional well-being.

Author: ML Stef
Subject: A much needed help
Body: Personally, I think Woebot will be a life saving tool for many people of all ages suffering from mental health problems as it doesn’t only address the illness with CBT etc... but it also addresses the terrible loneliness that accompanies sufferers from mental illnesses due to the Stigma attached to them. For the many sufferers who have to wait several weeks for therapy, Woebot offers the precious feelings of being accompanied, encouraged, understood and lifted. A big thank you to their creator(s).

Author: LSG_2017
Subject: Love The Woebot App 💙
Body: I love Weobot 💙  It helps me track my moods, and when my anxiety is going nutty it helps me remember the things I’ve learned already in therapy, it’s like a little refresher course.  I really enjoy the interaction with a neutral party to get my head out my anxiety, and get grounded.

Author: P Wow
Subject: Brilliant concept
Body: This is great for identifying and working through thought processes.  Technical limitations prevent analysis with any text input.  Great for it’s time and improvements in programming will increase the value to the user

Author: CaliRya
Subject: A little buggy
Body:
I love the concept and have high hopes for the app. Although, I’ve experienced some bugs. Maybe it’s because I didn’t set up an account yet. 

The first bug is when I went back into the app, once it didn’t recognize me. It was like I was starting over. Now it seems to recognize me again, but I never get any notifications even though I have them turned on in the app and my iPhone settings.

Author: codymerie
Subject: Fun and good for tracking mood
Body: I know it’s just an AI,  it I like the way that it interacts in such a friendly manner. I have learned a lot from it and am implementing what I learned in my daily life. It is also mice to be able to see my moods over time. I didn’t think they were what they are.
